42002027	Behold , this man came in the Spirit to the temple , and when his parents brought in Jeshu the child , to do for him as it is commanded in the law ,
42002028	he took him upon his arms and blessed Aloha , and said ,
42002029	Now dismiss thy servant , my Lord , according to thy word , in peace ;
42002030	For lo , mine eyes have seen thy grace ,
42002031	Which thou hast prepared in the face of all the nations ;
42002032	A light for the revelation of the peoples , And the glory of thy people Isroel .
42002033	But Jauseph and his mother wondered at these words which were spoken concerning him .
42002034	And Shemun blessed them , and said to Mariam his mother , Behold , this child is set for the ruin and uprising of many in Isroel , for the sign of contention .
42002035	And through thine own soul shall pass a spear , that may be revealed the reasonings of the hearts of many .
42002036	NOW Chana , the prophetess , ( was ) the daughter of Phanuel , of the tribe of Asher ; she was aged also in her days , and seven years with her husband had lived from her virginity .
42002037	And she was a widow as of years eighty and four , and she removed not from the temple , and with fasting and with prayer she worshipped in the day and in the night .
42002038	And she also arose in that hour and confessed the Lord , and discoursed concerning him with all who were expecting the redemption of Urishlem .
42002039	And when they had fulfilled every thing according to the law of the Lord , they returned unto Galila , to Natsrath their city .
42002040	But the child grew , and was strengthened in spirit , and was filled with wisdom ; and the grace of Aloha was upon him .
42002041	And his relatives every year went unto Urishlem at the feast of Petscha .
42002042	AND when he was a son of twelve years , they went up , as they were used , to the festival .
42002043	And when the days ( were ) fulfilled , they returned . But Jeshu , the child , remained in Urishlem , and Jauseph and his mother knew not .
42002044	For they thought that he was with the sons of the company ; and when they had gone the journey of one day , they sought him with the men and with any who knew him .
42002045	And they found him not : and they returned again to Urishlem , and sought him .
42002046	And after three days they found him in the temple , sitting in the midst of the doctors , hearing them and questioning them .
42002047	And all of them were astonished , as they heard him , at his wisdom and at his answers .
42002048	And when they saw him , they wondered ; and his mother said to him , My son , why hast thou done with us thus ? for , behold , I and thy father with great anxiety have sought thee .
42002049	He saith to them , Why have you sought me ( elsewhere ) ? Knew you not that ( in ) the house of my Father it behoveth me to be ?
42002050	But they did not comprehend the word that he spake to them .
42002051	And he went down with them , and came to Natsrath , and was subject to them . But his mother kept all these words in her heart .
42002052	But Jeshu increased in his stature , and in his wisdom , and in favour with Aloha and men .
42003001	NOW in the fifteenth year of the reign of Tiberios Cesar , in the government of Pontios Pilatos in Jehud , Herodes being chief of the Fourth in Galila , and Philipos his brother chief of the Fourth in Ituria and in the region of Trakona , and Lusania chief of the Fourth of Abilini ;
42003002	in the high priesthood of Chanan and of Kaiopha , was the word of Aloha unto Juchanon bar Zakaria in the desert .
42003003	And he came into the whole country about the Jurdan , preaching the baptism of repentance for the remission of sins .
42003004	As it is written in the book of the words of Eshaia the prophet , who said , The voice which crieth in the desert , Prepare the way of the Lord , And make straight in the plain the highways for our Aloha .
42003005	All valleys shall be filled , And all mountains and heights be brought low , And the mound shall be a level ( place ) , And the rough place a plain ,
42003006	And all flesh shall see the salvation of Aloha .
42003007	And he said to those multitudes who came to him to be baptized , O brood of vipers , who hath showed you to flee from the wrath that cometh ?
42003008	Work therefore fruits which are worthy of repentance . And begin not to say within yourselves that Abraham is father to us ; for I tell you , that from these stones Aloha is able to raise up sons unto Abraham .
42003009	But , behold , the axe is laid at the root of the trees . Every tree therefore which good fruit maketh not , is cut down and into the fire falleth .
42003010	And the assemblies inquired of him , saying , What then shall we do ?
42003011	He answered and said to them , Whoever hath two tunics , let him give to him who hath none ; and whoever hath food , so let him do ( likewise ) .
42003012	The publicans also came to be baptized , and they said to him , Malphona , what shall we do ?
42003013	But he said to them , Demand not any thing more upon what is prescribed to you to require .
42003014	And the military servants asked of him and said , What shall we also do ? And he said to them , Molest no man , oppress no man , and let your wages satisfy you .
42003015	But while the people thought concerning Juchanon , and all of them reasoned in their hearts whether he were the Meshicha ,
42003016	Juchanon answered and said to them , Behold , I baptize you with waters , but there cometh after me He who is mightier than I ; He , the latchet of whose sandals I am not worthy to unloose ; He shall baptize you with the Spirit of Holiness and with fire :
42003017	He who , holding the fan in his hand , and cleansing his floors , gathereth the wheat into his garners , and the chaff he will burn in the fire which is not quenched .
42003018	But many other things he also taught and preached to the people .
42003019	But Herodes Tetrarka , because he was reproved by Juchanon concerning Herodia the wife of Philipos his brother , and concerning all the evil things which he had done ,
42003020	added this also upon all , and shut up Juchanon in the house of the chained .
42003021	But it was when he had baptized all the people , and also Jeshu he baptized . And while he prayed ,
42003022	the heavens were opened , and the Spirit of Holiness descended upon him in the bodily likeness of a dove : and the voice was from the heavens , which said , Thou art my Son the Beloved One , in thee I have delighted .
42003023	NOW Jeshu himself was as a son of thirty years , and was considered the son of Jauseph bar Heli ,
42003024	bar Mattath , bar Levi , bar Malki , bar Jani , bar Jauseph ,
42003025	bar Mattha , bar Amuts , bar Nachum , bar Chesli , bar Nagi ,
42003026	bar Math , bar Matath , bar Shemri , bar Jauseph , bar Jihuda ,
42003027	bar Juchanon , bar Rosa , bar Zurbobel , bar Shelathiel , bar Niri ,
42003028	bar Malki , bar Adi , bar Kusam , bar Elmudod , bar Ir ,
42003029	bar Jose , bar Eleazar , bar Juram , bar Mathitha , bar Levi ,
42003030	bar Shemun , bar Jihuda , bar Jauseph , bar Jonam , bar Eliakim ,
42003031	bar Malia , bar Mani , bar Mattha , bar Nathan , bar David ,
42003032	bar Jeshi , bar Ubid , bar Boos , bar Salmon , bar Nachshun ,
42003033	bar Aminodob , bar Aram , bar Chetsrun , bar Pharets , bar Jihuda ,
42003034	bar Jakub , bar Ishok , bar Abraham , bar Tarach , bar Nachur ,
42003035	bar Soruk , bar Aru , bar Pholeg , bar Ebor , bar Shaloch ,
42003036	bar Kainan , bar Arphakshad , bar Shim , bar Nuch , bar Lamek ,
42003037	bar Mathushalach , bar Chanuk , bar Jared , bar Mahloleel , bar Kainan ,
42003038	bar Anush , bar Sheth , bar Adom , who was from Aloha .
42004001	BUT Jeshu , being full of the Spirit of Holiness , returned from the Jurdan , and the Spirit led him into the desert ,
42004002	to be tempted forty days by the accuser . And he ate nothing in those days ; and when they were fulfilled , afterwards he hungered .
42004003	And the accuser said to him , If thou art the Son of Aloha , tell this stone to become bread .
42004004	Jeshu answered and said to him , It is written , It is not by bread alone that the son of man liveth , but by every word of Aloha .
42004005	And Satana carried him up into a high mountain , and showed him all the kingdoms of the earth in a little time .
42004006	And the accuser said to him , To thee will I give all this power and the glory of it , which to me is delivered ; and to whomsoever that I will , I give it unto him .
42004007	If therefore thou wilt worship before me , thine shall be all .
42004008	But Jeshu answered and said to him , It is written , That the Lord thy Aloha thou shalt worship , and him only shalt thou serve .
42004009	And he caused him to be at Urishlem , and to stand on the pinnacle of the temple , and said to him , If thou art the Son of Aloha , throw thyself from hence beneath :
42004010	for it is written , His angels he shall charge concerning thee to keep thee ,
42004011	and upon their arms to bear thee up , that thou strike not thy foot against a stone .
42004012	But Jeshu answered and said to him , It is spoken , Thou shalt not tempt the Lord thy Aloha .
42004013	And when the accuser had accomplished all his temptations , he removed from him for a time .
42004014	AND Jeshu returned in the power of the Spirit into Galila , and there went forth a report concerning him in all the region about them ,
42004015	and he taught in their assemblies , and was glorified of every one .
42004016	And he came to Natsrath where he had grown up ; and he went out , as his custom was , into the synagogue on the day of shabath , and he stood up to read .
42004017	And there was given to him the book of Eshaia the prophet , and Jeshu opened the book and found the place where it is written ,
42004018	The Spirit of the Lord is upon me , Because he hath anointed me to evangelize to the poor , And hath sent me to heal the contrite in heart , To proclaim to the captives release , And to the blind , vision , And to assure the contrite by remission ,
42004019	And to proclaim the year of acceptance of the Lord .
42004020	And he rolled the book , and gave it to the minister , and went and sat down ; but the eyes of all them in the synagogue beheld him .
42004021	And he began to say to them , Today is fulfilled this scripture which is in your ears .
42004022	And all witnessed him and wondered at the words of grace which proceeded from his mouth . And they said , Is not this the son of Jauseph ?
42004023	Jeshu said to them , You will perhaps say to me this proverb , Physician , heal thyself ; and all that we have heard that you have done in Kapher-nachum do also here in your own city .
42004024	But he said , I tell you assuredly , There is no prophet who is received in his ( own ) city .
42004025	For I say to you the truth , that many widows were in the house of Isroel in the days of Elia the prophet , when the heavens were shut up for three years and six months , and great famine was in all the land ;
42004026	and to none of them was Elia sent , but to Sarephath of Tsaidon , unto a woman a widow :
42004027	and many lepers were in the house of Israel , in the days of Elisha the prophet , and not one of them was cleansed only Namon the Aramian .
42004028	And when they heard these things , they who were in the synagogue were all of them filled with anger ,
42004029	and they arose , forced him without from the city , and brought him to the brow of the hill on which their city was built to throw him from the rock :
42004030	but he passed through them and went .
42004031	AND he went down to Kapher-nachum , a city of Galila , and instructed them on the shabath .
42004032	And they were astonished at his doctrine , for with power was his word .
42004033	And there was in the synagogue a man who had the spirit of an unclean devil , and he cried with a high voice ,
42004034	and said , Leave me , what to us and to thee , Jeshu Natsroia ? art thou come to destroy us ? I know thee who thou art , the Holy One of Aloha .
42004035	And Jeshu rebuked him , and said , Close thy mouth , and come forth from him . And the devil cast him down in the midst , and came forth from him , and hurt him not any thing .
42004036	And wonder seized on every man , and they spake with each other and said , What thing is this ? for with authority and with power he commandeth the unclean spirits , and they go forth .
42004037	And there went out the fame concerning him into all the region which surrounded them .
42004038	And when Jeshu had gone forth from the synagogue , he entered into the house of Shemun ; and the mother-in-law of Shemun was afflicted with a great fever , and they besought him on behalf of her ;
42004039	and he stood over her and rebuked the fever , and it left her , and she rose up at once and ministered to them .
42004040	But at the setting of the sun all they who had diseased ones , who were diseased with various diseases , brought them to him , and he upon every one of them laid his hand , and healed them .
42004041	And he cast forth also devils from many , ( they ) crying out , and saying , Thou art the Meshicha , the Son of Aloha . And he rebuked them , and suffered them not to speak , for they knew that he was the Meshicha .
42004042	And at the dawn of day he departed , and went to a desert place ; and the people sought him , and came to him , and held him , that he should not go from them :
42004043	but Jeshu said to them , To other cities also must I go to announce the kingdom of Aloha , for concerning this I have been sent .
42004044	And he preached in the synagogues of Galila .
42005001	AND it was while the assembly gathered upon him to hear the word of Aloha , he stood upon the bank of the sea of Genesar ;
42005002	and he saw two vessels standing by the sea-side , and the fishermen who had gone up from them , and were washing their nets .
42005003	And one of them was of Shemun Kipha ; and Jeshu ascended , sat in it , and directed that they should take it a little from the land into the waters ; and he sat , and taught the multitudes from the vessel .
42005004	And when he was silent from his discourses , he said to Shemun , Lead into the deep , and cast forth your nets for a draught .
42005005	Shemun answered and said to him , Rabi , the whole night we have laboured and nothing have we taken ; but at thy word I throw the net .
42005006	And when they had this done , they enclosed great multitudes of fishes , and their net brake .
42005007	And they signed to their companions , who were in another vessel , to come and help them . And when they had come , they filled those two vessels , so that they were nigh to be swallowed up .
42005008	But when Shemun Kipha saw , he fell before the feet of Jeshu and said to him , I pray from thee , my Lord , remove thee from me , for I am a man a sinner .
42005009	For amazement had seized him , and all who were with him , on account of the draught of fishes which they had taken .
42005010	Even so also Jacub and Juchanon , sons of Zabdai , who were partners of Shemun . But Jeshu said , Fear not , from henceforth the sons of men shalt thou catch unto life .
42005011	And they brought the vessels to land , and forsook every thing , and went after him .
42005012	AND when Jeshu was in one of the cities , there came a certain man who was wholly filled with leprosy ; he saw Jeshu , and fell upon his face , and prayed of him , and said to him , My Lord , if thou art willing , thou canst make me clean .
42005013	And Jeshu extended his hand , touched him , and said to him , I am willing ; be clean . And in an instant his leprosy went from him .
42005014	And he commanded him , Tell no man , but go show thyself to the priests , and offer the oblation for thy cleansing , as Musha ordained for their testimony .
42005015	And the fame concerning him went forth the more , and much people were gathered together to hear him and to be healed from their diseases .
42005016	And he passed away into the desert , and prayed .
42005017	And it was on one of the days , while Jeshu was teaching , ( certain ) Pharishee and doctors of the law were sitting . And they had come from all the villages of Galila and of Jehud , and from Urishlem : and the power of the Lord was ( there ) to heal them .
42005018	And some brought on a couch a certain man a paralytic ; and they sought to enter , that they might set him before him .
42005019	And when they found not how to bring him in because of the multitude of people , they ascended to the house-top , and sent him with his couch from the roof into the midst before Jeshu .
42005020	And when Jeshu saw their faith , he said to the paralytic , Man , forgiven to thee are thy sins .
42005021	And the Sophree and Pharishee began to reason and to say , Who is this who speaketh blasphemy ? Who can forgive sins but Aloha only ?
42005022	But Jeshu knew their reasoning , and said to them , What reason you in your hearts ?
42005023	Which is easier , to say , Forgiven to thee are thy sins ; or to say , Arise , walk ?
42005024	But that you may know that authority hath the Son of man in the earth to forgive sins , - he saith to the paralytic , - To thee I say , Arise , take up thy couch , and go to thine house .
42005025	And immediately he arose before them , and took up his couch , and went to his house , glorifying Aloha .
42005026	And amazement held every man ; and they glorified Aloha , and were filled with fear , saying , We have seen today wonders .
42005027	After these things Jeshu went forth , and saw a tribute-taker , whose name was Levi , sitting at the house of tribute . And he said to him , Come after me :
42005028	and he left every thing , and arose , and went after him .
42005029	And Levi made in his house a great feast ; and there was a large company of tribute-takers , and of others that reclined with them .
42005030	And the Sophree and Pharishee murmured , saying to his disciples , Why with tribute-takers and sinners eat you and drink ?
42005031	Jeshu answered and said to them , The whole do not require the physician , but they who are grievously ill .
42005032	I am not come to call the just , but the sinners , to repentance .
42005033	But they say to him , Why do the disciples of Juchanon constantly fast , and pray also as the Pharishee , but thine eat and drink ?
42005034	But he said to them , How can you make the sons of the chamber fast , while the bridegroom is with them ?
42005035	But the days will come when the bridegroom will be taken up from them : then shall they fast in those days .
42005036	He spake to them a parable : No man cutteth a piece from a new material , and fasteneth it upon an old garment ; lest he rend the new , without completing the old with the piece that is new .
42005037	And no man poureth new wine into old bottles ; lest the new wine burst forth , and the wine be shed , and the bottles perish .
42005038	But they pour new wine into new bottles , and both are preserved .
42005039	And no man , drinking old wine , immediately asketh new : for he saith , The old is softer .
42006001	IT was on the shabath , while Jeshu was walking among the corn , and his disciples gathered the ears , and rubbed in their hands and ate ( them ) .
42006002	But some of the Pharishee said to them , Why do you a thing which it is not lawful on the shabuth to do ?
42006003	Jeshu answered and said to them , And this have you not read , what David did when he hungered , and they who were with him ?
42006004	that he went into the house of Aloha , and the bread of the table of the Lord he took , ate , and gave to them who were with him , that ( bread ) which was not lawful to eat , except by the priests only ?
42006005	And he said to them , That the Lord of the shabath is the Son of man .
42006006	And it was on another shabath ( that ) he entered into the synagogue , and taught . And there was a man whose right hand was dried :
42006007	and the Sophree and Pharishee watched him , if he would heal on the shabath , that they might accuse him .
42006008	But he knew their thoughts , and said to the man whose hand was dried , Rise ( and ) come into the midst of the assembly .
42006009	And when he had come and stood , Jeshu said to them , I ask you which is lawful to do on the shabath , good or evil , life to save or to destroy ?
42006010	And he beheld them all , and said to him , Stretch forth thine hand : and he stretched it forth , and his hand was restored as its fellow .
42006011	But they were filled with envy , and spake one with another what they should do with Jeshu .
42006012	BUT it was in those days that Jeshu went forth into a mountain to pray ; and there remained he all night in the prayer of Aloha .
42006013	And when the day brake , he called his disciples , and chose from them twelve , those whom he named Apostles ,
42006014	Shemun , he whose name was Kipha , and Andreas his brother , and Jacub , and Juchanon , and Philipos , and Bar Tholmai ,
42006015	and Mathai , and Thoma , and Jakub bar Chalphai , and Shemun who was called the Zealous ,
42006016	and Jihuda bar Jakub , and Jihuda Scaruta , he who was the traitor .
42006017	And Jeshu descended with them , and stood in the plain , and a great assembly of his disciples and a multitude of people from all Jehud , and from Urishlem , and from the sea-coast of Tsur and Tsaidon ,
42006018	who had come to hear his words , and to be healed of their diseases ; and they who were vexed by unclean spirits , and they were healed .
42006019	And all the multitudes sought to approach to him , for the power went forth from him , and all of them he healed .
42006020	AND he lifted up his eyes upon his disciples , and said , Blessed are you poor , for yours is the kingdom of Aloha .
42006021	Blessed are you who hunger now , for you shall be satisfied . Blessed are you who weep now , for you shall laugh .
42006022	Blessed are you when the sons of man hate you , and separate you , and revile you , and cast out your name as evil , for the sake of the Son of man .
42006023	Rejoice in that day , and exult , for your reward is great in heaven ; for thus did they to your fathers the prophets .
42006024	But woe to you ( who are ) rich , because you have received your consolation .
42006025	Woe to you ( who are ) full , for you shall hunger . Woe to you who laugh now , for you shall weep and lament .
42006026	Woe to you when the sons of men shall speak well of you , for so did to the prophets of falsity their fathers .
42006027	But I say to you who hear , Love your adversaries , and do good to those who hate you ,
42006028	and bless those who execrate you , and pray for those who lead you by violence .
42006029	And to one who striketh you on your cheek , offer to him the other : and whosoever taketh your cloak , forbid him not your coat also .
42006030	To every one who asketh of you give ; and from him who taketh of yours demand not ( again ) .
42006031	And as you will that the sons of man should do to you , so do you also to them .
42006032	For if you love them who love you , what is your grace ? for sinners also love those who love them .
42006033	And if you do good to those who benefit you , what is your grace ? for the sinners also thus do .
42006034	And if you lend to them from whom you expect to be recompensed , what is your grace ? for sinners also lend to sinners , that they might be profited .
42006035	But love your adversaries , and do good to them , and lend , and cut not off the hope of any one ; and great shall be your reward , and you shall be the children of the Most High ; for he is benign to the evil and to the ungrateful .
42006036	Be you therefore merciful , as also your Father is merciful .
42006037	JUDGE not , and you shall not be judged ; condemn not , and you shall not be condemned ; release , and you shall be released ;
42006038	give , and it shall be given to you ; in good measure , compressed , redundant , shall they pour into your bosoms . For in that measure you mete , it shall be measured to you .
42006039	And he spake to them a parable : How can the blind lead the blind , and not fall into the ditch ?
42006040	The disciple than his master is not greater ; but every man who is perfect shall be as his master .
42006041	For why behold you the rod that is in the eye of your brother , but the rafter in your ( own ) eye is not seen by you ?
42006042	Or how can you say to your brother , My brother , permit ( that ) I pull out the rod that is in your eye , and behold the rafter in your own eye is not seen by you ? Hypocrite ! first take out the rafter from your own eye , and then shall you see to take out the rod that is in the eye of your brother .
42006043	A good tree maketh not evil fruits ; also an evil tree maketh not good fruits :
42006044	for every tree by its fruits is known . For how gather they from thorns figs ? neither also from the bramble do they gather in grapes .
42006045	The good man , from the good treasures which are in his heart , bringeth forth good things ; and the evil man , from the evil treasures which are in his heart , bringeth forth evil things ; for from the adundancies of the heart the lips speak .
42006046	Why call you me , My Lord , my Lord , and the things which I say do not ?
42006047	Every man who cometh to me and heareth my words , and doeth them , I will show you to whom he is like .
42006048	He is like a man who built a house , and digged deep , and laid the foundations upon the rock : but when there was an inundation , the inundation beat against that house , and it could not shake it , for its foundations were set upon a rock .
42006049	And he who heareth and doeth not , is like a man who built his house upon the dust , without a foundation : and when the river beat against it , it immediately fell , and the ruin was great of that house .
42007001	AND when he had finished all these words in the hearing of the people , Jeshu entered into Kapher-nachum .
42007002	But the servant of a certain centurion , who was valued by him , was sick , and nigh unto dying .
42007003	And he heard of Jeshu , and sent to him the elders of the Jihudoyee , and besought him to come ( and ) save his servant .
42007004	And they , when they came to Jeshu , besought of him earnestly , saying , He is worthy that thou do this for him ;
42007005	for he loveth our people , and also a synagogue he hath built for us .
42007006	And Jeshu went with them . But when he was not greatly distant from the house , the centurion sent to him his friends , saying to him , My Lord , labour not , for I am not worthy that thou shouldst enter beneath my roof .
42007007	Wherefore I was not worthy to come to thee ; but speak by a word , and my youth shall be healed .
42007008	For I also am a man who am subjected under authority ; and there are under my hand soldiers , and I say to this one , Go , and he goeth ; and to another , Come , and he cometh ; and to my servant , Do this , and he doeth .
42007009	Now when Jeshu heard these ( words ) , he admired , and turned and said to the company who came after him , I tell you , that not also in the house of Isroel have I found faith like this .
42007010	And they who had been sent , returned to the house , and found the servant who had been sick now well .
42007011	AND it was the day after , that he went to a city whose name was Nain , and his disciples with him , and a great multitude .
42007012	And as he approached the gate of the city , he saw ( them ) following ( one ) dead , who was the only born of his mother , and she his mother was a widow : and a great multitude of the people of the city were with her .
42007013	And Jeshu beheld her , and had compassion upon her , and said to her , Weep not .
42007014	And he went and touched the bier ; and they who were carrying it stood . And he said , Young man , to thee I say , Arise .
42007015	And the dead sat up , and began to speak . And he gave him to his mother .
42007016	And fear seized all men ; and they glorified Aloha , saying , A great prophet hath arisen among us , and Aloha hath visited his people .
42007017	And this word concerning him went forth into all Jihud , and into the whole region around them .
42007018	And the disciples of Juchanon showed him all these .
42007019	AND Juchanon called two from his disciples ,
42007020	and sent them to Jeshu , saying , Art thou He who cometh ! or another should we expect ?
42007021	But in that very hour he healed many from diseases , and from plagues , and from evil spirits ; and to many blind he gave to see .
42007022	And Jeshu answered and said to them , Go tell Juchanon every thing you have seen and heard : that the blind see , and the lame walk , and the lepers are cleansed , and the deaf hear , and the dead arise , and the poor are evangelized ;
42007023	and blessed is he whosoever is not offended in me .
42007024	But when the disciples of Juchanon were gone , Jeshu began to speak to the people concerning Juchanon : What went you forth into the wilderness to see ? a reed from the wind shaken ?
42007025	If not , what went you forth to see ? a man clothed in soft raiment ? Behold , they who are clothed in bright vestments , and are ( living ) in pleasures , are in the house of kings .
42007026	If not , what went you forth to see ? a prophet ? Yes , I tell you , and more than a prophet :
42007027	he , concerning whom it is written , Behold , I send mine angel before thy face , Who shall prepare the way before thee .
42007028	I tell you , that no prophet among those born of women ( hath been ) greater than Juchanon the Baptizer . Yet the least in the kingdom of Aloha is greater than he .
42007029	( And all the people that heard him , and the tribute-gatherers also , justified Aloha , because they were baptized with the baptism of Juchanon .
42007030	But the Pharishee and Sophree rejected against themselves the will of Aloha , because they were not baptized of him . )
42007031	With what therefore shall I compare the men of this generation , and to what are they like ?
42007032	They are like children sitting in the public place , and crying to their companions , and saying , We have sung to you , and you have not danced ; we have wailed to you , and you have not wept .
42007033	For Juchanon the Baptizer came , neither eating bread nor drinking wine , and you say , A devil is in him .
42007034	The Son of man came eating and drinking , and you say , Behold a man a devourer and a drinker of wine , and a friend of tribute-takers and of sinners !
42007035	But justified is wisdom of her sons .
42007036	NOW there came one of the Pharishee requesting of him to eat with him : and he entered into the house of the Pharisha , and reclined .
42007037	And a woman , a sinner , was in that city ; and when she knew that in the house of the Pharisha he reclined , she took a vase of ointment ,
42007038	and stood behind him at his feet and wept , and began with her tears to bedrop his feet , and with the hair of her head to wipe them , and she kissed his feet , and anointed ( them ) with the ointment .
42007039	But when the Pharisha who had invited him saw ( this ) , he thought within himself and said , Were this a prophet , he would know who this is and what is her report , for this woman is a sinner who toucheth him .
42007040	But Jeshu answered and said to him , Shemun , I have somewhat to say to thee . He said to him , Say , Rabi .
42007041	Jeshu said to him , A certain creditor had two debtors : the one owed him five hundred dinoree , and the other fifty dinoree .
42007042	And when they had nothing to pay , he forgave them both . Which , therefore , of them the most would love him ?
42007043	Shemun answered and said , I think he to whom much was forgiven . Jeshu said to him , Thou hast judged rightly .
42007044	And he turned to that woman , and said to Shemun , Thou seest this woman : I entered thy house ; waters for my feet thou gavest me not ; but this with her tears hath bedropped my feet , and with her hair hath wiped them .
42007045	Thou didst not kiss me ; but , behold , this from ( the time ) I entered hath not ceased my feet to kiss .
42007046	Thou with ointment my feet didst not anoint , but this with ointment of balsam my feet hath anointed .
42007047	Therefore I tell thee , That forgiven to her are her many sins , because she hath loved much . For he to whom little is forgiven , little loveth .
42007048	And he said to her , Woman , forgiven to thee ( are ) thy sins .
42007049	But they who reclined said among themselves , Who is this who also sins forgiveth ?
42007050	But Jeshu said to that woman , Thy faith hath saved thee ; go in peace .
42008001	AND it was after these things that Jeshu itinerated among the cities and villages , and preached and announced the kingdom of Aloha , and his twelve with him ,
42008002	and those women who had been healed from infirmities and from evil spirits , Mariam who was called Magdalitha , she from whom he had cast out seven devils ,
42008003	and Juchana the wife of Kusa , chief of the household of Herodes , and Shushan , and many others , who ministered unto him from their possessions .
42008004	And when a great multitude had assembled , and from all the cities had come to him , he discoursed in parables .
42008005	A sower went forth to sow his seed . And as he sowed , some fell by the road-side ; and it was trodden down , and the fowl devoured it .
42008006	And other fell upon the rock ; and it immediately sprang up , and , because it had no moisture , it withered .
42008007	And other fell among thorns , and they sprang up with it , and choked it .
42008008	And other fell into ground good and fair , and sprang up , and made fruit an hundredfold . And when he had said these ( words ) , he cried , Whoever hath ears to hear , let him hear .
42008009	And his disciples asked him , What is ( the signification of ) this parable ?
42008010	But he said to them , To you it is given to know the mysteries of the kingdom of Aloha ; but to those who are the rest in similitudes is it spoken ; that while seeing they may not see , and while hearing they may not understand .
42008011	But this is the parable : The seed is the word of Aloha .
42008012	Now they by the road-side are they who hear the word ; and the adversary cometh , and taketh up the word from their hearts , that they should not believe and be saved .
42008013	But those who fell upon the rock are those who , when they hear , with joy receive the word ; yet root they have not , but for a time is their faith , and in the time of temptation they are offended .
42008014	But that which fell among thorns are they who hear the word , and by the cares , and by the riches , and by the lusts of the world , they are choked , and fruit they give not .
42008015	But that which ( was ) in good ground are they who , with hearts humble and good , hear the word and retain , and give fruits with perseverance .
42008016	NO man lighteth a lamp , and covereth it with a measure , or setteth it under a bed ; but setteth it upon a candlestick , that every one who cometh in may see the light of it .
42008017	For there is nothing hidden which shall not be revealed , and nothing secret that shall not be known and come into openness .
42008018	Take heed how you hear : for unto him who hath , it shall be given ; and from him who hath not , that also which he thinketh that he hath shall be taken from him .
42008019	Now came to him his mother and his brethren , and could not speak with him on account of the assembly .
42008020	And they said to him , Thy mother and thy brethren are standing without , desiring to see thee .
42008021	But he answered and said to them , These are my mother and my brethren , they who hear the word of Aloha , and do it .
42008022	NOW it was on one of the days that Jeshu ascended and sat in a vessel and his disciples : and he said to them , Let us pass to the other side of the water .
42008023	But as they went , Jeshu himself slept . And there became a storm of wind on the water , and nigh was the vessel to be swallowed up .
42008024	And they approached ( and ) awoke him , saying to him , Our master , our master , we perish ! But he arose and rebuked the winds and the waves of the sea ; and they quieted , and there was a calm .
42008025	And he said to them , Where is your faith ? But they , afraid , wondered , saying one with another , Who is this that also commandeth the winds , and to whom the waves and the sea are obedient ?
42008026	And they went forward and came to the country of the Godroyee , which is over against Galila .
42008027	And when he had gone forth to the land , there met him a certain man from the city , who had a devil in him a great time , and ( who ) wore no clothes , and in a house dwelt not , but in the place of the buried .
42008028	But when he saw Jeshu , he cried out , and fell before him , and said in a high voice , What to us and to thee , Jeshu , son of Aloha Marima ? I beseech of thee , torment me not .
42008029	For Jeshu commanded the unclean spirit to come forth from the man . For long was the time that he had been enthralled of him ; and ( when ) bound with chains , and kept with fetters , he had burst asunder his bonds , and had been driven by the demon into the waste .
42008030	And Jeshu demanded of him , What is thy name ? He saith to him , Legion : because that many devils had entered into him .
42008031	And they besought from him that he would not cast them out to go into the abyss .
42008032	Now there was there a great herd of many swine which fed on the hill : and they besought from him that he would permit them to enter into the swine . And he permitted them .
42008033	And the demons went forth from the man , and entered into the swine ; and the whole herd went directly to the precipice , and plunged into the waters , and were suffocated .
42008034	And when the herdmen saw the thing that was done , they fled , and made known in the city and in the villages .
42008035	And the men went forth to see the thing which was done . And they came to Jeshu , and found the man from whom the demons had gone out , clothed , sober , and sitting at the feet of Jeshu . And they feared .
42008036	And they who had seen it showed to them how the man of the demon had been healed .
42008037	And the whole multitude of the Godroyee besought of Jeshu that he would go from them , because great fear had taken them . And he , Jeshu , ascended the ship , and returned from them .
42008038	But he , the man from whom had gone forth the demons , besought of him that he might be with him . But Jeshu dismissed him , and said to him ,
42008039	Return to thine house , and show what Aloha hath done for thee . And he went and proclaimed in every city what Jeshu had done for him .
42008040	WHEN Jeshu returned , a great multitude received him : for they were all expecting him .
42008041	And a certain man whose name was Jorush , head of the synagogue , fell before the feet of Jeshu , and besought him to enter into his house ;
42008042	for he had an only daughter , as a daughter of twelve years , and she was nigh unto death . And as Jeshu went with him , the great multitude pressed him .
42008043	And a certain woman whose blood had gushed forth twelve years , she who among the physicians had spent all her substance , but could not be healed by any one ,
42008044	approached him from behind , and touched the border of his garment , and immediately stood the flowing of her blood .
42008045	And Jeshu said , Who touched me ? And when all denied , Shemun Kipha and those with him said , Raban , the crowd straiteneth and presseth thee , and sayest thou , Who touched me ?
42008046	But he said , Some one hath touched me , for I know that power hath gone forth from me .
42008047	And she , the woman , when she saw that she was not hid , came trembling and fell ( and ) worshipped him . And she told before all the people for what cause she had touched him , and how at once she had been healed .
42008048	But he , Jeshu , said to her , Be comforted , my daughter : thy faith hath saved thee , go in peace .
42008049	And while he was speaking , there came a man from the chief of the synagogue and said to him , Thy daughter is dead , weary not the Malphona .
42008050	But Jeshu heard , and said to the father of the damsel , Fear not , only believe , and she lives !
42008051	But Jeshu came to the house , and he suffered no man to enter with him , save Shemun , and Jakub , and Juchanon , and the father of the damsel , and her mother .
42008052	And they were all weeping and wailing for her ; but Jeshu said , Weep not , for she is not dead , but asleep .
42008053	And they laughed at him , for they knew that she was dead .
42008054	But he put every man forth without . And he took her by the hand , and called and said , Damsel , arise .
42008055	And her spirit returned , and she arose . And he directed that they should give her to eat .
42008056	And her parents were astonished ; but he cautioned them that no man they should tell what he had done .
42009001	AND Jeshu called his twelve , and gave them power and authority over all demons and diseases , to heal .
42009002	And he sent them to proclaim the kingdom of Aloha , and to heal the diseased .
42009003	And he said to them , Take nothing for the way , neither staff , nor bag , nor bread , nor silver ; nor two tunics shall you have .
42009004	And into whatever house you enter , there be , and from thence go forth .
42009005	And whoever will not receive you , when you depart from that city the dust also from your feet shake off as a testimony against them .
42009006	And the apostles went forth and itinerated in the villages and the cities , and evangelized and healed in every place .
42009007	But Herodes , Tetrarka , heard all that was done by his hand , and was astonished ; for men said that Juchanon had risen from the house of the dead .
42009008	But others said that Elia had appeared , and others that a prophet from the former prophets had risen .
42009009	And Herodes said , The head of Juchanon I have cut off ; but who is this of whom I hear these ( things ) ? And he willed to see him .
42009010	And when the apostles returned , they showed Jeshu all that they had done . And he took them by themselves to a desert place of Bethtsaida .
42009011	But the multitudes , when they knew it , went after him , and he received them , and discoursed to them concerning the kingdom of Aloha . And those who had need of healing he healed .
42009012	BUT when the day began to decline , the disciples drew near and said to him , Send away the multitudes , that they may go to the villages and hamlets that are around , to lodge in them and to find for themselves victuals , because we are in a desert place .
42009013	Jeshu said to them , Give you them to eat . But they said , We have nothing more than five loaves and two fishes , unless we go and buy food for all this people :
42009014	for they were about five thousand men . Jeshu said to them , Make them recline in reclining companies , fifty men in a company .
42009015	And the disciples did so . And they all reclined .
42009016	And Jeshu took those five loaves and two fishes , and looked up to heaven and blessed and brake and gave to his disciples , that they should set before the multitude .
42009017	And all did eat and were filled . And they took up fragments which abounded , twelve baskets .
42009018	AND as he was praying alone , and his disciples with him , he asked them and said , What say concerning me the multitude , that I am ?
42009019	They answered and say to him , Juchanon the Baptizer ; and others that ( thou art ) Elia ; but others that a prophet from the former prophets hath arisen .
42009020	He saith to them , But what do you say that I am ? Shemun answered and said , The Meshicha of Aloha !
42009021	But he forbade them and cautioned them that this they should tell no man .
42009022	And he told them how it was to be ( that ) he the Son of man should suffer many things and be rejected by the elders and the chief priests and Sophree , and ( that ) they would kill him ; and that on the third day he would arise .
42009023	And he said before all , Whoever willeth to come after me , must deny himself , and take up his cross daily , and come after me .
42009024	For whoever willeth to save his life , loseth it ; but whoever ( is willing ) to lose his life , for my sake , he saveth it .
42009025	For what is helped a son of man , if he shall gain the whole world and lose his soul , or perish ?
42009026	For whoever shall be ashamed of me and of my words , the Son of man will be ashamed of him , when he cometh in the glory of his Father with the holy angels .
42009027	THE truth I say to you , that some who are standing here shall not taste death , until they have seen the kingdom of Aloha .
42009028	And it was after these words about eight days , that Jeshu took Shemun and Jakub and Juchanon , and went up into a mountain to pray .
42009029	And while he prayed , the appearance of his countenance was changed , and his garments became white and shone .
42009030	And , behold , two men talked with him , who were Musha and Elia ,
42009031	who appeared in glory ; but they spake concerning his going forth which should be accomplished at Urishlem .
42009032	And Shemun , and they who were with him , had been heavy with sleep , and were scarcely awaked when they saw his glory and those two men who stood with him .
42009033	And when they began to depart from him , Shemun said to Jeshu , Rabi , it is good for us to be here : and let us make three tabernacles ; for thee one , and for Musha one , and for Elia one . But he knew not what he said .
42009034	And as he spoke these ( words ) there was a cloud which shadowed over them , and they feared when they saw that Musha and Elia entered into the cloud . i
42009035	And the voice was from the cloud , saying , This is my Son , the Beloved , Him hear .
42009036	And when the voice had been , Jeshu was found alone . And they were silent , and told no man in those days what they had seen .
42009037	AND the day after when they had descended from the mountain , a great multitude met them .
42009038	And a certain man from the multitude cried and said , Malphona , I beseech thee , turn unto me ; ( there is ) my son , my only one ,
42009039	and a spirit passeth upon him , and he suddenly crieth , and gnasheth his teeth , and lacerateth , and hardly removeth from him when he hath bruised him .
42009040	And I besought thy disciples to cast him out , but they could not .
42009041	Then Jeshu answered and said , Ah generation unbelieving and perverse ! how long shall I be with you and bear with you ? Bring thy son hither .
42009042	And as they brought him near , the devil cast him down and bruised him : and Jeshu rebuked that unclean spirit and healed the youth and gave him to his father .
42009043	And they all wondered at the majesty of Aloha . And while every one wondered at all which Jeshu did , he said to his disciples ,
42009044	Treasure these words in your ears ; for the Son of man is to be delivered into the hands of men .
42009045	But they understood not that saying , because it was hidden from them that they should not know it : and they feared to ask of him concerning that saying .
42009046	And there entered among them the thought , Who should be greatest among them ?
42009047	But Jeshu knew the thought of their heart ; and he took a child and made him stand with him .
42009048	And he said to them , Every one who receiveth a child like this in my name , receiveth me . And whosoever receiveth me , he receiveth Him who sent me . For he who is least among you , he shall be greatest .
42009049	And Juchanon answered and said , Raban , we saw a man who was casting out demons in thy name , and we forbade him , because he came not with us after thee .
42009050	Jeshu saith to them , Forbid him not ; for he who is not against us , he is for us .
42009051	AND it was that when the days were fulfilled for his Assumption , he directed his face to go to Urishlem .
42009052	And he sent messengers before his face , and they went and entered into a village of the Shomroyee , so as to prepare for him .
42009053	And they would not receive him , because his face unto Urishlem was set to go .
42009054	And when Jacub and Juchanon his disciples saw it , they say to him , Maran , art thou willing that we call fire to descend from heaven to consume them , as Elia did ?
42009055	But he turned and reproved them , and said , You know not of what spirit you are : for the Son of man is not come to destroy lives , but to save .
42009056	And they went to another village .
42009057	And while they went in the way , a certain man said to him , I will follow thee to the place whither thou goest , my Lord .
42009058	Jeshu saith to him , The foxes have holes and the fowls of the heaven a shadow , but the Son of man hath not where to lay his head .
42009059	And he said to another , Come after me . But he said to him , My Lord , permit me first to go bury my father .
42009060	Jeshu said to him , Leave the dead burying their dead ; and thou , go and preach the kingdom of Aloha .
42009061	And another said to him , I will come after thee , my Lord , but first permit me to go to salute the sons of my house , and I will come .
42009062	Jeshu saith to him , No man putting his hand upon the coulter of the yoke , and looking behind him , is fit for the kingdom of Aloha .
42010001	AFTER these Jeshu separated from his disciples seventy others , and sent them by two and two before his face to every place and city whither he was himself to come .
42010002	And he said to them , The harvest is great , but the labourers ( are ) few ; pray therefore from the Lord of the harvest to send forth labourers into his harvest .
42010003	Go ; behold , I send you as sheep among wolves .
42010004	Take with you neither purses , nor bags , nor sandals , neither with the salutation ( shaloma ) shall you salute any man in the way .
42010005	But into whatever house you enter , first say , Peace to the house !
42010006	And if a son of peace be there , your peace shall descend upon him ; but if not , your peace upon you shall return .
42010007	But in that house be , eating and drinking of theirs : for worthy is the labourer of his hire . And remove not from house to house .
42010008	And into whatever city you enter and they receive you , eat such things as are set to you .
42010009	And heal those who are sick , and say to them , There hath drawn nigh upon you the kingdom of Aloha .
42010010	But if any city which you enter will not receive you , go you out into the street and say ,
42010011	Even the dust which cleaveth to our feet from your city we shake off against you ; nevertheless know this , that hath come nigh upon you the kingdom of Aloha .
42010012	I tell you that for Sadum it shall be more tolerable in that day than for that city .
42010013	Woe to thee , Kurazin ! woe to thee , Bethtsaida ! for if in Tsur and Tsaidon had been wrought the miracles which were wrought in you , now long since in sackcloth and in ashes would they have repented .
42010014	Nevertheless for Tsur and for Tsaidon it shall be more tolerable in the day of the judgment , than for you .
42010015	And thou , Kapher-nachum , which unto heaven art lifted up , unto Shiul shalt thou be abased .
42010016	He that you heareth , me heareth ; and he who you rejecteth , me he rejecteth ; and he who me rejecteth , he rejecteth him who sent me .
42010017	And the seventy whom he had sent , returned with great joy , saying to him , Our Lord , the demons also are subjected to us through thy name .
42010018	Then he said to them , I saw him , Satana , when he fell as lightning from heaven .
42010019	Behold , I give you power to tread upon serpents and scorpions , and all the strength of the enemy , and nothing shall hurt you .
42010020	Nevertheless in this rejoice not , that the demons are subject to you ; but rejoice that your names are written in heaven .
42010021	In that hour Jeshu exulted in the Holy Spirit , and said , I praise thee , my Father , Lord of heaven and of earth , that thou hast hid these things from the wise and the intellectual , and hast revealed them unto children . Yes , my Father , for so was thy will .
42010022	And he turned to his disciples , and said to them , Every thing is delivered to me by my Father : and no man knoweth who the Son is but the Father ; and who the Father is but the Son , and he to whom the Son willeth to reveal .
42010023	And he turned to his disciples by themselves , and said , Blessed are your eyes because they see what you see ;
42010024	for I tell you that prophets many and kings have desired to see what you see , and have not seen , and to hear what you hear , and have not heard .
42010025	AND , behold , a certain Sophra stood up to try him , saying , Malphona , what shall I do to inherit everlasting life ?
42010026	But Jeshu said to him , In the law how is it written , how readest thou ?
42010027	He answered and said to him , Thou shalt love the Lord thy Aloha with all thy heart , and with all thy soul , and with all thy strength , and with all thy mind , and thy neighbour as thyself ,
42010028	Jeshu said to him , Thou hast said correctly . This do , and thou shalt live .
42010029	But he , willing to justify himself , said to him , And who is my neighbour ?
42010030	Jeshu saith to him , A certain man went down from Urishlem to Jerichu , and fell among robbers , who stripped him and wounded him , and left him with little life subsisting in him , and went .
42010031	And a certain priest happened to go down by that way , and he saw him and passed over .
42010032	And likewise also a Levoia , being come to that place , beheld him , and passed over .
42010033	But a man , a Shomroya , while he journeyed , came where he was , and saw him , and had compassion on him ,
42010034	and went near , and bound up his wounds , and poured in upon them wine and oil , and set him upon his ass , and brought him to the inn , and was anxious for him .
42010035	And on the morning of the day , he took out two dinoreen , gave to the host , and said to him , Take care of him ; and if more thou layest out , when I return I will give to thee .
42010036	Which therefore of these three doth it appear to thee was neighbour to him who fell into the hands of the thieves ?
42010037	And he said , He who had compassion on him . Jeshu saith to him , Go thou also and do likewise .
42010038	AND it was that as they went in the way , he entered into a certain village , and a woman whose name was Martha received him into her house .
42010039	And she had a sister whose name was Mariam , and she came , sat at the feet of our Lord , and heard his words .
42010040	But Martha was occupied with much serving . And she came and said to him , My Lord , carest thou not that my sister leave me alone to serve ? Tell her to help me .
42010041	Jeshu answered and said to her , Martha , Martha , thou art careful and disturbed about many ,
42010042	but ( there ) is the one that is needed . And Mariam the good portion hath chosen , that which shall not be taken from her .
42011001	AND it was that while he was praying in a certain place , when he had finished , one of his disciples said to him , Our Lord , teach us to pray as also Juchanon taught his disciples .
42011002	Jeshu said to them , When you pray , thus be saying , Our Father who ( art ) in the heavens , be sanctified thy name . Come thy kingdom . Be done thy will as in the heavens also upon earth .
42011003	Give to us the bread of our need every day ,
42011004	and forgive us our sins , for we also forgive all who are indebted to us . And lead us not into temptation , but deliver us from the evil .
42011005	And he said to them , Who of you that has a friend , and shall go to him at midnight , and shall say to him , My friend , lend me three loaves ,
42011006	because a friend has come to me from the way , and I have nothing to set to him ?
42011007	and that friend from within shall answer and say unto him , Disturb me not , for the door is shut , and my children are with me in bed : I cannot rise and give to you .
42011008	I tell you if for friendship's sake he will not give him , ( yet ) because of importunity he will arise and give him as many as he needeth .
42011009	I say also to you , Ask , and it shall be given to you ; seek , and you shall find ; knock , and it shall be opened to you .
42011010	For every one who asketh receiveth , and who seeketh findeth , and who knocketh hath it opened to him .
42011011	For what father ( is there ) among you who , if his son shall ask bread , will reach to him a stone ? or should he ask a fish , how instead of a fish will he reach to him a serpent ?
42011012	or if an egg he shall ask , will he a scorpion reach to him ?
42011013	And if you , who are evil , know to give good gifts to your children , how much more will your Father from the heavens give the Spirit of Holiness to those who ask him !
42011014	AND he was casting out a demon which was dumb ; and when he had cast out the demon , the dumb spake , and the multitudes wondered .
42011015	But some from them said , By Beelzebub , the prince of the devils , he casteth out devils ;
42011016	while others , tempting him , the sign from heaven demanded of him .
42011017	But Jeshu , who knew their thoughts , said to them , Every kingdom which is divided against itself will be desolated ; and a house that against its own self is divided falleth ;
42011018	and if Satana against himself be divided , how will his kingdom stand ? Because you say that through Beelzebub I cast out devils .
42011019	But if I by Beelzebub cast out devils , your sons , by what do they cast ( them ) out ? On account of this they shall be your judges .
42011020	But if by the finger of Aloha I cast out devils , there hath drawn nigh upon you the kingdom of Aloha .
42011021	When the strong one armed keepeth his court , his possession is in peace ;
42011022	but if a stronger than he shall come , he shall overcome him ; all his armour he taketh on which he depended , and he divideth his spoils .
42011023	He who is not with me is against me ; and he who does not collect with me , by scattering he scattereth .
42011024	The unclean spirit , when he hath gone out from a son of man , goeth about through regions which have no waters in them , because he seeketh to him rest . And when he cannot find it he saith , I will return to my house from whence I went out .
42011025	And when he cometh he findeth it swept and ornamented .
42011026	Then he goeth , taketh seven other spirits who are more wicked than himself , and they enter and dwell there , and the last of that man is worse than his first .
42011027	AND while he spake these words , a certain woman lifted up her voice from the crowd , and said to him , Blessed is the womb that bare thee , and the breasts which thou hast sucked !
42011028	He said to her , Blessed are they who hear the word of Aloha and keep it .
42011029	And when the assemblies had gathered together , he began to say , This evil generation requireth a sign ; but no sign shall be given to it save the sign of Jaunon the prophet .
42011030	For as was Jaunon a sign to the Ninvoyee , so shall also the Son of man be to this generation .
42011031	The queen of the south shall rise in judgment with the men of this generation , and shall condemn them ; for she came from the confines of the earth to hear the wisdom of Shelemun , and , lo , a greater than Shelemun is here .
42011032	The men of Nineveh shall rise in judgment with this generation and shall condemn it : for they repented at the preaching of Jaunon , and , lo , a greater than Jaunon is here .
42011033	No man lighteth a lamp and setteth it in a secret ( place ) or under a measure , but upon a candlestick , that they who enter may see the light of it .
42011034	The lamp of thy body is thine eye ; when therefore thine eye is simple , thy whole body also will be illuminated ; but if it be evil , thy body also will be darkness .
42011035	Beware , therefore , lest the light that is in thee become darkness .
42011036	But if thy whole body be illuminated , and no part whatever in it be darkness , the whole will be light , as when a lamp with its flame enlighteneth thee .
42011037	AND as he was speaking , a certain Pharisha requested of him to dine with him , and he went in to recline .
42011038	But he , the Pharisha , when he saw him , wondered that he had not first washed before his dinner .
42011039	But Jeshu said to him , Now you Pharishee cleanse the outside of the cup and the dish , but within you are full of rapine and wickedness .
42011040	Wanting in understanding ! did not he who made that which is without , make also that which is within ?
42011041	But of whatever there is , give in alms , and , behold , every thing is clean to you .
42011042	But woe to you , Pharishee ! for you tithe mint , and rue , and every herb , and pass by judgment and the love of Aloha . These hath it behoved you to do , and those not to have omitted .
42011043	Woe to you , Pharishee ! for you love the chief seats in the assemblies , and the salutation in the public places .
42011044	Woe to you , scribes and Pharishee , hypocrites ! for you are like tombs that are not known , and men walk upon them , and do not know .
42011045	And one of the Sophree answered and said to him , Doctor , while you say these things , you vilify us also !
42011046	But he said , Also unto you , Sophree , woe ! because you lade men with heavy burdens , and you with one of your fingers will not touch those burdens .
42011047	Woe to you ! for you build the tombs of the prophets whom your fathers killed :
42011048	thus you bear witness that you consent in the deeds of your fathers ; for they killed them , and you build their sepulchres .
42011049	ON this account also Wisdom saith , Behold , I will send to them prophets and apostles ; and of them they will persecute and kill ;
42011050	that the blood of all the prophets which hath been shed from the creation of the world may be required from this generation .
42011051	From the blood of Habil unto the blood of Zakaria who was killed between the temple and the altar : yes , I tell you , It shall be required of this generation .
42011052	Woe to you , Sophree ; for you have taken away the key of knowledge ; you enter not in ( yourselves ) , and they who are entering you prohibit .
42011053	And while he spoke these ( words ) to them , the Sophree and Pharishee began to be displeased , and they were wrathful , and controverted his words , and enticed him on many ( points ) ,
42011054	seeking to lay hold on something from his mouth that they might be able to accuse him .
42012001	AND when ( there ) had gathered ( by ) myriads great assemblies , so that they would have trodden upon one another , Jeshu began to say to his disciples , Beware for yourselves before all things of the leaven of the Pharishee , which is hypocrisy .
42012002	For nothing is hidden which shall not be revealed , and nothing secreted which shall not be made known .
42012003	For all that you say in darknesses in the light shall be heard , and what you whisper in the ear in closets shall be proclaimed on the housetops .
42012004	But I say to you , my beloved ones , Fear not them who kill the body , and who afterward can do nothing more ;
42012005	but I will show you whom you shall fear ; Him who , after he hath killed , hath power to cast into gihana , yes , I say to you , Fear this ( one ) .
42012006	Are not five sparrows sold for two asorin ; and one of them is not forgotten before Aloha .
42012007	But of you , the numbers of the hairs of your head are all numbered . Fear not , therefore ; than many sparrows more precious are you .
42012008	But I tell you that every one who shall confess me before men , the Son of man will also confess him before the angels of Aloha .
42012009	But he who denieth me before men , I will deny him before the angels of Aloha .
42012010	And every one who shall speak a word against the Son of man , it may be forgiven him ; but whoever against the Spirit of Holiness shall blaspheme , it shall not be forgiven him .
42012011	And when they bring you into the synagogues , before heads and authorities , be not anxious how you shall express yourselves , or what you shall say ;
42012012	for the Spirit of Holiness will teach you in that hour what you ought to say .
42012013	AND a man from the assembly said to him , Malphona , tell my brother to divide with me the inheritance .
42012014	But Jeshu said to him , Man , who established me over you a judge and a divider ?
42012015	And he said to his disciples , Beware of all avarice : for life is not in the abundance of riches .
42012016	And he spake a parable to them : The ground of a certain rich man produced him much provisions .
42012017	And he thought within himself , and said , What shall I do ? for I have not where to collect my provisions .
42012018	And he said , This will I do : I will destroy my house of stores , and will build and enlarge it ; and there will I collect all my provender and my good things :
42012019	and I will say to my soul , My soul , thou hast many good things laid up for many years : be at ease , eat , drink , and be merry .
42012020	But Aloha said to him , Reasonless ( man ) ! this night thy soul they shall require of thee ; and then , ( the things ) which thou hast prepared ,
42012021	whose shall they be ? So is he who layeth up to himself treasures , and towards Aloha is not rich .
42012022	And he said to his disciples , Therefore I tell you , Be not anxious for yourselves , what you shall eat ; neither for the body , how you shall dress :
42012023	for the soul is more precious than food , and the body than raiment .
42012024	Consider the ravens , which sow not nor reap , which have no chambers or barns , yet Aloha feeds them . How much , therefore , are you better than the fowls !
42012025	And which of you by being anxious could add to his stature one cubit ?
42012026	But if indeed you are not capable of ( that which is ) the least , why concerning the rest are you anxious ?
42012027	Consider the lilies , how they grow , which toil not nor spin ; but I tell you that even Shelemun in all his glory was not arrayed like one of these .
42012028	But if the herbage , which today is in the field , and to-morrow is cast into the furnace , Aloha thus clothes , how much more you , little in faith !
42012029	And seek you not what you shall eat , and what you shall drink ; nor let your mind be distracted for these :
42012030	for all these the nations of the world seek ; but to you also your Father knoweth that these are needful .
42012031	But seek the kingdom of Aloha , and these all shall be added to you .
42012032	FEAR not , little flock ; for your Father hath willed to give you the kingdom .
42012033	Sell your substance , and give alms : make to you bags which become not old , and a treasure which is not transient , in the heavens , where the thief does not approach , and the moth destroys not .
42012034	For where your treasure is , there will be also your heart .
42012035	Let your loins be bound , and your lamps be burning ,
42012036	and be you like men who wait for their lord , when he shall return from the place of festivity , that , when he hath come and knocked , immediately they may open to him .
42012037	Blessed those servants who , when their lord shall come , shall be found watching . Amen I tell you , He will gird his loins , and make them recline , and will come over and serve them .
42012038	And if in the second or the third watch he shall come and find them thus , blessed will be those servants .
42012039	But this know , that if the lord of the house had known in what watch the thief would come , he would have watched , and not have permitted his house to be dug through .
42012040	Also you , be you therefore ready : for , in that hour that you think not , cometh the Son of man .
42012041	Shemun Kipha said to him , Our Lord , to us speakest thou this parable , or to all men also ?
42012042	Jeshu said to him , Who then is that steward , faithful and wise , whom his lord hath established over his service , to give the portion in its time ?
42012043	Blessed that servant whom , when his lord shall come , he shall find so doing .
42012044	Assuredly I tell you , He will establish him over all his substance .
42012045	But if that servant shall say in his heart , My lord withholdeth to come , and shall begin to beat the servants and the handmaids of his lord , and shall begin to eat and to drink and be drunken ;
42012046	the lord of that servant will come in a day when he thinketh not , and in an hour which he knoweth not ; and shall sunder him , and set him his portion with those who are not faithful .
42012047	And that servant who knew the will of his lord , and prepared not himself according to his will , shall be beaten with many
42012048	But he who knew not , and did that which was worthy of stripes , shall be beaten with few stripes . For every one to whom much is given , much will be required from him ; and to whom much is committed , the more will they require at his hand .
42012049	FIRE have I come to send forth upon the earth , and I would that it already burned :
42012050	and I have a baptism ( wherewith ) to be baptized , and greatly am I pressed till it be completed .
42012051	Suppose you that peace I have come to send forth on the earth ? I tell you , not ( peace ) , but divisions .
42012052	For from henceforth there will be five in one house , who ( will be ) divided , three against two , and two against three .
42012053	For the father will be divided against his son , and the son against his father ; the mother against her daughter , and the daughter against her mother ; the mother-in-law against the daughter-in-law and the daughter-in-law against the mother-in-law .
42012054	And he said to the assembly , When you see a cloud arisen from the west , immediately you say , The rain cometh ; and it is so :
42012055	and when bloweth the south , you say , It becomes heat ; and it is so .
42012056	You hypocrites , the aspect of the sky and of the earth you know to distinguish ; but this Time how do you not distinguish ?
42012057	But why of yourselves judge you not the truth ?
42012058	When thou art going with thine adversary to the magistrate , while in the way , negotiate , and be freed from him ; lest he bring thee to the judge , and the judge deliver thee to the exactor , and the exactor cast thee into the house of the bound ;
42012059	and Amen I tell thee , Thou wilt not be delivered from thence till thou shalt have given the last shomona .
42013001	NOW at that time came some and told him of the Galiloyee , they whose blood Pilatos had mingled with their sacrifices .
42013002	Jeshu answered and said to them , Think you that these Galiloyee were sinners more than all the Galiloyee , that thus it was ( with ) them ?
42013003	No ; but I tell you that all of you also , if you repent not , will thus perish .
42013004	Or those eighteen on whom fell the tower in Silucha , and killed them ; think you that they were sinners above all men who dwell in Urishlem ?
42013005	No ; but I tell you that , if you repent not , all of you likewise shall perish .
42013006	And he spake this parable : A man had a fig-tree which was planted in his vinery : and he came and sought fruits on it , but did not find .
42013007	And he said to the husbandman , Behold , three years come I seeking fruits from this fig-tree , but I have not found : cut it down ; why maketh it the ground useless ?
42013008	The husbandman saith to him , My lord , suffer it also this year , until I tend it and manure it :
42013009	and if it produce fruits , ( well ) : but if not , then afterwards I will cut it down .
42013010	AS Jeshu was teaching on a shabath in one of the synagogues ,
42013011	a woman was there who had a spirit of infirmity eighteen years ; and she was bowed down , and could not be straight at all .
42013012	But Jeshu saw her , and called her , and said to her , Woman , thou art loosed from thine infirmity .
42013013	And he laid his hand upon her ; and at once she was made straight , and glorified Aloha .
42013014	But the chief of the synagogue answered , being angry that Jeshu had healed on the shabath , and said to the congregation , Six days there are in which it is lawful to work : in them come and be healed , and not on the day of shabath .
42013015	But Jeshu answered and said to him , Hypocrite , doth not any one of you on the shabath loose his ox or his ass from the manger , and going giveth to drink ?
42013016	But this daughter of Abraham , whom , behold , the Accuser hath bound eighteen years , is it not lawful to loose from this binding on the day of shabath ?
42013017	And as he said these things , ashamed were all they who had risen up against him ; and all the people rejoiced in all these wonders that were done by his hand .
42013018	Jeshu said , What doth the kingdom of Aloha resemble , and to what shall I compare it ?
42013019	It resembles a grain of mustard , which a man took ( and ) cast into his garden : and it grew , and became a great tree ; and the fowl of the heaven built in its branches .
42013020	Jeshu said again , To what shall I compare the kingdom of Aloha ?
42013021	It is like leaven which a woman took ; ( and ) hid in three satas of meal , until all had leavened .
42013022	And he journeyed , teaching in the villages and in the cities , and going forwards to Urishlem .
42013023	ONE had demanded ( of ) him if they are few who are saved . But Jeshu said to them ,
42013024	Strive to enter in at the strait gate : for I say to you that many will seek to enter in , but shall not be able .
42013025	From the hour that the Lord of the house shall have risen up and have shut the door , you may stand without , knocking at the door , and may begin to say , Our Lord , our Lord , open to us ! But he will answer and say , I tell you that I know not whence you are .
42013026	And you shall begin to say , Before thee we have eaten and drunk , and in our streets thou hast taught .
42013027	And he shall say to you , I know you not whence you are : depart from me , workers of falsity .
42013028	There will be weeping and gnashing of teeth , when you shall see Abraham and Ishok and Jakub and all the prophets in the kingdom of Aloha , but you be cast forth without .
42013029	And they shall come from the east , and from the west , and from the south , and from the north , and shall recline in the kingdom of Aloha .
42013030	And , behold , there are last who shall be first , and there are first who shall be last .
42013031	In that day came men from the Pharishee , saying to him , Remove , go from hence , because Herodes desireth to kill thee .
42013032	Jeshu saith to them , Go , tell that fox , Behold , I cast out devils and perform cures to-day and to-morrow , and the third day I am perfected .
42013033	Nevertheless it behoveth me to-day and to-morrow to work and the ( day ) after I shall go ; because it cannot be that a prophet perish out of Urishlem .
42013034	Urishlem , Urishlem ! killing the prophets , and stoning them that are sent to her , what times would I have gathered thy sons as the hen gathereth her chickens under her wings , and you willed not !
42013035	Behold , left to you is your house a desert ; for I say to you , that you will not see me until you shall say , Blessed is he who cometh in the name of the Lord .
42014001	AND it was that while he went into the house of one of the chief Pharishee to eat bread , on the day of shabath , they watched him .
42014002	And , behold , a certain man who had gathered waters was before him .
42014003	And Jeshu answered and said to the Sophree and the Pharishee , Is it lawful on the shabath to heal ?
42014004	But they were silent . And he took him , and healed him , and dismissed him .
42014005	And he said to them , Who from you , whose son or his ox hath fallen into a pit on the day of shabath , doth not at once bring him forth ?
42014006	And they could not give him the answer concerning this .
42014007	And he spoke a parable to them who had been invited there , forasmuch as he had observed them , that they chose the chief places of reclining :
42014008	When thou art invited by one into the house of festivity , go not to recline on the principal seat , lest there be invited thither one more honourable than thou ;
42014009	and he come who thyself and him had called , and say to thee , Give place to this ; and thou be ashamed as thou arisest to take another place .
42014010	But when thou art invited , go , recline thee in the last ( seat ) , that when he who called thee cometh , he may say to thee , My friend , ascend and recline above , and thou shalt have honour before all of them who recline with thee .
42014011	For every one who exalteth himself shall be humbled ; and every one who humbleth himself shall be exalted .
42014012	And he said to him who had called him , When thou makest a dinner or a supper , thou shouldest not call thy friends , nor thy brethren , nor thy kinsmen , nor thy rich neighbours , lest they also call thee , and thou have this recompence .
42014013	But when thou makest a feast , call the poor , the maimed , the lame , the blind ,
42014014	and thou shalt be blessed , because they cannot recompense thee ; for thy recompence shall be in the resurrection of the just .
42014015	But when one of those who reclined heard these ( words ) , he said to him , Blessed he who shall eat bread in the kingdom of Aloha !
42014016	Jeshu saith to him , A certain man made a great supper , and called many . And he sent his servant ,
42014017	at the time of the supper , to say to them who were called , Behold , every thing is prepared for you , come .
42014018	And every one of them began to excuse himself . The first said to him , I have bought an estate , and am constrained to go forth to see it : I beseech thee , permit me to be excused .
42014019	Another said , Five yoke of oxen have I bought , and I go to prove them : I beseech thee , permit me to be excused .
42014020	Another said , A wife have I taken , and therefore I cannot come .
42014021	And the servant came and told his lord these things . Then the lord of the house was angry , and said to his servant , Go into the streets and outskirts of the city , and bring hither the poor , and the afflicted , and the lame , and the sightless .
42014022	And the servant said , My lord , it is done as thou hast commanded , and yet there is place .
42014023	And the lord said to his servant , Go forth into the ways , and among the hedges , and constrain them to come in , that my house may be filled :
42014024	for I tell you , that not one of those men who were called shall taste of my supper .
42014025	AND while great multitudes were going with him , he turned and said to them ,
42014026	Whoever cometh with me , and doth not hate his father and his mother , and his brethren and his sisters , and his wife and his children , and himself also , a disciple he cannot be of mine .
42014027	And whoever doth not take up his cross and come after me , a disciple he cannot be of mine .
42014028	For who of you that willeth to build a tower , and doth not first sit down and reckon the expense of it , whether he have ( wherewith ) to finish it ?
42014029	lest , when he shall have laid the foundation , and shall not be able to finish , all who see shall deride him ,
42014030	saying , This man began to build , and was not able to finish .
