42014031	Or , what king , going to war with a king his neighbour , doth not first consider , whether he be able with ten thousand to meet him who cometh against him with twenty thousand ?
42014032	and if not , while he is distant from him , he may send legates , and pray for peace .
42014033	So every one of you who doth not leave all his possession , cannot be unto me a disciple .
42014034	Salt is good ; but if the salt also shall become insipid , with what shall it be seasoned ?
42014035	Not for the earth , nor for the dunghill , it goeth . They cast it out . Who hath ears to hear , let him hear .
42015001	Then drew near to him the publicans and sinners to hear him .
42015002	And the Sophree and Pharishee murmured , and said , This ( man ) receiveth sinners , and eateth with them .
42015003	And Jeshu spake to them this parable :
42015004	What man of you , who hath a hundred sheep , if he shall lose one from them , does not leave the ninety and nine in the wilderness , and , going , seeketh that which was lost until he shall have found it ?
42015005	And when he hath found it , he rejoiceth and carrieth it upon his shoulders .
42015006	And , coming to his house , he calleth his friends and his neighbours , and saith to them , Rejoice with me ; for I have found the sheep which was lost .
42015007	I say to you , that thus shall there be joy in heaven over one sinner who repenteth , more than over the ninety and nine just ones who have no need of repentance .
42015008	Or , who is the woman that hath ten zuzis , and shall lose one of them , ( and ) does not light a lamp and sweep the house , and seek it diligently , until she shall have found it ?
42015009	And when she hath found it , she calleth her friends and her neighbours , and saith to them , Rejoice with me ; for I have found my zuzi that I had lost .
42015010	I say to you , that so shall there be joy before the angels of God over one sinner that repenteth .
42015011	AND Jeshu said to them again , A certain man had two sons ;
42015012	and his minor son said to him , My father , give to me my division of the goods of thy house . And he divided to them his substance .
42015013	And after a few days the minor son gathered together his all whatsoever , and went into a distant country , and there dispersed his substance in living profusely .
42015014	And when every thing he had was finished , there was a great famine in that country ; and he began to want .
42015015	And he went and joined himself to one of the sons of the city of that place ; and he sent him into the field to tend the swine .
42015016	And he had a desire to fill his belly with those karubs which the swine did eat ; and no man gave to him .
42015017	And when he came to himself , he said , How many hirelings are there now in my father's house , who have abundance of bread , and I here with hunger am perishing !
42015018	I will arise , go to my father , and say to him , My father , I have sinned against heaven and before thee ,
42015019	and am no more worthy thy son to be called : make me as one of thy hirelings .
42015020	And he arose , ( and ) went to his father . And while he was ( yet ) afar , his father saw him , and had compassion upon him , and ran , fell upon his neck , and kissed him .
42015021	And his son said to him , My father , I have sinned against heaven and before thee , and am not worthy thy son to be called .
42015022	But his father said to his servants , Bring forth the first robe to clothe him , and put a ring upon his hand , and let him be , shod with sandals ,
42015023	and bring , kill the calf that is fat , and let us eat and be glad ;
42015024	for this my son was dead , and he is alive ; he was lost , and is found . And they began to rejoice .
42015025	But he , the elder son , was in the field ; and as he came and drew near to the house , he heard the voice of music ;
42015026	and he called one of the youths , and asked him what this was .
42015027	He said to him , Thy brother hath come , and thy father hath killed the calf that was fat , because he hath received him well .
42015028	And he was angry , and would not go in . And his father came forth and besought him .
42015029	But he said to his father , Behold , how many years have I wrought thee service , and never have I transgressed thy commandment : yet never hast thou given me a kid , that I might feast with my friends .
42015030	But this thy son , when he hath wasted thy substance with harlots , and hath come , thou hast killed for him the fatted calf .
42015031	His father saith to him , My son , thou in all time art with me , and every thing that I have is thine .
42015032	But to rejoice it behoves us , and to be glad , because this thy brother was dead , and is alive ; and was lost , and is found .
42016001	AND he spake a parable to his disciples : There was a certain rich man who had a house-chief ; and he was accused to him that his substance he wasted .
42016002	And his lord called him , and said to him , What is this that I hear of thee ? give me the account of thy house-headship ; for thou canst no longer be house-chief unto me .
42016003	And the house-chief said within himself , What shall I do ? for my lord taketh from me the house-headship . I cannot dig , and to beg I am ashamed .
42016004	I know what I will do , that when I shall be put out of the house-headship , they may receive me into their houses .
42016005	And he called one by one from the debtors of his lord , and said to the first , How much owest thou to my lord ?
42016006	And he said to him , An hundred metres of oil . He saith to him , Take thy book , and sit down quickly , and write fifty metres .
42016007	And he said to another , And thou , how much owest thou to my lord ? He saith to him , An hundred kureen of wheat . He saith to him , Take thy book , and sit down , write eighty kureen .
42016008	And praised our Lord the house-chief who was unjust , in that he had done wisely ; for the sons of this world are wiser than the sons of light in this their generation .
42016009	Also I say unto you , Make to you friends from this wealth of unrighteousness , that , when perfect , they may receive you into the tabernacles of eternity .
42016010	Whoever in the little is faithful , in the great also is faithful ; and he who in the little is unjust , in the great also is unjust .
42016011	If , therefore , in the wealth of unrighteousness you have not been faithful , the truth to you who will confide ?
42016012	And if in that which is not yours you are not found faithful , your own who will give to you ?
42016013	No man can serve two lords ; for either the one he will hate , and the other he will love ; or the one he will honour , and the other despise . You cannot serve Aloha and wealth .
42016014	But the Pharishee , when they heard all these things , because they loved money , derided him .
42016015	But Jeshu said to them , You are they who justify yourselves before the sons of men ; but Aloha knoweth your hearts . For , what is exalted among men , before Aloha is abominable .
42016016	The law and the prophets were until Juchanon ; from thenceforth the kingdom of Aloha is preached , and every one presseth to enter .
42016017	But it is easier for heaven and earth to pass away than one letter from the law to pass away .
42016018	Every one who looseth his wife , and taketh another , committeth adultery ; and every one who taketh the dismissed , committeth adultery .
42016019	NOW there was a certain rich man , and he was clothed in byssos and purple , and every day feasted gaily .
42016020	And there was a certain poor man , whose name was Loózar ; and he lay at the gate of him who was rich , bruised with wounds ,
42016021	and desired to fill his belly with the crumbs which fell from the table of that rich . And also the dogs came and licked his wounds .
42016022	Now that poor man died , and angels conducted him to the bosom of Abraham : but that rich man also died , and was buried .
42016023	And , tormented in shiul , he lifted up his eyes afar , and seeth Abraham , and Loózar in his bosom .
42016024	And he cried with a high voice , and said , My father Abraham , have compassion upon me , and send Loózar , that he may dip the top of his finger in waters , and moisten my tongue ; for , behold , I am tormented in this flame .
42016025	Abraham said to him , My son , remember that thou didst receive thy goods in thy life , and Loózar his evils , and now , behold , he reposeth here , and thou art tormented .
42016026	And with all these , there is a great void set between us and you , that they who would pass from hence unto you are not able , nor they also who would pass from thence to us .
42016027	He said to him , I pray thee , then , my father , to send him unto my father's house :
42016028	for five brethren have I ; let him go and testify unto them , that they also come not to this place of torment .
42016029	Abraham said to him , They have Musha and the prophets , let them hear them .
42016030	But he said to him , No , my father Abraham , but if one from the dead shall go unto them , they repent .
42016031	Abraham saith to him , If Musha and the prophets they hear not , neither , if one from the dead should rise , would they believe him .
42017001	AND Jeshu said to his disciples , It cannot be that offences should not come , but woe to him by whom they shall come .
42017002	It were better for him that an ass-millstone were hanged on his neck , and he be cast into the sea . Woe ( to him ) who shall offend one of these little ones !
42017003	Take heed to yourselves ; if thy brother transgress , reprove him , and if he repent , forgive him .
42017004	And if seven times in the day he shall trespass against thee , and seven times in the day return to thee and say , I repent , forgive him .
42017005	And the apostles said unto our Lord , Increase to us faith .
42017006	He saith to them , If you had faith as a grain of mustard , you should say to this mulberry tree , Be rooted up and planted in the sea , and it would obey you .
42017007	Which of you , having a servant who leadeth a yoke ( of oxen ) or who tendeth the flock , and when he cometh from the field , saith to him at once , Pass on and recline thyself ?
42017008	but ( rather ) saith to him , Prepare me something that I may sup , and gird thy loins , serve me until I have eaten and drunk , and afterwards thou also shalt eat and drink .
42017009	Does that servant receive thanks because he hath done what was required of him ? I consider not .
42017010	Thus also you , when you have done all those things which are required of you , have said , We are unprofitable servants , because what we were obligated to do , ( that ) have we done .
42017011	AND it was that as Jeshu was going to Urishlem , he passed among the Shomroyee from Galila .
42017012	And as he drew near to enter a certain village , there met him ten men , lepers , and they stood from afar ,
42017013	and lifted up their voice and said , Our Lord Jeshu , have mercy upon us !
42017014	And when he saw them , he said to them , Go show yourselves to the priests . And as they went , they were cleansed .
42017015	Then one of them , when he saw that he was cleansed , returned to him , and with a high voice glorified Aloha .
42017016	And he fell upon his face before the feet of Jeshu , and thanked him . And , behold , this was a Shomroya .
42017017	And Jeshu answered and said , Were not they who were cleansed ten ? Where are the nine ?
42017018	None have separated to come ( and ) give praise to Aloha , but this , who is from a strange people .
42017019	And he said to him , Arise , go ; thy faith hath saved thee .
42017020	AND when Jeshu was questioned from the Pharishee , When cometh the kingdom of Aloha ? he answered and said to them , The kingdom of Aloha cometh not with watchings :
42017021	nor say they , Behold , it is here ! and , Behold , it is there ! for the kingdom of Aloha is within you .
42017022	And he said to his disciples , The days will come , when you will desire to see one of the days of the Son of man , and you will not see .
42017023	And if they say to you , Behold here , and , Behold there , go not .
42017024	For as the lightning lighteneth from heaven , and illuminateth all beneath the heaven , so shall be the Son of man in his day .
42017025	But first it will be that he shall suffer many ( things ) , and be rejected of this generation .
42017026	And as it was in the days of Nuch , so will it be in the days of the Son of man ;
42017027	when they ate and drank and took wives and gave to husbands , until the day when Nuch entered into the ark , and the deluge came , and destroyed every one .
42017028	So also as it was in the days of Lut ; they ate and drank , and bought and sold , and planted and builded ;
42017029	but in the day that Lut went forth from Sadum , the Lord rained fire and brimstone from heaven and destroyed them all .
42017030	Thus will it be in the day when the Son of man shall be revealed .
42017031	In that day , he who is on the roof and his garments in the house , let him not go down and take them . And he who is in the field , let him not turn his back .
42017032	Remember the wife of Lut .
42017033	Whoever willeth to save his life shall lose it , and whoever is willing to lose his life shall save it .
42017034	I tell you , that in that night two shall be in one bed ; the one shall be taken and the other left .
42017035	Two shall be grinding together , one shall be taken and the other left .
42017036	Two shall be in the field , one shall be taken and the other left .
42017037	They answered and said to him , Where , our Lord ? He saith to them , Where the body is , there will be assembled the eagles .
42018001	AND he spake also a parable to them , that in all time ( men ) should pray and not weary .
42018002	There was a judge in a certain city who of Aloha was not afraid , and of men was not regardful .
42018003	But a certain widow was in that city , who came to him , saying , Avenge me of my adversary .
42018004	And he was not willing long time ; but afterward he said within himself , If of Aloha I am not afraid , and of men am not regardful ,
42018005	yet , because this widow wearies me , I will avenge her , that in all time she come not molesting me .
42018006	And our Lord said , Hear what saith the unrighteous judge .
42018007	But shall not Aloha do vengeance for his chosen , who cry to him by day and by night , and prolong his spirit towards them ?
42018008	I tell you he will avenge them speedily . Nevertheless , when the Son of man shall come , will he find faith upon the earth ?
42018009	And he spake this parable against some who trusted in themselves that they were just , and despised all ( men ) :
42018010	Two men went up to the temple to pray , the one a Pharisha , the other a publican ;
42018011	and , behold , the Pharisha stood ( and ) within himself these words prayed : Aloha , I thank thee that I am not as the rest of men , rapacious and unjust , and adulterers ; nor as this publican .
42018012	But I fast twice in the week , and tithe whatever I possess .
42018013	But that publican stood from afar , and would not even his eyes lift up to heaven , but smote upon his breast , saying , Aloha , be merciful to me a sinner !
42018014	I tell you that this one went down justified to his house , rather than that Pharisha . For every man who exalteth himself shall be humbled , and every one who humbleth himself shall be exalted .
42018015	Then they brought to him infants , that he should touch them : and the disciples saw it , and rebuked them .
42018016	But Jeshu called them , and said to them , Suffer children to come to me , and forbid them not ; for of those who are as these ,
42018017	of them is the kingdom of heaven . Amen I say to you , That whoever does not receive the kingdom of Aloha as a child , shall not enter into it .
42018018	AND one of the rulers asked him , saying , Good Teacher , what shall I do that I may inherit eternal life ?
42018019	Jeshu saith to him , Why callest thou me good , and none is good but one , Aloha ?
42018020	The commandments thou knowest , Thou shalt not kill , and , Thou shalt not commit adultery , and , Thou shalt not steal , and , Thou shalt not witness false testimony , Honour thy father and thy mother .
42018021	He saith to him , These all have I kept from my childhood .
42018022	But when Jeshu heard this , he said to him , One thing is lacking with thee ; go , sell whatever thou hast , and give to the poor , and thou shalt have treasure in heaven , and come after me .
42018023	But he , when he heard these words , was grieved ; for he was very rich .
42018024	And when Jeshu saw that he was grieved , he said , How difficult is it to those who have riches to enter into the kingdom of Aloha !
42018025	It is easier for a camel into the aperture of a needle to enter , than the rich into the kingdom of Aloha .
42018026	They who heard said to him , And who can be saved ?
42018027	But Jeshu said , Those ( things ) which with the sons of men are not possible , with Aloha are possible to be done .
42018028	Shemun Kipha said to him , Behold , we have forsaken every thing , and have come after thee .
42018029	Jeshu saith to him , Amen I say to you , That no man who leaveth houses , or fathers , or brethren , or wife , or children , for the kingdom of Aloha ,
42018030	and shall not receive by two-fold ( as ) many in this time , and in the world that cometh the life that is eternal .
42018031	AND Jeshu took the twelve , and said to them , Behold , we go up to Urishlem , and shall be fulfilled all ( things ) that are written in the prophets concerning the Son of man .
42018032	For he will be delivered to the Gentiles ; and they will deride him , and spit in his face ,
42018033	and will scourge him , and maltreat him , and kill him ; and the third day he shall arise .
42018034	But not one of these understood they : for this word was hidden from them , and they knew not those sayings which were spoken with them .
42018035	And as he drew nigh to Jirichu , a certain blind man was sitting by the road-side , and begging .
42018036	And he heard the voice of the multitude as it was passing , and asked what was this .
42018037	They say to him , Jeshu Natsroya passeth .
42018038	And he cried and said , Jeshu bar David , have mercy on me !
42018039	And they who went before Jeshu rebuked him , that he might be silent : but he cried out the more , Son of David , have mercy on me !
42018040	And Jeshu stood , and commanded that they should lead him unto him . And when he , approached him , he asked him and said to him ,
42018041	What wilt thou I shall do for thee ? And he said , My Lord , that I may see .
42018042	And Jeshu said to him , See ! thy faith hath saved thee .
42018043	And in an instant he saw , and came after him , and glorified Aloha : and all the people , when they saw , gave praise to Aloha .
42019001	And as Jeshu entered and passed through Jirichu ,
42019002	there was a certain man whose name was Zakai ; he was rich and chief of the publicans :
42019003	and he wished to see Jeshu , who he was , and could not for the crowd , because in his stature Zakai was small .
42019004	And he ran before Jeshu , and ascended a wild fig-tree to see him , because so he was about to pass .
42019005	And when Jeshu came to that place , he saw him , and said to him , Be in haste , descend , Zakai ; for to-day I must be at thy house .
42019006	And he was in haste , and descended , and received him rejoicing .
42019007	But when they all saw ( this ) , they murmured , and said that with a man a sinner he hath gone in to abide .
42019008	But Zakai stood , and said to Jeshu , Behold , my Lord , the dividing of my wealth give I to the poor ; and to every man , whatever I have wrongfully taken , fourfold I restore .
42019009	Jeshu saith to him , To-day is there salvation to this house , because this ( man ) also ( is a ) son of Abraham .
42019010	For the Son of man came to save that which was lost .
42019011	And when they had heard these things , he added to speak a parable ; because he had drawn nigh to Urishlem , and they expected that in that hour would be revealed the kingdom of Aloha .
42019012	And he said , A certain man of a noble house went into a distant country , to receive for himself a kingdom , and to return .
42019013	And he called his ten servants , and gave to them ten minin , and said to them , Trade till I come .
42019014	But his citizens hated him , and sent messengers after him , saying , We are not willing that this should reign over us .
42019015	And having received the kingdom and returned , he spake to call to him those servants to whom he had given the silver , that he might know how every one of them had traded .
42019016	And the first came and said , My lord , thy mani ten minin hath gained .
42019017	He saith to him , Well , good servant : because in a little thou art found faithful , thou shalt have rule over ten towns .
42019018	And the second came and said , My lord , thy mani five minin hath made .
42019019	He saith also to this , Thou also shalt have rule over five towns .
42019020	And the other came and said , My lord , behold thy mani which I have had with me , laid up in a napkin .
42019021	For I feared thee , because thou art a hard man , taking up what thou hadst not laid down , and reaping what thou sowedst not .
42019022	He said to him , From thy own mouth I will judge thee , evil servant : thou didst know that I was a hard man , taking up what I had not laid down , and reaping what I sowed not :
42019023	why ( then ) gavest thou not my silver upon the table , that when I came I might require it with its increase ?
42019024	And to those who stood before him he said , Take from him the mani , and give to him who hath the ten minin .
42019025	They say to him , Our lord , he hath ten minin .
42019026	He saith to them , I tell you , that to every one who hath ( it ) shall be given ; and from him who hath not , that also which he hath shall be taken .
42019027	But those adversaries who would not that I should reign over them , bring them , and slay them before me .
42019028	AND when Jeshu had said these things , he went forward to go to Urishlem .
42019029	And when he came to Bethphage and Beth-ania , at the mount that is called the Place of Olives , he sent two from his disciples ,
42019030	and said to them , Go to the village over against us ; and as you enter , behold , you will find a colt tied , whereon no man hath ridden : loose and bring him .
42019031	And if any man demand why you loose him , thus say : It is requested by our Lord .
42019032	And they who were sent went and found as he had told them .
42019033	And as they were loosing the colt , the owners of him said to them , Why loose you the colt ?
42019034	And they said to them , Because by our Lord it is requested .
42019035	And they brought him to Jeshu ; and they cast upon the colt their garments , and Jeshu rode upon him .
42019036	And as they went , they spread their clothes in the way .
42019037	And when he had come nigh to the declivity of the Mount of Olives , the whole assembly of the disciples began to rejoice , and praise Aloha with a high voice , for all the mighty acts which they had seen :
42019038	and they said , Blessed be the King who cometh in the name of the Lord ! Peace in the heavens , and glory in the highest !
42019039	But some of the Pharishee from among the multitudes say to him , Rabi , rebuke thy disciples .
42019040	He saith to them , I tell you , if these should be silent , the stones would cry out .
42019041	AND when he approached , and saw the city , he wept over her , saying ,
42019042	If thou hadst known these things which are for thy peace , and in this thy day ! But now they are hidden from thine eyes .
42019043	But the days will come to thee when thine enemies shall encompass thee and straiten thee on every side ,
42019044	and they shall overthrow thee , and thy children within thee , and not leave in thee one stone upon another , because thou knewest not the time of thy visitation .
42019045	And as he went into the temple , he began to cast out those who bought in it and sold ,
42019046	and said to them , It is written that my house is the house of prayer ; but you have made it a den of thieves .
42019047	And he taught every day in the temple ; but the chief priests and the scribes and the elders of the people sought to destroy him ,
42019048	but could not find what they might do to him ; for all the people hung upon him to hear him .
42020001	AND it was on one of the days , while he taught the people in the temple and evangelized , the chief priests and scribes with the elders rose up against him ,
42020002	and said to him , Tell us by what authority thou doest these , and who is he who gave thee this authority ?
42020003	Jeshu answered and said to them , I will also ask of you a word , and tell you me :
42020004	the baptism of Juchanon , from heaven was it , or from the sons of men ?
42020005	But they reasoned within themselves , saying , If we shall say , From heaven , he saith to us , Why did you not believe him ?
42020006	But if we shall say , From men , all the people will stone us ; for they are persuaded that Juchanon was a prophet .
42020007	And they said to him , We know not from whence it is .
42020008	Jeshu saith to them , Nor tell I you by what authority I do these .
42020009	And he began to speak to the people this parable : A certain man planted a vinery , and let it to husbandmen , and removed for a great time .
42020010	And at the season he sent his servant to the husbandmen that they should give him of the fruit of the vinery . But the husbandmen beat him , and sent him away empty .
42020011	And he added and sent another servant ; but they beat him also , and maltreated him , and sent him away empty .
42020012	And he added and sent a third ; but they also wounded him , and cast him out .
42020013	The lord of the vinery saith , What shall I do ? I will send my son , the beloved ; now will they see him and reverence him .
42020014	But when the husbandmen saw him , they reasoned among themselves , saying , This is the heir : come , let us kill him , and the inheritance will be ours .
42020015	And they cast him out of the vinery , and killed him . What therefore shall the lord of the vinery do to them ?
42020016	He will come and destroy those husbandmen , and will give the vinery to others . But when they heard , they said , May this not be !
42020017	But he beheld them , and said , And what is that which is written , The stone which the builders rejected is become the head of the corner ?
42020018	And every one who shall fall upon this stone shall be broken ; and every one on whom it shall fall it will scatter him .
42020019	But the chief priests and Sophree sought to lay hands on him in that very hour ; but they feared the people , for they knew that concerning them ( selves ) he had spoken this parable .
42020020	And they sent to him spies , who should resemble just men , that they might take him in discourse , and deliver him to the judgment and to the authority of the governor .
42020021	And they asked him , and said to him , Doctor , we know that thou speakest and teachest rightly , neither dost thou deceive , but with integrity thou teachest the way of Aloha .
42020022	Is it lawful for us to give head-silver to Cesar or not ?
42020023	But he understood their subtilty , and said , Why tempt you me ?
42020024	Show me a dinara . Of whom upon it is the image and the inscription ? But they said , Of Cesar .
42020025	Jeshu saith to them , Give then of Cesar's to Cesar , and of Aloha's unto Aloha .
42020026	And they could not take hold of his words before the people ; and they wondered at his answer , and were silent .
42020027	BUT some of the Zadukoyee approached , they who say that there is no resurrection ;
42020028	and they questioned him , and said to him , Doctor , Musha wrote to us that if a man's brother die having a wife who hath not children , his brother shall take his wife , and raise up seed unto his brother .
42020029	But there were seven brethren ; and the first took ; a wife , and died without children .
42020030	And the second took his wife , and he died without children .
42020031	And the third also took her ; and so also the seven of them : and they died and left no children .
42020032	Died in the end also the woman .
42020033	In the resurrection therefore , whose of them shall she be the wife ? for the seven of them had taken her .
42020034	Jeshu saith to them , The sons of this world take wives , and women become ( the wives ) of men :
42020035	but they who of that world are worthy , and of the resurrection which is from among the dead , take not wives , neither do women become ( the wives ) of men .
42020036	Neither again can they die , for they are as the angels ; and the children are they of Aloha , because they have become the children of the resurrection .
42020037	But that the dead arise , Musha also showeth ; for he commemorateth at the bush , while he saith , The Lord the God of Abraham , and the God of Ishok , and the God of Jakub .
42020038	But he was not the God of the dead , but of the living : for they all live unto him .
42020039	And some of the Sophree answered and said to him , Doctor , thou hast well said .
42020040	And they dared not question him again of any thing .
42020041	AND he said to them , How say the Sophree concerning the Meshicha , that he is the Son of David ?
42020042	And David himself saith in the book of Psalms , The Lord said unto my Lord , Sit thou at my right hand ,
42020043	until I put thine adversaries beneath thy feet .
42020044	If David therefore calleth him Lord , how is he his son ?
42020045	And while all the people heard , he said to his disciples ,
42020046	Beware of the Sophree , who will to walk in stoles , and love the shaloma in public places , and the chief seats in the synagogues , and the chief reclining-places at evening feasts ;
42020047	who devour the houses of widows , and for the occasion prolong their prayers : these shall receive the greater judgment .
42021001	Jeshu looked at those rich ( persons ) who were throwing into the house of treasure their oblations .
42021002	And he saw also a certain poor widow who threw in two shomonee .
42021003	And he said , Truth I say to you , That this poor widow hath thrown in more than every one :
42021004	for all those from what abounded to them have thrown into the house of the oblation of Aloha : but this from her penury all that she possessed hath she thrown in .
42021005	AND as some spake of the temple , ( with ) what beautiful stones and gifts it was adorned , Jeshu said to them ,
42021006	These that you see , the days shall come ( when ) of them there will not be found a stone upon a stone that shall not be destroyed .
42021007	And they inquired of him , and said , Malphona , when shall these be ? and what is the sign that these are nigh to be ?
42021008	But he said to them , Beware lest you be seduced : for many will come in my name , and will say , I am the Meshicha ; and the time hath drawn nigh : but go not you after them .
42021009	And when you hear of wars and commotions , fear not : for these are first to be ; but not yet cometh the end .
42021010	For nation shall rise up against nation , and kingdom against kingdom :
42021011	and great earthquakes will be in divers places , and famines , and plagues ; and there will be portents , and terrors , and great signs from the heavens will appear , and great tempests shall there be .
42021012	But before all these , they will lay hands upon you , and persecute you , and deliver you up to the synagogues , and to the house of the bound . And they will bring you before kings and governors on account of my name .
42021013	And it shall be to you for a testimony .
42021014	But lay it up in your hearts that you may not be learned for the answer ;
42021015	for I will give you a mouth and wisdom which all your adversaries cannot stand against .
42021016	But your fathers , and your brethren , and your kinsfolk , and your friends will betray you , and some of you they shall put to death .
42021017	And you will be hated of all men on account of my name :
42021018	yet a hair of your head shall not perish ,
42021019	but in your perseverance you shall possess your souls .
42021020	But when you see Urishlem encompassed by an army , then know that its destruction hath drawn nigh .
42021021	Then let them who are in Jihud escape to the mountain , and they who are within her escape , and let not them who are in the country places enter into her .
42021022	For those ( will be ) the days of retribution , that all which is written may be fulfilled .
42021023	But woe to those who are with child and to those who suckle in those days ! for there will be great distress in the land , and wrath upon this people .
42021024	And they shall fall by the edge of the sword , and be led captive into every place , and Urishlem shall be trodden down of the Gentiles , until shall be fulfilled the times of the Gentiles .
42021025	And there will be signs in the sun , and in the moon , and in the stars , and on earth distress of nations , and smiting of hands from astonishment at the voice of the sea ,
42021026	the commotion hurrying forth the souls of the sons of men from fear of what is about to come upon the earth ; and the powers of the heavens shall be commoved .
42021027	And then shall they see the Son of man coming in the clouds , with power and great glory .
42021028	But when these things begin to be , take courage , and lift up your heads , because your redemption hath drawn nigh .
42021029	AND he spake to them a parable , Behold the fig-tree and all the trees ;
42021030	when they bud forth , immediately from them you know that summer hath drawn nigh .
42021031	Thus also you , when you see that these are , know that nigh is the kingdom of Aloha .
42021032	Amen I say to you , That this race shall not pass away till all these things shall be .
42021033	Heaven and earth shall pass away , but my words shall not pass away .
42021034	But take heed to yourselves , that at any time your hearts be not heavy with excess and drunkenness , and the care of the world , and unawares shall come upon you that day .
42021035	For as a net it will overtake all them who dwell upon the faces of the whole earth .
42021036	Be therefore wakeful at all time , and pray that you may be worthy to escape from those things that are about to be , and that you may stand before the Son of man .
42021037	So in the day ( time ) he taught in the temple , and at night he went forth and lodged in the mount which is called the Place of Olives .
42021038	And all the people were early with him at the temple to hear his word .
42022001	BUT the feast of the Phatiree , which is called Petscha , drew on .
42022002	And the chief priests and the Sophree sought how they might kill him ; for they feared from the people .
42022003	But Satana entered into Jihuda called Scarjuta , who was of the number of the twelve .
42022004	And he went , and spoke with the chief priests , and the Sophree , and the chief authorities of the temple , how he would deliver him to them .
42022005	And they were glad , and confirmed to give him silver .
42022006	And he promised to them , and sought him opportunity to betray him apart from the multitude .
42022007	And the day of unleavened bread came , on which it was the custom to slay the petscha .
42022008	And Jeshu sent Kipha and Juchanon , and said to them , Go prepare for us the petscha , that we may eat .
42022009	But they said to him , Where wilt thou that we prepare ?
42022010	He saith to them , When , you have entered into the city , a man meeteth you , bearing a pitcher of waters ; go after him , and when he hath gone in ,
42022011	say to the lord of the house , Our Master saith , Is there a dining-place where I may eat the petscha with my disciples ?
42022012	And he will show you a certain large upper chamber which is furnished : there make ready .
42022013	And they went , and found as he had told them : and they prepared the petscha .
42022014	And when it was time , Jeshu came and reclined , and the twelve apostles with him .
42022015	And he said to them , With desire have I desired to eat this petscha with you before I suffer :
42022016	for I tell you that from henceforth I shall not eat it , until it shall have been fulfilled in the kingdom of Aloha .
42022017	And he took the cup , and praised , and said , Take this , and divide it among yourselves :
42022018	for I tell you that I shall not drink of the fruit of the vine , until the kingdom of Aloha shall have come .
42022019	And he took bread , and praised , and brake , and gave to them , and said , This is my body which for you is given : this do in my memory .
42022020	And thus also respecting the cup , when , after they had supped , he said , This cup is the new covenant in my blood , which for you is shed .
42022021	Nevertheless , the hand of him who betrayeth me is on the table .
42022022	And the Son of man goeth , as he was set apart : nevertheless woe to that man by whom he is betrayed !
42022023	And they began to inquire among themselves , who it was of them who this should do .
42022024	But there was also a contention among them , who of them was the greatest .
42022025	And Jeshu said to them , The kings of the Gentiles are their lords ; and they who exercise authority over them , doers of good are called .
42022026	But you , not so : yea , he who is great among you , let him be as the least ; and he who is chief , as one who serveth .
42022027	For who is greatest , he who reclineth , or he who serveth ? Is not he who reclineth ? But I am among you as he who serveth .
42022028	You are they who have remained with me in my temptations .
42022029	And I promise to you , as hath promised to me my Father , a kingdom ;
42022030	that you may eat and drink at the table in my kingdom , and may sit upon thrones , and judge the twelve tribes of Isroel .
42022031	AND Jeshu said to Shemun , Shemun , behold , Satana , demandeth to sift thee as wheat ;
42022032	but I have prayed for thee , that thy faith may not fail : and thou also , in the time that thou art converted , confirm thy brethren .
42022033	But Shemun said to him , My Lord , with thee I am prepared , and for the house of the bound , and for death .
42022034	Jeshu saith to him , I tell thee , Shemun , that the cock will not crow to-day , till three times thou hast denied that thou knowest me .
42022035	And he said to them , When I sent you without purse , or scrip , or shoes , was any thing wanting to you ? They say to him , Nothing .
42022036	He saith to them , Henceforth , he who hath a purse , let him take it , and likewise a scrip also ; and he who hath not a sword , let him sell his garment and buy a sword .
42022037	For I tell you also , that what is written must be fulfilled in me , that with the transgressors he was numbered : for all which concerns me must be accomplished .
42022038	And they say to him , Our Lord , behold , here are two swords . He saith to them , They suffice .
42022039	And he came forth , and went , as he was used , to the mount of the Place of Olives ; and his disciples also went after him .
42022040	And when come unto the spot , he said to them , Pray that you enter not into temptation .
42022041	And he removed from them as ( about the distance of ) a stone's throw , and bowed the knee , and prayed ,
42022042	and said , Father , if thou wilt , let this cup pass : nevertheless not my will , but thine be done .
42022043	And an angel appeared to him from heaven , who strengthened him .
42022044	And being in terror , more vehemently he prayed , and his sweat was as drops of blood , and fell upon the ground .
42022045	And he arose from prayer , and came to his disciples , and found them asleep , from sorrow .
42022046	And he said to them , Why sleep you ? arise and pray , that you enter not into temptation .
42022047	And as he was speaking , behold a multitude , and behold him who was called Jihuda , one of the twelve , coming before them , and he came nigh to Jeshu , and kissed him : for this was the sign he had given to them , He whom I shall kiss is he .
42022048	Jeshu saith to him , Jihuda , with the kiss betrayest thou the Son of man ?
42022049	But when they who were with him saw what was done , they say to him , Our Lord , shall we strike with the sword ?
42022050	And one of them struck the servant of the high priest , and took off his right ear .
42022051	Jeshu answered and said , It sufficeth until this ; and he touched his ear which he had struck , and healed it .
42022052	And Jeshu said to them who had come against him , the chief priests , and elders , and the chiefs of the forces of the temple , As against a thief are you come forth against me , with swords and clubs to take me ?
42022053	Every day with you have I been in the temple , and you did not stretch forth upon me ( your ) hands ; but this is your hour and the power of darkness .
42022054	And they took ( and ) brought him to the house of the chief of the priests ; and Shemun came after him from afar .
42022055	Now they had kindled a fire in the midst of the hall , and were sitting around it , and Shemun also sat with them .
42022056	And a certain damsel saw him as he sat by the fire , and , looking at him , she said , This also was with him .
42022057	But he denied , and said , Woman , I know him not .
42022058	And after a little while , another saw him , and said , Thou also art of them . But Kipha said , I am not .
42022059	And after one hour another contended and said , Assuredly this also was with him , for he is also a Galiloya .
42022060	Kipha saith , Man , I know not what thou sayest . And at once , while he was speaking , the cock crew .
42022061	And Jeshu turned , and looked upon Kipha ; and Shemun remembered his word which our Lord had spoken to him , that before the cock shall crow thou wilt have denied me three times .
42022062	And Shemun went without and wept bitterly .
42022063	And the men who held Jeshu mocked him ,
42022064	and veiled him , and they struck him upon the face , saying , Prophesy , who struck thee .
42022065	And many other things they blasphemed and spake against him .
42022066	AND when it dawned , the elders and chief priests and the Sophree came together , and took him into the house of their assembly ; saying to him ,
42022067	Art thou the Meshicha ? tell us . He saith to them , Should I tell you , you would not believe me ;
42022068	and were I to ask you , you would not return me a word , nor release me .
42022069	Henceforth the Son of man sitteth at the right hand of the power of Aloha .
42022070	Then said they all , Thou art , then , the Son of Aloha ? Jeshu saith to them , You say that I am .
42022071	They say , Why yet need we witnesses ? for we have heard from his mouth .
42023001	And the whole assembly of them arose , and brought him to Pilatos .
42023002	And they began to accuse him , saying , We have found this who deludeth our people , and forbiddeth that tribute unto Caesar we should give , saying of himself that he is the King Meshicha .
42023003	But Pilatos asked him , and said to him , Art thou the king of the Jihudoyee ? He saith to him , Thou hast said .
42023004	And Pilatos said to the chief priests and to the assembly , I find no occasion against this man .
42023005	But they cried out and said , He commoveth our people while he teacheth throughout all Jihud , beginning from Galila unto this place .
42023006	Pilatos , however , when he heard the name of Galila , asked if the man were a Galiloya .
42023007	And when he knew that he was from the limit of the jurisdiction of Herodes , he sent him unto Herodes , because that in Urishlem he was in those days .
42023008	And Herodes , when he saw Jeshu , was very glad ; for he had desired to see him of a great time : for he had heard concerning him many things , and hoped that some sign he should see from him .
42023009	And many words he asked him ; but Jeshu gave him no answer whatever .
42023010	And the chief priests and scribes stood and strenuously accused him .
42023011	Then Herodes and his soldiers treated him as a fool ; and when he had derided him , he dressed him in a robe of crimson , and sent him to Pilatos .
42023012	And in that day Pilatos and Herodes were friends with each other ; for before there had been enmity between them .
42023013	And Pilatos called the chief priests and the rulers of the people ,
42023014	and said to them , You have brought to me this man as a perverter of your people ; and , behold , I have examined him in your sight , and have found no cause in this man of all that you accuse him :
42023015	nor also Herodes ; for I sent him unto him , and , behold , nothing worthy of death is done to him :
42023016	I will therefore chastise him , and dismiss him .
42023017	For a custom had he to release to them one at the festival .
42023018	But all the multitude cried out , saying , Take this , and release to us Baraba ;
42023019	he who , for insurrection and murder which had been done in the city , had been thrown into the house of the chained .
42023020	But Pilatos spake with them again , being willing to release Jeshu .
42023021	But they cried out , saying , Crucify him ! Crucify him !
42023022	He the third time also said to them , Why , what evil hath this done ? Cause whatever that is worthy of death , I find not in him : I will therefore chastise him , and dismiss him .
42023023	But they were urgent with a high voice , demanding that they might crucify him ; and theirs and the voices of the high priests prevailed .
42023024	And Pilatos commanded that their requirement should be done .
42023025	And he released to them him who , for insurrection and murder , had been thrown into the house of the chained , whom they had asked : but Jeshu he delivered to their will .
42023026	AND as they led him away , they laid hold on Shemun Kurinoya , who was coming from the country , and they laid on him the cross , that he might bear ( it ) after Jeshu .
42023027	And there followed him much people , and those women who mourned and wailed for him .
42023028	And Jeshu turned to them , and said , Daughters of Urishlem , weep not for me , but for yourselves weep , and for your children .
42023029	For , behold , coming are the days in which they shall say , Blessed are the barren , and the wombs which have not borne , and the breasts that have not suckled .
42023030	Then shall they begin to say to the mountains , Fall on us ! and to the heights , Cover us !
42023031	For if to the tree which is good they do these things , unto the dry what shall be ?
42023032	And there went with him two others , workers of evil , to be put to death .
42023033	And when they came to a certain place called Karkaphtha , there they crucified him , and those workers of evil , one on his right hand , and one on his left .
42023034	BUT Jeshu himself said , Father , forgive them ; for they know not what they do . And they divided his garments , and cast for them lots .
42023035	But the people stood beholding , and the rulers also , mocking him , and saying , He saved others , let him save himself , if he be the Meshicha , the Chosen of God .
42023036	And the soldiers also , deriding him , approaching him , and offering to him vinegar ,
42023037	said to him , If thou art the King of the Jihudoyee , save thyself .
42023038	And there was also an inscription which was written over him in Greek and Roman and Hebrew , THIS IS THE KING OF THE JIHUDOYEE .
42023039	And one of those workers of evil who were hanged with him , blasphemed against him , saying , If thou art the Meshicha , deliver thyself , and deliver us also .
42023040	And his companion rebuked him , and said to him , Dost thou not fear ( even ) Aloha ? for thou also art in this judgment .
42023041	And we righteously , forasmuch as we have been deserving , and as we are punished for that which we have done ;
42023042	but this hath done nothing that is abominable . And he said to Jeshu , Remember me , my Lord , when thou art come into thy kingdom !
42023043	Jeshu saith to him , Amen I say to thee , That to-day with me thou shalt be in Paradise .
42023044	NOW it was about six hours , and there was darkness over all the earth until nine hours .
42023045	And the sun darkened , and rent was the vail of the temple through the midst of it .
42023046	And Jeshu cried with a high voice , and said , My Father , in thy hands I place my spirit . This he said , and completed .
42023047	But when the centurion saw what was done , he glorified Aloha , saying , Assuredly this was a just man .
42023048	And all the multitude , they who were assembled to see this , when they saw what was done , returned , smiting upon their breasts .
42023049	And there were standing afar off all the acquaintances of Jeshu , and those women who came with him from Galila ; and they saw these things .
42023050	BUT a certain man , whose name was Jauseph , a senator from Rometha , a city of Jehud , a man ( who ) was good and just :
42023051	( this had not consented to the counsel and deed of them ; and he was waiting for the kingdom of Aloha : )
42023052	this approached Pilatos , and begged the body of Jeshu ;
42023053	and he took it down , and wrapped it in a cloth of linen , and laid it in a hewn sepulchre , in which no one had hitherto been laid .
42023054	And it was the day of the preparation ; and the shabath had lighted .
42023055	And the women also drew near , they who had come with him from Galila ; and they saw the sepulchre , and where the body was laid ;
42023056	and , returned , they prepared balsams and aromatics , and on the shabath rested , as it is commanded .
42024001	But on the first ( day ) in the week , in the morning , while yet dark , they came to the sepulchre , and brought those aromatics which they had prepared ;
42024002	and with them there were other women . And they found the stone rolled from the sepulchre ,
42024003	and entered , but found not the body of Jeshu .
42024004	And it was that while they were amazed at this , behold , two men stood over against them , and whose raiment shined ;
42024005	and they were in fear , and bowed their faces to the earth . And they said to them , Why are you seeking the living with the dead ?
42024006	He is not here , he is risen . Remember what he spake with you while he was in Galila ,
42024007	and ( when he ) said , The Son of man must be delivered into the hands of men of sins , and he will be crucified , and ( in ) the third of the days he will arise .
42024008	And they remembered his words ,
42024009	and returned from the sepulchre , and told all these ( things ) unto the eleven , and to the rest .
42024010	Now it was Mariam Magdalitha , Juchanon , and Mariam his mother , and Jacub , and the rest who were with them , who told these ( occurrences ) to the apostles .
42024011	And these words appeared in their eyes as dreams , and they believed them not .
42024012	But Shemun arose , and ran to the sepulchre , and , looking in , he saw the linen clothes lying apart ; and he went away , wondering in himself at what was done .
42024013	AND , behold , two of them in that day went to a village whose name was Emaos , and distant from Urishlem sixty stadia .
42024014	And they talked one with the other of all these ( events ) which had happened .
42024015	And while they discoursed and investigated one with the other , Jeshu himself came and went with them , and walked with them .
42024016	And their eyes were holden , that they should not know him .
42024017	And he said to them , What are these words that you speak with each other , as you walk and are sad ?
42024018	And one of them answered , whose name was Kleopha , and said to him , Art thou only a stranger from Urishlem , who knowest not what hath been done in it in these days ?
42024019	He saith to them , What ? They say to him , Concerning Jeshu , who was of Natsrath , a man who was a prophet , and mighty in word and in deed before Aloha , and before all the people .
42024020	And the chief priests and elders delivered him to the judgment of death , and crucified him .
42024021	But we had hoped that it was he who shall redeem Isroel ; and , lo , three days ( have passed ) since all these things were done .
42024022	But women also of us have astonished us ; for they were before at the sepulchre ;
42024023	and when they found not his body , they came and told us that angels they had seen there , and ( that ) they had said concerning him that he was alive .
42024024	And some also of us went to the sepulchre , and found even as the women had said , but him they saw not .
42024025	Then said Jeshu to them , O wanting in understanding , and hard of heart to believe all the things which the prophets have spoken !
42024026	Was it not to be that these the Meshicha should suffer , and enter into his glory ?
42024027	And , beginning from Musha and all the prophets , he explained to them concerning himself from all the scriptures .
42024028	And they drew near to that village to which they were going ; and he made them suppose that to a more distant place he was going .
42024029	And they constrained him , and said to him , Abide with us , because the day now inclines to darken . And he went in to remain with them .
42024030	And it was that , while he reclined with them , he took bread , and blessed , and brake , and gave to them .
42024031	And at once their eyes were opened , and they knew him ; and he was taken from them .
42024032	And they said one to the other , Did not our hearts burn within us , while he spake with us by the way , and explained to us the scriptures ?
42024033	And they arose in the same hour , and returned to Urishlem , and found the eleven , who were assembled , and they who were with them ,
42024034	saying , Assuredly our Lord is risen , and hath appeared unto Shemun .
42024035	And they also declared those things which had happened in the way , and how he was made known to them while he brake the bread .
42024036	AND while they were discoursing , Jeshu stood among them , and said to them , Peace be with you !
42024037	I am ; fear not . And they were troubled , and were in fear ; for they thought they beheld a spirit .
42024038	Jeshu saith to them , Why are you perturbed , and why arise thoughts in your hearts ?
42024039	Behold my hands and my feet , that it is I : feel me , and see ; for a spirit hath not flesh and bones , as you see that I have .
42024040	And while these words he spake , he showed them his hands and his feet .
42024041	And while they as yet believed not for joy , and wondered , he said to them , Have you here somewhat to eat ?
42024042	And they gave to him a portion of broiled fish , and of the comb of honey ;
42024043	and he took ( and ) did eat before their eyes .
42024044	And he said to them , These are the words that I spoke with you while I was with you , that every thing must be fulfilled which is written in the law of Musha , and in the Prophets , and in the Psalms , concerning me .
42024045	Then opened he their minds , that they might understand the scriptures .
42024046	And he said to them , that so it is written , and so it was just , that the Meshicha should suffer , and should rise from among the dead in the three days ,
42024047	and that in his name should be preached repentance and the forgiveness of sins among all nations , and that the commencement should be from Urishlem .
42024048	And you are the witnesses of these . And I will send upon you the promise of my Father .
42024049	But await you in Urishlem the city until you be clothed with power from on high .
42024050	And he brought them out unto Bethania , and lifted up his hands , and blessed them .
42024051	And it was that while he blessed them , he was separated from them , and he ascended to the heavens .
42024052	And they worshipped him , and returned to Urishlem with great joy . And at all time were they in the temple ,
42024053	praising and blessing Aloha . Amen .
43001001	IN the beginning was the Word , and the Word himself was with Aloha , and Aloha was the Word himself .
43001002	This was in the beginning with Aloha .
43001003	Every thing by his hand was made ; and without him also was not one thing made that was made .
43001004	In him was life , and the life is the light of the sons of man ;
43001005	and the Light himself in the darkness shineth , and the darkness perceived him not .
43001006	There was a man who was sent from Aloha , his name ( was ) Juchanon .
43001007	He came for the testimony , to testify concerning the Light , that all men might believe through his ministry .
43001008	He was not the Light himself , but came to testify concerning the Light .
43001009	For that was the true Light that enlighteneth every man who cometh into the world .
43001010	In the world was he , and the world by his hand had been made , and the world knew him not .
43001011	He came to his own , and his own received him not .
43001012	But they who received him , he gave to them power , that the sons of Aloha they should become , to those who believe in his name .
43001013	These , not from blood , nor from the will of the flesh , nor from the will of man , but from Aloha , are born .
43001014	And the Word flesh was made , and tabernacled with us ; and we saw his glory , the glory as of the one-begotten who ( was ) from the Father , full of grace and truth .
43001015	Juchanon testified concerning him , and cried , and said , This is he of whom I said , that he cometh after me , and was before me , because he is anterior to me .
43001016	And from his fulness we all have received , and grace for grace .
43001017	For the law by the hand of Musha was given ; but the truth and the grace were by Jeshu Meshicha .
43001018	ALOHA no man hath ever seen : the one-begotten God , he who is in the bosom of his Father , he hath declared him .
43001019	And this was the testimony of Juchanon , when the Jihudoyee sent to him from Urishlem priests and Levoyee to demand of him , Who art thou ?
43001020	And he confessed , and denied not , but confessed , I am not the Meshicha .
43001021	And they asked him again , What then ? art thou Elia ? And he said , I am not . Art thou the Prophet ? And he said , No .
43001022	And they said to him , And who art thou ? that we may give an answer to those who sent us . What sayest thou of thyself ?
43001023	He saith , I am the voice which crieth in the wilderness , Make plain the way of the Lord , as said Eshaia the prophet .
43001024	But they who were sent were from the Pharishee .
43001025	And they demanded and said to him , Why then baptizest thou , if thou art not the Meshicha , nor Elia , nor the Prophet ?
43001026	Juchanon answered and said to them , I baptize you with waters ; but he standeth among you whom you know not :
43001027	he it is who cometh after me , and he was before me ; he , the latchets of whose shoes I am not worthy to unloose .
43001028	These things were done in Bethania , at the passage of the Jurdan , where Juchanon was baptizing .
43001029	AND the day after , Juchanon seeth Jeshu , who was coming to him ; and he said , Behold the Lamb of Aloha , who beareth the sin of the world !
43001030	This is he concerning whom I said , After me cometh a man , and he was before me , because he is anterior to me .
43001031	And I knew him not , but that he should be made known unto Isroel , therefore have I come with waters to baptize .
43001032	And Juchanon testified and said , I saw the Spirit descending from heaven as a dove , and it remained upon him .
43001033	And I knew him not : but he who sent me to baptize with water , he said to me , He upon whom thou seest the Spirit descend and remain , this baptizeth with the Spirit of Holiness :
43001034	and I saw , and bare witness that this is the Son of Aloha
43001035	And the day after Juchanon stood , and two of his disciples ;
43001036	and , contemplating Jeshu as he walked , he said , Behold the Lamb of Aloha !
43001037	And his two disciples heard him as he spake , and they went after Jeshu .
43001038	And Jeshu turned ( himself ) , and saw them coming after him , and said to them , Whom seek you ? They say to him , Raban , where dwellest thou ?
43001039	He saith to them , Come and see . And they went and saw where he dwelt ; and they were with him that day : and it was about the tenth hour .
43001040	Now one of those who heard Juchanon and went after Jeshu , was Andreas , the brother of Shemun .
43001041	This saw first Shemun his brother , and said to him , We have found the Meshicha ;
43001042	and he brought him to Jeshu . And Jeshu saw him , and said , Thou art Shemun bar Jona ; thou shalt be called Kipha .
43001043	AND the day following Jeshu willed to go forth into Galila . And he found Philipos , and said to him , Come after me .
43001044	Now Philipos was from Beth-tsaida , from the city of Andreas and of Shemun .
43001045	Philipos found Nathanael , and said to him , Him of whom Musha in the law , and the prophets , did write we have found , ( and ) that Jeshu ( is ) he , the son of Jauseph who is from Natsrath .
43001046	Saith to him Nathanael , From Natsrath can any good thing be ? Philipos saith to him , Come and see .
43001047	And Jeshu saw Nathanael as he was coming to him , and said of him , Behold truly a son of Isroel who hath no guile in him .
43001048	Nathanael saith to him , Whence knowest thou me ? Jeshu saith to him , While yet Philipos had not called thee , while thou wast under the fig-tree , I saw thee .
43001049	Nathanael answered and said to him , Rabi , thou art the Son of Aloha himself , thou art the very King of Isroel .
43001050	Jeshu saith to him , Upon my telling thee that I saw thee under the fig-tree , believest thou ? Greater things than these thou shalt see .
43001051	He saith to him , Amen , amen , I say to you , Hereafter you shall see the heavens opened , and the angels of Aloha ascending and descending unto the Son of man .
43002001	AND on the third day there was a feast in Kotna , a city of Galila ; and the mother of Jeshu was there :
43002002	and Jeshu and his disciples were called to the feast .
43002003	And the wine failed , and his mother saith to him , to Jeshu , They have no wine .
43002004	Jeshu saith to her , What ( is it ) to me and to thee , woman ? Not yet hath come mine hour .
43002005	His mother saith to the servitors , Whatever he telleth you , do .
43002006	Now there were six waterpots of stone set there , unto the purification of the Jihudoyee , which contained each two quarantals or three .
43002007	Jeshu saith to them , Fill these water-pots with waters ; and they filled them to the top .
43002008	He saith to them , Draw now , and carry to the chief of the guests . And they carried .
43002009	And when that chief of the guests had tasted those waters which were made wine , and knew not whence it was , ( but the servitors knew , who had filled them with waters , ) the chief of the guests called the bridegroom ,
43002010	and said to him , Every man at first the good wine produceth , and when they are satisfied , then that which is inferior ; but thou hast kept the good wine until now .
43002011	This is the first sign that Jeshu wrought in Kotna of Galila , and manifested his glory ; and his disciples believed in him .
43002012	AFTER this he went to Kapher-nachum , he and his mother and his brethren and his disciples . And they were there a few days .
43002013	And the petscha of the Jihudoyee was nigh , and Jeshu went up to Urishlem .
43002014	And he found in the temple those who sold oxen and sheep and doves , and the money-changers sitting .
43002015	And he made him a scourge of cord , and drove them all from the temple , and the sheep and the oxen and the money-changers ; and he shed their money , and their tables he overturned .
43002016	And to those who sold doves he said , Take these hence ; make not the house of my Father a house of merchandise .
43002017	And his disciples remembered that it was written , The zeal of thy house hath devoured me .
43002018	The Jihudoyee answered and said to him , What sign showest thou to us , as these things thou doest ?
43002019	Jeshu answered , Destroy this temple , and in three days I will raise it .
43002020	The Jihudoyee say to him , Forty-and six years was this temple being built , and wilt thou in three days raise it ?
43002021	But he spake of the temple of his body .
43002022	But when he was risen from the house of the dead , his disciples remembered that this he had said ; and they believed the scriptures , and the word which Jeshu had spoken .
43002023	WHILE Jeshu was in Jerusalem at the petscha , at the feast , Many believed in him who saw the signs which he wrought .
43002024	But he , Jeshu , did not confide himself to them , because he knew every man ,
43002025	and needed not that any should testify to him concerning any man , because he knew what is in man .
43003001	But there was one of the Pharishee whose name was Nikodimos , a ruler of the Jihudoyee :
43003002	this came to Jeshu in the night , and said to him , Rabi , we know that from Aloha thou art sent a teacher ; for no man can these signs perform which thou doest , unless Aloha be with him .
43003003	Jeshu answered and said to him , Amen , amen , I say to thee , Except a man be born anew , he cannot see the kingdom of Aloha .
43003004	Nikodimos said to him , How can an old man be born ? Who can again the womb of his mother the second time enter , and be born ?
43003005	Jeshu answered and said to him , Amen , amen , I say to thee , That if a man be not born of waters and the Spirit , he cannot enter into the kingdom of Aloha .
43003006	Whatever is born of the flesh , is flesh ; and whatever is born of the Spirit , is spirit .
43003007	Wonder not that I have said to thee , that it behoves you to be born anew .
43003008	The wind bloweth where she willeth , and her voice thou hearest ; but thou knowest not whence she cometh , nor whither she goeth : so is every man who is born of the Spirit .
43003009	Nikodimos answered and said to him , How can these things be ?
43003010	Jeshu answered and said to him , Art thou Malphona of Israel , and these knowest not ?
43003011	Amen , amen , I say to thee , What we know we speak , and what we have seen we testify ; but our testimony you receive not .
43003012	If of ( what is ) on earth I tell you , and you believe not , how if I tell you of ( what is ) in heaven , could you believe me ?
43003013	AND no man hath ascended into heaven , but he who descended from heaven , the Son of man , he who is in heaven .
43003014	And as Musha elevated the serpent in the wilderness , so is to be elevated the Son of man ,
43003015	that every man who believeth in him might not perish , but have the life which is eternal .
43003016	For so loved Aloha the world , as his Son , the Only-begotten , he would give , that every one who believeth in him might not perish , but have the life which is eternal .
43003017	For Aloha sent not his Son into the world to condemn the world , but that the world might live by him .
43003018	He who believeth on him is not judged , and he who believeth not is judged already , because he believeth not in the name of the only-begotten Son of Aloha .
43003019	And this is the judgment , that the light hath come into the world , and the sons of men have loved darkness rather than the light , for their deeds have been evil .
43003020	For every one who doeth abominable things hateth the light , and cometh not to the light , lest his deeds should be reproved .
43003021	But he who doeth the truth cometh to the light , that his works may be known that in Aloha they are wrought .
43003022	AFTER these came Jeshu and his disciples into the land of Jihuda , and there conversed with them and baptized .
43003023	But Juchanon also was baptizing in Ein-yon , near Sholim , because the waters were there many ; and they came and were baptized ;
43003024	for not yet was Juchanon cast into the house of the bound .
43003025	But there was a question with some of the disciples of Juchanon ( and ) a certain Jihudoya , upon purification .
43003026	And they came to Juchanon , and said to him , Raban , he who was with thee at the passage of Jurdan , ( and ) concerning whom thou didst give witness , he also baptizeth , and many come to him .
43003027	Juchanon answered and said to them , A man cannot receive of his own will any thing , unless it be given to him from heaven .
43003028	You bear me witness that I said , I am not the Meshicha , but I am an apostle before him .
43003029	He that hath the bride is the bridegroom ; but the friend of the bridegroom , who standeth and attendeth him , with great joy rejoiceth on account of the voice of the bridegroom : this my joy therefore , behold , is complete .
43003030	To him it must be to increase , and to me to decrease .
43003031	For he who from above hath come , is above all ; and he who is from the earth , is of the earth , and of the earth speaketh : he who from heaven hath come , is above all .
43003032	And what he hath seen and heard he testifieth , and his testimony no man receiveth .
43003033	But he who hath received his testimony , hath sealed that the true Aloha is he .
43003034	For he whom Aloha hath sent , the very words of Aloha speaketh ; for it was not in measure that Aloha gave the Spirit .
43003035	The Father loveth the Son , and every thing hath he given into his hands .
43003036	He who believeth in the Son hath the life which is eternal ; and he who obeyeth not the Son shall not see life , but the wrath of Aloha remaineth on him .
43004001	But when Jeshu knew that the Pharishee had heard that he had made many disciples , and baptized more than Juchanon ,
43004002	( though it was not Jeshu himself baptized , but his disciples , )
43004003	he left Jihuda , and came again into Galila .
43004004	AND he needed that in going he should pass through among the Shomroyee ;
43004005	and he came to a city of the Shomroyee which is called Shokar , nigh to the field which Jakub gave unto Jauseph his son .
43004006	And the fountain of water of Jakub was there . But Jeshu was wearied with the labour of the way , and sat by the fountain ; and it was six hours .
43004007	There came a woman from Shomreen to draw waters , and Jeshu said to her , Give me waters to drink .
43004008	Now his disciples had gone into the city to buy for them meat .
43004009	The woman , the Shomroytha , saith to him , How ( canst ) thou who art a Jihudoya ask drink of me who am a woman , a Shomroytha ? For the Jihudoyee have no accommodation with the Shomroyee .
43004010	Jeshu answered and said to her , If thou hadst known the gift of Aloha , and who He is who hath said to thee , Give me to drink , thou wouldst have asked of him , and he had given thee living waters .
43004011	That woman saith to him , My Lord , thou hast no vessel , and the well is deep ; whence hast thou living waters ?
43004012	Art thou greater than our father Jakub , he who gave us this well , and himself drank of it , and his children , and his flocks ?
43004013	Jeshu answered and said to her , Every one who shall drink of these waters again will thirst ;
43004014	but every one who shall drink of the waters that I will give him shall never thirst ; but those waters that I shall give him shall be in him a fountain of waters , that shall spring forth to the life of eternity .
43004015	That woman saith to him , My Lord , give me of those waters , that I thirst not again , nor come to draw from hence .
43004016	Jeshu saith to her , Go , call thy husband , and come hither .
43004017	She saith to him , I have no husband . Jeshu saith to her , Well hast thou said , I have no husband ;
43004018	for five husbands hast thou had , and this whom thou now hast is not thy husband ; this hast thou said truly .
43004019	That woman saith to him , My Lord , I perceive that thou art a prophet .
43004020	Our fathers in this mountain worshipped , and you say that in Urishlem is the place where it behoves to worship .
43004021	Jeshu saith to her , Woman , believe me that the hour cometh when neither in this mountain , nor at Urishlem , you shall worship the Father :
43004022	you worship something you know not ; but we worship whom we know ; for salvation is from the Jihudoyee .
43004023	But the hour cometh , and now is , when the true worshippers will worship the Father in spirit and in truth ; for the Father also requireth worshippers such as these .
43004024	For Aloha is a Spirit ; and they who worship him , in spirit and in truth must worship .
43004025	That woman saith to him , I know that the Meshicha cometh ; and when he hath come , he will teach us all things .
43004026	Jeshu saith to her , I am ( he ) , I who speak with thee .
43004027	And as he spoke , his disciples came , and they wondered that with the woman he spoke ; but no man said , What inquirest thou ? or , Why speakest thou with her ?
43004028	The woman left her water-pot , and went into the city , and saith ,
43004029	Come , see a man who hath told me every thing that I have done : is not this the Meshicha ?
43004030	And the men went out of the city , and came with her .
43004031	Between these things his disciples entreated of him , saying to him , Raban , eat .
43004032	But he said to them , I have food to eat of which you know not .
43004033	The disciples say among themselves , Has any man brought him somewhat to eat ?
43004034	Jeshu saith to them , My meat is to do the will of Him who sent me , and to accomplish his work .
43004035	Say you not , that after four moons cometh harvest ? Behold , I tell you , Lift up your eyes , and see the lands which have become white for the harvest already .
43004036	And he who reapeth receiveth wages , and gathereth fruit unto life eternal ; and the sower and the reaper shall rejoice together .
43004037	For in this is the proverb true , One soweth , and another reapeth .
43004038	I sent you to reap that ( for ) which you did not toil ; for others toiled , and you have entered upon their labour .
43004039	Now of that city many Shomroyee believed in him , because of the saying of that woman , who testified , He told me every thing that I have done .
43004040	And when those Shomroyee came to him , they besought him to be with them . And he was with them two days ,
43004041	and many believed through his word .
43004042	And they said to the woman , Now not through thy word believe we in him ; for we have heard and known that this is truly the Meshicha , the Saviour of the world .
43004043	AND after two days Jeshu went forth from thence , and came into Galila ;
43004044	for he himself testified , that a prophet in his own city is not honoured .
43004045	But when he came to Galila , the Galiloyee received him , because they had seen all the signs which he had done in Urishlem at the feast ; for they also went to the feast .
43004046	So Jeshu came again into Kotna of Galila , where he had made the waters wine . And there was at Kapher-nachum the servant of a certain king , whose son was ill .
43004047	This ( man ) heard that Jeshu had come from Jihuda into Galila ; and he came to him , and besought him that he would come down and heal his son , for he was near to die .
43004048	Jeshu saith to him , If signs and wonders you do not SEE , you will not believe .
43004049	The servant of the king saith to him , My lord , come down ere my child die !
43004050	Jeshu saith to him , Go , thy son liveth . And the man believed in the word which Jeshu had spoken to him , and went .
43004051	But as he was going down , his servants met him , and gave him good news , saying to him , Thy son liveth .
43004052	And he asked at what time he was healed . They say to him , Yesterday , at seven hours , the fever left him .
43004053	And his father knew that in that hour it was in which Jeshu said to him , Thy son liveth ; and he believed , and all his house .
43004054	This is again the second sign ( which ) Jeshu did when he had come from Jihuda into Galila .
43005001	AFTER these there was a feast of the Jihudoyee , and Jeshu went up to Urishlem .
43005002	Now there was there in Urishlem a certain place of ablution , which was called in Hebrew Bethchesda , and having in it five porticoes .
43005003	And in these were many infirm people , blind and lame and withered , awaiting the moving of the waters .
43005004	For an angel at times descended to the pool and moved the waters ; and he who first descended after the movement of the waters was healed of whatever disease he had .
43005005	But a certain man was there who for thirtyand-eight years had been in a disease .
43005006	Jeshu saw this ( man ) as he lay , and knew that for a long time he had ( been thus ) , and said to him , Art thou willing to be healed ?
43005007	The diseased man answered and said , Yes , my Lord ; but I have no man who , when the waters are moved , shall cast me into the pool : but while I am coming , another before me descendeth .
43005008	Jeshu saith to him , Arise , take up thy bed , and walk .
43005009	And in the instant that man was healed , and , arising , he took up his bed , and walked : and that day was the shabath .
43005010	And the Jihudoyee said to him who had been healed , This is the shabath : it is not lawful for thee to carry thy bed .
43005011	But he answered and said to them , He who made me whole , he said to me , Take up thy bed , and walk .
43005012	And they said to him , What man is this who told thee to take up thy bed , and walk ?
43005013	But he who had been healed knew not who it was ; for Jeshu had retired among the great multitude which was in that place .
43005014	After a time Jeshu found him in the temple , and said to him , Behold , thou art healed : sin not again , lest there be to thee that which is worse than the first .
43005015	And that man went away , and told the Jihudoyee , that it was Jeshu who had healed him .
43005016	On account of this the Jihudoyee persecuted Jeshu , and sought to kill him , because these things he had done on the shabath .
43005017	But he , Jeshu , said to them , My Father until now worketh , I also work .
43005018	But on this account the more sought the Jihudoyee to kill him , not only because he had loosed the shabath , but also that of Aloha he had said that he was his Father , and had made himself equal with Aloha .
43005019	BUT Jeshu answered and said to them , Amen , amen , I say to you , The Son cannot do any thing from the will of himself , but that which he seeth the Father do .
43005020	For those which the Father doeth , these also the Son likewise doeth . For the Father loveth the Son , and every thing that he doeth he showeth him ; and greater than these works he showeth him , that you may wonder .
43005021	For as the Father raiseth the dead , and quickeneth , so also the Son quickeneth those whom he willeth .
43005022	For the Father judgeth no man , but all judgment he hath given to the Son ;
43005023	that all men should honour the Son , as they honour the Father . He who honoureth not the Son , honoureth not the Father who sent him .
43005024	Amen , amen , I say to you , He who heareth my word and believeth on him who sent me , hath the life that is eternal , and into condemnation he cometh not , but hath passed from death unto life .
43005025	Amen , amen , I say to you , That the hour cometh and also now is , when the dead shall hear the voice of the Son of Aloha ; and they who hear shall live
43005026	For as the Father hath life in his person , so hath he given also to the Son to have life in his person ,
