43005027	and hath empowered him also to execute judgment . Because he is the Son of man ,
43005028	marvel not at this ; for the hour cometh when all they who are in the sepulchres shall hear his voice ,
43005029	and shall come forth ; they who have done good unto the resurrection of life , and they who have done evil unto the resurrection of condemnation .
43005030	I CANNOT of the will of myself do any thing ; but as I hear I judge , and my judgment is just ; for I seek not my will , but the will of Him who sent me .
43005031	If I should witness concerning myself , my testimony would not be ( regarded as ) truth :
43005032	there is another who witnesseth of me , and I know that true is his testimony which he hath witnessed of me .
43005033	You sent to Juchanon , and he witnessed of the truth .
43005034	But I do not from man ( only ) receive testimony . But these ( things ) speak I that you may be saved .
43005035	He was a lamp that burneth and shineth , and you were willing to glory for the hour in his light .
43005036	But I have a testimony which is greater than that of Juchanon ; for the works that the Father hath given me to accomplish , these works that I do testify of me that the Father hath sent me .
43005037	And the Father who hath sent me , he testifieth of me : but his voice you have never heard , nor his appearance seen .
43005038	And his word abideth not in you , because in Him whom he hath sent you do not believe .
43005039	Investigate the scriptures ; for in them you think you have the life that is eternal , and they testify of me .
43005040	And you will not come to me that the life that is eternal you might have .
43005041	Glory from the sons of men I receive not .
43005042	But I know you , that the love of Aloha is not in you .
43005043	I have come in the name of my Father , and you have not received me .
43005044	If another should come in his own name , him you would receive . How can you believe , who glory one from another are receiving , and the glory which is from one , Aloha , you seek not ?
43005045	How think you that I will accuse you before the Father ? There is one who accuseth you , Musha himself , in whom you hope .
43005046	For if in Musha you had believed , you would also have believed in me ; for Musha of me hath written .
43005047	But if his writings you believe not , how my words will you believe ?
43006001	AFTER these Jeshu went over the Sea of Galila of Tiberios ,
43006002	and great multitudes went after him , because they had seen the signs which he wrought on the diseased .
43006003	And Jeshu ascended a mountain , and there sat with his disciples .
43006004	Now the feast of the petscha of the Jihudoyee drew nigh .
43006005	And Jeshu lifted up his eyes , and saw the great assembly which had come to him ; and he said to Philipos , Whence shall we buy bread , that these may eat ?
43006006	But this he said trying him ; for he knew what he was about to do .
43006007	Philipos saith to him , Two hundred dinoreen of bread is not sufficient for them , that a little every one of them may take .
43006008	Saith to him one of his disciples , Andreas , brother of Shemun Kipha ,
43006009	There is here a certain youth , who hath with him five cakes of barley and two fishes ; but these what are they for these all ?
43006010	Jeshu saith to them , Make all the men recline ; for there was much herbage in that place . And the men reclined , in number five thousand .
43006011	And Jeshu took the bread , and blessed , and divided unto those who reclined , and likewise also of the fishes , as much as they willed .
43006012	And when they were satisfied , he said to his disciples , Gather the fragments that abound , that nothing be lost ;
43006013	and they gathered and filled twelve baskets of fragments , those which abounded unto them who had eaten of the five loaves of barley .
43006014	But those men , when they had seen the sign which Jeshu had wrought , said , Truly this is the Prophet that cometh into the world .
43006015	But when Jeshu knew that they were about to come to seize him and make him the King , he passed away to a mountain alone .
43006016	AND when it was eventide , his disciples went down to the sea .
43006017	And they sat in a vessel , and went over for Kapher-nachum . And it was dark , and Jeshu had not come to them .
43006018	But the sea had risen against them , because a great wind blew .
43006019	And they had led stadia twentyfive or thirty , and they saw Jeshu walking upon the sea , and drawing nigh to the vessel ; and they feared .
43006020	But Jeshu himself said to them , I am , fear not .
43006021	And they willed to receive him into the vessel , and soon that vessel was at that land to which they were going .
43006022	The day after the people that stood on the opposite shore of the sea saw that there was not another vessel there except that into which the disciples had ascended , and that Jeshu had not entered with his disciples into the vessel ;
43006023	but there came other boats from Tiberios near the place , where they did eat bread when Jeshu had blessed .
43006024	And when that company saw that Jeshu was not there nor his disciples , they ascended into those boats , and came to Kapher-nachum . And they sought Jeshu ;
43006025	and when they had found him on the opposite side of the sea , they say to him , Raban , when camest thou hither ?
43006026	Jeshu answered and said to them , Amen , amen , I tell you , You seek me , not because you considered the signs , but because you did eat the bread , and were satisfied .
43006027	Work not ( for ) the food which perisheth , but ( for ) the food that endureth unto the life that is eternal , which the Son of man shall give to you : for this hath the Father sealed , ( even ) Aloha .
43006028	They say to him , What shall we do that we may work the works of Aloha ?
43006029	Jeshu answered and said to them , This is the work of Aloha , that you believe in Him whom he hath sent .
43006030	THEY say to him , What sign doest thou that we may see , and believe in thee ? What performest thou ?
43006031	Our fathers manna did eat in the desert , as it is written , that bread from heaven be gave them to eat .
43006032	Jeshu saith to them , Amen , amen , I tell you , That Musha gave you not that bread from heaven , but my Father giveth you the true bread from heaven :
43006033	for the bread of Aloha is He who hath descended from heaven , and giveth life to the world .
43006034	They say to him , Our Lord , at all time give us this bread .
43006035	Jeshu saith to them , I am the bread of life : he who cometh to me shall not hunger , and he who believeth in me shall not thirst , for ever .
43006036	But I have told you that you have seen me , and have not believed .
43006037	Every one whom the Father hath given me , unto me will come ; and him who unto me shall come , I will not cast out .
43006038	I descended from heaven not to do mine own will , but the will of Him who sent me .
43006039	But this is the will of my Father who sent me , that of all whom he hath given me I shall lose not of him , but shall raise him at the last day .
43006040	For this is the will of my Father , that every one who seeth the Son and believeth on him , shall have the life that is eternal , and I will raise him at the last day .
43006041	But the Jihudoyee murmured against him because he said , I am the bread which hath descended from heaven .
43006042	And they said , Is not this Jeshu bar Jauseph , he whose father and mother we know ? and how saith this , From heaven I have descended ?
43006043	Jeshu answered and said to them , Murmur not one with another .
43006044	No man can come to me unless the Father who sent me shall attract him , and I will raise him at the last day .
43006045	It is written in the prophet , that they shall be all taught of Aloha : every one , therefore , who hath heard from the Father and learned of him , cometh unto me .
43006046	There is no man who hath seen the Father , but he who is from Aloha , he hath seen the Father .
43006047	AMEN , amen , I say to you , Whosoever believeth in me hath the life which is eternal .
43006048	I am the bread of life .
43006049	Your fathers did eat manna in the desert , and are dead :
43006050	but this is the bread which hath descended from heaven , that man may eat of it , and die not .
43006051	I am the bread of life that from heaven hath descended ; and if man shall eat of this bread , he shall live for ever ; and the bread that I will give is my body , which for the life of the world I give .
43006052	The Jihudoyee contended one with another , saying , How can this his body give to us to eat ?
43006053	And Jeshu said to them , Amen , amen , I tell you , That unless you eat the body of the Son of man , and drink his blood , you have no life in yourselves .
43006054	He who eateth of my body , and drinketh of my blood , hath the life which is eternal , and I will raise him at the last day .
43006055	For my body is truly food , and my blood is truly drink .
43006056	He who eateth my body , and drinketh my blood , abideth in me , and I in him .
43006057	As the Father the Living ( one ) who hath sent me , and I live by the Father , even so he who shall eat me , shall live , too , by me .
43006058	This is the bread which hath descended from heaven . Not as was the manna that your fathers ate , and are dead ; he who eateth of this bread shall live for ever .
43006059	These things he spake in the synagogue , as he taught in Kapher-nachum .
43006060	And many of his disciples who heard said , A hard word is this : who can hear it ?
43006061	BUT Jeshu knew in himself that his disciples murmured concerning this ; and he said to them , Does this stumble you ?
43006062	If you shall see then the Son of man ascend up to the place where he was from the first ?
43006063	It is the Spirit that maketh alive , the body profiteth nothing : the words which I have spoken to you , they are spirit and they are life .
43006064	But there are some of you who do not believe . For Jeshu knew from the first who they were who believed not , and who it was who would betray him .
43006065	And he said to them , On account of this I told you that no man can come to me , unless it be given him of my Father .
43006066	On account of this word many of his disciples went back , and walked not with him .
43006067	Jeshu said to the twelve , Do you also will to go ?
43006068	Shemun Kipha answered and said , My Lord , unto whom shall we go ? thou hast the words of eternal life ;
43006069	and we believe and know that thou art the Meshicha , the Son of Aloha the Living .
43006070	Jeshu saith to them , Have I not chosen you twelve , and from you one is Satana ?
43006071	He spake concerning Jihuda bar Shemun Scarjuta ; for he it was who would betray him , one from the twelve .
43007001	AFTER these Jeshu walked in Galila ; for he would not walk in Jihuda , because the Jihudoyee had sought to kill him .
43007002	And the feast of tabernacles of the Jihudoyee drew nigh .
43007003	And his brethren said to Jeshu , Remove thee hence , and go into Jihuda , that thy disciples may see the works which thou doest .
43007004	For there is no man who doeth any thing in concealment , and willeth himself to be in openness : if these things thou doest , show thyself to the world .
43007005	For neither did his brethren believe in him , in Jeshu .
43007006	Jeshu saith to them , My time until now cometh not , but your time is always ready .
43007007	The world cannot hate you : but me it hateth , because I bear witness against it that the works of it are evil .
43007008	Go you up to this feast : I do not ascend now to this feast , because my time is not yet complete .
43007009	These things said he , and remained in Galila .
43007010	But when his brethren had ascended to the feast , then also he ascended ; not in openness , but as in concealment .
43007011	But the Jihudoyee sought him at the feast , and said , Where is he ?
43007012	and there was great murmuring concerning him among the people ; for some said that he was good , and others said , No ; but he deceiveth the people .
43007013	But no man openly spoke of him , for fear of the Jihudoyee .
43007014	But when the days of the feast divided , Jeshu ascended to the temple , and taught .
43007015	And the Jihudoyee wondered and said , How knoweth this man the scripture , when he hath not learned ?
43007016	Jeshu answered and said , My doctrine is not mine , but his who sent me .
43007017	Whosoever willeth to do his will understandeth my doctrine , if it be from Aloha , or ( if ) from the will of myself I speak .
43007018	He who from the will of his ( own ) mind speaketh , the glory of himself seeketh ; but he who the glory of him who hath sent him seeketh , is true , and no iniquity is in him .
43007019	Did not Musha give you the law ? But no man of you keepeth the law . Why seek you to kill me ?
43007020	The people answered , saying , Thou hast a demon : who seeketh to kill thee ?
43007021	Jeshu answered and said to them , One work have I performed , and all of you wondered on this account .
43007022	Musha gave you circumcision , not because it was from the fathers , and on the shabath you circumcise a man .
43007023	But if a man is circumcised on the day of shabath because the law of Musha may not be broken , why against me do you murmur , because I have altogether healed a man on the day of shabath ?
43007024	Judge not with acceptance of persons , but righteous judgment judge you .
43007025	And some of Urishlem said , Is not this he whom they seek to kill ?
43007026	and , behold , openly he discourseth , and nothing say they to him . Do the elders know that this is truly the Meshicha ?
43007027	Yet of this we know from whence he is ; but when the Meshicha cometh , no man knoweth from whence he is .
43007028	Jeshu lifted up his voice as he taught in the temple , and said , You know me , and from whence I am you know : and of myself I am not come ; but true is he who sent me , he whom you know not .
43007029	But I know him who am from him ; and he hath sent me .
43007030	And they sought to apprehend him ; but no man laid hands on him , because not yet was come his hour .
43007031	But many of the multitude believed in him , and said , When the Meshicha is come , will he exceed the miracles which this doeth ?
43007032	The Pharishee heard the assembly , that they said these things of him , and the chief priests sent officers to apprehend him .
43007033	Jeshu said , Yet a little while am I with you , and I go unto him who sent me :
43007034	and you will seek me , and shall not find me : and where I am you cannot come .
43007035	The Jihudoyee say among themselves , Whither is this about to go , that we cannot find him ? To the countries of the nations is he to go , and to teach the Heathens ?
43007036	What is this word he hath said , You shall seek me , and not find me ; and where I am you cannot come ?
43007037	BUT in the great day , which was the last of the feast , stood Jeshu and cried , and said , If ( any ) man thirst , let him come unto me and drink ;
43007038	for whosoever believeth in me , as have said the scriptures , rivers of living waters shall flow from his belly .
43007039	But this he spake of the Spirit which they should receive who believe in him . For not yet was the Spirit given , because not yet was Jeshu glorified .
43007040	Now many of the assemblies who heard his words said , This is truly the Prophet .
43007041	Others said , This is the Meshicha . Others said , How from Galila cometh the Meshicha ?
43007042	Hath not the scripture said , That from the seed of David , and from Beth-lechem the town of David , cometh the Meshicha ?
43007043	And there was a division concerning him among the assemblies ;
43007044	and there were men of them who would have apprehended him ; but no man laid hands on him .
43007045	AND those officers came to the chief priests and the Pharishee ; and the priests said to them , Why have you not brought him ?
43007046	The officers say to them , Never so spake a son of man as speaks this man !
43007047	The Pharishee say to them , Are you also deceived ?
43007048	Have any of the heads , or of the Pharishee , believed in him ?
43007049	But if this people who know not the law ( believe in him ) , they are accursed .
43007050	One of them , Nikodimos , he who came to Jeshu by night , saith to them ,
43007051	Does our law condemn a man unless it shall hear from him first , and know what he hath done ?
43007052	They answered and said to him , Art thou also of Galila ? Investigate , and see , that the Prophet from Galila ariseth not .
43008012	BUT again spake Jeshu with them , and said , I am the Light of the world : he who followeth me shall not walk in darkness , but shall find the light of life .
43008013	The Pharishee say to him , Thou of thyself testifiest : thy testimony is not the truth .
43008014	Jeshu answered and said to them , Though I testify of myself , my testimony is the truth : because I know from whence I am , and whither I go .
43008015	But you know not from whence I am , nor whither I go . You judge carnally ; but I judge no man .
43008016	Yet if I judge , my judgment is true : because I am not alone , but I and my Father who sent me .
43008017	So in your law it is written , that the testimony of two men is truth :
43008018	I am ( one ) who testify of myself , and my Father who sent me testifieth ( also ) of me .
43008019	They say to him , Where is thy Father ? Jeshu answered and said to them , You know neither me , nor my Father ; for if me you had known , my Father also would you have known .
43008020	These words spake Jeshu in the house of treasure , as he taught in the temple : and no man apprehended him ; for not yet had come his hour .
43008021	Jeshu said again , I go , and you will seek me , and will die in your sins ; and where I go you cannot come .
43008022	The Jihudoyee say , Will he kill himself then ? for he saith , Whither I go you cannot come .
43008023	And he said to them , From beneath are you ; but I am from above : you are of this world ;
43008024	but I am not of this world . I said to you , that you will die in your sins : for if you believe not that I AM , you will die in your sins .
43008025	The Jihudoyee say , Who art thou ? Jeshu saith to them , The same that I began to tell you .
43008026	Much have I against you to say and to judge : but he who hath sent me is true ; and those ( things ) which I have heard from him these speak I in the world .
43008027	But they knew not that of the Father he spake to them .
43008028	JESHU saith to them again , When you have lifted up the Son of man , then shall you know that I am ( he ) , and ( that ) nothing from myself I do ; but as the Father hath taught me , so I speak .
43008029	And he who sent me is with me : my Father hath not left me alone ; for whatever is pleasing to him I do at all time .
43008030	And as these ( words ) he spake , many believed on him .
43008031	And Jeshu said to those Jihudoyee who believed on him , If you persevere in my doctrine , you shall be truly my disciples ;
43008032	and you shall know the truth , and the truth shall liberate you .
43008033	They say to him , We are the seed of Abraham , and never service to man have we performed ; how sayest thou that we shall be sons of freedom ?
43008034	Jeshu saith to them , Amen I tell you , Whoever doeth sin is the servant of sin .
43008035	And the servant abideth not for ever in the house , but the Son for ever abideth .
43008036	If He therefore , the Son , shall liberate you , truly shall you be sons of freedom .
43008037	I know that you are the seed of Abraham ; but you seek to kill me , because in my word you do not concur .
43008038	That which I have seen with my Father I speak , and that which you have seen with your father you do .
43008039	They answered and said to him , Our father is Abraham . Jeshu saith to them , If you were the sons of Abraham , the works of Abraham you would do .
43008040	But now you seek to kill me , the man who the truth has spoken with you , which I have heard from Aloha . This Abraham did not .
43008041	But you do the deeds of your father . They say to him , We from fornication are not ; one Father have we , Aloha .
43008042	Jeshu saith to them , If Aloha were your Father , you would love me ; for I from Aloha came forth , and I came not of myself , but he sent me .
43008043	Wherefore my word do you not acknowledge ? Because you cannot hear my word .
43008044	You are from your father the accuser , and the desires of your father you are willing to do . He from the beginning was the killer of men , and in the truth he stood not ; therefore the truth is not in him . And when he speaketh a lie , of his own he speaketh , because of falsity he is also the father .
43008045	But I ( speak the truth , and ) because the truth I speak , you believe me not .
43008046	Who of you convicteth me of sin ? Yet if the truth I speak , why do you not believe me ?
43008047	He who is of Aloha the words of Aloha heareth : therefore you hear not , because you are not of Aloha .
43008048	The Jihudoyee answered and say to him , Did we not well say , Thou art a Shomroya , and hast a devil ?
43008049	Jeshu said to them , I have no devil ; but my Father I honour , and you debase me .
43008050	But I seek not my own glory ; He is , who seeketh and judgeth .
43008051	Amen , amen , I say to you , That he who my word keepeth , death shall not see for ever .
43008052	The Jihudoyee say to him , Now we know that thou hast a devil . Abraham is dead , and the prophets ; and thou sayest , that he who thy word keepeth , death shall not taste for ever .
43008053	Art thou greater than our father Abraham , who is dead ; and than the prophets , who are dead ? What makest thou thyself ?
43008054	Jeshu said to them , If I glorify myself , my glory is nothing : it is my Father who glorifieth me ; he , of whom you say that he is your God .
43008055	But you know him not ; but I know him : and should I say that I know him not , I should be a liar like you . But I know him , and keep his words .
43008056	Abraham , your father , desired to see my day , and he saw , and was glad .
43008057	The Jihudoyee said to him , Yet the son of fifty years thou art not , and Abraham hast thou seen ?
43008058	Jeshu saith to them , Amen , amen , I say to you , Before Abraham was , I AM .
43008059	And they took up stones to stone him ; but Jeshu concealed himself , and went from the temple , and passed among them , and went .
43009001	AND as he was passing , he saw a man blind from the womb of his mother .
43009002	And his disciples asked him , saying , Raban , who sinned , this or his parents , that blind he should have been born ?
43009003	Jeshu saith to them , Neither he sinned , nor his parents ; but that there might be seen in him the works of Aloha .
43009004	Me it behoveth to do the works of Him who sent me , while it is to-day : the night cometh when man cannot work .
43009005	So long as I am in the world , I am the Light of the world .
43009006	And when he had said these things , he spat upon the ground , and formed clay from his spittle , and rubbed upon the eyes of the blind ,
43009007	and said to him , Go , wash in the pool of Shilucha . And he went , washed , and came seeing .
43009008	But his neighbours , and they who had seen ( him ) aforetime as he begged , said , Is not this he who sat and begged ?
43009009	Some said , It is he ; and some said , It is not , but one like him ; but he said , I am he .
43009010	They say to him , How were thine eyes opened ?
43009011	He answered and said to them , The man whose name is Jeshu made clay , and rubbed upon mine eyes , and said to me , Go , wash in the waters of Shilucha ; and I went , washed , and received sight .
43009012	They say to him , Where is he ? He saith to them , I know not .
43009013	They brought him who from the beginning was blind to the Pharishee .
43009014	Now it was shabath when Jeshu made the clay and opened his eyes :
43009015	and again the Pharishee questioned him , How didst thou receive sight ? He said to them , He put clay upon mine eyes , and I washed , and received sight .
43009016	And some of the Pharishee said , This man is not from Aloha ; for the shabath he keepeth not . But others said , How can a man , a sinner , perform these signs ? And there was a division among them .
43009017	They say again to the blind , What sayest thou concerning him , because he hath opened thine eyes ? He saith to them , I say that he is the Prophet .
43009018	But believed not concerning him the Jihudoyee that blind he had been and made-to-see , until they called the parents of him who had been made to see ,
43009019	and asked them , If this is your son who , you say , was born blind , how now doth he see ?
43009020	His parents answered and said , We know that this ( is ) our son , and that blind he was born .
43009021	But how he now seeth , or who hath opened his eyes , we know not . He also hath entered on his years , ask him : he for himself shall speak .
43009022	These words said his parents , because they feared the Jihudoyee ; for the Jihudoyee had determined that if any man should confess him that he was the Meshicha , they would cast him out of the synagogue :
43009023	on this account said his parents , He hath entered on his years , ask him .
43009024	And they called the second time the man who had been blind , and said to him , Glorify Aloha : for we know that this man is a sinner .
43009025	He answered and said to them , Whether he be a sinner , I know not ; but one ( thing ) I know , that I have been blind , and now , behold , I see .
43009026	They say to him again , What did he to thee ? how opened he to thee thine eyes ?
43009027	He saith to them , I told you , and you heard not : what will you hear ? Are you also willing disciples to him to become ?
43009028	But they reviled him , and said to him , Thou art the disciple of him ; but we are the disciples of Musha .
43009029	And we know that with Musha Aloha spake ; but for this , we know not whence he is .
43009030	Answered the man and said to them , At this then we must wonder , that you know not from whence he is , and ( yet ) mine eyes he hath opened !
43009031	But we know that Aloha the voice of sinners heareth not ; but if any man fear him and do his will , him he heareth .
43009032	From of old it hath not been heard that a man hath opened the eyes of one born blind .
43009033	If this were not from Aloha , he could not this have done .
43009034	They answered and say to him , Thou altogether wast born in sins , and art thou teaching us ? And they cast him without .
43009035	Jeshu heard that they had cast him without , and he found him , and said to him , Dost thou believe on the Son of Aloha ?
43009036	He who had been cured answered and said , Who ( is he ) , my Lord , that I may believe in him ?
43009037	Jeshu said to him , Thou hast SEEN him , and He who talketh with thee is He .
43009038	He said , I believe , my Lord ! And , falling , he adored him .
43009039	Jeshu said to them , For the judgment of this world am I come , that they who see not may see , and they who see may be made blind .
43009040	And some of the Pharishee who were with him heard these ( words ) , and they said to him , Are we blind also ?
43009041	Jeshu saith to them , If blind you were , you would have no sin ; but now you say , We see : therefore your sin is confirmed .
43010001	AMEN , amen , I say to you , Whosoever entereth not by the door into the fold of the flock , but ascendeth by another place , he is a thief and a robber .
43010002	But he who entereth by the door , he is the shepherd of the flock .
43010003	And to him the keeper of the gate openeth the gate , and the flock heareth his voice , and his sheep he calleth by their names , and he leadeth them forth ;
43010004	and when his flock hath gone forth , he goeth before it , and his sheep follow him , because they know his voice .
43010005	But after a stranger the flock goeth not , but it fleeth from him ; for it knoweth not the voice of a stranger .
43010006	This parable spake Jeshu to them , but they knew not what he said with them .
43010007	Jeshu saith to them again , Amen , amen , I say to you , I am the gate of the flock ;
43010008	and all those who have come were thieves and robbers , but the flock heard them not .
43010009	I am the gate ; by me if any man enter , he shall live and shall come in , and go out , and find pasture .
43010010	The thief cometh not but to steal and to kill and destroy : I am come that they may have life , and that which is more .
43010011	I am the good shepherd , and the good shepherd his life layeth down for his flock .
43010012	The hireling who is not the shepherd , and whose the sheep are not , when he seeth the wolf coming , leaveth the flock and fleeth ; and the wolf cometh ravaging and destroying the flock .
43010013	But the hireling fleeth because he is an hireling , and careth not for the flock .
43010014	I am the good shepherd , and know my own , and am known of my own .
43010015	As my Father knoweth me ( and ) I know my Father , and my life I lay down for the flock .
43010016	But I have other sheep also which are not of this fold ; and these also it behoveth me to bring , and they will hear my voice , and all shall become one flock and one shepherd .
43010017	On this account my Father loveth me , because I lay down my life again to take it .
43010018	No man taketh it away from me , but I lay it down from my will ; for I am able to lay it down , and I am able to take it again ; for this commandment have I received from my Father .
43010019	And there was again a division among the Jihudoyee because of his words :
43010020	and many of them said , He has a devil , and is altogether insane , why do you hear him ?
43010021	But others said , These words are not of a demoniac : how can a devil open the eyes of the blind ?
43010022	IT was the feast of the renovation at Urishlem ,
43010023	and it was winter . And Jeshu walked in the temple in the portico of Shelumun .
43010024	And the Jihudoyee surrounded him , saying to him , How long takest thou our souls ? If thou art the Meshicha , tell us openly .
43010025	Jeshu answered and said to them , I have told you , and you believe not . The works that I do in the name of my Father , these witness for me .
43010026	But you believe not , because you are not of my sheep , ( even ) as I told you .
43010027	My sheep hear my voice , and I know them , and they follow me ;
43010028	and I give to them the life which is eternal , and they shall not perish for ever , and no man shall snatch them from my hands .
43010029	For my Father who gave them to me than all is greater ; and no man from the hand of my Father can snatch them .
43010030	I and my Father are One .
43010031	And again the Jihudoyee took up stones to stone him .
43010032	Jeshu saith to them , Many good works from my Father have I showed you : on account of which of these works do you stone me ?
43010033	The Jihudoyee say to him , Not on account of the good works do we stone thee , but because thou blasphemest ; thou , being a son of man , making thyself Aloha .
43010034	Jeshu saith to them , Is it not written in your law , I said , Ye are Alohee ?
43010035	If them he calleth Alohee , because with them was the word of Aloha , and the scripture cannot be loosed ,
43010036	to him whom the Father hath sanctified and sent into the world , say you , Thou blasphemest , because I have said to you , I am the Son of Aloha ?
43010037	And if I do not the works of my Father , believe me not ;
43010038	but if I do , though you believe not me , the works believe , that you may know and believe that the Father is in me , and ( that ) I ( am ) in the Father .
43010039	And they sought again to apprehend him ; but he went forth from among their hands :
43010040	and he went beyond Jurdan , to the place where Juchanon at first had baptized , and was there .
43010041	And many came to him , and said , Juchanon did not one sign ; but every thing which Juchanon said concerning this man was true .
43010042	And many believed in him .
43011001	BUT a certain man was sick , Loozar , of the village Bethania : ( he was ) the brother of Mariam and of Martha .
43011002	It was that Mariam who anointed with balsam the feet of Jeshu , and wiped ( them ) with her hair , whose brother this Loozar was who was sick .
43011003	And his two sisters sent unto Jeshu , saying , Our Lord , he whom thou lovest is sick .
43011004	But Jeshu said , This sickness is not of death , but for the glory of Aloha , that the Son of Aloha may be glorified on account of it .
43011005	But Jeshu loved Martha and Mariam and Loozar .
43011006	And when he heard that he was sick , he remained in the place where he was two days .
43011007	And afterwards he saith to his disciples , Come , we will go again into Jihud .
43011008	His disciples say to him , Raban , now have the Jihudoyee sought to stone thee ; and again goest thou thither ?
43011009	Jeshu saith to them , Are there not twelve hours in the day ? If a man walk in the day , he stumbleth not , because he seeth the light of this world ;
43011010	but if a man walk in the night , he stumbleth , because no light is in him .
43011011	These spake Jeshu ; and afterwards he said to them , Loozar our friend reposeth ; but I go to awake him .
43011012	His disciples say to him , Our Lord , if he sleep he is healed .
43011013	But Jeshu spake concerning his death ; and they thought that concerning the repose of sleep he spake .
43011014	Then said Jeshu to them explicatively , Loozar is dead .
43011015	And I am glad I was not there for your sakes , that you may believe . But let us walk thither .
43011016	Thoma , who is called the Twin , saith to his fellow-disciples , Let us also go , that we may die with him .
43011017	And Jeshu came to Bethania , and found that he had been four days in the house of burial .
43011018	Now Bethania was nigh to Urishlem , being a distance from it of about fifteen stadia .
43011019	And many of the Jihudoyee had come to Martha and Mariam , that they might speak to their hearts concerning their brother .
43011020	Then Martha , when she heard that Jeshu had come , went forth to meet him ; but Mariam sat in the house .
43011021	And Martha said to Jeshu , My Lord , if thou hadst been here , my brother had not died .
43011022	But even now know I that whatsoever thou wilt ask of Aloha , he giveth to thee .
43011023	Jeshu saith to her , Thy brother ariseth .
43011024	Martha saith to him , I know that he ariseth in the resurrection at the last day .
43011025	Jeshu saith to her , I am the Resurrection and the Life ; and ( he ) who believeth in me , although he will die , shall live .
43011026	And every one who liveth and believeth in me , for ever shall not die . Believest thou this ?
43011027	She saith to him , Yes , my Lord ; I believe that thou art the Meshicha , the Son of Aloha , who cometh into the world .
43011028	And when she had said these , she went , called Mariam her sister in secret , and said to her , Our Master hath come , and calleth for thee .
43011029	When Mariam heard , she arose quickly , and came to him .
43011030	But Jeshu himself had not yet come into the village , but was in that place where Martha met him .
43011031	But those Jihudoyee who were also with her in the house to console her , when they saw that Mariam rose up hastily to go forth , went themselves after her ; for they thought that to the sepulchre she went to weep .
43011032	But she , Mariam , when she was come where Jeshu was , and saw him , fell down at his feet , saying , If thou hadst been here , my Lord , my brother had not died .
43011033	But Jeshu , when he saw her weeping , and those Jihudoyee who came with her weeping , he was moved in his spirit , and was troubled ,
43011034	and said , Where have you laid him ? And they said to him , Our Lord , come and see .
43011035	And the tears of Jeshu came .
43011036	And the Jihudoyee said , See how he loved him !
43011037	But some of them said , Could not this who opened the eyes of that blind have caused also that this should not have died ?
43011038	Jeshu , groaning within himself , came to the house of burial ; and that house of burial was a cave , and a stone was laid at the gate of it .
43011039	And Jeshu said , Take up this stone . Martha , the sister of him ( who was ) dead , saith to him , My Lord , he now stinketh ; for four days are to him .
43011040	Jeshu said to her , Said I not to thee , that if thou wilt believe , thou shalt see the glory of Aloha ?
43011041	And they took up the stone . And Jeshu lifted his eye upward , and said , Father , I give thanks to thee that thou hast heard me ;
43011042	and I know that at all times thou hearest me : yet , because of this assembly which standeth , I say these ( words ) , that they may believe that thou hast sent me .
43011043	And when he had said these ( words ) , he cried with a high voice , Loozar , come without !
43011044	And he , the dead , came forth , his hands and his feet being bound with bandages , and his face in a linen cloth . Jeshu saith to them , Release him , and let ( him ) go .
43011045	And many of the Jihudoyee who came with Mariam , when they saw the thing which Jeshu did , believed on him .
43011046	And some of them went to the Pharishee , and told them every thing that Jeshu had done .
43011047	AND the chief priests and Pharishee assembled , and said , What shall we do ? because this man doeth many signs ;
43011048	and if we leave him thus , all men will believe on him , and the Rumoyee , coming , take away our country and our people .
43011049	But one of them , whose name was Kaiapha , was the high priest of that year ; and he said to them , You know not any thing ,
43011050	nor reason that it is expedient for us that one man die for the people , and not all the people perish .
43011051	But this from himself he spake not , but because he was high priest of that year , he prophesied that Jeshu should die for the people ,
43011052	and not only for ( that ) people , but also that the children of Aloha who are dispersed he should gather into one .
43011053	And from that day they determined to kill him .
43011054	But Jeshu himself walked not openly among the Jihudoyee , but went from thence to the region near the wilderness , to a region which was called Ephrem , and there conversed with his disciples .
43011055	NOW the petscha of the Jihudoyee drew nigh ; and many went up from the country places to Urishlem before the festival , to purify themselves .
43011056	And they sought for Jeshu , and said one to another in the temple , What think you , that he cometh to the feast ?
43011057	But the chief priests and Pharishee had commanded that if any man knew where ( he was ) , he should declare it to them , as that they might apprehend him .
43012001	But Jeshu six days before the petscha came to Bethania , where Loozar was , he whom Jeshu had raised from among the dead .
43012002	And they made him there a supper and Martha served , and Loozar was one of those who reclined with him .
43012003	But Mariam took a vase of balsam of the finest nard , great in price , and anointed the feet of Jeshu , and wiped with her hair his feet , and the house was filled with the fragrance of the balsam .
43012004	And Jihuda Scarjuta , one of his disciples , he who would betray him said ,
43012005	Why was not this ointment sold for three hundred dinoreen , and given to the poor ?
43012006	But this he said , not because for the poor he had care , but because he was a thief , and the purse was with him , and whatever fell into it he carried .
43012007	But Jeshu said , Let her alone . For the day of my burial had she kept it .
43012008	In all time the poor you have with you ; but me you have not at all time .
43012009	And a great company of Jihudoyee who were there heard Jeshu . And they had come not on Jeshu's account only , but also to see Loozar , he whom he had raised from among the dead .
43012010	But the chief priests were minded to slay Loozar also ,
43012011	because many of the Jihudoyee on account of him had gone and believed in Jeshu .
43012012	THE day after , a great gathering of those who had come to the feast , when they heard that Jeshu was coming to Urishlem ,
43012013	took branches of palms , and went forth to meet him . And they cried out , saying , Aushana ! Blessed is he who cometh in the name of the Lord , the King of Israel .
43012014	And Jeshu caused to be found an ass , and sat upon him ; as it is written ,
43012015	Fear not , daughter of Tseun : behold , thy King cometh to thee , and riding on a colt , the foal of an ass .
43012016	But these the disciples knew not at that time ; but when Jeshu was glorified , the disciples remembered that these were written concerning him , and ( that ) these ( things ) they had done unto him .
43012017	But the assembly that was with him when he called Loozar from the sepulchre , and raised him from among the dead , bare witness .
43012018	And on account of this , great multitudes went forth to receive him ; for they had heard that this sign he had done .
43012019	But the Pharishee said one to another , See you that you do not profit any thing ! For , behold , the whole world is gone after him .
43012020	Now there were also from the Gentiles men who had ascended to worship at the feast .
43012021	These came and drew near to Philipos , who was of Beth-tsaida of Galila ; and they requested of him , and said to him , Mari , we desire to see Jeshu .
43012022	And Philipos came and told Andreas , and Andreas and Philipos told Jeshu .
43012023	BUT Jeshu answered and said to them , The hour hath come that the Son of man may be glorified .
43012024	Amen , amen , I say to you , That a grain of wheat if it fall not and die in the earth remaineth alone ; but if it die , it bringeth much fruits .
43012025	He who loveth his life shall lose it ; and he who hateth his life in this world shall keep it to the life which is eternal .
43012026	If any man serve me , let him come after me ; and where I am , there shall be also my servant : whoever serveth me , him will my Father honour .
43012027	Now my soul , behold it is commoved ; and what shall I say ? My Father , deliver me from this hour :
43012028	but on account of this have I come unto this hour . Father , glorify thy name . And the voice was heard from heaven , I have glorified , and again I glorify .
43012029	And the company who stood , heard , and they said there was thunder . But others said , An angel spake with him .
43012030	Jeshu answered and said to them , Not on my account was this voice , but on your account .
43012031	Now is the judgment of this world ; now is the ruler of this world cast out .
43012032	And I , when I have been lifted up from the earth , will draw all men unto me .
43012033	But this he said to show by what death he should die .
43012034	The people said to him , We have heard from the law that the Meshicha for ever abideth : how sayest thou that the Son of man is to be lifted up ? Who is this Son of man ?
43012035	Jeshu saith to them , A little further time is the light with you . Walk while you have the light , that the darkness overtake you not . And whoever walketh in darkness knoweth not whither he goeth .
43012036	While you have the light , believe in the light , that the sons of light you may become . These spake Jeshu , and went ( and ) concealed himself from them .
43012037	Yet though all these signs he had done before them , they believed not in him :
43012038	that the word of the prophet Eshaia might be fulfilled , who said , My Lord , who hath believed our report , And the arm of the Lord , to whom hath it been revealed ?
43012039	Because of this they were not able to believe : Wherefore again Eshaia had said ,
43012040	He hath blinded their eyes , And darkened their heart , That they should not see with their eyes , And understand with their heart , And be turned , and I should heal them .
43012041	These said Eshaia when he saw his glory , and spake concerning him .
43012042	Yet of the chiefs also many believed in him : but because of the Pharishee they did not confess , that they might not be put out of the synagogue :
43012043	for they loved the glory of men more than the glory of Aloha .
43012044	But Jeshu cried and said , He who believeth in me , believeth not in me , but in him who sent me .
43012045	And he who seeth me seeth him who sent me .
43012046	I the light am come into the world , that every one who believeth in me might not abide in darkness .
43012047	And he who heareth my words , and doth not keep them , I judge him not : for I came not to judge the world , but to save the world .
43012048	He who rejecteth me , and receiveth not my word , hath that which judgeth him : the word which I speak , that judgeth him in the last day .
43012049	For I of myself have not spoken , but the Father who sent me , he gave me a commandment , what I should say , and what I should speak .
43012050	And I know that his commandments are life everlasting : these therefore which I speak , as said to me my Father , so I speak .
43013001	NOW before the feast of petscha , Jeshu knew that his hour was come , and that he should pass from this world unto his Father , and he had loved his who were in this world , and unto the end he had loved them .
43013002	And when was the supper , Satana had cast it into the heart of Jihuda bar Shemun Scarjuta to betray him .
43013003	But Jeshu himself , because he knew that the Father had given all things into his hands , and that from Aloha he had come forth , and unto Aloha he was going ,
43013004	riseth from supper , and setteth his garments apart , and took a towel , ( and ) bound ( it ) upon his loins ;
43013005	and he poured water into a basin , and began to wash the feet of his disciples , and wiped ( them ) with the towel that he had bound upon his loins .
43013006	But when he came to Shemun Kipha , Shemun said to him , Dost thou , my Lord , wash my feet for me ?
43013007	Jeshu answered and said to him , What I do , thou knowest not now ; but afterward thou shalt know .
43013008	Shemun Kipha saith to him , Never shalt thou wash for me my feet . Jeshu saith to him , If I do not wash thee , thou hast with me no part .
43013009	Shemun Kipha saith to him , Then , my Lord , not only my feet shalt thou wash for me , but also my hands , also my head .
43013010	Jeshu saith , He that hath bathed needeth not but his feet only to wash , for all of him he hath cleansed : also you are clean , but not all of you .
43013011	For Jeshu knew who was betraying him ; therefore he said , Ye are not all of you clean .
43013012	But when he had washed their feet , he took up his garments and reclined , and said to them , Know you what I have done for you ?
43013013	You call me Our Master , and Our Lord ; and well say you , for I am .
43013014	If I then , your Lord and your Master , have washed for you your feet , how much more ought you to wash the feet of one another ?
43013015	For this pattern have I given you , that as I have done to you , you also should do .
43013016	Amen , amen , I say to you , The servant is not greater than his lord ; nor ( is ) the apostle greater than he who sent him .
43013017	If these you know , happy are you if you do them .
43013018	Not of all of you do I speak ; for I know those whom I have chosen ; but that the scripture might be fulfilled , that he who eateth bread with me hath lifted against me his heel .
43013019	Now I tell you before it shall be , that when it is done you may believe that I am .
43013020	Amen , amen , I say to you , Whoever receiveth him whom I send receiveth me ; and whoever receiveth me receiveth him who sent me .
43013021	These said Jeshu , and was agitated in his spirit , and testified , and said , Amen , amen , I say to you , That one of you shall betray me .
43013022	But the disciples looked one on the other , because they knew not concerning whom he spake .
43013023	Now there was of his disciples one who reclined on his bosom ; he whom Jeshu loved .
43013024	To this signed Shemun Kipha that he would ask of whom it was that he spake .
43013025	And that disciple fell upon the bosom of Jeshu , and said to him , My Lord , who is this ?
43013026	Jeshu answered and said to him , He to whom I give the dipped bread . And Jeshu dipped the bread and gave it to Jihuda bar Shemun Scarjuta .
43013027	Then after the bread Satana entered into him . And Jeshu said to him , What thou doest , do with speed !
43013028	But this no man knew of those who reclined of what he spake to him .
43013029	For some of them thought that as Jihuda had the purse , he had instructed him to buy something that should be required at the feast , or that he should give somewhat to the poor .
43013030	But he , Jihuda , received the bread and immediately went out : and it was night when he went out .
43013031	AND Jeshu said , Now is glorified the Son of man , and Aloha is glorified in him .
43013032	And if Aloha is glorified in him , Aloha shall glorify him in himself , and at once doth glorify him .
43013033	My sons , a little longer I am with you , and you will seek me ; and , as I said to the Jihudoyee , Whither I go you cannot come , so to you say I now .
43013034	A new commandment give I to you , that you should love one another ; as I have loved you , so do you also love one another .
43013035	By this shall all men know that you are my disciples , if love be in you one for another .
43013036	Shemun Kipha said to him , Our Lord , whither goest thou ? Jeshu said to him , Whither I go , thou canst not now come after me ; but at the last thou shalt come .
43013037	Shemun Kipha saith to him , My Lord , why cannot I come after thee now ? My life for thee lay I down .
43013038	Jeshu saith to him , Dost thou lay down thy life for me ! Amen , amen , I tell thee , That the cock will not crow , until thou shalt have denied me three times .
43014001	LET not your heart be troubled : believe in Aloha , and in me believe .
43014002	Many are the mansions of my Father's house : and if not , I would have told you ; for I go to prepare for you a place .
43014003	And if I go to prepare for you a place , I will come again and take you with me , that where I am you also may be .
43014004	And whither I go you know , and the way you know .
43014005	Thoma saith to him , Our Lord , we know not whither thou goest , and how can we know the way ?
43014006	Jeshu saith to him , I ( am ) the way , and the truth , and the life . No man cometh unto my Father unless by me .
43014007	But if me you had known , my Father also would you have known : and henceforth you know him and have seen him .
43014008	Philipos saith to him , Our Lord , show us the Father , and it sufficeth us .
43014009	Jeshu saith to him , All this time have I been with you , and hast thou not known me , Philipé ? He who me seeth , seeth the Father ; and how sayest thou , Show us the Father ?
43014010	Believest thou not that I am in my Father and my Father in me ? And these words that I speak , I speak not from myself , but my Father who dwelleth in me , he doeth these works .
43014011	Believe that I am in my Father and my Father in me ; and if not , even on account of the works , believe .
43014012	Amen , amen , I say to you , That whosoever believeth in me , these works that I do shall he do also ; and more than these shall he do , because I go unto my Father .
43014013	And whatsoever you shall ask in my name , I will do for you , that the Father may be glorified in his Son .
43014014	And if you shall ask ( of ) me in my name , I will do .
43014015	IF you love me , keep my commandments ;
43014016	and I will pray of my Father , and another Paraclete will he give you , who will be with you for ever ,
43014017	the Spirit of truth , he whom the world cannot receive , because it doth not see him , nor know him . But you know him ; for with you he dwelleth , and in you is .
43014018	I will not leave you orphans ; for I will come to you a little after .
43014019	And the world seeth me not , but you shall see me ; for because I live , you also shall live .
43014020	In that day you will know that I am in my Father , and you in me , and I in you .
43014021	He who hath my commandments and keepeth them is he who loveth me ; and he who loveth me shall be loved of my Father , and I will love him , and will manifest to him myself .
43014022	Jihuda saith to him , ( it was not Scarjuta , ) My Lord , how to us wilt thou manifest thyself , and not to the world ?
43014023	Jeshu replied , and said to him , He who loveth me , my word keepeth , and my Father will love him , and unto him we come , and a dwelling-place with him we make .
43014024	But he who loveth me not , keepeth not my word . And the word that you hear is not mine , but of the Father who sent me .
43014025	These have I spoken with you while I am with you .
43014026	But he , the Paraclete , the Spirit of Holiness , whom the Father sendeth in my name , he shall teach you every thing , and he shall remind you of all that I have said to you .
43014027	PEACE I leave with you ; my peace I give to you : not as the world giveth , give I unto you . Let not your heart be troubled , nor be afraid .
43014028	You have heard what I have told you , that I go , and come to you ( again ) . If you had loved me , you would have rejoiced , because I go to my Father ; for my Father is greater than I .
43014029	And now , behold , I have told you while it is not done , that when it has been you may believe .
43014030	Henceforth I will not speak with you much ; for the ruler of the world cometh , and in me hath he nothing .
43014031	But that the world may know that I love my Father , and as my Father hath commanded , so I do . Arise , let us go hence !
43015001	I am the true vine , and my Father is the husbandman .
43015002	Every branch which in me giveth not fruits he taketh away ; and that which giveth fruits he cleanseth , that more fruits it may give .
43015003	Now are you clean because of the word which I have spoken with you .
43015004	Abide in me , and I in you . As the branch cannot give fruits of itself if it abide not in the vine , so also cannot you , if you abide not in me .
43015005	I am the vine , and you the branches . Whoso abideth in me , and I in him , this produceth much fruits , because without me you cannot do any thing .
43015006	But if a man abide not in me , he is cast without , as a withered branch ; and , gathering , they cast it into the fire to burn .
43015007	But if you abide in me , and my words abide in you , all whatever you will to ask shall be unto you .
43015008	IN this is glorified my Father , that much fruit you give , and be my disciples .
43015009	As my Father hath loved me , so I have loved you : continue in the love of me .
43015010	If my commandments you will keep , you shall abide in my love ; as I have kept the commandments of my Father , and abide in his love .
43015011	These have I spoken with you , that my joy may be in you , and that your joy may be full .
43015012	This is my commandment , That you love one another , as I have loved you .
43015013	Love which is greater than this is not , that a man lay down his life for his friends .
43015014	You are my friends , if you do all that I command you .
43015015	No more I call you servants , for the servant knoweth not what doeth his Lord ; but my friends have I called you ; wherefore all that I have heard from my Father , I have made known unto you .
43015016	You have not chosen me , but I have chosen you , and placed you , that you also may go ( and ) yield much fruit ; and your fruit shall remain , because all that you shall ask the Father in my name , he will give to you .
43015017	These I command you , That you love one another .
43015018	And if the world hate you , know that , before you , it hated me .
43015019	And if of the world you were , the world its own would have loved ; but you are not of the world , for I have chosen you from the world ; on which account the world hateth you .
43015020	Remember the word which I spake with you , That there is no servant who is greater than his lord . If me they have persecuted , you also will they persecute ; and if my word they had kept , yours also would they keep .
43015021	But these all will they do to you on account of my name , because they know not Him who sent me .
43015022	If I had not come and spoken with them , they had not had sin ; but now have they no pretext for their sins .
43015023	He who hateth me , my Father also hateth .
43015024	And if the works I had not done before their eyes which no other man hath done , they had not had sin ; but now they have seen and hated both me and my Father ;
43015025	that the word may be fulfilled which is written in their law , They hated me undeservedly .
43015026	But when the Paraclete cometh , He whom I will send unto you from my Father , the Spirit of Truth , He who from my Father cometh forth , He shall testify of me .
43015027	You also testify , because from the beginning are you with me .
43016001	These have I spoken with you , that you may not be offended .
43016002	They shall cast you out from their synagogues ; and the hour cometh when every one who shall kill you will think that a sacrifice he offereth unto Aloha .
43016003	And these will they do , because they have not known either my Father or me .
43016004	THESE have I spoken with you , that when their time hath come you may remember that I told you . But these at first I did not tell you , because with you I was .
43016005	But now I go unto Him who sent me ; and no man of you asketh me , Whither goest thou ?
43016006	For I have told you these , and sorrow hath come and filled your hearts .
43016007	But I the truth say to you , That it is needful for you that I go ; for if I go not , the Paraclete cometh not to you . But if I go , I will send him to you .
43016008	And when he hath come , he will convict the world of sin , and of righteousness , and of judgment .
43016009	Of sin , because they believe not in me ;
43016010	but of righteousness , because unto my Father I go , and you see me not again ;
43016011	but of judgment , because the ruler of this world is judged .
43016012	I have yet much to tell you , but you cannot now apprehend ;
43016013	but when the Spirit of Truth hath come , he will lead you into all the truth ; for he will not speak of himself ; but all that he shall hear he will speak , and the things to come will he make known to you .
43016014	He will glorify me , because of mine he will take and will show you .
43016015	All whatever that the Father hath is mine : on this account I have said to you , That of mine he will take , and will show you .
43016016	A LITTLE ( time ) , and you will not see me ; and again a little , and you shall see me , because I go to the Father .
43016017	And the disciples said one to another , What is this that he saith to us ? A little ( time ) , and you will not see me ; and again a little ( while ) , and you shall see me , and because I go to my Father .
43016018	And they said , What is this little ( time of ) which he hath spoken ?
43016019	We know not what he saith . But Jeshu knew that they sought to ask him ; and he said to them , Concerning this do you inquire together that I told you , A little ( time ) , and you will not see me ; and again a little , and you shall see me ?
43016020	Amen , amen , I tell you , That you will weep and lament , and the world will rejoice ; and to you shall be sorrow ; but your sorrow shall become joy .
43016021	A woman , when she travaileth , hath sorrow , that the day hath come for her giving birth ; but when she hath borne a son , she remembereth not her anguish , for joy that a child of man hath been born into the world .
43016022	You also now have sorrow ; but again I will see you , and your heart shall rejoice , and your joy no man taketh from you .
43016023	And in that day you will ask me nothing . Amen , amen , I tell you , That whatsoever you shall ask my Father in my name , he will give you .
43016024	Hitherto you have not asked any thing in my name : ask , and receive , that your joy may be full .
43016025	These in parables I have spoken with you ; but the hour cometh when I will not speak with you in parables , but manifestly ; and I will announce to you concerning the Father .
43016026	In that day you shall ask in my name ; and I say not to you that I will ask of the Father for you ;
43016027	for the Father himself loveth you , because you have loved me , and have believed that from the Father I came forth .
43016028	I came forth from the Father , and came into the world ; and again I leave the world , and go unto the Father .
43016029	His disciples say to him , Behold , now openly speakest thou , and not one parable hast thou spoken .
43016030	Now know we that every thing thou knowest , and thou needest not that any man should ask thee . By this we believe that from Aloha thou hast come forth .
43016031	JESHU saith to them , Believe !
43016032	Behold , the hour shall come , and now cometh , that you will be dispersed ( every ) man to his place , and you will have left me alone . But I am not alone , because the Father is with me .
43016033	These have I said to you , that in me you may have peace . In the world you shall have distress ; but be of heart , I have conquered the world .
43017001	These spake Jeshu ; and , uplifting his eyes to heaven , he said , My Father , the hour hath come ; glorify thy Son , that thy Son may glorify thee .
43017002	As thou hast given him power over all flesh , that to all whom thou hast given him he should give the life which is eternal .
43017003	But this is the life which is eternal , that they know thee , who art the true Aloha , and Him whom thou hast sent , Jeshu Meshicha .
43017004	I have glorified thee on the earth ; the work which thou didst give me to do , I have finished it .
43017005	And now glorify thou me , my Father , with thyself , in that glory which I had with thee before the world was .
43017006	I have made known thy name unto the sons of man ; those whom thou gavest me from the world : thine they were , and to me didst thou give them ; and they have kept thy word .
43017007	Now have they known that whatsoever thou hast given me is from thee .
43017008	And the words that thou gavest me I have given them , and they have received , and have known assuredly that from thee I came forth , and have believed that thou didst send me .
43017009	And for them I pray ; not for the world I pray , but for them whom thou hast given me , because they are thine .
43017010	And every thing of mine is thine , and thine is mine , and I am glorified in them .
43017011	Henceforth I am not in the world ; but these are in the world , and I come to thee . Holy Father , keep them through thy name , that ( name ) which thou hast given to me , that they may be one as we are .
43017012	While I was with them in the world , I kept them through thy name : those whom thou gavest me I have kept , and a man of them is not lost , but the son of perdition , that the scripture may be fulfilled .
43017013	BUT now I come to thee , and these ( things ) I speak in the world , that they may have my joy completed in themselves .
43017014	I have given them thy word , and the world hath hated them , because they are not of the world , as I am not of the world .
43017015	Not that thou wouldest take them out of the world do I pray , but that thou wouldest keep them from the evil ;
43017016	for they are not of the world , even as I am not of the world .
43017017	Father , sanctify them through thy truth ; for thy word is truth .
43017018	As me thou hast sent into the world , I also have sent them into the world .
43017019	And for their sakes I consecrate myself , that they also may be consecrated for the truth .
43017020	Nor for these do I pray only , but also for those who shall believe in me through their word ;
43017021	that they all may be one , as thou , my Father , ( art ) in me , and I in thee , that they also in us one may be ; that the world may believe that thou hast sent me .
43017022	And the glory which thou hast given me have I given unto them , that they may be one as we are one ;
43017023	I in them , and thou in me , that they may be perfected in one ; and that the world may know that thou hast sent me , and that thou hast loved them , as me also thou hast loved .
43017024	Father , those whom thou hast given I will that where I am they also may be with me , that they may see that glory of mine , which thou hast given to me ; for thou lovedst me before the foundations of the world .
43017025	My righteous Father , the world hath not known thee ; but I have known thee , and these have known that thou hast sent me .
43017026	And I have made known unto them thy name , and I make it known that the love itself , wherewith thou hast loved me , may be in them , and I may be in them .
43018001	THESE said Jeshu , and went forth with his disciples over the ford of Kedrun , where there was a garden , which he entered with his disciples .
43018002	But Jihuda , the traitor , also knew that place , because many-a-time had Jeshu there with his disciples convened .
43018003	Jihuda then took a band , and from the chief priests and Pharishee he took officers , and came thither with lanterns and lamps and arms .
43018004	But Jeshu , who knew every thing that should come upon him , went forth and said to them , Whom seek you ?
43018005	They say to him , Jeshu Natsroia . Jeshu saith to them , I am . And Jihuda the traitor was also standing with them .
43018006	And when Jeshu had said to them , I am , they went backward and fell upon the ground .
43018007	And Jeshu again asked them , Whom seek you ? Then they said , Jeshu Natsroia .
43018008	Jeshu saith to them , I have told you that I am ; and if me you seek , let these go .
43018009	That the word might be fulfilled which he spake , Of those whom thou hast given me I have not lost even one .
43018010	But Shemun Kipha had a sword upon him , and he drew it , and smote the servant of the high priest , and took off his right ear .
43018011	And the name of the servant was Molek . Jeshu said to Kipha , Put up the sword into its sheath ; the cup which my Father hath given me shall I not drink it ?
43018012	Then the band and the captains and the officials of the Jihudoyee took Jeshu and bound him ,
43018013	and brought him unto Chanan first , because he was father-in-law of Kaiapha , he who was the high priest of that year .
43018014	Now it was Kaiapha , he , who had counselled the Jihudoyee that it was expedient that one man should die for the people .
43018015	But Shemun Kipha , and one of the other disciples , came after Jeshu . And that disciple knew the chief of the priests , and went in with Jeshu into the hall .
43018016	But Shemun stood without at the door . And that other disciple , who knew the chief of the priests , went out and told the keeper of the door to admit Shemun .
43018017	But the damsel keeping the door said to Shemun , Art thou also of the disciples of this man ? He saith to her , No .
43018018	And the servants and officials were standing , and they had set a fire to warm them , because it was cold ; and Shemun stood also with them and warmed himself .
43018019	And the high priest questioned Jeshu concerning his disciples , and concerning his doctrine .
43018020	And Jeshu said to him , I openly discoursed with the people , and , at all time , taught in the synagogue and in the temple , where all the Jihudoyee assemble . And nothing in secret have I spoken .
43018021	Why askest thou me ? Ask them who have heard what I have said with them . Behold , they know every thing that I have said .
43018022	And as these ( words ) he spake , one of the officers who stood ( by ) struck Jeshu upon his cheek , and said to him , Thus givest thou the answer to the chief of the priests ?
43018023	Jeshu replied and said to him , If wickedly I have spoken , bear witness of the evil ; but if well , why hast thou struck me ?
43018024	But Chanan had sent Jeshu bound unto Kaiapha , chief of the priests .
43018025	And Shemun Kipha stood and warmed ( himself ) , and they say to him , Thou art also one of his disciples ? And he denied and said , I am not .
43018026	One of the servants of the chief of the priests said to him , the brother of him whose ear Shemun had cut off , Did not I see thee with him in the garden ?
43018027	And again Shemun denied . And in the same hour the cock crowed .
43018028	NOW they led Jeshu from Kaiapha into the praetorium , and it was early . But they would not enter the praetorium , that they might not be defiled , until they should have eaten the petscha .
43018029	But Pilatos came forth to them without , and said to them , What accusation have you against this man ?
43018030	They answered and said to him , If he were not a worker of evils , we would not to thee have delivered him .
43018031	Pilatos saith to them , Take you him , and judge him according to your law .
43018032	The Jihudoyee say to him , It is not lawful for us to put any one to death . That the word that Jeshu spake might be accomplished , when he declared by what death he should die .
43018033	But Pilatos entered the Praetorium , and called Jeshu , and said to him , Art thou the king of the Jihudoyee ?
43018034	Jeshu saith to him , Of thyself sayest thou this , or did others tell thee concerning me ?
43018035	Pilatos saith to him , Am I a Jihudoya ? The sons of thy people and the chief priests have delivered thee to me : what hast thou done ?
43018036	Jeshu saith to him , My kingdom is not from this world . If from this world were my kingdom , my servants would have fought , that I should not have been delivered to the Jihudoyee . But now my kingdom is not from hence .
43018037	Pilatos saith to him , Then thou art a king ? Jeshu saith to him , Thou hast said that I am a king . For this am I born , and for this I came into the world , to testify of the truth . Every one who is of the truth heareth my voice .
43018038	Pilatos said to him , What is the truth ? And when he had said this , he went forth again to the Jihudoyee , and said to them , I find not one cause in him .
43018039	But you have a custom that one I should release to you at the petscha . Will you , therefore , that I release to you this King of the Jihudoyee ?
43018040	And they all cried and said , Not this , but Bar Aba . Now this Bar Aba was a robber .
43019001	Then Pilatos scourged Jeshu .
43019002	And the soldiers entwined a crown of thorns , and set it on his head ; and they covered him with robes of purple ,
43019003	and said , Hail to thee , King of the Jihudoyee ! and struck him upon his cheeks .
43019004	And Pilatos came again forth , and said to them , Behold , I bring him to you forth , that you may know that I find nothing against him , nor one cause ( of death ) .
43019005	AND Jeshu came forth , having on him the crown of thorns and the robes of purple . And Pilatos said to them , Behold the man !
43019006	But when the chief priests and officials saw him , they cried out , saying , Crucify him , crucify him ! Pilatos saith to them , Take you him and crucify him ; for I find in him no cause .
43019007	The Jihudoyee say to him , We have a law , and , according to our law , he is guilty of death , because he made himself the son of Aloha .
43019008	When Pilatos heard that word , he the more feared .
43019009	And he entered again the praetorium , and said to Jeshu , Whence art thou ? But Jeshu gave him no answer .
43019010	Pilatos saith to him , With me speakest thou not ? Knowest thou not that I have power to release thee , and power to crucify thee ?
43019011	Jeshu saith to him , Thou against ME hast no power , no not any , unless it hath been given to thee from above : wherefore he who delivered me to thee hath a sin greater than thine .
43019012	On this account Pilatos willed to release him : but the Jihudoyee cried out , If this ( man ) thou releasest , thou art not the friend of Cesar : for whosoever maketh himself a king is the adversary of Cesar .
43019013	But when Pilatos heard that word , he brought Jeshu without , and sat down upon the tribunal in the place which is called the Pavement of Stones , but in Hebrew it is called Gaphiphtha .
43019014	And it was the preparation for the petscha . AND it was about the sixth hour . And he said to the Jihudoyee , Behold your king !
43019015	But they cried out , Take him away , take him away ! crucify him , crucify him ! Pilatos saith to them , Your king shall I crucify ? The chief priests say to him , We have no king but Cesar .
43019016	Then delivered he him to them , that they might crucify him .
43019017	And they took Jeshu , and led him forth , bearing his cross to a place which is called A Skull , but in Hebrew is Gogultha :
43019018	there they crucified him , and with him two others , one on either side , and Jeshu in the midst .
43019019	And a tablet also wrote Pilatos , and set it on the cross ; and it was thus written , This is Jeshu Natsroya , King of the Jihudoyee .
43019020	And this title many of the Jihudoyee read ; for nigh to the city was the place where Jeshu was crucified ; and the writing was in Hebrew and Greek and Roman .
43019021	And the chief priests said to Pilatos , Do not write that he is king of the Jihudoyee , but that he said , I am the king of the Jihudoyee .
43019022	Pilatos saith , That which I have written , I have written .
43019023	BUT the soldiers , when they had crucified Jeshu , took his vestments and made four parts , a part unto each one of the soldiers : but his tunic was without seam , from the top woven all of it .
43019024	And they said one to another , Let us not rend it , but play for it by playing , ( to decide ) whose it shall be : and fulfilled was the scripture which had said ,
43019025	They divided my garments among them , And upon my raiment did they cast the lot . These things did the soldiers . But there stood by the cross of Jeshu his mother , and the sister of his mother , and Mariam , she who was ( the wife ) of Cleopha , and Mariam Magdalitha .
43019026	Jeshu seeth his mother , and that disciple whom he loved , standing ; and he said to his mother , Woman , behold thy son !
43019027	and he said to that disciple , Behold thy mother ! And from that hour that disciple received her to be with him .
43019028	After these Jeshu knew that every thing would be accomplished , and , that the scripture might be fulfilled , said , I thirst .
43019029	And a vessel was set ( there ) filled with vinegar : then they filled a sponge from the vinegar , and put it upon hyssop , and offered it to his mouth .
43019030	And when Jeshu had taken the vinegar , he said , Behold , it is finished ! And he bowed his head , and delivered up his spirit .
43019031	THE Jihudoyee , because it was the preparation , said , Let not these bodies remain-all-night upon the cross , because the shabath has lighted : for a great day was the day of that shabath . And they besought of Pilatos that they should break the legs of those ( who had been ) crucified , and take them down .
43019032	And the soldiers came , and brake the legs of the first , and of that other who was crucified with him ;
43019033	but when they came unto Jeshu , they saw that he was dead already , and they brake not his legs .
43019034	But one of the soldiers struck him in his side with the lance , and forthwith there came out blood and water .
43019035	And he who SAW testifieth , and the truth is his testimony ; and he knoweth that the truth he hath said , that you also may believe .
43019036	For these things were done , that the scripture might be fulfilled , which said , that A bone shall not be broken in him .
43019037	And again another scripture which said , They shall look upon him whom they pierced .
43019038	After these Jauseph , he who was of Rometha , begged of Pilatos , for he was a disciple of Jeshu , but secretly for fear of the Jihudoyee , that he might take the body of Jeshu : and Pilatos permitted . And he came and took the body of Jeshu .
43019039	And Nikodimos also came , he who at first had come to Jeshu by night , and he brought with him a condiment of myrrh and aloes , as a hundred lithreen .
43019040	And they took the body of Jeshu , and wrapped it in cloths and in balsams , as is the manner of the Jihudoyee to bury .
43019041	Now in that place where Jeshu was crucified was a garden , and in the garden a new sepulchre where one yet had not been laid .
43019042	And they laid there Jeshu , because the shabath was coming in and the sepulchre was near .
43020001	BUT in the first in the week came Mariam Magdalitha in the early-morn , ( while it was ) yet dark , unto the house of burial .
43020002	And she saw the stone that it was taken from the sepulchre . And she ran , and came to Shemun Kipha , and to that other disciple , whom Jeshu loved , saying to them , They have taken away our Lord from that house of burial , and I know not where they have laid him .
43020003	And Shemun went forth , and that other disciple , and they came to the house of burial .
43020004	And they ran both of them together ; but that disciple ran before Shemun , and came first to the house of burial .
43020005	And looking , he saw the cloths lying , but entering he entered not .
43020006	But Shemun came after him , and went into the house of burial , and saw the cloths set ,
43020007	and the napkin that had been bound upon his head , not with the cloths , but folded up , and laid apart in one place .
43020008	Then went in also that disciple who came first to the house of burial , and he saw , and believed .
43020009	For not yet knew they the scriptures , that he was to rise from the dead .
43020010	And those disciples went again to their place .
43020011	But Mariam stood at the sepulchre weeping : and while weeping , she looked into the sepulchre ,
43020012	and saw two angels in white , who were sitting , one at his pillows , and one at his feet , where the body of Jeshu had lain .
43020013	And they say to her , Woman , why weepest thou ? She saith to them , Because they have taken away my Lord , and I know not where they have laid him .
43020014	This said she , and turned herself back , and saw Jeshu standing , and knew not that it was Jeshu .
43020015	Jeshu saith to her , Woman , why weepest thou ? and whom seekest thou ? But she thought he was the gardener , and said to him , Sir , if thou have taken him away , tell me where thou hast laid him , and I will go ( and ) take him away .
43020016	Jeshu saith to her , Mariam . She turned and saith to him in Hebrew , Rabuni , which is saying , Malphona .
43020017	Jeshu saith to her , Touch me not ; for not yet have I ascended to my Father : but go to my brethren , and say to them , I ascend to my Father , and to your Father , to my God , and to your God .
43020018	Then went Mariam Magdalitha , and announced to the disciples that she had seen our Lord , and ( that ) these ( words ) he had spoken to her .
43020019	WHEN it was the evening of that day which ( was ) the first in the week , and the doors were shut where the disciples were , for fear of the Jihudoyee , came Jeshu , stood among them , and said to them , Peace ( be ) with you .
43020020	This he said , and showed them his hands and his side . And the disciples rejoiced when they saw our Lord .
43020021	Then said Jeshu unto them , Peace ( be ) with you : as my Father sent me , I also send you .
43020022	And when he had said these , he breathed on them , and said to them , Receive the Spirit of Holiness :
