43020023	if you forgive sins to a man , they shall be forgiven to him ; and if you retain ( the sins ) of a man , they are retained .
43020024	But Thoma , one of the twelve , he who was called the Twin , was not there with them when Jeshu came .
43020025	And the disciples say to him , We have seen our Lord . But he said to them , Unless I see in his hands the places of the nails , and put into them my fingers , and extend my hand into his side , I believe not .
43020026	AND after eight days again within were the disciples , and Thoma with them . And Jeshu came , while the doors were shut , stood in the midst , and said to them , Peace ( be ) with you .
43020027	And he said to Thoma , Bring thy finger hither and see my hands , and bring thy hand and thrust it into my side , and be not unbelieving but believing .
43020028	And Thoma answered and said to him , My Lord , and my God !
43020029	Jeshu saith to him , Now that thou hast seen , thou hast believed : blessed are they who have not seen me , and have believed .
43020030	But many other signs did Jeshu before his disciples : those are not written in this record ;
43020031	but these are written , that you may believe that Jeshu is the Meshicha , the Son of Aloha , and that when you have believed you may have in his name the life which is eternal .
43021001	AFTER these Jeshu again showed himself to his disciples at the sea of Tiberios ; and he showed ( himself ) thus .
43021002	There were together Shemun Kipha , and Thoma who was called the Twin , and Nathanael , he who was of Kotna of Galila , and the sons of Zabdai , and two other of the disciples .
43021003	Shemun Kipha saith to them , I go to net fishes . They say to him , We also go with thee . And they went forth and ascended into a vessel ; and through that night they netted nothing .
43021004	But when it was morning Jeshu stood on the sea shore ; but the disciples knew not that it was Jeshu .
43021005	And Jeshu said to them , Children , have you any thing to eat ? They say to him , No .
43021006	He saith to them , Cast your net on the right side of the vessel , and you shall find . And they cast ( it ) , and could not draw the net for the multitude of fishes which it held .
43021007	And that disciple whom Jeshu loved said to Kipha , This is our Lord . But Shemun , when he heard that it was our Lord , took his tunic , and threw it over his loins , for he was naked , and cast himself into the sea to come to Jeshu .
43021008	But the other disciples came in the vessel , for they were not far from the land , but as two hundred ameen , and they drew that net of fishes .
43021009	Then when they had ascended the land , they saw coals laid , and fish laid upon them , and bread .
43021010	And Jeshu said , Bring of the fish which you have now caught .
43021011	And Shemun Kipha went up , and drew the net to land full of great fishes , an hundred and fifty and three : yet for all this weight that net was not broken .
43021012	And Jeshu said to them , Come , dine . But one of the disciples did not dare to ask him , Who is he ? for they knew that it was our Lord .
43021013	And Jeshu drew near , and took bread , and fish , and gave to them .
43021014	This is the third time that Jeshu was seen by his disciples when he had risen from among the dead .
43021015	WHEN they had dined , Jeshu said to Shemun Kipha , Shemun bar Jona , lovest thou me more than these ? He saith to him , Yes , my Lord , thou knowest that I love thee . Jeshu saith to him , Feed my lambs .
43021016	He saith to him again the second time , Shemun bar Jona , lovest thou me ? He saith to him , Yes , my Lord , thou knowest that I love thee . Jeshu saith to him , Feed my sheep .
43021017	Jeshu saith to him again the third time , Shemun bar Jona , lovest thou me ? And it grieved Kipha that he said to him the third time , Lovest thou me ? And he said to him , My Lord , all things thou understandest , thou knowest that I love thee . Jeshu saith to him , Feed my sheep .
43021018	Amen , I say to thee , When thou wast young , thou didst gird thy loins and walk whithersoever thou willedst ; but when thou art old , thou shalt stretch forth thy hands , and another will bind thy loins , and conduct thee whither thou willest not .
43021019	But this he said , to show by what death he was to glorify Aloha . And when he had said these , he said to him , Come after me .
43021020	AND Shemun turned , and saw the disciple whom Jeshu loved following ; he , who leaned at the supper upon the bosom of Jeshu , and said , My Lord , who is he that betrayeth thee ?
43021021	This when Kipha saw , he said to Jeshu , My Lord , and this , what ?
43021022	Jeshu saith to him , If I will that this wait until I come , what ( is that ) to thee ? Come thou after me .
43021023	And that word went forth among the brethren , that that disciple dieth not . But Jeshu did not say , He dieth not , but , If I will that this ( man ) wait until I come , what ( is that ) to thee ?
43021024	This is the disciple who hath testified of all these , and hath also written them : and we know that the truth is his testimony .
43021025	There are also many other things which Jeshu hath done , those that if one by one they were written , not the world also itself , as I think , would suffice for the books that could be written .
44001001	THE former writing , O Theophilus , I wrote concerning all those ( things ) which our Lord Jeshu Meshiha began to do and to teach ,
44001002	until that day in which he was taken up , after that he had instructed those apostles whom he had chosen by the Holy Spirit :
44001003	to whom also he showed himself alive , after he had suffered , with many signs , for forty days , appearing to them , and discoursing on the kingdom of Aloha .
44001004	And when he had eaten bread with them , he directed them that from Urishlem they should not remove ; but await the promise of the Father , which , you have heard from me .
44001005	For Juhanon baptized with waters , but you shall be baptized with the Spirit of Holiness after days not many .
44001006	But they when assembled asked him , and said to him , Our Lord , at this time wilt thou restore the kingdom to Israel ?
44001007	He saith to them , This is not yours to know the time or the times which the Father hath reposed in his own authority :
44001008	but when the Spirit of Holiness hath come upon you , you shall receive power to be made unto me the witnesses , in Urishlem and in all Jehud , and also among the Shomroyee , and unto the confines of the earth .
44001009	And as these he said , while they beheld him , he was taken up , and the cloud received him , and he was covered from their eyes .
44001010	And while they looked to the heavens as he went , two men were found standing with them in white vestments ;
44001011	and they said to them , Men , Galiloyee , why stand you looking to the heavens ? this Jeshu who is taken up from you into the heavens will so come as you have seen him ascend into the heavens .
44001012	And afterward they returned to Urishlem from the mount which is called the place of Olives , which is over against Urishlem , and distant from her as seven stadias .
44001013	And after they had entered , they ascended to that upper room in which were Petros , and Juhanon , and Jakub , and Andros , and Philipos , and Thoma , and Mathai , and Bar Tolmai , and Jakub bar Halphai , and Shemun the Zealous , and Jihuda bar Jakub .
44001014	These altogether persevered in prayer with one soul , with the women , and with Mariam the mother of Jeshu , and with his brethren .
44001015	AND in those days arose Shemun Kipha in the midst of the disciples ; - now there was there an assembly of men as an hundred and twenty ; - and said ,
44001016	Men , brethren , it was right for that scripture to be fulfilled which the Spirit of Holiness had before spoken , by the mouth of David , concerning Jihuda , who was the leader of them who took Jeshu .
44001017	For he had numbered with us , and had part in this ministry .
44001018	This is he who obtained the field with the wages of sin , and fell upon his face on the ground , and was severed in his middle , and all his bowels were shed forth .
44001019	And this hath been known of all who dwell in Urishlem ; and so is called that field in the language of the country Hakel-damo , the interpretation of which is , A field of blood .
44001020	For it is written in the book of Psalms : Let his habitation be desert , And no inhabitant be therein , And his ministry let another take .
44001021	There needeth therefore one from these men who have been with us in all this time in which our Lord Jeshu hath come in and gone out among us ,
44001022	which went forth from the baptism of Juhanon until the day that he was taken up from ( being ) with us , to be with us a witness of his resurrection .
44001023	And they set up two : Jauseph , who is called Barshaba , who is surnamed Justus , and Mathia .
44001024	And praying , they said , Thou , Lord , ( who ) knowest the hearts of all , show the one whom thou choosest of these two ,
44001025	that he may receive the part in the ministry and the apostleship from which Jihuda separated , to go unto his place .
44001026	And they cast the lots , and it came up unto Mathia ; and he was numbered with the eleven apostles .
44002001	AND when the days of pentecost were fulfilled , while they were assembled all together ,
44002002	there was suddenly from heaven the voice as of a mighty wind , and all that house in which they were sitting was filled with it ;
44002003	and tongues that were divided like fire appeared to them , and sat upon each one of them .
44002004	And they were all filled with the Holy Spirit , and they began to speak in several tongues as the Spirit gave them to speak .
44002005	But there were men dwelling in Urishlem who feared Aloha ; Jihudoyee , from all the peoples who are under heaven .
44002006	And when that voice was made , the whole people assembled and were perturbed , because every man of them heard as they spoke in their ( several ) tongues .
44002007	( And ) they were all astonished , and wondered , saying one to another , These all who speak , behold , are they not Galiloyee ?
44002008	How hear we ( then ) each in his own tongue in which we were born ?
44002009	Parthoyee and Medoyee and Alanoyee , and they who dwell in the Place of Rivers , Jihudoyee and Kapadukoyee , and of the region of Pontos and of Asia ;
44002010	and from the land of Phrygia and of Pamphylia and of Metsreen , and the regions of Lybi neighbouring upon Kyrine , and those who come from Rumi , Jihudoyee , and Proselytes ,
44002011	and from Krete and Arabia , behold , we hear them speaking in our tongues the wonders of Aloha .
44002012	But all of them were amazed and admired , saying one to another , Of whom is this thing ?
44002013	But others mocked them , saying , These have drunk new wine , and are inebriate .
44002014	And afterwards arose Shemun Kipha with the eleven apostles , and lifted up his voice and said to them : Men , Jihudoyee , and all who dwell at Urishlem , be this known to you , and hearken to my words .
44002015	For not as you suppose are these drunken ; for , behold , until now are three hours .
44002016	But this is that spoken of by Joel the prophet :
44002017	It shall be in the last days , saith Aloha , I will pour my Spirit upon all flesh : And your sons and your daughters shall prophesy , And your youths shall see visions ,
44002018	And your elders shall dream dreams : And upon the servants and upon the handmaids Will I pour my Spirit in those days ; And they shall prophesy .
44002019	And I will give signs in heaven , And mighty ( deeds ) on earth ; Blood and fire and clouds of smoke :
44002020	The sun shall be turned into darkness , And the moon into blood , Before shall come the day of the Lord , great and fearful ;
44002021	And every one who shall call the name Of the Lord shall be saved .
44002022	MEN , sons of Israel , hear these words ; Jeshu Natsroya , the man who from Aloha appeared with you , with powers and mighty acts , which Aloha wrought among you by his hand , ( even ) as you know ,
44002023	This , who was separated thereunto by the foreknowledge and by the will of Aloha , you delivered into the hands of the wicked , and crucified and slew .
44002024	But Aloha raised him , and loosed the bands of Shiul , because it was not possible that he should be holden in Shiul .
44002025	For David said concerning him , I have foreseen my Lord at all time , Who is at my right hand that I should not be moved ;
44002026	Wherefore my heart is glad , And my glory rejoiceth : And also my body shall sojourn in hope ;
44002027	For thou wilt not leave my soul in Shiul , Nor give thy Saint to see corruption .
44002028	Thou wilt reveal to me the way of life , Thou wilt fill me with joy with thy presence .
44002029	Men , brethren , suffer me to speak openly with you concerning the chief-father David , that he is dead and also buried , and his sepulchre is with us till this day .
44002030	For he was a prophet , and knew that the oath Aloha had sworn to him , Of the fruit of thy loins I will cause to sit upon thy throne :
44002031	And he foresaw and spake concerning , the resurrection of the Meshiha , that He would not be left in Shiul , nor would his body see corruption .
44002032	This Jeshu hath Aloha raised , and we all are his witnesses .
44002033	And he it is who at the right hand of Aloha is exalted , and hath received of the Father the promise of the Holy Spirit , and hath shed forth this gift , which , behold , you see and you hear .
44002034	For David hath not ascended into heaven , because he himself hath said , The Lord said unto my Lord , Sit thou at my right hand
44002035	Until I place thine adversaries the stool of thy feet .
44002036	Assuredly , then , let all the house of Israel know , that Lord and Meshiha hath Aloha made this Jeshu , whom you crucified .
44002037	AND when they heard , they were pierced in their heart , and said to Shemun and to the rest of the apostles , What shall we do , brethren ?
44002038	Shemun saith to them , Repent , and be baptized , every man of you , in the name of the Lord Jeshu , for the remission of sins , and you shall receive the gift of the Holy Spirit .
44002039	For to you is the promise , and to your children , and to all them who are afar off , whom Aloha himself shall call .
44002040	And with many other words he testified to them and entreated of them , saying , Save ( yourselves ) from this perverse generation .
44002041	And some of them eagerly received his word and believed and were baptized , and there were added in that day as three thousand souls .
44002042	And they were faithful in the doctrine of the apostles , and participated in prayer and in the breaking of the eucharist .
44002043	And solemnity was on every soul ; and many signs and mighty acts were done by the hand of the apostles in Urishlem .
44002044	And all those who believed were together , and every thing they had was in common .
44002045	And they who had property sold it , and divided to each according to that which he needed .
44002046	And every day they continued in the temple with one soul , and in the house they brake the bread , and took their food rejoicing and in the cleanness of their hearts ,
44002047	praising Aloha , ( and ) given ( to be ) in favour before all the people . And our Lord added daily them who were saved into the church .
44003001	AND it was that as Shemun Kipha and Juhanon ascended together to the temple at the time of prayer , which is the ninth hour ,
44003002	behold a certain man lame from the womb of his mother , ( whom ) they carried , who were used to bring and set at the gate of the temple which is called the Beautiful , to beg alms of those who entered into the temple .
44003003	He , when he saw Shemun and Juhanon entering the temple , prayed of them to give him alms .
44003004	And Shemun and Juhanon beheld him , and said to him , Regard us .
44003005	But he regarded them , expecting to receive from them somewhat .
44003006	Shemun saith to him , Gold and silver I have not , but what I have I give thee : In the name of our Lord Jeshu Meshiha Natsroya , rise and walk .
44003007	And he took him by his right hand and raised him : and instantly his feet strengthened and his heels .
44003008	And he leaped and arose and walked , and entered with them into the temple , walking , and leaping , and glorifying Aloha .
44003009	And all the people saw him walking and glorifying Aloha .
44003010	And they knew that it was he , the beggar , who had sat daily and asked alms at the gate which is called the Beautiful . And they were filled with wonder and astonishment at what had been done .
44003011	AND as he held Shemun and Juhanon , all the people ran wondering unto them to the portico which is called Of Shelemun .
44003012	And when Shemun saw , he answered and said to them , Men , sons of Israel , why wonder you at this ? or why gaze you at us , as by power of ours , or by our ( own ) authority , we had done this , that this ( man ) should walk ?
44003013	The God of Abraham , and of Ishok , and of Jakub , the God of our fathers , hath glorified his son Jeshu , him whom you delivered up , and denied before the face of Pilatos , when he had justified ( him ) and would have released him ;
44003014	but you the Holy and the Just denied , and demanded for you the man the murderer to be given to you .
44003015	And Him the Prince of life you killed , whom Aloha hath raised from among the dead ; and we all are his witnesses .
44003016	And by faith in his name , this , whom you see and know , he hath strengthened and healed ; and faith which is in him hath given to him this soundness before you all .
44003017	Now , however , my brethren , I know that through delusion you did this , as also did your princes ;
44003018	and Aloha , according to that which he had before proclaimed by the mouth of all the prophets , that his Meshiha should suffer , hath fulfilled this .
44003019	Repent therefore , and be converted , that your sins may be blotted out , and that the times of repose may come to you from before the presence of the Lord ;
44003020	and he may send to you Him whom he hath ordained for you , Jeshu Meshiha ,
44003021	whom the heavens must receive until the completion of the times of all those which Aloha hath spoken by the mouth of his holy prophets , who ( have been ) from of old .
44003022	For Musha hath said , A prophet shall the Lord raise up unto you from your brethren , like to me ; him hear in all ( things ) which he shall speak with you .
44003023	And it shall be that every soul who will not hear that prophet , perish shall that soul from his people .
44003024	And the prophets , all of them from Shamuel and they who were after him , spake and proclaimed concerning these days .
44003025	You are the sons of the prophets ; and the covenant which Aloha set with our fathers , saying unto Abraham , In thy seed shall be blessed all the generations of the earth ,
44003026	with you from the first he hath established ; and Aloha hath sent his Son , blessing you , if you will return and repent of your iniquities .
44004001	AND while they spake these words to the people , the priests , and Zadukoyee , and the governors of the temple , arose against them ,
44004002	being angered against them because they taught the people , and preached through the Meshiha the resurrection from the dead .
44004003	And they laid upon them hands , and kept them unto the day after , because the evening had drawn nigh .
44004004	And many who heard the word believed ; and they were in number as five thousand men .
44004005	And the day after , the rulers , and elders , and sophree , assembled ,
44004006	and also Hanan chief of the priests , and Kaiapha , and Juhanon , and Alexandros , and they who were of the race of the chief priests .
44004007	And when they had made them stand in the midst , they questioned them , By what power , or in what name , have you done this ?
44004008	Then Shemun Kipha was filled with the Spirit of Holiness , and said to them , Rulers of the people , and elders of the house of Israel ,
44004009	hear : If we this day are judged of you concerning the good which has been done to the infirm man , insomuch that he is cured ;
44004010	be this known to you , and to all the people of Israel , that in the name of Jeshu Meshiha Natsroya , whom you crucified , whom Aloha hath raised from among the dead , through this Himself , behold , this ( man ) standeth before you well .
44004011	This is the stone which you builders rejected , and he is become the head of the corner .
44004012	And in no other one is redemption : for there is no other name under heaven given to mankind , by which we must be saved .
44004013	And when they heard the words of Shemun and of Juhanon , which they had confidently spoken , they perceived that they knew not literature and were common-men , and wondered at them ; and they recognised them , that with Jeshu they had been conversant .
44004014	And they saw that the lame man who had been healed was standing with them , and they could not say any thing against them .
44004015	Then they commanded that they should lead them from their assembly , and said one to another ,
44004016	What shall we do with these men ? For , behold , a conspicuous sign which hath been done by their hands to all the inhabitants of Urishlem is known , and we cannot deny .
44004017	But that this report may not go forth more , we will threaten them that again they shall not speak in This Name to any man .
44004018	And they called them , and commanded them that not at all they should speak and teach in the name of Jeshu .
44004019	SHEMUN KIPHA and Juhanon answered and said to them , If it be right before Aloha that you we obey rather than Aloha , judge you .
44004020	For what we have seen and heard we cannot but speak .
44004021	And they threatened them , and dismissed them ; for they could not find cause to lay upon their head , because of the people ; for every one glorified Aloha for that which had been done .
44004022	For a son of more than forty years was that man in whom had been wrought this sign of healing .
44004023	And when they were dismissed they came to their brethren , and made known to them whatever the priests and elders had said .
44004024	And they , when they had heard , with one accord lifted up their voice unto Aloha , and said , Lord , thou art God who hast made heaven and earth and the seas , and all that is in them :
44004025	And thou art he who hast spoken by the Spirit of Holiness in the mouth of David thy servant : Why rage the Heathen , And the peoples imagine vanity ?
44004026	The kings and powers of the earth arise And counsel together against the Lord , And against his Meshiha .
44004027	For verily they are assembled in this city against thy holy Son Jeshu , whom thou hast anointed , - Herodes and Pilatos with the Gentiles and the synagogue of Israel ,
44004028	to work whatsoever thy hand and thy will have signified before should be done .
44004029	And now also , Lord , behold and see their threatenings , and give unto thy servants with boldness to preach thy word ,
44004030	while thy hand thou outstretchest unto healings and mighty works which they shall do in the name of thy holy Son Jeshu .
44004031	And as they prayed and supplicated , the place in which they were assembled was moved , and they were all filled with the Spirit of Holiness , and they spake with openness the word of Aloha .
44004032	BUT to the assembly of the men who believed there was one soul and one mind ; and no man of them said of the goods which he possessed that they were his own , but all whatever they had was in common .
44004033	And with great power did those apostles testify concerning the resurrection of Jeshu Meshiha , and great grace was with all of them .
44004034	And no man of them had want ; for they who possessed fields and houses sold , and brought the prices of whatever was sold
44004035	and laid at the feet of the apostles , and there was given to each according to that which was needed .
44004036	But Jauseph , who was entitled Bar Naba by the apostles , which is interpreted , A son of consolation , a Levoya from the Isle of Kypros ,
44004037	had a field , and he sold it , and brought its price and laid before the feet of the apostles .
44005001	AND a certain man whose name was Hanania , with his wife whose name was Shaphira , sold a field ,
44005002	and took from its value and concealed , while his wife consented , and brought of it silver and laid before the feet of the apostles .
44005003	And Shemun said to him , Hanania , how hath Satana thus filled thine heart that thou shouldest lie to the Spirit of Holiness , and conceal from the silver of the price of the field ?
44005004	Was it not thine own until it should be sold ? and when it was sold thou hadst yet power over the price of it . Why hast thou laid up in thy heart to do this thing ? Thou hast not lied unto men , but unto Aloha !
44005005	And when Hanania heard these words he fell and died . And there was great fear upon all those who heard .
44005006	And they who were young men among them arose and composed him , carried him forth and buried him .
44005007	And after there had been three hours , his wife also entered , not knowing what had been done .
44005008	Shemun said to her , Tell me if for these prices you sold the field ? But she said , Yes : for these prices .
44005009	Shemun said to her , Why have you agreed to tempt the Spirit of the Lord ? Lo , the feet of the buriers of thy husband are at the door , and they will carry thee out !
44005010	And at once she fell before their feet and died . And those young men entered and found her dead , and they laid her out , and brought her forth and buried her by the side of her husband .
44005011	And there was great fear upon all the church and in all them who heard .
44005012	AND by the hand of the apostles were done great signs and mighty works among the people : and all gathered together at the portico of Shelemun .
44005013	And from the others not a man dared to come near them ; but the people magnified them .
44005014	And the more were they who believed added to the Lord , an assemblage of men and of women ;
44005015	so that into the streets they brought forth the diseased lying on beds , that , when Shemun should come , even his shadow might overshadow them .
44005016	But there came many to them from the other cities round about Urishlem , bringing the diseased and those who had unclean spirits : and they were healed , all of them .
44005017	And the chief of the priests , and they who were with him , who were of the doctrine of the Zadukoyee , were filled with envy ,
44005018	and they laid hands on the apostles , and apprehended and bound them in the house of the bound .
44005019	Then in the night the angel of the Lord opened the gate of the house of the bound , and brought them forth , and said to them ,
44005020	Go stand in the temple and speak to the people all these words of salvation .
44005021	And they went forth in the time of morning , and entered the temple , and taught . But the chief of the priests and they who were with him arose ( and ) convoked their associates and the elders of Israel , and sent to the house of the bound to bring the apostles .
44005022	And when they who were sent from them went , they found them not ( in ) the house of the bound ; and they returned , and came ,
44005023	and said , We found the house of the bound shut carefully , and the keepers standing at the gates : and we opened , but no man found we there .
44005024	And when the chief priests and rulers of the temple heard these words , they were astounded by them , and reasoned , what this was .
44005025	And one came and declared to them , Those men whom you shut up in the house of the bound , behold , they are standing in the temple and teaching the people .
44005026	Then went the rulers with the satellites to bring them , not with violence , for they feared lest the people should stone them ;
44005027	and when they had brought them they made them stand before all the assembly , and the chief of the priests began to say to them ,
44005028	Did we not commanding command you , that you should teach no man in this name ? But , behold , you have filled Urishlem with your doctrine , and you will to bring upon us the blood of this man !
44005029	SHEMUN answered with the apostles and said to them , Aloha must we obey rather than men .
44005030	The God of our fathers hath raised up Jeshu whom you killed and hanged on the tree .
44005031	Him hath Aloha constituted a Prince and a Saviour , and elevated him at his right hand , to give repentance and remission of sins unto Israel .
44005032	And we are witnesses of these words , and the Spirit of Holiness himself , whom Aloha hath given to them who believe in him .
44005033	And when they heard these words they were transported with rage , and were mindful to kill them .
44005034	And one of the Pharishee arose , whose name was Gamaliel , a doctor of the law , and honoured by all the people , and commanded to take the apostles without a little time .
44005035	And he said to them , Men , sons of Israel , beware of yourselves , and consider what it behoves you to do concerning these men .
44005036	For before this time arose Thuda , and said of himself that he was something great , and there went after him four hundred men : and he was slain , and they who went after him were scattered and became as nothing .
44005037	Afterward arose Jihuda Galiloya in the days when men were enregistered for the head-silver , and tempted much people after him ; and he died , and all they who went after him were scattered .
44005038	And now I say to you , keep aloof from these men , and dismiss them ; for if from men be this imagination and this work , it will be dissolved and end ;
44005039	but if it be from Aloha , there is no power in your hands to bring it to an end : lest you should be found to have arisen against Aloha .
44005040	And they were persuaded by him , and called the apostles , and scourged them , and commanded them that they should not teach in the name of Jeshu , and loosed them .
44005041	And they went out from before them , rejoicing to be worthy for the sake of the Name to be ill treated .
44005042	And they ceased not daily to teach in the temple , and in the house , and to preach concerning our Lord Jeshu Meshiha .
44006001	AND in those days the disciples being many , the Javnoyee disciples murmured against the Ebroyee because their widows were slighted in the daily ministration .
44006002	And the twelve apostles called all the assembly of the disciples and said to them , It is not fit that we should leave the word of Aloha , and serve tables .
44006003	Look out therefore , brethren , and choose seven men from you who have testimony concerning them , and are full of the Spirit of the Lord and wisdom , and we will appoint them over this matter .
44006004	And we will be constant in prayer , and in the ministration of the word .
44006005	And this saying was pleasing before all the people ; and they chose Estephanos , a man who was full of faith and the Spirit of Holiness ; and Philipos , and Prokoros , and Nicanor , and Timon , and Parmena , and Nikolos , a proselyte of Antiokia .
44006006	And these they set before the apostles : and while praying they laid upon them the hand .
44006007	And the word of Aloha increased , and the number of the disciples increased in Urishlem greatly : and much people of the Jihudoyee were obedient to the faith .
44006008	But Estephanos was filled with grace and power , and wrought signs and miracles among the people .
44006009	And men arose from the congregation which was called Libertinu , Kyrainoyee , and Aleksandroyee , and from Cilicia , and from Asia , and disputed with Estephanos ,
44006010	and were not able to stand against the wisdom and the spirit which spake in him .
44006011	Then they sent men and instructed them to say , We have heard him speak words of blasphemy against Musha and against Aloha .
44006012	And they stirred up the people and the elders and the sophree , and came and rose upon him , and carried him away and brought him into the midst of the assembly .
44006013	AND witnesses of falsehood arose , and said , This man ceases not from speaking words contrary to the law and against this holy place .
44006014	For we have heard him say that this Jeshu Natsroya shall destroy this place , and shall change the customs which Musha delivered unto us .
44006015	And all they who sat in the assembly looked upon him , and saw his face as the face of an angel .
44007001	And the chief of the priests demanded if these ( things ) were so ?
44007002	But he said , Men , brethren , and fathers , hear ! The God of glory appeared to our father Abraham while he was between the rivers , he had not yet come to dwell in Charan ,
44007003	and said to him , Go forth from thy country and from ( being ) with the sons of thy family , and come to the land that I will show thee .
44007004	Then went forth Abraham from the land of the Kaldoyee , and came and dwelt in Charan : and from thence , his father being dead , Aloha caused him to pass into this land in which you dwell to-day .
44007005	And ( yet ) he gave him no inheritance in it , nor a place of the feet , but he promised to give it to him for an heritage to himself and to his seed , while as yet he had not a son .
44007006	And Aloha spake with him , telling him that his seed should be a sojourner in a strange land , and that they would enslave and ill-treat them four hundred years .
44007007	And the nation whom they will serve ( in ) bondage will I judge , saith Aloha : and afterward they shall come forth and serve me in this place .
44007008	And he gave to him the covenant of circumcision . And then begat he Ishok , and circumcised him on the eighth day , and Ishok begat Jakub , and Jakub begat our twelve fathers .
44007009	And these our fathers were incited against Jauseph , and sold him into Mitsreen . And Aloha was with him :
44007010	and he delivered him from all his afflictions , and gave him grace and wisdom before Pherun king of Mitsreen , and he appointed him prince over Mitsreen , and over all his house .
44007011	AND there was a famine and great affliction in all Mitsreen , and in the land of Kenaan , and our fathers had nothing to satisfy them .
44007012	And when Jakub heard that there was corn in Mitsreen , he sent forth our fathers before .
44007013	And when they had gone the second time , Jauseph made himself known to his brethren , and the family of Jauseph were made known unto Pherun .
44007014	And Jauseph sent and brought his father Jakub and all his family , and they were in number seventy and five souls .
44007015	And Jakub went down into Mitsreen and died there ; he and our fathers .
44007016	And he was removed to Shechem , and laid in the sepulchre that Abraham bought with silver from the B'nai Chamur .
44007017	And when was come the time of that which Aloha promised with an oath unto Abraham , the people had multiplied and increased in Mitsreen
44007018	until another king had arisen over Mitsreen , who knew not Jauseph ,
44007019	and he dealt fraudulently against our kindred , and shamefully entreated our fathers , and commanded that their children should be cast away , that they might not live .
44007020	In that time Musha was born , and was beloved of Aloha , and was brought up three months in the house of his father .
44007021	And when he was outcast from his people , the daughter of Pherun found him , and brought him up unto her for a son .
44007022	And Musha was instructed in all the wisdom of the Mitsroyee , and was excellent in words ( and ) also in deeds .
44007023	And when he became a son of forty years , it arose upon his heart to visit his brethren the sons of Israel .
44007024	And he saw one of the sons of his tribe treated with violence , and he avenged him , and did him justice , and he killed the Mitsroya who had offended him and
44007025	hoped that his brethren , the sons of Israel , would understand that Aloha by his hand would give them deliverance ; but they understood not .
44007026	And the day after he appeared to them while they strove one with another : and he persuaded them to be pacified , saying , Men , you are brethren ; why offend you one the other ?
44007027	But he who had offended his neighbour removed himself from him , and said to him , Who appointed thee over us a prince and a judge ?
44007028	Seekest thou to kill me as thou killedst the Mitsroya yesterday ?
44007029	And Musha fled at that word , and became a sojourner in the land of Median , and there were to him two sons .
44007030	AND when forty years were there fulfilled to him , there appeared to him in the desert of Mount Sinai the angel of the Lord in a flame that burned in a bush .
44007031	And while Musha looked , he wondered at the sight . And as he drew near to gaze , the Lord spake to him with the voice :
44007032	I am the God of thy fathers , the God of Abraham and of Ishok and of Jakub . And Musha , trembling , dared not look upon the sight .
44007033	And the Lord said to him , Loose thy sandals from thy feet : for the ground on which thou standest is holy .
44007034	Seeing I have seen the affliction of my people who in Mitsreen , and his groaning I have heard , and I have descended that I may deliver them . And now come , I will send thee into Mitsreen .
44007035	This Musha whom they denied , when they said , Who appointed thee over us a prince and a judge ? this , sent Aloha unto them a prince and a deliverer by the hand of the angel who appeared to him at the bush .
44007036	This brought them out , when he had wrought signs and wonders and mighty deeds in the land of Mitsreen , and at the Sea of Suph , and in the desert forty years .
44007037	THIS is that Musha , who said to the sons of Israel , A Prophet will Aloha the Lord raise up unto you from your brethren , like me ; him shall you hear .
44007038	This is he who was with the congregation in the desert , with the angel himself who spake with him and with our fathers at the mountain of Sinai ; and he it was who received the words of life to give ( them ) to us .
44007039	And our fathers willed not to give heed to him , but left him , and in their hearts turned back to Mitsreen ,
44007040	saying to Aharun , Make us alohee that may go before us , because this Musha , who brought us forth from the land of Mitsreen , we know not what is become of him .
44007041	And he made them the calf in those days , and they sacrificed sacrifices to idols , and were delighted with the work of their hands .
44007042	And Aloha turned , and delivered them up to be worshippers of the hosts of heaven ; as it is written in the book of the prophets , Forty years in the desert Victims or sacrifices did you offer to me , Sons of Israel ?
44007043	But you took up the tabernacle of Malkum , And the star of the god of Raphan , Images you have made to worship them ; I will remove you beyond Babel .
44007044	BEHOLD , the tabernacle of testimony of our fathers was in the desert , as He who spake with Musha had commanded to make it after the pattern which he had seen .
44007045	And this tabernacle also our fathers bringing brought in with Jeshu to the land which Aloha had given to them , an inheritance from those peoples whom he had expelled from before them , and it was carried until the days of David ;
44007046	who found favour before Aloha , and asked to find a tabernacle for the God of Jakub .
44007047	But Shelemun builded the house .
44007048	But the Most High dwelleth not in the work of hands , as saith the prophet ,
44007049	Heaven is my throne , And earth the footstool beneath my feet : What house will you build me ? saith the Lord : Or what is the place of my rest ?
44007050	Hath not my hand made all these ?
44007051	O , hardened of neck and uncircumcised in your hearts and in your hearing , you at all times against the Spirit of Holiness stand up ; as your fathers , so you also .
44007052	For which of the prophets have not your fathers persecuted and slain ? they who before announced the coming of the Righteous ; him whom you delivered up and slew .
44007053	And you have received the law by the precept of angels . and have not kept it .
44007054	AND when they heard these they were filled with wrath in themselves , and they gnashed their teeth upon him .
44007055	And he , being full of faith and of the Spirit of Holiness , looked up to heaven , and saw the glory of Aloha , and Jeshu standing at the right hand of Aloha .
44007056	And he said , Behold , I see the heavens opened , and the Son of man standing at the right hand of Aloha .
44007057	And they cried with a high voice , and stopped their ears , and rushed upon him , all of them ,
44007058	and seizing they brought him out of the city and stoned him . And they who witnessed against him laid their garments before the feet of a certain young man named Shaol .
44007059	And they stoned Estephanos , ( he ) praying and saying , Our Lord Jeshu , receive my spirit .
44007060	And kneeling down , he cried with a high voice , and said , Our Lord , let not this sin arise against them . And when this he had said , he slept .
44008001	But Shaol willed to take part in his killing . And there was made in those days a great persecution against the church that was in Urishlem ; and they were all dispersed in the country of Jihud and also among the Shomroyee , excepting only the apostles .
44008002	And faithful men laid Estephanos in his tomb , and mourned over him greatly .
44008003	BUT Shaol persecuted the church of Aloha , going to the houses , and drawing men and women delivered them to the house of the bound .
44008004	And they who were dispersed went about and preached the word of Aloha .
44008005	But Philipos descended to a city of the Shomroyee , and preached concerning the Meshiha .
44008006	And when they heard his word , the men who were there attended to him , and were persuaded of all that he said : for they saw the signs that he wrought .
44008007	For many whom unclean spirits possessed cried with a high voice , and they came out from them ; and others , palsied and lame , were healed :
44008008	and great joy was in that city .
44008009	But a certain man was there whose name was Simon , who had dwelt in that city much time , and with his sorceries had deceived the people of the Shomroyee , magnifying himself , and saying , I am the Great .
44008010	And all inclined to him , great and small , and said , This is the great Power of Aloha .
44008011	And they were persuaded by him , because that much time by his sorceries he had astonished them .
44008012	But when they believed Philipos , who evangelized the kingdom of Aloha in the name of our Lord Jeshu Meshiha , they were baptized , men and women .
44008013	And Simon also himself believed , and was baptized , and adhered to Philipos . And when he saw the signs and great works which were done by his hands , he wondered and was astonished .
44008014	AND when the apostles who were at Urishlem heard that the people of the Shomroyee had received the word of Aloha , they sent to them Kipha and Juhanon .
44008015	And they went down and prayed for them , that they might receive the Spirit of Holiness :
44008016	for he was not upon one of them yet ; but they were only baptized in the name of our Lord Jeshu .
44008017	Then they laid upon them the hand , and they received the Spirit of Holiness .
44008018	And when Simon saw that by the hand-laying of the apostles the Spirit of Holiness was given , he offered to them silver ,
44008019	saying , Give also to me this power , that he on whom I shall lay the hand may receive the Spirit of Holiness .
44008020	Shemun Kipha said to him , Thy silver go with thee into perdition , because thou thoughtest that the gift of Aloha with the possessions of the world might he obtained .
44008021	Thou hast neither part nor lot in this faith , because thine heart hath not been right before Aloha .
44008022	Nevertheless , repent of this thy wickedness , and pray of Aloha , that the guile of thy heart may haply be forgiven thee ;
44008023	for in bitter gall and in the bonds of iniquity I see that thou art .
44008024	Simon answered and said , Pray you on my behalf , of Aloha , that not any of these things which you have spoken may come upon me .
44008025	But Shemun and Juhanon , when they had testified and taught the word of Aloha , returned to Urishlem , and evangelized in many villages of the Shomroyee .
44008026	AND the angel of the Lord spake with Philipos , and said to him , Arise , go to the south , in the desert way which goeth down from Urishlem to Gaza .
44008027	And arising he went . And there met him a certain eunuch who had come from Cush , an officer of Kandak , queen of the Cushoyee ; and he was officer over all her treasure . And he had been to worship at Urishlem ;
44008028	and while returning that he might go , he sat in the chariot and read in Eshaia the prophet .
44008029	And the Spirit of Holiness said to Philipos , Approach , and join the chariot .
44008030	And being near , he heard that he read in Eshaia the prophet ; and he said to him , Understandest thou what thou readest ?
44008031	And he said , How can I understand , unless one teach me ? And he prayed of him , of Philipos , to ascend and sit with him .
44008032	But the section ( phosuka ) of the scripture in which he was reading is this : As a lamb to the slaughter was he led ; And as a sheep before the shearer is silent , So opened not he his mouth in his humiliation .
44008033	From oppression and from judgment was he led ; And his age who shall recount ? For his life is taken from the earth .
44008034	That eunuch said Unto Philipos , I pray thee , of whom speaketh this the prophet ? of himself , or of another man ?
44008035	Then Philipos opened his mouth and began , from that very scripture , preaching to him concerning our Lord Jeshu .
44008036	And as they went in the way they came to a certain place which had water in it , and that eunuch said , Behold the water ; what is the hinderance that I should be baptized ?
44008038	And he commanded that the chariot should stand ; and they descended both of them to the water , and Philipos baptized that eunuch .
44008039	And when they had ascended from the water , the Spirit of the Lord rapt away Philipos , and the eunuch again saw him not ; but he went on his way rejoicing .
44008040	But Philipos was found at Azotos , and from thence he itinerated and evangelized in all the cities until he came to Cesarea .
44009001	BUT Shaol was yet full of threatenings and murderous wrath against the disciples of our Lord .
44009002	And he demanded letters from the chief priests which he should give at Darmsuk to the synagogues , that if he found ( any ) who walked in this way , men or women , he might bind and bring them to Urishlem .
44009003	And as he went and began to come nigh to Darmsuk , suddenly there shone forth upon him a light from heaven ;
44009004	and he fell upon the earth , and heard a voice which said to him , Shaol , Shaol , why persecutest thou me ? It is hard to thee to kick against the pricks .
44009005	He answered and said , Who art thou , my Lord ? And our Lord said , I am Jeshu Natsroya , whom thou persecutest ;
44009006	but arise , go into Darmsuk , and there it will be spoken with thee concerning what thou must do .
44009007	And the men who went with him in the way stood astonished , because the voice alone they heard , but a man was not seen by them .
44009008	And Shaol arose from the earth , and could not see any thing when his eyes were opened . And they took him by his hand and brought him into Darmsuk ;
44009009	and he saw not for three days , neither did he eat or drink .
44009010	But there was in Darmsuk a certain disciple whose name was Hanania . And the Lord said to him in a vision , Hanania . And he said , Behold me , my Lord .
44009011	And our Lord said to him , Arise , go to the street which is called the Straight , and inquire in the house of Jihuda for Shaol , who is from Tarsos the city . For , behold , while praying ,
44009012	he hath seen in a vision a man whose name is Hanania , who entered and laid upon him the hand that his eyes might be opened .
44009013	And Hanania said , My Lord , I have heard from many concerning this man , of how much evil he hath brought upon thy saints in Urishlem .
44009014	And behold , here also he hath authority from the chief priests to bind all those who invoke thy name .
44009015	And the Lord said to him , Arise , go ; for a vessel is he to me , chosen to bear my name to the nations , and to kings , and to the house of the sons of Israel .
44009016	For I will show him what he is to suffer on account of my name .
44009017	Then Hanania went to the house unto him , and he laid upon him the hand , and said to him , Shaol , my brother , our Lord Jeshu hath sent me ; He who appeared to thee in the way while thou wast coming , that thine eyes may be opened , and thou mayest be filled with the Spirit of Holiness .
44009018	And instantly there fell from his eyes something which was like to scales ; and his eyes were opened , and , arising , he was baptized .
44009019	And he took food and was strengthened ,
44009020	and was ( certain ) days with those disciples who were in Darmsuk . And at once he preached in the synagogues of the Jihudoyee concerning Jeshu , that he is the Son of Aloha .
44009021	And all they who heard him wondered , and they said , Is not this he who persecuted all those who call upon this name in Urishlem ? And behold , also , hither upon the self-same ( object ) was he sent to bind and take them to the chief priests .
44009022	BUT Shaol was the more strengthened , and moved those Jihudoyee who dwelt at Darmsuk , while he showed that this is the Meshiha .
44009023	And when days were many to him there , the Jihudoyee wrought treachery against him to kill him .
44009024	But their treachery was showed to Shaol , which they sought to do to him ; and that they kept the gates of the city day and night to kill him .
44009025	Then the disciples set him in a pannier , and dismissed him from the wall by night .
44009026	And he went to Urishlem , and willed to be attached to the disciples . And all of them were afraid of him , and believed not that he was a disciple .
44009027	But Bar Naba took him and brought him to the apostles , and recounted to them how in the way he had seen the Lord , and what he had spoken with him ; and how in Darmsuk with boldness he had spoken in the name of Jeshu .
44009028	And he went in with them and went out in Urishlem . And he spake in the name of Jeshu with boldness ,
44009029	and disputed with those Jihudoyee who knew Greek ; but they were wishful to kill him .
44009030	And when the brethren knew , they brought him by night to Cesarea , and from thence sent him to Tarsos .
44009031	Nevertheless , in the church which was in Jihud , and in Galila , and Shomreen , there was peace , while ( it ) was edified ; and going forward in the fear of Aloha , and in the consolation of the Spirit of Holiness , was multiplied .
44009032	And it was that while Shemun itinerated among the cities , he went down also to the saints who dwelt in Lud the city .
44009033	And he found a certain man whose name was Ania , who had lain upon a bed paralyzed eight years .
44009034	And Shemun said to him , Ania , Jeshu Meshiha healeth thee ; arise , and make thy bed . And instantly he arose .
44009035	And all who dwelt in Lud and in Sarona saw him , and turned to Aloha .
44009036	BUT there was a certain disciple in Joppa the city , whose name was Tabitha . This was rich in good works and in alms which she had done .
44009037	But she became afflicted in those days , and died . And they washed her and laid her in an upper room .
44009038	And the disciples heard that Shemun was in Lud the city , because it is over against Joppa , and they sent to him two men , who should pray of him not to delay to come among them .
44009039	And Shemun arose and went with them . And when he was come , they brought him up to the upper room , and assembled ( and ) stood around him all the widows , weeping , and showing him those vestments and mantles which Tabitha had given them , while living .
44009040	But Shemun put forth all the men without , and fell upon his knees and prayed ; and he turned towards the corpse and said Tabitha , arise . And she opened her eyes ;
44009041	and when she beheld Shemun , she sat . And he reached his hand and raised her , and called the saints and widows , and gave her to them living .
44009042	And this was known to all the city , and many believed in our Lord .
44009043	And he was in Joppa days not a few , sojourning in the house of Shemun the tanner .
44010001	BUT in Cesarea was a certain man , a centurion , whose name was Cornelius , of the cohort which was called the Italic .
44010002	And he was just , and feared Aloha , he and all his house : he did much alms among the people , and in all time prayed of Aloha .
44010003	This saw an angel of Aloha in a vision manifestly about the ninth hour of the day , who came in to him , and said to him , Cornelius !
44010004	And he beheld him , and feared , and said , What , my Lord ? And the angel said to him , Thy prayers and thy alms have ascended for a memorial before Aloha .
44010005	And now send men to Joppa the city , and bring Shemun who is called Kipha :
44010006	behold , he sojourneth in the house of Shemun the tanner , which is hard by the sea .
44010007	And when the angel who had spoken with him had gone , he called two from the sons of his house , and a certain soldier who feared Aloha ( and ) who was obedient to him ;
44010008	and he made known to them every thing he had seen , and sent them to Joppa .
44010009	AND the day after while they went on the way , and drew nigh to the city , Shemun ascended to the roof to pray , at the sixth hour .
44010010	And he hungered , and desired to eat : and while they were preparing for him , there fell upon him an entrancement ,
44010011	and he saw the heavens opened , and a certain vessel bound at the four corners , and like to a great sheet , and it was let down from heaven upon the earth :
44010012	and in it were all animals of four feet , and reptiles of the earth , and fowls of the heaven .
44010013	And a voice came to him , which said , Shemun , arise , slay , and eat .
44010014	And Shemun said , Not so , my Lord : for never have I eaten any thing that is profane and unclean .
44010015	And again the second time was to him , Those ( things ) which Aloha cleanseth make not thou profane .
44010016	This was three times done : and the vessel was elevated to heaven .
44010017	And while Shemun wondered in himself for what ( was ) the vision he had seen , those men came who had been sent by Cornelius , and inquired for the house where Shemun sojourned , and they came and stood at the gate of the court .
44010018	And they called there , and inquired , whether Shemun who was called Kipha there sojourned .
44010019	And while Shemun thought on the vision , the Spirit said to him , Behold , three men seek thee :
44010020	arise , descend and go with them , not being divided in thy mind : for I have sent them .
44010021	Then Shemun descended to those men , and said to them , I am he whom you seek : what is the occasion on which you have come ?
44010022	They said to him , A certain man whose name is Cornelius , a centurion , who feareth Aloha , and of whom all the people of the Jihudoyee give witness , hath been told in a vision by an holy angel to send and bring thee to his house , and to hear words from thee .
44010023	And Shemun brought them in , and received them while they tarried ; and he arose the day after , and went forth , and proceeded with them ; and certain of the brethren of Joppa went with them .
44010024	And the next day they entered Cesarea : but Cornelius was waiting for them , while all the sons of his family , and the friends and beloved ones whom he had , were assembled with him .
44010025	AND when Shemun entered Cornelius met him , and fell and worshipped at his feet .
44010026	And Shemun raised him , and said to him , Arise , I also am a man .
44010027	And while speaking with him he entered , and found many who had come thither .
44010028	And he said to them , You know that it is not lawful for a man a Jihudoya to attach to a foreign man who is not a son of his tribe . But me hath Aloha showed that I should not declare any man unclean or profane .
44010029	Wherefore I the more diligently came when you sent for me . But I ask you , on what account you have sent for me ?
44010030	And Cornelius said to him , Four days are unto this from when , behold , I am fasting ; and at nine hours , while praying in my house , a certain man stood before me clothed in white .
44010031	And he said to me , Cornelius , thy prayer is heard , and thy alms have made memorial before Aloha .
44010032	But send to Joppa the city , and bring Shemun who is called Kipha ; behold , he abideth in the house of Shemun a tanner , which is by the sea ;
44010033	and he will come and speak with thee . And immediately I sent to thee , and thou hast well done to have come . And , behold , we are all before thee , and desire to hear every thing that hath been commanded thee by Aloha .
44010034	BUT Shemun opened his mouth , and said , In truth I comprehend that Aloha is no respecter of persons :
44010035	but in all nations whoever feareth him and worketh righteousness is accepted of him .
44010036	For ( this is ) the word which he hath sent to the sons of Israel , and hath announced to them peace and repose through Jeshu Meshiha , - this is the Lord of all .
44010037	And you also know by the word which hath been in all Jihud ( which began ) from Galila after the baptism which Juhanon preached ,
44010038	concerning Jeshu who was of Natsrath , whom Aloha anointed with the Spirit of Holiness and with power : he who went about and healed those who were worn out with evil , because Aloha was with him .
44010039	And we are his witnesses of all which he did in the land of Jihud and of Urishlem . This ( one ) himself did the Jihudoyee hang upon the tree and kill ;
44010040	and him did Aloha raise up on the third day , and gave him to be seen openly ;
44010041	yet not to all the people , but to us who by Aloha were chosen to be unto him the witnesses , who ate with him and drank after his resurrection from among the dead .
44010042	And he commanded us to preach and to testify to the people that this is he who hath been separated by Aloha ( to be ) the Judge of the living and of the dead .
44010043	And of him all the prophets testify , that whoever believeth in his name shall receive remission of sins .
44010044	And while Shemun spake these words the Spirit of Holiness overspread all who heard the word .
44010045	And the circumcised brethren who had come with him were astonished and amazed , because upon the Gentiles also the gift of the Spirit of Holiness was poured out .
44010046	For they heard them speaking with tongues ; and they magnified Aloha . And Shemun said ,
44010047	Can any one forbid waters that they should not be baptized , they who , behold , have received the Spirit of Holiness as well as we ?
44010048	Then he commanded them to be baptized in the name of our Lord Jeshu Meshiha . And they prayed of him to remain with them ( certain ) days .
44011001	And the apostles and brethren who were in Jihud heard that the Gentiles also had received the word of Aloha .
44011002	AND when Shemun had gone up to Urishlem , they who were of the circumcision contended with him ,
44011003	saying , that unto men uncircumcised he had entered , and had eaten with them .
44011004	And Shemun put forth in order to say to them ,
44011005	That while praying in Joppa I saw a vision ; a certain vessel descended which was like to a sheet , and bound at the four corners : and it came down from heaven and came unto me .
44011006	And gazing at it I beheld in it animals of four feet , and reptiles of the earth , and fowls of the heaven .
44011007	And I heard a voice which said to me , Shemun , arise , slay , and eat .
44011008	And I said , Not so , my Lord ; for nothing hath entered my mouth that is unclean or profane .
44011009	And again the voice said to me from heaven , What Aloha hath cleansed make not thou to be polluted .
44011010	This was done three times , and every thing was taken up into heaven .
44011011	And at that moment three men , who had been sent to me by Cornelius from Cesarea , came and stood at the gate of the court where I was sojourning .
44011012	And the Spirit said to me , Go with them without doubting . And there went also with me these six brethren , and we entered into the man's house .
44011013	And he related to us how he had seen in his house an angel , who stood and said to him , Send to the city Joppa , and bring Shemun who is called Kipha ,
44011014	and he will speak with thee words by which thou wilt be saved , thou and all thy house .
44011015	And when I proceeded to speak there , the Spirit of Holiness overshadowed them , as upon us from the beginning .
44011016	And I remembered the word of our Lord , who said , Juhanon baptized you with waters , but you shall be baptized with the Spirit of Holiness .
44011017	If then Aloha equally hath given the gift to the Gentiles who have believed in our Lord Jeshu Meshiha as we , who was I , that I should be sufficient to prohibit Aloha ?
44011018	And when these words they had heard they were silent , and they praised Aloha , and said , Now also unto the Gentiles Aloha hath given repentance unto life .
44011019	BUT they who had been dispersed by the tribulation that was concerning Estephanos went unto Punika , also to the region of Kypros and to Antiokia , but with any one not speaking the word unless only with the Jihudoyee .
44011020	But of them were men of Kypros and of Kyrine ; these entered into Antiokia , and discoursed with the Javnoyee , and evangelized concerning our Lord Jeshu .
44011021	And the hand of the Lord was with them , and many believed , and were converted unto the Lord .
44011022	And this was heard by the ears of the sons of the church which was at Urishlem , and they sent Bar Naba to Antiokia .
44011023	And when he came thither , and beheld the grace of Aloha , he rejoiced , and entreated them with all their heart to cleave to our Lord .
44011024	For he was a good man , and full of the Spirit of Holiness and of faith , and there was added much people to our Lord .
44011025	And he went forth to Tarsos to seek for Shaol ;
44011026	and when he had found him he brought him with him to Antiokia . And a whole year together they assembled in the church , and taught much people : from thence first in Antiokia the disciples were called Christianee .
44011027	And in those days there came from Urishlem thither prophets .
44011028	And one of them arose whose name was Agabos : and he made known to them by the Spirit that a great famine would be in all the land . And that famine was in the days of Claudios Caesar .
44011029	Therefore the disciples , according as each of them had , determined to send for the service of those brethren who dwelt in Jihud ;
44011030	and they sent by the hand of Bar Naba and Shaol to the presbyters who were there .
44012001	BUT at that time Herodes the king , he who was surnamed Agripos , stretched forth hands upon some who were in the church , to ill-treat them .
44012002	And he killed with the sword Jakub the brother of Juhanon .
44012003	And when he saw that this pleased the Jihudoyee , he added to apprehend also Shemun Kipha . And they were the days of the Phatiree .
44012004	And he apprehended him and cast him into the house of the bound , and delivered him to sixteen soldiers to keep him , that after the Petscha he might deliver him to the people of the Jihudoyee .
44012005	And while Shemun was kept in the house of the bound , constant prayer was offered by the church on his behalf unto Aloha .
44012006	And in that night of the coming morning when he should be delivered up , while Shemun slept between two soldiers , and bound with two chains , and the others were watching the gates of the house of the bound ,
44012007	the angel of the Lord stood over him , and light shined in all the house .
44012008	And he smote him on his side , and said to him , Arise quickly . And the chains fell from his hands . And the angel said to him , bind thy loins , and put on thy sandals . And he did so . And again he said to him , Wrap thy mantle , and come after me .
44012009	And he went forth , and came after him ; not knowing that what was done by the hand of the angel was reality , for he thought that he saw a vision .
44012010	And when he had passed the first and second guard , they came to the gate of iron , and it was opened to them of its own accord . And when they went forth and had passed one street , the angel departed from him .
44012011	Then acknowledged Shemun , and said , Now know I in truth that the Lord hath sent his angel , and hath delivered me from the hand of Herodes the king , and from that which the Jihudoyee had calculated against me .
44012012	And when he had understood , he came to the house of Mariam the mother of Juhanon , he who is surnamed Markos ; because many brethren were assembled there and praying .
44012013	And he knocked at the gate of the court , and there came forth to answer him a damsel whose name was Roda .
44012014	And she knew the voice of Shemun ; and for joy she opened not the gate , but returned with running , and said to them , Shemun , behold , stands at the gate of the court .
44012015	And they said to her , Thou art altogether moved . And she contended that it was so . And they said , It may be that it is his angel .
44012016	And Shemun knocked at the gate ; and they went forth , and seeing him they were astonished .
44012017	And he beckoned to them with his hand to be silent ; and entered , and showed them how the Lord had brought him out from the house of the bound . And he said to them , Show these to Jakub and to the brethren ; and he departed and went to another place .
44012018	And when it was morning there was made a great tumult among the soldiers concerning Shemun , what was become of him ?
44012019	But Herodes when he inquired and found him not , condemned the guards , and commanded that they should die . And he went forth from Jihud and came to Cesarea .
44012020	And because he was angry with the Tsuroyee and with the Tsaidonoyee , they gathered together and came to him by persuasion of Blestos the chamberlain of the king , and prayed of him that peace should be to them , because the sustenance of their country was from the kingdom of Herodes .
44012021	But upon a public day Herodes was clothed with the robe of royalty , and sat upon the tribunal , and he discoursed to an assembly .
44012022	But all the people exclaimed , and said , These are the words of a god , and not of a man .
44012023	And on this account , because he gave not the glory to Aloha , in that hour the angel of the Lord smote him , and he was corroded with worms , and died .
44012024	And the gospel of Aloha was proclaimed , and was great .
44012025	BUT Bar Naba and Shaol returned from Urishlem to Antiokia after they had accomplished their ministry ; and they took with them Juhanon who was called Markos .
44013001	But there were in the church of Antiokia prophets and teachers , Bar Naba and Shemun who was called Niger , and Lukios who was from the city of Kyrene , and Manael , a fosterbrother of Herodes Tetrarka , and Shaol .
44013002	And as they fasted and supplicated Aloha , the Spirit of Holiness said to them , Separate to me Shaol and Bar Naba for the work to which I have called them .
44013003	And after they had fasted and prayed , they laid upon them the hand , and dismissed them .
44013004	And they , being sent by the Spirit of Holiness , went down to Selukia , and from thence proceeded by sea to Cyprus .
44013005	And when they had entered the city Salamina , they preached the word of our Lord in the congregations of the Jihudoyee , and Juhanon ministered to them .
44013006	And when they had itinerated through the whole island unto the city Paphos , they found a man , a certain sorcerer , a Jihudoya , who was a false prophet , whose name was Bar Shuma .
44013007	This adhered to a wise man who was proconsul , and was called Sergius Paulos . And the proconsul called Shaol and Bar Naba and requested to hear from them the word of Aloha .
44013008	But this sorcerer , Bar Shuma , whose name interpreted is Elymos , stood against them , because he desired to avert the proconsul from faith .
44013009	But Shaol , he who is called PAULOS , was filled with the Spirit of Holiness , and beheld him ,
44013010	and said , O full of all deceits and all wickednesses , thou son of the devil , and adversary of all righteousness , ceasest thou not to pervert the right ways of the Lord ?
44013011	And now the hand of the Lord is upon thee , and thou shalt be blind , and not see the sun until the time . And in the hour there fell upon him obscurity and darkness , and he went about asking some one to hold him by the hand .
44013012	But when the proconsul saw what had been done , he wondered , and believed in the doctrine of the Lord .
44013013	BUT Paulos and Bar Naba went on by sea from the City Paphos , and came to Perga , a city of Pamphylia ; and Juhanon separated from them , and went to Urishlem .
44013014	But they went forth from Perga , and came to Antiokia , the city of Pisidia . And they entered the synagogue , and sat on the day of shabath .
44013015	And after the law and the prophets had been read , the presbyters of the synagogue sent to them , and said , Men , brethren , have you a word of exhortation to say to the people ?
44013016	And Paulos arose , and signed with his hand , and said to them :
44013017	Men , sons of Israel , and those who fear Aloha , hearken ! The God of this people elected our fathers , and exalted and magnified them , when they were sojourners in the land of Metsreen , and with uplifted arm brought them out therefrom
44013018	And he nourished them in the desert forty years .
44013019	And he destroyed seven nations in the land of Canaan , and gave them their land an inheritance . And four hundred and fifty years
44013020	he gave them judges , until Shamuel the prophet ;
44013021	and then prayed they for themselves a king ; and Aloha gave to them Shaol-bar-Kish , a man of the tribe of Benjamin , forty years .
44013022	And he took him , and raised unto them David the king , and testified of him , and said , I have found David , the son of Jeshai , a man according to my heart ; he will perform all my will .
44013023	From the seed of this ( man ) the God of Israel , as he had promised , raised up Jeshu the Redeemer .
44013024	And he sent Juhanon to proclaim before his coming the baptism of repentance to the whole people of Israel .
44013025	And while Juhanon accomplished his ministry , he said , Whom think you that I am ? I am not ( he ) , but , behold , he cometh after me , he , the latchet of whose sandals I am not worthy to unloose .
44013026	MEN , brethren , sons of the race of Abraham , and they among you who fear Aloha , unto you is sent the word of life .
44013027	For they , the inhabitants of Urishlem and their princes , have not consented thereto , nor also to the writings of the prophets which are read on every shabath ; but condemned him , and accomplished all that was written .
44013028	And while they found not any cause of death , they requested Pilatos that they might kill him .
44013029	And when they had fulfilled every thing that was written concerning him , they took him from the cross , and laid him in a sepulchre .
44013030	But Aloha raised him from among the dead .
44013031	And he was seen days many by those who had come up with him from Galila to Urishlem , and they are now his witnesses unto the people .
44013032	And we also , behold , we preach to you that that promise which was made to our fathers ,
44013033	behold , Aloha hath fulfilled it to their children , ( in ) that he hath raised up Jeshu ; as it is written in the second psalm , Thou art my Son ; This day have I begotten thee .
44013034	And thus did Aloha raise him from among the dead , that again he should not return thither to see corruption ; as he had said , I will give you the sure grace of David .
44013035	And again he hath said in another place , Thou hast not given thy Saint to see corruption .
44013036	For David in his generation served the will of Aloha , and slept , and was added to his fathers , and saw corruption .
44013037	But This whom Aloha raised saw no corruption .
44013038	Know then , brethren , that through This himself is preached to you the remission of sins ;
44013039	and from all ( from ) which we could not by the law of Musha be justified , through This all who believe are justified .
44013040	Beware , then , lest there come upon you that which is written in the prophets :
44013041	Behold , despisers , and wonder , and perish : For a work I work in your days Which you will not believe if one should declare it to you .
44013042	And when they had gone out from among them , they besought of them that the next shabath they would speak to them these words .
44013043	And when the congregation was dissolved , many Jihudoyee went after them ; and also the proselytes who worshipped Aloha . And they discoursed ( with ) and persuaded them to cleave to the grace of Aloha .
44013044	AND on the next shabath the whole city gathered to hear the word of Aloha .
44013045	And when the Jihudoyee saw the great assemblage , they were filled with envy , and arose against the words which Paulos spake , and blasphemed .
44013046	But Paulos and Bar Naba said to them openly , To you it behoved first to speak the word of Aloha ; but because you repel it from you , and determine against yourselves that you are not worthy of eternal life , behold , we turn to the Gentiles .
44013047	For so hath our Lord commanded , as it is written , I have set thee a light to the Gentiles , To be for salvation to the ends of the earth .
44013048	And when the Gentiles heard , they rejoiced and glorified Aloha ; and they believed who were disposed unto eternal life .
44013049	And the word of Aloha was spoken in all that region .
44013050	But the Jihudoyee excited the principal men of the city and rich women , who with them feared Aloha , and raised a persecution against Paulos and against Bar Naba , and cast them out from their bounds .
44013051	And as they went forth , they shook off against them the dust of their feet ; and they came to Ikanon , a city .
44013052	And the disciples were filled with joy and with the Spirit of Holiness .
44014001	And they came and entered into the synagogue of the Jihudoyee , and so spake with them as that many believed of Jihudoyee and of Javanoyee .
44014002	But Jihudoyee , of those who were not persuaded , excited the Gentiles to ill-treat the brethren .
44014003	But they much time were there , and openly discoursed concerning the Lord ; and He testified of the word of his grace by the signs and the wonders which he wrought by their hands .
44014004	And all the society of the city was divided : of them some were with the Jihudoyee , and of them ( some ) adhered to the apostles .
44014005	But there was made a movement by the Gentiles and by the Jihudoyee and their chiefs to maltreat them , and to crush them with stones .
44014006	And when they knew , they passed away , and escaped to the cities of Lykania , Lystra , and Derbe , and the villages which surround them ,
44014007	and there evangelized .
44014008	AND a certain man dwelt in the city of Lystra who was afflicted in his feet , lame from the womb of his mother , ( and ) who had never walked .
44014009	This heard Paulos discourse . And when Paulos saw him , and knew that there was faith in him to be saved ,
44014010	he said to him with a high voice , To thee I say , in the name of our Lord Jeshu Meshiha , Stand upon thy feet .
44014011	And leaping , he stood and walked . And the assembly of the people , when they saw what Paulos had done , lifted up their voice in the language of the country , and said , Gods in the likeness of men have come down unto us .
44014012	And they named Bar Naba , lord of the gods ; and Paulos , Hermis , because he was foremost in discourse .
44014013	And the priest of the lord of the gods , who was without the city , brought oxen and garlands to the gates of the court of the place where they dwelt , and willed to sacrifice to them .
44014014	But Bar Naba and Paulos , when they heard , rent their garments , and sprang up , and came out to the crowd . And they cried ,
44014015	and said , Men , what do you ? We also are children of men liable to sufferings like you , ( and ) who preach to you that from these vanities you should turn unto Aloha the living , who made heaven and earth , and the seas , and all that is in them :
44014016	who in former generations left all nations to walk in ways of their own ;
44014017	yet leaving not himself without witness , while he did them good from heaven , and sent down rain , and multiplied the fruits in their times , and filled with food and gladness their hearts .
44014018	And when these they had said , they scarcely restrained the people that some one should not sacrifice to them .
44014019	But there came thither Jihudoyee from Ikanon and from Antiokia , and stirred up against them the people ; and they stoned Paulos , and dragged him out of the city , because they thought that he was dead .
44014020	And the disciples gathered to him , and , arising , he entered the city . AND the day after he went forth from thence with Bar Naba , and came to Derbe the city .
44014021	And when they had preached to the sons of the city , they discipled many . And they returned and came to Lystra the city , and to Ikanon , and to Antiokia ,
44014022	confirming the souls of the disciples , and exhorting them to persevere in the faith . And they said to them , that through much tribulation it behoveth to enter the kingdom of Aloha .
44014023	And they constituted for them in all the churches presbyters , having fasted with them and prayed , and commended them to our Lord in whom they had believed .
44014024	And when they had gone through the country of Pisidia , they came to Pamphylia ,
44014025	and when they had preached in the city Perga the word of the Lord , they went down to Atalia ,
44014026	and from thence voyaged by sea and came to Antiokia , because from thence they had been commended to the grace of the Lord for the work which they had accomplished .
44014027	And when all the church had convened , they recounted every thing which Aloha had done with them , and that he had opened the door of the faith unto the Gentiles .
44014028	And much time were they there with the disciples .
44015001	But men from Jihud came down and taught the brethren , If you be not circumcised after the custom of the law , you cannot be saved .
44015002	And there were great agitation and disputation for Paulos and Bar Naba with them ; and it was that Paulos and Bar Naba , and others with them , went up to the apostles and presbyters who were in Urishlem on account of this question .
