45002016	in the day when Aloha judgeth the secrets of men according to my gospel by Jeshu Meshiha .
45002017	But if thou ( who ) a Jihudoya art called , and reposest on the law , and boastest in Aloha ,
45002018	because thou knowest his will , and distinguishest the things that are fitting , because thou art learned from the law ;
45002019	and confidest upon thyself that thou art a guide of the blind , and a light to those who are in darkness ,
45002020	and an instructor of the wanting-in-mind , and a teacher of children , and hast a type of knowledge and of truth in the law :
45002021	Thou , then , who teachest others , dost thou not teach thyself ? and who preachest that men should not steal , dost thou steal ?
45002022	and who sayest they should not commit adultery , dost thou commit adultery ? And thou who condemnest idols , dost thou despoil the sanctuary ?
45002023	And thou who boastest of the law , in this that thou transgressest against the law , Aloha himself despisest thou ?
45002024	For the name of Aloha through you is blasphemed among the Gentiles , as it is written .
45002025	For circumcision profiteth , if thou accomplish the law ; but if thou transgress the law , thy circumcision is become uncircumcisedness .
45002026	But if the uncircumcision shall keep the commandment of the law , is not uncircumcisedness reckoned to him ( as ) circumcision ?
45002027	And the uncircumcision , who by nature accomplishes the law will judge thee , who with the scripture and with circumcision , transgressest against the law .
45002028	FOR it is not in outwardness that he is a Jihudoya nor is that which is seen in the flesh circumcision :
45002029	but he is a Jihudoya who is one in inwardness ; and circumcision is that which is of the heart , in the spirit , and not in the letter ; whose praise is not from the sons of men , but from Aloha .
45003001	What then is the excellence of the Jihudoya , and what the profit of circumcision ?
45003002	Much in every thing : primarily that they had intrusted ( to them ) the words of Aloha .
45003003	For if some of them believed not , would their unbelief abolish the faithfulness of Aloha ?
45003004	Not so : for Aloha is true , and every man a liar ; as it is written , That thou mayest be just in thy words , And triumph when they judge thee .
45003005	But if our iniquity the righteousness of Aloha establisheth , what shall we say ? Is Aloha evil , who bringeth his wrath ? As a man do I speak .
45003006	Not so ; otherwise how shall Aloha judge the world ?
45003007	For if the truth of Aloha is promoted by my lie unto his glory , why then am I judged as a sinner ?
45003008	Or why , as certain blaspheme concerning us , affirming that we say , Let us do evil , that good may come ? they , whose condemnation is reserved by justice .
45003009	What then , have we attained excellence ? ( No . ) For before we decided of the Jihudoyee and of the Aramoyee that they are all under sin ;
45003010	as it is written , None is righteous , not one .
45003011	None understandeth or seeketh Aloha .
45003012	All have declined together and are reprobate , And there is none that doeth good , not one .
45003013	Open sepulchres are their throats , Their tongues have deceived , And the venom of asps is under their lips .
45003014	Their mouth is full of cursing and bitterness ,
45003015	And their feet are swift to shed blood .
45003016	Crushing and misery are in their ways ;
45003017	And the way of peace they have not known ;
45003018	And the fear of Aloha is not before their eyes .
45003019	BUT we know that whatever the law saith , to them who are under the law it saith : that every mouth may be shut , and all the world be guilty unto Aloha .
45003020	Because by the works of the law no flesh is justified before him ; for from the law sin is known .
45003021	But now , without the law the righteousness of Aloha is revealed , and the law and the prophets ( themselves ) testify of it .
45003022	But the righteousness of Aloha is by faith of Jeshu Meshiha , unto all and also upon all who believe in him . For there is no distinction :
45003023	for all have sinned , and have failed of the glory of Aloha ;
45003024	and all are justified by grace freely , and ( that ) through the redemption which is in Jeshu Meshiha ,
45003025	whom Aloha before ordained ( to be ) a propitiation through faith in his blood for our sins which from the first we had sinned , within the space which Aloha hath given to us in his patience ,
45003026	unto the manifestation of his righteousness which ( is ) in this time : that he might be just , and might justify in righteousness him who is in the faith of our Lord Jeshu Meshiha .
45003027	Where , then , is boasting ? It is abolished . By what law ? of works ? No , but by the law of faith .
45003028	We comprehend , therefore , that by faith man is justified , and not by the works of the law .
45003029	Is Aloha of the Jihudoyee only , and not of the Gentiles ? Yes , of the Gentiles also
45003030	Because one is Aloha , who justifieth the circumcision by faith , also the uncircumcision by the same faith .
45003031	Do we therefore the law abolish by faith ? Not so , but the law itself we establish .
45004001	What then say we of Abraham , the chief of the fathers , that he found in the flesh ?
45004002	For if Abraham by works was justified , he had cause for boasting ; but not with Aloha .
45004003	For what saith the scripture ? That Abraham believed Aloha , and he reckoned it to him for righteousness .
45004004	But to him who worketh , his wages are not reckoned to him as of favour , but as that which is owing to him :
45004005	but to him who worketh not , but believeth only in him who justifieth sinners , his faith is reckoned to him for righteousness .
45004006	As also David hath spoken concerning the blessedness of the man to whom Aloha reckoneth righteousness without works , saying ,
45004007	Blessed are they whose iniquity is forgiven , And whose sins are covered .
45004008	Blessed is the man to whom Aloha reckoneth not his sin .
45004009	Is this blessedness , then , upon the circumcision ( only ) , or upon the uncircumcision ( also ) ? Now we have said , that his faith was reckoned to Abraham for righteousness .
45004010	When , then , was it reckoned to him ? In circumcision or in uncircumcision ? It was not in circumcision , but in uncircumcision .
45004011	For he received the sign of circumcision ( as ) a seal of the righteousness of his faith , which ( was his ) in uncircumcision , that he should be the father of all them who believe of the uncircumcision ; that it might be accounted also to them for righteousness :
45004012	and the father of the circumcision , not of them who are of the circumcision only , but of them who pursue the footsteps of the faith of uncircumcision of our father Abraham .
45004013	FOR not through the law was the promise unto Abraham and to his seed that he should be the heir of the world , but through the righteousness of faith .
45004014	For if they who are of the law were heirs , faith would be vain , and the promise be abolished .
45004015	For the law is the worker of wrath . For where there is no law , there also is no transgression of the law .
45004016	Therefore it is by faith , which is through grace , that we are justified , that the promise might be firm unto all his seed ; not to that which is of the law only , but also to that which is of the faith of Abraham , who is the father of us all :
45004017	( as it is written , I have ordained thee the father of many nations before Aloha , in whom thou hast believed , who maketh alive the dead , and calleth those who are not as though they were : )
45004018	and who , without hope , unto hope believed that he should be the father of many nations , as it is written , that " so shall be thy seed . "
45004019	Nor was he weak in his faith , while considering his body dead , ( for he was the son of an hundred years , ) and the dead womb of Sara ;
45004020	and at the promise of Aloha he wavered not as deficient in faith , but was strong in faith , and gave glory to Aloha ;
45004021	and was sure that what he had promised to him Aloha could fulfil .
45004022	Wherefore it was reckoned to him for righteousness .
45004023	And not for his sake only was this written , that his faith was reckoned for righteousness ,
45004024	but for our sake , because it should be reckoned to us also who believe in Him who hath raised our Lord Jeshu Meshiha from among the dead ;
45004025	who was delivered for our sins , and rose that he might justify us .
45005001	BECAUSE , then , we are justified by faith , we have peace with Aloha through our Lord Jeshu Meshiha .
45005002	And by him we have been admitted through faith into this grace in which we stand , and exult in hope of the glory of Aloha .
45005003	And not thus only , but also in afflictions we exult ; for we know that affliction perfecteth patience in us ,
45005004	and patience experience , and experience hope :
45005005	but hope maketh us not ashamed , because the love of Aloha is shed forth upon our hearts by the Spirit of Holiness who is given to us .
45005006	But if the Meshiha on account of our infirmity in this time for the wicked hath died :
45005007	for hardly for the wicked one dieth ; for on account of the good one may perhaps dare to die .
45005008	Nevertheless Aloha hath manifested his love for us , in that , when we were sinners , the Meshiha for us died :
45005009	how much more , then , shall we be now justified through his blood , and by him be delivered from wrath ?
45005010	For if , while we were adversaries , Aloha was reconciled with us through the death of his Son , how much more , then , in reconciliation with him , shall we be saved by his life ?
45005011	And not thus only , but we also exult in Aloha through our Lord Jeshu Meshiha , by whom we have now received the reconciliation .
45005012	As by one man sin entered into the world , and by sin death , so death hath passed upon all men through this , that all have sinned .
45005013	For until the law , sin , while it was in the world , was not reckoned sin , because the law was not ;
45005014	yet death reigned from Adam until Musha on them also who had not sinned after the manner of the transgression of the law of Adam , who was the type of him who was to be .
45005015	But not as was the fall , so is the gift ; for if , on account of the fall of one , many died , how much more the grace of Aloha , and his gift , for the sake of one man , Jeshu Meshiha , in many will abound ?
45005016	And not as the transgression of one , so is the gift ; for the judgment that was by one was unto condemnation , but the gift ( which saves ) from many sins was unto righteousness .
45005017	For if because of the transgression of one death was made to reign , much more ( shall ) they who receive the abundance of the grace and of the gift and of righteousness , reign in life by one , Jeshu Meshiha .
45005018	As then on account of the transgression of one was the condemnation of all men , so , on account of the righteousness of one shall there be acquittal unto the life of all men .
45005019	For as on account of the disobedience of one man many became sinners , so also on account of the obedience of one many became righteous .
45005020	But the entrance which was of the law , ( made ) sin to increase ; and where sin increased , there grace hath abounded :
45005021	that as sin hath reigned in death , so grace might reign in righteousness unto the life which is eternal , by the hand of our Lord Jeshu Meshiha .
45006001	WHAT , then , shall we say , Let us remain in sin , that grace may abound ?
45006002	Not so . For how shall they who are dead to sin live yet in it ?
45006003	Or do you not know , that they who have been baptized into Jeshu Meshiha , into his death have been baptized ?
45006004	For we are buried with him by baptism into death ; that as Jeshu Meshiha arose from among the dead by the glory of his Father , so also we in a new life shall walk .
45006005	For if together we have been planted with him in the likeness of his death , so also in his resurrection shall we be .
45006006	For we know that our old man is crucified with him , that the body of sin might be abolished , that more we should not serve sin .
45006007	For he who is dead is set free from sin .
45006008	If then we are dead with the Meshiha , we believe that with him , with the Meshiha , we shall live :
45006009	for we know that the Meshiha rose from among the dead , and no more dieth , nor hath death dominion over him .
45006010	For he who died on account of sin died once , and he who liveth liveth unto Aloha ;
45006011	so also reckon yourselves to be dead unto sin , and alive unto Aloha by our Lord Jeshu Meshiha .
45006012	Let not sin then reign in your dead body , as that you may obey the lusts of it :
45006013	nor prepare your members the instruments of iniquity unto sin , but prepare yourselves for Aloha , as men who from the dead have been made alive , and your members instruments to be for the righteousness of Aloha .
45006014	For sin shall not rule over you ; for you are not under law , but under grace .
45006015	What , then , shall we sin , because we are not under law , but under grace ? Not so .
45006016	Know you not , that to whomsoever you prepare yourselves to obey him unto service , of him you are the servants , of him whom you obey ; whether of sin , or of the hearing of the ear of righteousness ?
45006017	But praise to Aloha that you were the servants of sin , but have obeyed from the heart the form of doctrine to which you have been delivered .
45006018	And when you were made free from sin , you became obedient to righteousness .
45006019	As among men I speak , because of the infirmity of your flesh , that as you have prepared your members for the service of uncleanness and of iniquity , so also now prepare ye your members for the service of righteousness and of holiness .
45006020	For when you were the servants of sin , you were free from righteousness .
45006021	And what product had you then from that of which to-day you are ashamed ? For the end of it is death .
45006022	And now made free from sin , and become servants to Aloha , you have holy fruits , of which the end is the life of eternity .
45006023	For the wages of sin is death ; and the gift of Aloha the life of eternity by our Lord Jeshu Meshiha .
45007001	BUT know you not , my brethren , for to those who know the law I speak , that the law has authority over a man as long as he liveth ?
45007002	as a woman who is bound in law to her husband as long as he liveth ; but if her husband be dead , she is freed from the law of her husband .
45007003	But if , while her husband lives , she adhere to another man , she becometh an adulteress ; but if her husband shall die , she is freed from the law , and is not an adulteress , though she become ( the wife ) of another man .
45007004	And now , my brethren , you also are dead to the law , through the body of the Meshiha , that you should be married to another , ( namely , to ) him who rose from the dead , that you may render fruit unto Aloha .
45007005	For while we were in the flesh , the affections of sin , which are against the law , wrought powerfully in our members to yield fruits unto death ;
45007006	but now we are loosed from the law , and are dead to that which held us , that we might serve henceforth in the newness of the spirit , and not in the oldness of the writing .
45007007	What then , say we the law is sin ? Not so . But sin I had not learned ( to know ) but by the law : for I had not known concupiscence ( to be sinful ) , but ( by ) the law , which hath said , Thou shalt not covet .
45007008	And by this commandment sin found for itself an occasion , and completed in me all concupiscence . For without the law sin was dead .
45007009	But I was alive without the law formerly : but when the commandment came , sin lived , and I died .
45007010	And that commandment of life was found to me ( to tend ) unto death .
45007011	For sin , by the occasion it found through the commandment , deceived me , and thereby killed me .
45007012	The law therefore is holy , and the commandment holy , and just , and good .
45007013	The good , then , unto me , unto death was made ? Not so . But sin , that it might be seen what sin is , by the good ( law ) effected death in me , that sin might be the more condemned by the commandment .
45007014	For we know that the law is spiritual ; but I am carnal , and sold unto sin .
45007015	For what I work , I know not ; and not that which I will , I do ; but what I hate , that I do .
45007016	And if the thing that I would not , I do , I witness of the law that it is good .
45007017	But now it is not I who work this , but sin which dwelleth in me .
45007018	For I know that in me , but that is in my flesh , good dwelleth not ; because to will the good is easy to me , but to perform it I find not .
45007019	For the good that I will to do , I do not ; but the evil that I will not to do , that do I .
45007020	And if the thing that I will not I do , it is not I who do it , but sin which dwelleth in me .
45007021	I find then a law which accordeth with my mind , that willeth to do good , because evil is near to me .
45007022	For I rejoice in the law of Aloha in the interior man ;
45007023	but I see another law in my members , which warreth against the law of my mind , making me captive to the law of sin that is in my members .
45007025	I give thanks to Aloha ! ( it is ) by the hand of our Lord Jeshu Meshiha . Now then , I in my mind am the servant of the law of Aloha , but in my flesh I am the servant of the law of sin .
45008001	Hence , there is no condemnation to them who do not walk according to the flesh , in Jeshu Meshiha .
45008002	For the law of the Spirit of life , which is in Jeshu Meshiha , hath set thee free from the law of sin and of death .
45008003	Because the law was weak through the infirmity of the flesh , Aloha sent his Son in the likeness of the flesh of sin , on account of sin to condemn sin in his flesh ;
45008004	that the righteousness of the law might in us be fulfilled , who walk not in the flesh , but in the Spirit .
45008005	For they who are in the flesh , of that flesh are mindful ; and they who are of the Spirit , of that Spirit are mindful .
45008006	For the mind of the flesh is death , and the mind of the Spirit life and peace .
45008007	Because the mind of the flesh is enmity towards Aloha ; for to the law of Aloha it is not subject , for it cannot be ;
45008008	and they who are in the flesh cannot please Aloha .
45008009	But you are not in the flesh , but in the Spirit , if truly the Spirit of Aloha dwelleth in you . But if a man have not the Spirit of the Meshiha , this ( man ) is not his .
45008010	And if the Meshiha be in you , the body is dead because of sin ; but the Spirit is life because of righteousness .
45008011	And if the Spirit of him who raised our Lord Jeshu Meshiha from among the dead dwell in you , he who raised our Lord Jeshu Meshiha from among the dead will also make alive your dead bodies , on account of his Spirit who dwelleth in you .
45008012	Now , my brethren , we are debtors , not to the flesh , that according to the flesh we should walk .
45008013	For if after the flesh you live , you must die : but if , after the Spirit , the habitudes of the body you mortify , you live .
45008014	For they who by the Spirit of Aloha are led , they are the sons of Aloha .
45008015	For we have not received the spirit of servitude again unto fear , but we have received the Spirit of the adoption of sons , by whom we cry , Father , our Father !
45008016	And the Spirit himself witnesseth with our spirit , that we are the sons of Aloha .
45008017	And if sons , heirs also ; heirs of Aloha , and the sons of the inheritance of Jeshu Meshiha . For if we suffer with him , with him also shall we be glorified .
45008018	For I consider that the sufferings of this time are not equal to that glory which is to be revealed in us .
45008019	For the whole creation hopeth and waiteth for the manifestation of the sons of Aloha .
45008020	For the creation hath been subjected to vanity , not willingly , but on account of him who subjected her , upon the hope
45008021	that the creation herself also shall be made free from the servitude of corruption into the liberty of the glory of the sons of Aloha .
45008022	For we know that all creatures groan and travail until this day ;
45008023	and not only they , but we also who have in us the first-fruit of the Spirit , groan within ourselves , and wait for the adoption , the redemption of our bodies .
45008024	For in hope we live : but hope that is seen is not hope ; for if we see it , why hope we for it ?
45008025	But if we hope for that which is not seen , in patience we wait .
45008026	So also the Spirit helpeth our infirmity : for what to pray for as we ought we know not ; but the Spirit himself prayeth on our behalf in groanings unspoken .
45008027	But he who searcheth the hearts , he knoweth the mind of the Spirit , who , according to the will of Aloha , prayeth for the saints .
45008028	BUT we know that those who love Aloha , in every thing he helpeth them for good ; them whom he set before that they might be called .
45008029	And from the first he knew them , and signified them in the likeness of the image of his Son , that he might be the first-born of many brethren .
45008030	But whom he before signified , them he called ; and whom he called , them he justified ; and whom he justified , them he glorified .
45008031	What then shall we say of these ? If Aloha be for us , who is against us ?
45008032	And if his Son be spared not , but for all of us delivered him up , how will he not with him give us all things ?
45008033	Who is against the chosen of Aloha ? Aloha justifieth .
45008034	Who condemneth ? The Meshiha hath died and arisen , and is at the right hand of Aloha , and prayeth for us .
45008035	Who shall separate us from the love of Meshiha ? Affliction , or sorrow , or persecution , or famine , or nakedness , or peril , or the sword ?
45008036	As it is written : For thee all the day long are we killed , We are reckoned as sheep for the slaughter .
45008037	But in these we all are victorious by the hand of him who hath loved us .
45008038	For I am persuaded that neither death , nor life , nor angels , nor authorities , nor powers , nor things subsisting , nor things to come ,
45008039	nor height , nor depth , nor any other creature , shall be able to separate me from the love of Aloha which is in our Lord Jeshu Meshiha .
45009001	I say the truth in Meshiha , and lie not ; my conscience witnesseth for me in the Spirit of Holiness ,
45009002	that I have great grief , and ( that ) the sorrow of my heart ceaseth not .
45009003	For I could pray that I myself might be one accursed from Meshiha instead of my brethren and my kinsmen who are in the flesh ;
45009004	who are the sons of Israel , and whose was the adoption of sons , and the glory , and the covenants , and the law , and the ministry , and the promises ,
45009005	and the fathers ; and from whom appeared the Meshiha in the flesh , who is Aloha over all : his be praises and benedictions to the age of ages . Amen .
45009006	FOR the word of Aloha hath not really fallen : for not all who are of Israel are Israel ;
45009007	neither also are they who are of the seed of Abraham all children ; because it was said , In Ishok shall be called unto thee the seed :
45009008	but that is , the children of the flesh are not the children of Aloha , but the children of the promise are reckoned the seed .
45009009	For the promise is this word , In this time I will come , and a son shall be unto Sara .
45009010	And not this only , but also Raphka when with one , our father Ishok , she had association ,
45009011	before her sons were born , and had not wrought good or evil , the ( choice ) of Aloha was ( made ) known before that it should remain : not by works , but by him who called :
45009012	for it was said , The elder shall be servant to the less ;
45009013	as it is written , Jakub have I loved , and Isu have I hated .
45009014	What then say we ? Is there iniquity with Aloha ? Not so :
45009015	behold , also , he said unto Musha , I will have mercy upon whom I will have mercy , and I will be gracious to whom I will be gracious .
45009016	Therefore it is not by him who willeth , nor by him who runneth , but by Aloha the Merciful .
45009017	For it is said in the scripture to Pherun , For this I have raised thee up , that I might show in thee my power , and that my name might be proclaimed in all the earth .
45009018	Then upon whom he willeth he is merciful , and whom he willeth he hardeneth .
45009019	Perhaps thou wilt say , Of what then doth he complain ; for who shall arise against his will ?
45009020	Who then art thou , O man , who givest answer against Aloha ? Will the mass say to him who formeth it , Why thus hast thou formed me ?
45009021	Or , hath not the potter power over his clay , that from the ( same ) mass he might make vessels , the one to honour , and the other to vileness ?
45009022	BUT if Aloha , willing to reveal his wrath , and to make known his power , in his much patience bore with the vessels of wrath who were perfected for destruction ,
45009023	and poured his mercy upon the vessels of mercy who were prepared of Aloha for glory ,
45009024	who are we , ( ourselves ) the called , not only of the Jihudoyee , but also of the Gentiles :
45009025	so also in Husha he said , I will call them my people who were not my people , and on those on whom I was not merciful , will I be merciful :
45009026	for it shall be in the place where they were not called my people , there shall they be called the children of Aloha the Living .
45009027	But Eshaia proclaims of the sons of Israel : Though the number of the sons of Israel were as the sand which is on the sea , the residue of them shall be saved .
45009028	The Lord hath decreed and determined the word , and will perform it upon the earth .
45009029	And as that which Eshaia had said before : Unless the Lord of sebaoth had left to us a residue , as Sedum should we have been , and to Amura have been likened .
45009030	WHAT then shall we say ? That the Gentiles who have not followed after righteousness have attained righteousness , but that righteousness which is of faith :
45009031	but Israel , who followed after the law of righteousness , unto the law of righteousness have not attained .
45009032	For why ? Because it was not by faith , but by the works of the law : for they stumbled at the stone of stumbling ;
45009033	as it is written , Behold , I lay in Zion a stone of stumbling And a rock of offence ; And whosoever in him shall believe Shall not be ashamed .
45010001	My brethren , ( it is ) the wish of my heart , and my prayer to Aloha concerning them , that they may be saved .
45010002	For I testify of them that they have zeal for Aloha , but not in knowledge .
45010003	But the righteousness of Aloha they know not , but seek the righteousness of themselves to establish , and on this account to the righteousness of Aloha they have not become subject .
45010004	For the end of the law is the Meshiha unto righteousness in all who believe in him .
45010005	FOR Musha thus describeth the righteousness which is of the law , that he who doeth these things shall live by them .
45010006	But the righteousness which is by faith thus speaketh , Say not in thy heart , Who shall ascend into heaven , And bring down the Meshiha ?
45010007	And who shall descend into the deep of Sheul , And bring up the Meshiha from among the dead ?
45010008	But what saith it ? Nigh thee is the word of thy mouth and of thy heart : that is , the word of faith , which we preach .
45010009	And if thou wilt confess with thy mouth our Lord Jeshu , and wilt believe with thy heart that Aloha hath raised him from among the dead , thou shalt be saved .
45010010	For the heart which believeth in him is justified , and the mouth which confesseth him is saved .
45010011	For the scripture saith , that every one who believeth in him shall not be ashamed .
45010012	And in this he hath not distinguished nor the Jihudoya nor the Aramoya ; for one is the Lord of them all , who is rich toward every one who calleth on him .
45010013	For every one who shall invoke the name of the Lord shall be saved .
45010014	How then shall they invoke him in whom they have not believed ? Or how shall they believe in him of whom they have not heard ? Or how shall they hear without a preacher ?
45010015	Or how shall they preach if they are not sent ? As it is written , How beautiful the feet of them who evangelize peace , And who evangelize good things !
45010016	But all of them have not obeyed the preaching of the gospel : for Eshaia saith , My Lord , who hath believed our voice ?
45010017	Therefore faith is from the hearing of the ear , and the hearing of the ear from the word of Aloha .
45010018	But I say , Have they not heard ? Behold , in all the earth their voice hath gone forth , And to the ends of the world their words !
45010019	But I say , Hath not Israel known ? First , Musha thus speaketh , I will provoke you by a people who is not a people . And by the disobedient people will I make you angry .
45010020	But Eshaia is bold , and saith , I am beheld by them who have not sought me , And found of them who for me have not inquired .
45010021	But of Israel he saith , I have stretched out my hands all the day To a contentious and disobedient people .
45011001	BUT I say , Hath Aloha put away his people ? Not so . For I also am of Israel , of the seed of Abraham , of the tribe of Benyamen .
45011002	Aloha hath not put away his people whom from before he knew . Or know you not what he saith in the scripture concerning Elia ,
45011003	when he cried unto Aloha against Israel , saying , My Lord , thy prophets have they killed , and thy altars overthrown , and I alone am left , and they seek my soul ?
45011004	And it was said to him by revelation , Behold , I have left to myself seven thousand men , who upon their knees have not kneeled nor worshipped Baal .
45011005	So also , at this time , a residue is left by the election of grace .
45011006	But if by grace , it is not of works ; otherwise grace is not grace . But if by works , it is not of grace ; otherwise work is not work .
45011007	What then , That which Israel sought he hath not found ; but the election hath found : but the rest of them are blinded in their hearts .
45011008	As it is written , Aloha hath given them the spirit of trouble , And eyes that see not , and ears that hear not , until the present day .
45011009	And David again saith , Let their table become a snare before them , And their reward be for a stumbling-block :
45011010	Let their eyes be darkened , that they may not see , And their back at all times be bowed ;
45011011	But I say , Have they stumbled so as to fall ? Not so : but , by their stumbling was salvation to the Gentiles , unto their zeal .
45011012	And if their stumbling were wealth to the world , and their condemnation wealth to the Gentiles , how much then will their fulness be ?
45011013	To you , Gentiles , I speak , I , who am apostle of the Gentiles , in my ministry I glory ,
45011014	if I may provoke my fleshly kindred , and save some of them .
45011015	For if their rejection was the reconciliation of the world , what ( will ) their conversion ( be ) but life from the dead ?
45011016	For if the first-fruits be holy , ( so ) also ( will be ) the mass ; and if the root be holy , ( so ) also the branches .
45011017	And if the branches were cut off , and thou who art a wild olive art engrafted in their place , and hast a participation of the root and fatness of the olive ,
45011018	boast not against the branches : but if thou boast , thou bearest not the root , but the root beareth thee .
45011019	And perhaps thou wilt say , The branches were cut off , and I in their place am engrafted :
45011020	Well , they on account of unbelief were cut off , and thou by faith standest : be not exalted in thy mind , but fear .
45011021	If Aloha spared not them who were branches by nature , ( take heed ) lest he spare not thee .
45011022	Behold , then , the goodness and the severity of Aloha : towards them who fell , severity ; but towards thee , goodness , if thou continue in his goodness ; if not , thou also wilt be cut off .
45011023	And they , if they continue not in their want of faith , they also shall be engrafted ; for Aloha is able again to engraft them .
45011024	For if thou who art of the wild olive which is thy nature , wast cut off , and , which was not thy nature , art engrafted into the good olive , how much more they , if they are engrafted into the olive of their nature ?
45011025	But I would have you know , my brethren , this mystery , that you may not be wise in your own mind , - that blindness of heart for a little space is unto Israel until the fulness of the Gentiles be brought in :
45011026	and then all Israel shall be saved . As it is written , The Redeemer shall come from Sion , And turn iniquity from Jakub ;
45011027	And then shall be to them my covenant , When I have forgiven them their sins .
45011028	But , in ( regard of ) the gospel , they are enemies on your account ; and , in the election , they are beloved on account of the fathers .
45011029	For Aloha turneth not in his gift and in his vocation .
45011030	For as you also were not obedient unto Aloha at the first , and now have received mercy through their disobedience ;
45011031	so also these are now disobedient for the mercy that is upon you , that upon them also might be mercy .
45011032	For Aloha hath included them all in disobedience , that upon all he might show mercy .
45011033	O the depth of the riches of the wisdom and knowledge of Aloha , whose judgments man searcheth not , and whose ways are inscrutable !
45011034	For who hath known the mind of the Lord , or who hath been his counsellor ?
45011035	Or who hath first given to him , that so he should receive from him ?
45011036	For all is of him , and all in him , and all by him . To him be praises and benedictions unto the age of ages . Amen .
45012001	I BESEECH then of you , my brethren , by the mercies of Aloha , that you present your bodies a sacrifice , living and holy and acceptable unto Aloha , in a rational service .
45012002	And be not likened unto this world , but be changed by the renewing of your minds , that you may discern what is the will of Aloha , good , and acceptable , and perfect .
45012003	But I tell you all through the grace which is given to me , that you are not to think beyond what it is proper to think ; but that you think with sobriety , every man as Aloha hath divided to him faith in measure .
45012004	For as in one body we have many members , and as all the members have not one work ,
45012005	so also we who are many are one body in the Meshiha ; but we are each of us members one of another .
45012006	But we have various gifts according to the grace that is given to us : is it prophecy ? ( let him who has received it ) prophesy according to the measure of the faith .
45012007	Hath ( another the gift ) of ministry ? ( let him be employed ) in his ministry ; he who is a teacher , ( let him labour ) in his teaching ;
45012008	he who is an exhorter , in his exhorting ; as he who giveth , ( let him give with simplicity ; ) and he who presideth , ( let it be ) with diligence ; and he who ( is engaged in works ) of mercy , with cheerfulness .
45012009	And let not your love be guileful ; abhor things evil , cleave to the good .
45012010	Be tender to your brethren , and love one another , being forward to honour one another .
45012011	Be diligent , and not slothful , be fervent in spirit , be serving your Lord .
45012012	Rejoice in your hope , sustain your afflictions , be constant in prayer ;
45012013	distributing to the necessity of the saints . Be kind to strangers .
45012014	Bless your persecutors ; bless , and curse not .
45012015	Rejoice with them who rejoice , and weep with them who weep .
45012016	And what you think of yourselves , ( that ) also think of your brethren ; nor think with a high mind , but incline to them who are humble ; and be not wise in the conceit of your own mind .
45012017	And repay to no man evil for evil , but be careful to do good before all men .
45012018	And if possible , as much as is in you , with all men make peace .
45012019	And avenge not yourselves , my beloved , but give place unto wrath ; for it is written , that if thou execute not judgment for thyself , I will execute thy judgment , saith Aloha .
45012020	And if thy adversary hunger , feed him ; and if he thirst , give him drink : and if these things thou do unto him , coals of fire thou wilt heap upon his head .
45012021	Let not evil overcome you , but overcome evil with good .
45013001	LET every soul to the powers of dominion be subject . For there is no power that is not from Aloha , and the powers that be , of Aloha are they instituted .
45013002	Whoever then riseth up against the power , against the institution of Aloha he riseth ; and they who arise against them will receive judgment .
45013003	For judges are not a terror to the workers of good , but to the evil . Wilt thou then not be afraid of the power ? do good , and thou shalt have praise from him .
45013004	For he is the servant of Aloha , but to thee for good : and if thou do evil , fear ; for not in vain is he girded with the sword ; for he is the servant of Aloha , and the dispenser of wrath to them who do evil .
45013005	And because of this are we bound to be subject , not for the wrath only , but also because of conscience .
45013006	On this account also give we tribute to them ; for they are the servants of Aloha over these things constituted .
45013007	Render therefore to every man as is due to him : to whom tribute ( is due , ) tribute ; and to whom custom , custom ; and to whom reverence , reverence ; and to whom honour , honour .
45013008	And to no man owe any thing , but one another to love . For whoever loveth his neighbour fulfilleth the law :
45013009	for that also which it hath said , Thou shalt not kill ; and , Thou shalt not commit adultery ; and , Thou shalt not steal ; and , Thou shalt not covet ; and if there be any other commandment , in this word it is accomplished , Thou shalt love thy neighbour as thyself .
45013010	Love unto his neighbour evil worketh not : therefore love is the fulfilling of the law .
45013011	AND also this know , that the time is , and the hour is , when we should be awake from our sleep ; for now hath drawn nearer to us our salvation than when we believed .
45013012	The night now passeth away , and the day hath drawn nigh ; put we away then from us the works of darkness , and let us clothe with the arms of light .
45013013	And as in the day , let us walk decorously , not with the song , nor with drunkenness , nor in the unclean chamber , nor in envy and in contention ;
45013014	but let ( every one ) clothe himself with our Lord Jeshu Meshiha , and care not for your flesh unto the lusts ( thereof ) .
45014001	But to him who is weak in the faith give the hand , and be not divided in your thoughts .
45014002	For there are some who believe that one may eat every thing , and he who is weak ; eateth ( only ) the herb .
45014003	But let not him who eateth despise him who eateth not ; and he who eateth not , let him not judge him who eateth ; for Aloha hath received him .
45014004	Who art thou that judgest a servant who is not thine ? who , if he stand , unto his Lord he standeth , and if he fall , falleth unto his Lord . But standing , he standeth ; for there is power in the hands of his Lord to make him stand .
45014005	There is who distinguisheth day from day , and there is who judgeth all days ( to be alike ) ; but let every man in the conviction of his ( own ) mind be confirmed .
45014006	He who thinketh of the day , to his Lord he thinketh ; and every one who thinketh not of the day , unto his Lord he thinketh not ( of it ) . He who eateth , to his Lord he eateth , and to Aloha giveth thanks ;
45014007	and he who eateth not , to his Lord he eateth not , and giveth thanks to Aloha . For there is no one of us who to himself liveth and no one who to himself dieth .
45014008	For if we live , to our Lord we live ; and if we die , to our Lord we die : and if we live , then , or if we die , our Lord's are we .
45014009	Because of this also the Meshiha died and lived and arose , that he might be Lord of the dead and of the living . But thou , why dost thou judge thy brother ?
45014010	Or thou , also , why despisest thou thy brother ? For we shall all stand before the tribunal of the Meshiha :
45014011	as it is written , As I live , saith the Lord , unto me every knee shall bow , and to me shall every tongue confess .
45014012	Therefore , every one of us the answer for himself shall give unto Aloha .
45014013	Then judge not one another , but this determine rather , to lay not a stumbling-block for thy brother .
45014014	For I know , and am persuaded in the Lord Jeshu , that a thing which is unclean from itself is not ( so ) ; but to him who judgeth of any thing that it is polluted , to him only it is polluted .
45014015	But if on account of meat thou grievest thy brother , thou walkest not in love : destroy not by thy meat him on account of whom the Meshiha died .
45014016	Let not our good ( things ) be blasphemed .
45014017	For the kingdom of Aloha is not meat and drink , but righteousness and peace and joy in the Spirit of Holiness .
45014018	For who in these things serveth the Meshiha pleaseth Aloha , and before men is approved .
45014019	Now , after peace let us pursue , and after the edification of one another ,
45014020	and not for the sake of meats undo the work of Aloha . For each thing is pure , yet evil is it to the man who eateth with offence .
45014021	It is well not to eat flesh , nor to drink wine , nor any thing by which our brother is offended .
45014022	Hast thou confidence ? In thyself retain it before Aloha . Blessed is he who condemneth not himself in what he distinguisheth .
45014023	For he who doubteth and eateth is made guilty , because he eateth not with confidence . For every thing that is not of confidence is sin .
45015001	WE then , the strong , are obligated to bear up the infirmities of the weak , and not ourselves to please .
45015002	But let every one of us please his neighbour in good things as unto edification .
45015003	Because the Meshiha also pleased not himself ; but as it is written , The reproach of thy reproachers hath fallen upon me .
45015004	For every thing that hath before been written for our instruction was written , that by the patience and consolation of the scriptures we might have hope .
45015005	But the God of patience and of consolation give to you that with impartiality you may think one of another in Jeshu Meshiha ,
45015006	that with one mind and with one mouth you may glorify Aloha , the Father of our Lord Jeshu Meshiha .
45015007	Therefore , receive and bear with one another , as also the Meshiha hath received you , to the glory of Aloha .
45015008	But I say that Jeshu Meshiha ministered the circumcision , on behalf of the truth of Aloha , that he might confirm the promise of the fathers ,
45015009	and the Gentiles might glorify Aloha for his mercy that was upon them . As it is written , I will confess thee among the Gentiles , And to thy name will I sing .
45015010	And again he hath said , Be glad , ye Gentiles , with his people .
45015011	And again he hath said , Praise the Lord , all ( ye ) Gentiles ; Let all peoples praise him .
45015012	And again , Eshaia hath said , There shall be a root of Jeshai , And he who shall arise shall be the chief of the peoples ; And upon him will the Gentiles hope .
45015013	But the God of hope fill you with all joy and peace , through faith , that you may abound in hope through the power of the Spirit of Holiness .
45015014	BUT I am persuaded also concerning you , my brethren , that you are also full of good , and filled with all knowledge , and able also to instruct others .
45015015	But I have somewhat boldly written to you , my brethren , as that I may put you in remembrance , through the grace which is given to me from Aloha ,
45015016	to be a minister of Jeshu Meshiha among the Gentiles , and to labour in the gospel of Aloha , that there may be an oblation of the Gentiles , acceptable and holy through the Spirit of Holiness .
45015017	I have , then , exultation in Jeshu Meshiha with Aloha .
45015018	For I dare not speak any thing which the Meshiha hath not done by my hands , unto the obedience of the Gentiles , in word and in deeds ,
45015019	with the power of signs and miracles , and with the power of the Spirit of Aloha ; as that I have itinerated from Urishlem unto Illyrikum , to fulfil the preaching of Meshiha ;
45015020	being anxious to preach , not where the name of Meshiha had been called , that I might not build upon another foundation ,
45015021	but as it is written , They to whom it hath not been told of him , they shall see him ; and they who have not heard shall be persuaded .
45015022	On this account I have been hindered many times when I would have come to you .
45015023	But now , because I have no place in these countries , and have desired for many years to come to you ,
45015024	when I go into Ispania , I hope to come and see you ; and you shall lead me thitherward , when I shall in some measure have been gladdened with the sight of you .
45015025	But now I go to Urishlem to minister to the saints .
45015026	For they in Makedunia and in Akaia have desired that a communication should be made from themselves with the poor and the saints who are at Urishlem .
45015027	They have desired ( this ) , because they also are indebted to them . For if the Gentiles have participated with them in the Spirit , they are indebted to serve them in the flesh .
45015028	This , then , when I have accomplished , and have sealed to them this fruit , I ( intend to ) pass by you into Ispania .
45015029	And I know that when I come to you , with the plenitude of the blessing of the gospel of Meshiha I ( shall ) come .
45015030	Now I entreat of you , my brethren , by our Lord Jeshu Meshiha , and by the love of the Spirit , to labour with me in prayer on my behalf , with Aloha ,
45015031	that I may be delivered from them who believe not in Jihud , and ( that ) the service which I bear to the saints may be well received ,
45015032	and I may come to you with joy in the will of Aloha , and be rested with you .
45015033	The God of peace be with all of you . Amen .
45016001	I COMMEND to you Phebe our sister , who is a deaconess of the church of Kancreos ,
45016002	that you receive her in the Lord , as is right for saints ; and , in every thing which she requests from you , assist her ; because she also hath assisted many , and myself also .
45016003	Ask for the peace of Priskela and Akulos , labourers with me in Jeshu Meshiha ;
45016004	for they themselves for my life have given their necks ; and not only do I praise them , but also all the churches of the Gentiles .
45016005	And give salutation to the church which is in their house . Ask the peace of Epenetos , my beloved , who was the first-fruits of Akaia in the Meshiha .
45016006	Ask the peace of Maria , who hath laboured much with you .
45016007	Ask for the peace of Andronikos and Junia , my kindred , who were captives with me , and are known among the apostles , and in Meshiha were before me .
45016008	Ask for the peace of Ampleos , my beloved in our Lord .
45016009	Ask for the peace of Urbanos , a labourer with us in Meshiha , and of Estakos my beloved .
45016010	Ask the peace of Apella , chosen in our Lord . Ask for the peace of the sons of the house of Aristobulos .
45016011	Ask the peace of Herodion , my relative . Ask for the peace of the sons of the house of Narkisos , who are in our Lord .
45016012	Ask for the peace of Tryphena and Tryphosa , who labour in our Lord . Ask for the peace of Parsis , my beloved , who much hath laboured in our Lord .
45016013	Ask for the peace of Rufus , the chosen in our Lord , and of his mother and mine .
45016014	Ask the peace of Asynkritos , and of Phlegun , and of Arma , and of Patroba , and of Herma , and of the brethren who are with them .
45016015	Ask the peace of Philologos , and of Julia , and of Niros , and of his sister , and of Olympa , and all the saints who are with them .
45016016	Ask for the peace one of another with the holy kiss . All the churches of the Meshiha ask for your peace .
45016017	But I beseech of you , my brethren , beware of them who make divisions and scandals apart from the doctrine which you have learned ; and be distant from them .
45016018	For they who are thus serve not our Lord Jeshu Meshiha , but their bellies ; and with sweet words and benedictions seduce the hearts of the simple .
45016019	But your obedience is known to every one ; I rejoice therefore in you , and I wish you to be wise unto good ( works ) , and pure with regard to evil .
45016020	But the God of peace will soon bruise Satana beneath your feet . The grace of our Lord Jeshu Meshiha be with you !
45016021	Timotheos , a labourer with me , and Lukios and Iason and Sosipatros my kinsmen ask for your peace .
45016022	I , Tertios , who have inscribed this epistle in our Lord , ask for your peace .
45016023	Gaios my entertainer , and of all the church , asketh for your peace ; ( as do ) Erastos steward of the city , and Quartos a brother .
45016024	The grace of our Lord Jeshu Meshiha be with you all . Amen .
45016025	TO ALOHA , who is able to confirm you in my gospel which is proclaimed concerning Jeshu the Meshiha , through revelation of the mystery , which from the times of the ages was hidden ,
45016026	but is revealed in this time by means of the scriptures of the prophets , and by the commandment of the Everlasting Aloha is made known to all the nations for the obedience of faith ;
45016027	( to Him ) who alone is wise , BE GLORY BY JESHU MESHIHA , UNTO THE AGE OF AGES . AMEN .
46001001	PAULOS the called , and the apostle of Jeshu Meshiha by the will of Aloha , and Sosthenis a brother ,
46001002	to the church of Aloha which is in Kurinthos , the called , and the saints who in Jeshu Meshiha are sanctified ; and to all them who invoke the name of our Lord Jeshu Meshiha in every place , theirs and ours :
46001003	Grace be with you and peace from Aloha our Father , and from our Lord Jeshu Meshiha .
46001004	I give thanks to Aloha at all times on your behalf for the grace of Aloha which is given to you through Jeshu Meshiha ,
46001005	because in every thing you are enriched in him in all utterance and in all knowledge ,
46001006	according to the testimony of the Meshiha , which is confirmed in you .
46001007	That you may not be deficient in one of his gifts , but be expecting the revelation of our Lord Jeshu Meshiha ,
46001008	who will confirm you to the end , that you may be without fault in the day of our Lord Jeshu Meshiha .
46001009	Faithful is Aloha , by whom you have been called to the fellowship of his Son Jeshu Meshiha our Lord .
46001010	But I beseech of you , my brethren , in the name of our Lord Jeshu Meshiha , that you have all one doctrine , and that there be no divisions among you , but that you be perfect in one mind and one sentiment .
46001011	For they of the house of Kloë have sent to me concerning you , my brethren , that there are contentions among you .
46001012	For this I say , that there are some of you who say , I am of Paulos ; and some who say , I am of Apollo ; and some who say , I am of Kipha ; and some who say , I am of the Meshiha !
46001013	Is the Meshiha divided ? Or was Paulos crucified for you ? Or in the name of Paulos were you baptized ?
46001014	I thank Aloha that no man of you I have baptized , but only Krispos and Gaios ;
46001015	lest any man should say , that in my name I have baptized .
46001016	But I baptized also the house of Estepana ; beyond ( these ) I know not that any other man I have baptized .
46001017	For the Meshiha sent me not to baptize , but to preach ; not with the wisdom of words , lest the cross of the Meshiha should be nullified .
46001018	FOR the doctrine of the cross to those who perish is foolishness , but to us who are saved it is the power of Aloha .
46001019	For it is written , I will destroy the wisdom of the wise , And I will take away the understanding of the prudent .
46001020	Where is the wise ? Where is the scribe ? Or where is the disputer of this world ? Hath not . Aloha made foolish the wisdom of this world ?
46001021	For inasmuch as in the wisdom of Aloha , the world by wisdom hath not known Aloha , it hath pleased Aloha , by the foolishness of preaching , to save them who believe .
46001022	For the Jihudoyee demand signs , and the Aramoyee require wisdom ;
46001023	but we preach the Meshiha crucified , a scandal to the Jihudoyee , and to the Aramoyee foolishness ;
46001024	but to them who are called , Jihudoyee and Aramoyee , the Meshiha is the power of Aloha , and the wisdom of Aloha .
46001025	For the foolishness of Aloha is wiser than men , and the weakness of Aloha is stronger than men .
46001026	For you see also your calling , my brethren , that not many among you are wise after the flesh , and not many among you are powerful , and not many among you are of noble birth ;
46001027	but Aloha hath chosen the simple of the world , to shame the wise , and he hath chosen the weak of the world , to shame the mighty ,
46001028	and he hath chosen those of low birth in the world , and the outcasts , and those who are nothing , to bring to nothing those who are ;
46001029	that no flesh may boast before him .
46001030	But you are of him in Jeshu Meshiha , who hath been made unto us wisdom , of Aloha , and righteousness and sanctification and redemption ;
46001031	according as it is written , He who boasteth , in the Lord let him boast .
46002001	And I , my brethren , when I came to you , not with grandeur of speech , nor with wisdom , did I evangelize to you the mystery of Aloha .
46002002	And I considered myself among you as not knowing any thing unless Jeshu Meshiha , and him also as crucified .
46002003	And I in much fear and trembling was with you .
46002004	And my speech and my preaching were not with the persuasion of the words of wisdom , but with the demonstration of the Spirit and of power ;
46002005	that your faith might not be through the wisdom of men , but through the power of Aloha .
46002006	But we speak wisdom among the perfect : not the wisdom of this world , nor the authorities of this world , which are abolished ;
46002007	but we speak the wisdom of Aloha in the mystery which was hidden , and which Aloha predetermined from before the worlds unto our glorification ;
46002008	which not one of the authorities of this world hath known ; for if they had known it , the Lord of glory they would not have crucified .
46002009	But as it is written , The eye hath not seen , Nor the ear heard , Nor the heart of man hath risen ( to ) , That which Aloha hath prepared for those who love him .
46002010	BUT unto us hath Aloha revealed , by his Spirit . For the Spirit all things searcheth , also the depths of Aloha .
46002011	For what man knoweth what is in man , save the spirit of a man which is in him ? so also that which is in Aloha man knoweth not , but only the Spirit of Aloha .
46002012	But we not the spirit of this world have received , but the Spirit who is from Aloha , that we might know that the gifts from Aloha are given unto us ;
46002013	which also we speak , not with the learning of words of wisdom of men , but with the learning of the Spirit ; and with spirituals the spirituals we compare .
46002014	For the man who is animal receiveth not spirituals , for they are foolishness to him , and he cannot know them , because they by the Spirit are judged of ;
46002015	but the spiritual judgeth of every thing , and he of man is not judged .
46002016	For who hath known the mind of the Lord to teach him ? But we have the mind of the Meshiha .
46003001	AND I , my brethren , could not speak with you as with the spiritual , but as with the carnal , and as with babes in the Meshiha .
46003002	I have sustained you with milk , and have not given you meat ; for as yet you could not , nor can you now , ( bear it ) .
46003003	For as yet you are in the flesh . For while there are among you envy and contentions and divisions , are you not carnal , and walking in the flesh ?
46003004	For while some of you say , I am of Paulos , and another , I am of Apollo , are you not carnal ?
46003005	For who is Paulos , or who Apollo , but ministers by whom you have believed and each as the Lord gave to him ?
46003006	I have planted , and Apollo watered , but Aloha made to increase .
46003007	He then who planteth is not any thing nor he who watereth ; but Aloha who maketh to increase .
46003008	But he who planteth and he who watereth are one , ( and ) each according to his labour his recompence receiveth .
46003009	For with Aloha we work ; and the work of Aloha and the edifice of Aloha are you .
46003010	And according to the grace of Aloha which is given to me , I have laid the foundation as a wise architect ; but another hath built upon it .
46003011	But let every man beware how he buildeth upon it . For another foundation besides this which is laid no man can lay , ( that , namely , ) which is Jeshu the Meshiha .
46003012	And if any man build upon this foundation gold , or silver , or precious stones ; or wood , or hay , or stubble ;
46003013	the work of every one shall be revealed , for that day shall reveal it ; for by the fire shall it be revealed , and the work of every man as it is the fire shall distinguish .
46003014	And he whose work which he builded shall abide , will receive his recompense ;
46003015	and he whose work shall be burned , shall fail ; but he ( himself ) shall be rescued , but so as from fire .
46003016	KNOW YOU not that you are the temple of Aloha , and ( that ) the Spirit of Aloha inhabiteth in you ?
46003017	Whoso destroyeth the temple of Aloha , him will Aloha destroy for the temple of Aloha is holy , which you are .
46003018	Let no man deceive himself . Whoever among you supposeth himself wise in this world , let him become foolish , that he may be wise .
46003019	For the wisdom of this world is folly with Aloha ; for it is written , He hath taken the wise in their own craftiness .
46003020	And again , The Lord knoweth the thoughts of the wise , that they are vain .
46003021	On this account let no one boast in men : for every thing is yours ;
46003022	whether Paulos , or Apolo , or Kipha , or the world , or life , or death , or things standing , or things to be ; every thing is yours ,
46003023	and you are of the Meshiha , and the Meshiha of Aloha .
46004001	Thus let us be accounted of you as ministers of the Meshiha , and stewards of the mysteries of Aloha .
46004002	So now is it required of a steward that he be one found faithful .
46004003	But to me it is a little thing to be Judged by you , or by any man ; neither do I judge myself ,
46004004	for of nothing in myself am I conscious ; but not by this am I justified , but my judge is the Lord .
46004005	Therefore , do not judge before the time , until the Lord come , who will bring to light the hidden things of darkness , and reveal the thoughts of hearts . Then will there be praise to each man from Aloha .
46004006	BUT these things , my brethren , for your sakes I have applied to the person of myself and of Apolo , that through us you may learn not to think of us beyond what is written ; and that one above his neighbour may not be exalted on account of any thing .
46004007	For who distinguisheth thee ? Or , what hast thou which thou hast not received ? And if thou hast received , why dost thou boast as if thou hadst not received ?
46004008	Now you are satiated , and are rich , and without us have reigned . But I would that you did reign , that we might also reign with you !
46004009	But I consider that us , the apostles , Aloha hath set last , as unto death , to be a spectacle to the world , to angels , and to men ,
46004010	We are fools for the sake of the Meshiha , but we are wise in the Meshiha ; we are the weak , but you are the mighty ; you are glorified , and we abased .
46004011	Until this hour we hunger and thirst , we are naked and beaten and have no fixed dwelling ;
46004012	and we labour , working with our hands . They revile us , and we bless ; they persecute us , and we endure ;
46004013	they maltreat us , and we pray for them ; as the refuse of the world are we made and the execration of all men until now .
46004014	Not as to shame you write I these things , but as my beloved children I admonish ( you ) .
46004015	For if you have ten thousand teachers in the Meshiha , yet not many fathers ; for in Jeshu Meshiha I have begotten you through the gospel .
46004016	I entreat then of you that you be like me .
46004017	WHEREFORE I have sent to you Timotheos , who is my beloved son , and faithful in the Lord , that he may remind you of my ways in the Meshiha , according to that which I teach in all the churches .
46004018	But as if I were not coming to you , some of you are inflated .
46004019	But if the Lord will , quickly come I unto you ; and I will know not the words of them who exalt themselves , but their power .
46004020	For the kingdom of Aloha is not in word , but in power .
46004021	How are you willing ? with a rod shall I come to you , or with love and with the spirit of kindliness ?
46005001	Fornication is commonly reported among you ; and such fornication as is not heard among the Heathens , that the son should take the wife of his father .
46005002	And you are inflated ; but should you not rather sit in grief that he who hath wrought this work might be put away from you ?
46005003	But I , while distant from you in body , am near you in spirit , and now judge , as if near you , him who hath done this ;
46005004	that in the name of our Lord Jeshu Meshiha all of you be assembled , and I with you in spirit , with the power of our Lord Jeshu Meshiha ,
46005005	and you deliver this ( man ) to Satana for the destruction of his body , that in spirit he may be saved in the day of our Lord Jeshu Meshiha .
46005006	MY brethren , your boasting is not seemly . Know you not that a little leaven the whole mass leaveneth ?
46005007	Purge from you the old leaven , that you may be a new mass ; so that you may be ( as ) unleavened bread . For our Pascha is the Meshiha , who hath been slain for us .
46005008	Therefore , let us perform the festival , not with the old leaven , nor with the leaven of wickedness and animosity , but with the unleavened bread of purity and of holiness .
46005009	I have written to you by epistle , not to be mixed with fornicators ;
46005010	but I do not say with fornicators who are in this world , nor speak I concerning the covetous , or the rapacious , or the servers of idols ; otherwise you would be obligated from the world also to go forth .
46005011	But this which I have written to you , Be not mixed , ( is , ) If any one who is called a brother be a fornicator , or covetous , or a worshipper of idols , or a reviler , or a drunkard , or rapacious , with one who is such as he not to eat bread .
46005012	For what had I to judge those who are without ? But you judge those who are within ;
46005013	but those who are without , Aloha judgeth : and put away the wicked one from among you .
46006001	DARE any of you , having a suit with his brother , to litigate before the evil , and not before the saints ?
46006002	Or know you not that the saints shall judge the world ? And if the world by you is judged , are you not worthy to judge small matters ?
46006003	Know you not that you are to judge angels ? How much more those ( matters ) which are of this world ?
46006004	But if you have matters to be judged regarding the world , those who are little-esteemed in the church make you to sit in judgment .
46006005	But to your reproach am I to say to you , So there is not among you even one wise man , who is able to adjust between a brother and his brother ?
46006006	But a brother with his brother litigates , and , moreover , before those who are unbelievers !
46006007	Now , therefore , you make yourselves guilty while you have litigation one with another . For why do you not bear injury ? and why do you not suffer fraud ?
46006008	But you injure , and you defraud , also your brethren !
46006009	Or , know you not that the unjust the kingdom of Aloha cannot inherit ? Do not err ; neither fornicators , nor the servers of idols , nor adulterers , nor corrupters , nor liers with men , nor the oppressive ,
46006010	nor thieves , nor drunkards , nor revilers , nor the rapacious , the kingdom of Aloha can inherit .
46006011	And these were some of you but you are washed , and sanctified , and justified in the name of our Lord Jeshu Meshiha , and by the Spirit of our God .
46006012	ALL ( food ) is lawful to me , but all is not expedient for me . All is lawful to me , but over me no one shall have power .
46006013	Food is for the belly , and the belly for food ; but Aloha will abolish them both . But the body was not for fornication , but for our Lord , and our Lord for the body .
46006014	And Aloha hath raised up our Lord , and us will raise by his power .
46006015	Know you not that your bodies are members of the Meshiha ? Shall one take a member of the Meshiha to make it a member of a harlot ? Never !
46006016	Know you not that whosoever attacheth to a harlot is one body ? For it is said , The two shall be one body .
46006017	But , he who attacheth to our Lord is with him one spirit .
46006018	Flee from fornication : for every sin which a man committeth is without his body ; but he who committeth fornication against his own body sinneth .
46006019	Or , know you not that your body is the temple of the Spirit of Holiness , who dwelleth in you , ( even ) Him whom you have received from Aloha ? And you are not your own ,
46006020	for you are bought with the price ; therefore glorify Aloha in your body and in your spirit , which are of Aloha .
46007001	BUT concerning those ( questions ) of which you wrote to me , It is well for a man unto a woman not to come nigh ;
46007002	but , because of fornication , let a man take his wife , and let a woman take her husband .
46007003	And let a man render the love that is due unto his wife ;
46007004	so also the wife to her husband . For the wife hath not authority over her body , but the husband ; so also the man hath not authority over his body , but his wife .
46007005	Defraud not then one the other , unless you both agree for a time , that you may humble yourselves by fasting and by prayer ; and return again unto the same will , that Satana may not tempt you on account of the desire of your bodies .
46007006	But this I speak as to the infirm ; ( and ) not from commandment .
46007007	For I would that all men were as I am , in chastity . But every man hath the gift given to him from Aloha , this one thus , and the other thus .
46007008	But I say to those who have no wives , and to the widows , that it is expedient for them to remain as I do .
46007009	Yet , if they persevere not , they should marry ; for it is better to take a wife than to burn with concupiscence .
46007010	But those who have wives I command , yet not I , but my Lord , that the wife from her husband separate not .
46007011	Yet , if she separate , let her remain without a man , or unto her husband be reconciled . And let not a man put away his wife .
46007012	But to the rest I say , not my Lord , If a brother hath a wife who is not a believer , and she be willing to dwell with him , let him not put her away .
46007013	And any woman who has an husband unbelieving , and he willeth to dwell with her , let her not put away her husband .
46007014	For the man who believeth not is sanctified by the wife who believeth ; and any wife who believeth not is sanctified by the husband who believeth ; otherwise their children would be unclean ; but now are they clean .
46007015	But if he who believeth not separate , let him separate ; a brother or a sister is not in servitude to these : unto peace Aloha hath called us .
46007016	For how knowest thou , wife , whether thou mayest save thy husband ? Or knowest thou , man , if thy wife thou mayest save ?
46007017	But ( according as ) the Lord hath distributed to every one , as Aloha hath called , so let him walk ; and thus in all the churches , so I direct .
46007018	If a man circumcised hath been called , let him not turn to uncircumcision ; and if in uncircumcision he hath been called , let him not be circumcised .
46007019	For circumcision is not any thing , nor uncircumcision , but the observances of the commandments of Aloha .
46007020	Let every man in the calling in which he hath been called remain .
46007021	If a servant thou wast called , be not careful , but , if also thou canst be made free , choose that thou shouldest serve .
46007022	For he who a servant is called in the Lord , is the freeman of Aloha , so he who as a son of freedom is called , is a servant of the Meshiha .
46007023	With a price are you bought ; you will not be servants of men .
46007024	Every one in that in which he was called , my brethren , in it let him remain unto Aloha .
46007025	BUT respecting virginity , a commandment from Aloha I have not received ; but I give counsel as a man who hath had grace from Aloha to be faithful .
46007026	And I consider that this is good , on account of the necessity of the time , that it is expedient for a man so to be .
46007027	Art thou bound to a wife ? seek not to be loosed . Art thou loosed from a wife ? seek not a wife .
46007028	Yet , if thou takest a wife , thou sinnest not ; and if a virgin shall be to a husband , she sinneth not . Yet affliction in the body will be to them who are such ; but I am sparing over you .
46007029	And this I say , my brethren , that the time now becomes contracted ; and they who have wives should be as not having them ;
46007030	and they who weep , as not weeping ; and they who rejoice , as not rejoicing ; and they who buy , as not possessing ;
46007031	and they who use this world should not exceed the just use ; for the fashion of this world passeth away .
46007032	Wherefore I would that you be without anxiety ; for he who hath not a wife thinketh of the things of his Lord , that so he may please his Lord ;
46007033	and he who hath a wife is anxious for the world , that so he may please his wife .
46007034	But there is a distinction between the wife and the virgin . She who hath no man is thoughtful of the things of her Lord , that she may be holy in her body and in her spirit ; and she who hath a husband is thoughtful of the world , that so she may please her husband .
46007035	But this for your own profit speak I ; not to throw a snare over you , but that you may be constant towards your Lord in a comely manner , while not thoughtful of the world .
46007036	But if a man consider it to be dishonourable toward his virgin , who hath passed her time , that he hath not given her to the man , ( and ) that it is proper that he should give her ; as he willeth let him act , he sinneth not : let them marry .
46007037	But he who hath firmly decided in his own mind , and nothing constraineth him , and ( who hath ) power in his will , and thus judgeth in his heart , that he will keep his virgin , doeth well .
46007038	And he then who giveth his virgin doeth well , and he who giveth not his virgin doeth better .
46007039	The wife , so long as her husband liveth , is bound by the law ; but if her husband shall die , she is free , that she may do what she willeth , only in our Lord .
46007040	But it is good if thus she remain , according to my own mind . But I think also that the Spirit of Aloha is in me .
46008001	RESPECTING the sacrifices of idols , we know that in all of us there is knowledge ; and knowledge inflateth , but love buildeth up .
46008002	But if a man think that he knows any thing , he knows nothing yet as it behoves him to know :
46008003	but if a man love Aloha , this ( one ) is acknowledged of him .
46008004	Concerning the meat of the sacrifices of idols , then , we know that an idol is nothing in the world , and that there is no other God but one .
46008005	For there are also who are called gods , whether in heaven or in earth , as that there are gods many and lords many :
46008006	but to us our One is Aloha the Father , of whom are all , and we in him ; and one Lord Jeshu Meshiha , by whom are all , and we by him .
46008007	But not in every man is this knowledge ; for there are some who in their conscience until now ( believe ) that , with respect to idols , as of that which hath been sacrificed we eat . And because of weakness their conscience is defiled .
46008008	But meat doth not bring us nigh to Aloha . For if we eat , we excel not ; nor if we eat not , are we deficient .
46008009	But beware that this your power become not a stumbling-block to the infirm ones .
46008010	For if a man shall see thee in whom is knowledge reclining in the house of idols , will not his conscience , because he is weak , be confirmed to eat that which is sacrificed ,
46008011	and he will perish through thy knowledge ? he who is weak , and on account of whom the Meshiha died .
46008012	And if so you transgress against your brethren , and wound their weak consciences , do you not transgress against the Meshiha ?
46008013	On this account , if meat cause my brother to stumble , I will never ( more ) eat flesh , that I may not cause my brother to stumble .
46009001	Am I not a son of freedom ? am I not an apostle ? or have I not seen Jeshu Meshiha our Lord ? or are not you my work in my Lord ?
46009002	And if to others I be not an apostle , yet am I ( such ) to you ; and the seal of my apostleship are you .
46009003	My apology to them who judge me is this :
46009004	Have we not authority to eat and to drink ?
46009005	or have we not authority a sister , a wife , to lead about with us , as the rest of the apostles , and as the brethren of our Lord , and as Kipha ?
46009006	Or have I only , and Bar Naba , not authority to forbear from labour ?
46009007	Who serveth at service at the expenses of himself ? or who planteth the vinery , and from the fruits thereof eateth not ? or who pastureth sheep , and from the milk of the flock eateth not ?
46009008	Do I as a man speak these things ? Behold , the law also saith these things .
46009009	For it is written in the law of Musha , Thou shalt not muzzle the ox that treadeth out ( the corn ) . But of oxen is Aloha careful ?
46009010	But it is evident that on our account this is said ; for on our account it is written , because that in hope it behoveth the ploughman to plough , and him who thresheth , in hope of provision ( to thresh ) .
46009011	If we of the spirit have sown among you , is it a great thing if we from you of the body shall reap ?
46009012	And if others have this power over you , much more have we . But we are not used in this power ; but we bear all , lest in any thing we should hinder the gospel of the Meshiha .
46009013	KNOW you not that they who serve in the sanctuary from the sanctuary are sustained ? And they who at the altar serve share with the altar ?
46009014	So also our Lord hath commanded , that they who his gospel preach , by his gospel shall live .
46009015	But I am not used in one of these ; nor on this account have I thus written , that so it should be done unto me : for it were better for me that dying I should die , than that any man my glorying should make void .
46009016	Yet also in preaching I have no cause to glory : for necessity lieth upon me ; for woe to me unless I preach !
46009017	For if with my will I do this , I have a reward . But if without my will , ( yet ) a stewardship is confided to me .
46009018	What , then , is my reward ? That while preaching without expenses I may perform the annunciation of the Meshiha , and not abuse the power that is given to me in the gospel .
46009019	For while free of all men , to all men I subject myself , that the many I may gain .
46009020	And I become with the Jihudoyee as a Jihudoya , that the Jihudoyee I may gain ; and with them who are under the law , I become as one under the law , that them who are under the law I may gain ;
46009021	and to those who have not the law I become as one without law , while I am not unto Aloha without law , but in the law of the Meshiha , that them also who have not law I may gain .
46009022	I become with the weak as weak , that the weak I may gain . To all men all become I , that every man I may save .
46009023	But this I do that I may be a participator in the gospel .
46009024	Know you not , that they who run in the course , run all , but one taketh to him the victory ? So run , that you may take hold .
46009025	For every man who contendeth from every thing ( besides with ) holdeth his mind ; and they who run ( do it ) that they may receive a crown that is corruptible , but we one that is incorruptible .
46009026	I therefore so run , not as about a thing unknown ; and so smite I , as not smiting the air ;
46009027	but my body I subdue and make subservient , lest when to others I shall have preached , I my very self shall be rejected .
46010001	BUT I would that you know , my brethren , that all our fathers were under the cloud ,
46010002	and all of them in the sea were baptized , and all by
46010003	Musha were baptized in the cloud and in the sea , and all of them ate one spiritual food , and all of them drank one spiritual drink ;
46010004	for they drank of that spiritual Rock which went with them , - but that Rock was the Meshiha himself .
46010005	But not with many of them was Aloha pleased ; for they fell in the desert .
46010006	But these became an example for us ; that we should not desire evils , as they desired ;
46010007	nor also be servers of idols , as some of them served ; as it is written , The people sat down to eat and to drink , and rose up to play ;
46010008	nor commit fornication , as some of them committed , and fell , in one day , twenty and three thousand ;
46010009	nor tempt the Meshiha , as also ( some ) of them tempted , and perished by serpents .
46010010	Neither murmur you , as some of them murmured , and perished by the hand of the destroyer .
46010011	For all these which happened to them were unto us an example , and were written for our instruction , upon whom come the ends of the world .
46010012	Whoever then thinketh he standeth , let him beware that he fall not .
46010013	Temptation cometh not ( upon ) you but what cometh on mankind ; but faithful is Aloha , who will not permit you to be tempted more than you are able , but will make to your temptation a departure , that you may be able to endure .
46010014	WHEREFORE , my beloved , flee from the worship of idols .
46010015	As to the wise I speak ; judge what I say .
46010016	The cup of thanksgiving which we bless , is it not the participation of the blood of the Meshiha ? And the bread that we break , is it not the participation of the body of the Meshiha ?
46010017	As , then , one is that bread , so are we one body : for all we that one bread receive .
46010018	Consider Israel who are in the flesh : are not they who eat of the sacrifices participators of the altar ?
