46010019	What then do I say ? that an idol is any thing , or ( that ) the sacrifice of an idol is any thing ?
46010020	No : but that which the Heathens sacrifice , unto demons they sacrifice , and not unto Aloha . But I would not that you be participators with demons !
46010021	You cannot drink the cup of our Lord , and the cup of demons ; and you cannot participate in the table of our Lord , and in the table of demons .
46010022	Or , do we provoke the Lord ? are we stronger than he ?
46010023	Every thing is lawful for me , but every thing is not expedient ; every thing is lawful , but every thing doth not edify .
46010024	Let no man seek his own ( only ) , but every man also ( the profit ) of his neighbour .
46010025	Whatsoever is sold in the shambles eat , without inquiry on account of conscience :
46010026	for the earth is the Lord's , and its fulness .
46010027	But if a man of the Heathens invite you , and you be willing to go , whatever is set before you eat , without inquiry on account of conscience .
46010028	But , if one tell you , This is of a sacrifice , eat not , for his sake who hath told you , and on account of conscience ;
46010029	but I say , the conscience , not yours , but his who told you . But why is my liberty to be ruled by the conscience of others ?
46010030	But if I use ( these things ) by grace , why am I calumniated concerning that for which I give thanks ?
46010031	Whether therefore you eat or drink , or whatsoever you do , do all to the glory of Aloha .
46010032	Give no offence to Jihudoyee , or to Aramoyee , or to the church of Aloha .
46010033	As also I in every thing please all men , not seeking what is expedient for myself , but what is expedient for the many , that they may be saved .
46011001	Be imitators of me , as I am of the Meshiha .
46011002	But I commend you , my brethren , that in every thing you remember me ; and that as I have delivered to you precepts , you hold them .
46011003	But I would that you know that the Meshiha is the head of every man ; and the head of the woman is the man , and the head of the Meshiha is Aloha .
46011004	Every man who prayeth or prophesieth having his head covered , dishonoureth his head .
46011005	And every woman who prayeth or prophesieth having her head uncovered , dishonoureth her head , for she is similar to one whose head is shaven .
46011006	For if a woman be not covered , let her be shorn ; but if it be shameful for a woman to be shorn or shaven , let her be covered .
46011007	For a man is not obligated to cover his head , because he is the likeness and the glory of Aloha ; but woman is the glory of man .
46011008	For the man is not from woman , but the woman is from man .
46011009	Neither was the man created for the sake of woman , but woman for the sake of man .
46011010	Because of this the woman is a debtor , that the power shall be upon her head , on account of the angels .
46011011	Nevertheless man is not without woman , neither is woman without man , in our Lord .
46011012	For as a woman is from man , so is man by woman ; but every thing is from Aloha .
46011013	Judge among yourselves , Is it comely for a woman with her head revealed to pray to Aloha ?
46011014	Does not nature itself teach you , that when a man's hair standeth , it is a disgrace to him ?
46011015	But when a woman increaseth her hair , it is a glory to her ; because her hair for a covering was given to her .
46011016	But if any man contendeth about these things , we have no such usage as this , neither the church of Aloha .
46011017	But this I prescribe not as praising you , because you go not forward , but to the less you descend .
46011018	For , first , when you are assembled in the church , there are divisions , ( as ) I hear , among you , and in some measure I believe .
46011019	For it is to be that contentions be among you , that they who are approved with you may be known .
46011020	When then you are assembled , not as befitteth the day of the Lord you eat and drink ,
46011021	but each man his own supper before eateth , and one is hungry , and one drunken .
46011022	What ? have you not houses ( in ) which to eat and drink ? Or do you despise the church of Aloha , and shame those who have nothing to eat ? What do I say to you ? Do I praise you in this ? I praise you not .
46011023	FOR I received from our Lord that which I have delivered unto you : that our Lord Jeshu in that night when he was betrayed took bread ;
46011024	and he blessed and brake , and said , Take , eat , this ( is ) my body which for you is broken : so do to my remembrance .
46011025	Likewise after they had supped he gave also the cup , and said , This cup is the new covenant in my blood ; so do , whensoever you shall drink ( it ) to my remembrance .
46011026	For whensoever you eat this bread , and drink this cup , the death of our Lord you commemorate until his advent .
46011027	Whoever then eateth of the bread of the Lord , and drinketh of his cup , and is not worthy of it , is guilty of the blood of the Lord and of his body .
46011028	On this account a man should prove himself , and then eat of this bread , and drink of this cup .
46011029	For whoever eateth and drinketh of it while not worthy , condemnation to himself he eateth and drinketh , because he hath not distinguished the body of the Lord .
46011030	On this account many among you are sick and infirm , and many who sleep .
46011031	For if we judge ourselves , we shall not be judged .
46011032	But when we are judged of our Lord , we are chastised , that not with the world we might be condemned .
46011033	Wherefore , my brethren , when you assemble to eat , wait for one another .
46011034	But whoever hungereth , in his ( own ) house let him feed ; that you may not assemble unto condemnation . Concerning the rest , when I come I will direct you .
46012001	BUT concerning spirituals , my brethren , I wish you to know
46012002	that you were Heathens , and unto idols which have no voice you were led without discernment .
46012003	I therefore make known to you , that there is no man who by the Spirit of Aloha speaketh , and saith that Jeshu is accursed ; and no man also can say that Jeshu is THE LORD unless by the Spirit of Holiness .
46012004	Now , there are distributions of gifts , but one is the Spirit ;
46012005	and there are distributions of ministries , but one is the Lord ;
46012006	and distributions of powers , but one is Aloha , who worketh all in every man .
46012007	But to each is given ( such ) a revelation of the Spirit as is profitable to him .
46012008	To one is given by the Spirit the word of wisdom , but to another the word of knowledge by the same Spirit ;
46012009	and to another , faith by the same Spirit ; and to another , the gifts of healing by the same Spirit ;
46012010	but to another , powers ; to another , prophecy ; to another , the discernment of spirits ; but to another , kinds of tongues ; and to another , the interpretation of tongues .
46012011	But all these one Spirit effecteth , and divideth unto every man as he willeth .
46012012	For , as the body is one , and in it are many members , but all the members of the body , though many , are one body ; so also is the Meshiha .
46012013	For we all by one Spirit into one body are baptized ; whether Jihudoyee or Aramoyee ; whether servants or sons of freedom ; and all of us have imbibed one Spirit .
46012014	For the body also is not one member , but many .
46012015	For if the foot should say , Because I am not the hand , I am not of the body itself , would it therefore not be of the body itself ?
46012016	And if the ear should say , Because I am not the eye , I am not of the body itself , would it therefore not be of the body itself ?
46012017	For if the whole body were the eye , where would be the hearing ? And if the whole were hearing , where would be the smelling ?
46012018	But now hath Aloha set all the members severally in the body as he willed .
46012019	But if all were one member , where would be the body ?
46012020	But now the members are many , but the body one .
46012021	The eye is not able to say to the hand , Thou art not needful to me ; nor is the hand able to say to the feet , You are not needful to me .
46012022	But those members which are considered to be feeble , of them is the more especial need ;
46012023	and those which we consider contemptible in the body , to these the more we increase the honour ; and on those which are of shame we bestow the greater decoration .
46012024	But those members that are honourable in us have no need of adornment : but Aloha hath contempered the body , and given the more honour to the member which is inconsiderable ;
46012025	that there should be no divisions in the body , but all the members equally one of the other should have care :
46012026	as that when one member shall be diseased , all may suffer ; and if one member be glorified , all the members may be glorified .
46012027	But you are the body of the Meshiha , and members in your place .
46012028	FOR Aloha hath placed in the church , first , apostles ; after them , prophets ; after them , teachers ; after them , workers of miracles ; after them , gifts of healing , and helpers , and leaders , and kinds of tongues .
46012029	Are all apostles ? Are all prophets ? Are all teachers ? Are all workers of miracles ?
46012030	Have all the gifts of healing ? Do all speak with tongues , or do all interpret ?
46012031	But if you are emulous of great gifts , I will yet show you a way more admirable .
46013001	Though in every tongue of men and of angels I spoke , and had not love , I should be as brass which soundeth , or a cymbal which giveth voice .
46013002	And though there were in me prophecy , and I knew all mysteries , and all knowledge , and though there were in me all faith , as that I could remove the mountain , and love were not in me , I should be nothing .
46013003	And if all I have I make to feed the poor , and I deliver my body to burn , and love be not in me , I profit nothing .
46013004	LOVE is patient and benign ; love envieth not ; love is not tumultuous , nor inflated ;
46013005	it acteth not with unseemliness , nor seeketh its own ; it is not angry , nor thoughtful of evil ;
46013006	it rejoiceth not in iniquity , but rejoiceth in the truth .
46013007	It endureth every thing , believeth every thing ; it hopeth all , endureth all .
46013008	Love never falleth ; for prophecies shall be abolished , and tongues be silent , and knowledge be abolished :
46013009	for it is a little of much that we know , and a little of much we prophesy ;
46013010	but when the perfection shall have come , then shall be abolished that which is little .
46013011	When I was a child , as a child I spake , and as a child I thought , and as a child I reasoned ; but when I had become a man I abolished these things of childhood .
46013012	But now as in a mirror we see in a figure ; but then- the face before the face . Now I know a little of much ; but then shall I know even as I am known .
46013013	For these are the three that remain , faith and hope and love ; but the greatest of these is love .
46014001	Follow ( then ) after love , and be emulous of the gifts of the Spirit , but especially that you may prophesy .
46014002	For whoever speaketh in a tongue speaketh not to men but to Aloha ; for man heareth nothing that he speaketh but in the Spirit he speaketh mysteries .
46014003	But he who prophesieth speaketh to men , edification and encouragement and consolation .
46014004	He who speaketh in a tongue himself edifieth , and he who prophesieth the church edifieth .
46014005	But I would that all of you could speak with tongues , but especially that you could prophesy . For greater is he who prophesieth than he who speaketh with tongues , unless he interpret . But if he interpret , he edifieth the church .
46014006	And now , my brethren , if I come to you and speak with you in tongues , what do I profit you , unless I speak with you , or by revelation , or by knowledge , or by prophecy , or by doctrine ?
46014007	For those also which have no life in them , and give voice , whether pipe or harp , if distinction be not made between a tone and its fellow , how can it be known what is sung , or what is played ?
46014008	And if the trumpet call a voice which is not distinguished , who will prepare for the battle ?
46014009	So you also , if you speak the word in a tongue , and there be no interpretation , how will it be known what you say ? Will you not be as if speaking with the air ?
46014010	For , behold , there are many kinds of tongues in the world , and not one of them hath not signification ;
46014011	but if I do not know the power of the voice , I become as a barbarian to him who speaks , and he also who speaks is a barbarian to me .
46014012	So also you , while you are emulous of the gifts of the Spirit for the edification of the church , seek that you may excel .
46014013	And let him who speaketh with tongues pray that he may interpret .
46014014	For if I am praying in a tongue , my spirit prayeth , but my mind is without fruit .
46014015	What shall I do then ? I will pray with my spirit , and I will pray with my mind ; and I will sing with my spirit , and I will sing with my mind .
46014016	Otherwise , if thou bless with the spirit , how shall he who filleth the place of the unlearned say Amen to thy thanksgiving ? for he knoweth not what thou sayest .
46014017	For thou blessest well , but thy neighbour is not edified .
46014018	I praise Aloha that more than all of you I speak with tongues ;
46014019	but in the church I would rather speak five words with my mind , that others also may learn , than ten thousand words in a tongue .
46014020	MY brethren , be not children in your minds , but in evils be you babes , and in your minds be perfect .
46014021	In the law it is written , In a strange language and in another tongue Will I speak with this people ; Yet so will they not hear me , saith the Lord .
46014022	Hence , tongues are appointed for a sign , not to the believing , but to those who believe not : but prophecy , not for those who believe not , but for those who believe .
46014023	If then all the church be assembled , and all of you speak with tongues , and the ignorant , or those who believe not enter , will they not say you are insane ?
46014024	And if all should prophesy , and there come in to you the ignorant , or of those who believe not , he is convicted by you all , and reproved by you all ;
46014025	and the secrets of his heart are revealed ; and then will he fall upon his face and worship Aloha , and say , Truly Aloha is in you .
46014026	I say then , my brethren , that when you are assembled , if any one of you hath a psalm , let him speak ; and ( so too ) he who hath doctrine , and he who hath a revelation , and he who hath a tongue , and he who hath the interpretation : let all be done unto edification .
46014027	And if with a tongue any one speak , two shall speak , or at most three , and each shall ( separately ) speak , and one interpret .
46014028	And if there be no one who interpreteth , let him who speaketh with a tongue be silent in the church , and between himself and Aloha let him speak .
46014029	Let the prophets speak , two or three , and let the rest discern .
46014030	And if to another be revealed while sitting , let the first be silent .
46014031	For one by one you can all prophesy , that each may learn , and each be edified .
46014032	For the spirit of the prophets to the prophets is subject .
46014033	Because Aloha is not of tumult , but of peace , as in all the churches of the saints .
46014034	LET your women in the church be silent ; for it is not permitted to them to speak , but to be subject , as also saith the law .
46014035	But if any wish to learn , in their houses let them ask their husbands ; for it is a shame for a woman to speak in the church .
46014036	Was it from you that the word of Aloha went forth ? Or did it come only to you ?
46014037	But if any man of you think that he is a prophet , or that he is spiritual , let him acknowledge these which I write to you to be the commandments of our Lord .
46014038	But if any man know not , let him not know .
46014039	Be emulous , therefore , my brethren , to prophesy , and to speak with tongues forbid not ;
46014040	but let every thing be done with decency and in order .
46015001	BUT I make known to you , my brethren , the gospel which I have announced to you , and you have received , and in which you stand ,
46015002	and by which you are saved ; of which , the word I have preached to you , you are mindful , unless you have vainly believed .
46015003	For I delivered to you from the first , according as I had received : That the Meshiha died for our sins , as it is written ;
46015004	and that he was buried , and arose the third day , as it is written .
46015005	And he was seen of Kipha , and after him , of the twelve ,
46015006	and after them , he was seen of more than five hundred brethren together , many of whom survive till now , and some of them have slept .
46015007	And afterward he was seen of Jakub , and after him of all the apostles :
46015008	but last of them all , as of an abortion , he was seen also of me .
46015009	I am the least of the apostles , and am not worthy to be called an apostle , because I persecuted the church of Aloha :
46015010	but by the grace of Aloha I am what I am ; and his grace in me was not in vain ; but more than all have I laboured , ( yet ) not I , but his grace which is with me .
46015011	Whether I then , or they , so we have proclaimed , and so have you believed .
46015012	But if the Meshiha is proclaimed that he rose from the dead , how are there among you some who say that there is no life for the dead ?
46015013	And if there be no life for the dead , ( then ) neither hath the Meshiha risen .
46015014	And if the Meshiha hath not risen , vain is our proclamation , and vain also your faith .
46015015	But we are also found false witnesses of Aloha ; for we have testified of Aloha that he hath raised the Meshiha , while he hath not raised ( him ) .
46015016	For if the dead rise not , Meshiha also hath not risen
46015017	and if Meshiha hath not risen , your faith is made void and you are still in your sins .
46015018	And already have they too who have slept in Meshiha perished .
46015019	And if in this life only we hope in the Meshiha , more miserable are we than all men .
46015020	BUT now hath the Meshiha risen from among the dead , and become the first-fruits of those who sleep .
46015021	And as by man was death , so also by man is the life of the dead .
46015022	For as in Adam all men die , so also in the Meshiha are all made alive :
46015023	every one in his order : the first-fruits was the Meshiha ; afterward they who are of the Meshiha at his coming .
46015024	And then will be the end , when he delivereth the kingdom unto Aloha the Father ; when he abolisheth every head , and all authority and all powers .
46015025	For it is to be that he shall reign until he hath set all his adversaries beneath his feet ,
46015026	and the last enemy be abolished , ( which is ) death .
46015027	For every thing he subjecteth beneath his feet . But when he saith that every thing is subjected to him , it is evident that ( it is ) with the exception of him who hath subjected to him all .
46015028	And when all shall have been subjected to him , then the Son himself will be subjected to him who had made subject to him all , that Aloha may be all in all .
46015029	Else what shall they do who are baptized for the dead , if the dead arise not ? Why are they baptized for the dead ?
46015030	And why also every hour are we standing in peril ?
46015031	I asseverate , by your glorying , my brethren , which is mine in our Lord Jeshu Meshiha , that daily I die !
46015032	If as among men I have been thrown to beasts at Ephesus , what have I profited if the dead do not arise ? Let us eat and drink , for to-morrow we die .
46015033	Mistake not ; for Evil narrations corrupt well-disposed minds .
46015034	AWAKEN your hearts rightly , and sin not ; for there are some who have not the knowledge of Aloha ; to your shame I say it .
46015035	Some one of you will say , How arise the dead , and with what body come they ?
46015036	Fool , the seed which thou sowest , unless it die , lives not :
46015037	and that thing which thou sowest is not the body that is to be , but thou sowest naked grain , of wheat , or of barley , or of the rest of seeds ;
46015038	but Aloha giveth it a body as he willeth , and to each of the seeds a body of its own nature .
46015039	For every body is not alike : for there is one body of man , and another of the beast , and another of the fowl , and another of fishes .
46015040	There are heavenly bodies , and there are earthly bodies ; but one is the glory of the heavenly , and another of the earthly .
46015041	There is one glory of the sun , and another glory of the moon , and another glory of the stars ; and star excelleth star in glory .
46015042	So also is the life of the dead . They are sown in corruption , they arise without corruption .
46015043	They are sown in baseness , they arise in glory . They are sown in weakness , they arise in power .
46015044	It is sown an animal body , it ariseth a body spiritual . For there is a body of the animal , and there is a body of the spirit ;
46015045	as also it is written , Adam the first man became a living soul , and the last Adam a life-giving spirit .
46015046	But the spiritual was not first , but the animal ; and then the spiritual .
46015047	The first man who is of the earth is dust , the second man the Lord from heaven .
46015048	As was he who was dust , so also are they who are dust : as is he who is from heaven , so also are the heavenly ones .
46015049	And as we have worn the likeness of him who was dust , so shall we wear the likeness of him who is from heaven .
46015050	But this I say , my brethren , that flesh and blood cannot inherit the kingdom of heaven ; nor doth corruption inherit incorruption .
46015051	Behold , I tell you the mystery ; We shall not all sleep , but we all shall be changed :
46015052	suddenly , as in the twinkling of the eye , at the last trumpet , while it calleth ; and the dead will arise without corruption , and we shall be changed .
46015053	For this which is corruptible shall put on incorruption , and likewise ( this ) which dieth shall put on immortality .
46015054	But when this which is corruptible shall put on incorruptibleness , and this which dieth , immortality , then shall be done that word which is written , Death is swallowed up in victory !
46015055	Where is thy sting , Death ? and where is thy victory Shiul ?
46015056	But the sting of death is sin , and the strength of sin is the law .
46015057	But thanks be to Aloha , who giveth us the victory by the hand of our Lord Jeshu Meshiha .
46015058	Wherefore , my brethren , my beloved , be steadfast , be not moved , but be abounding in all time in the work of the Lord , while you know that your labour is not in vain in the Lord .
46016001	BUT concerning what is collected for the saints , as I have instructed the churches of Galatia , so also do you .
46016002	On each first day of the week let every one of you at his own house lay by and keep something of that which cometh unto his hands , lest when I come there be then collections .
46016003	And when I come , those whom you shall choose , them will I send with an epistle , that they may take your bounty to Urishlem .
46016004	But if it be a fit work that I too go ( thither ) , they also shall go with me .
46016005	But I will come to you when I shall have passed ( round ) from Makedunia : for I pass unto it , unto Makedunia .
46016006	And perhaps also I may remain with you , or I may winter with you , that you may lead me on to the place to which I shall go .
46016007	For I will not now see you as I pass the way ; for I hope to abide a time with you , if my Lord permit me .
46016008	For I remain at Ephesos until the Pentecost .
46016009	For a great door is opened to me , which is full of labours , and the opposers are many .
46016010	But if Timotheos come among you , see that he may be with you without fear ; for he doeth the work of the Lord , as I .
46016011	Wherefore let no man despise him , but conduct him in peace , that he may come to me ; for I wait for him with the brethren .
46016012	But of Apolo , my brethren , I begged much to come to you with the brethren ; nevertheless it was not his will to come to you ; but when there shall be opportunity he will come to you .
46016013	WATCH , and stand in the faith ; be manful and be strong .
46016014	And let all your affairs be done in love .
46016015	But I entreat of you , my brethren , for the house of Stephano , because you know they are the first-fruits of Akaia , and have disposed themselves for the service of the saints ,
46016016	that you be submissive to such as they , and to every one who laboureth with us and helpeth .
46016017	But I am glad of the coming of Stephano , and of Fortunatos , and of Akaiakos , because your deficiency with me they have fulfilled .
46016018	For they have refreshed my spirit and yours . Wherefore acknowledge those who are such .
46016019	All the churches of Asia ask for your peace ; Akilos and Priskila , with the church which is in their house , ask for your peace greatly in our Lord .
46016020	All the brethren ask for your peace . Ask the peace of one another with the holy kiss .
46016021	Peace , by the writing of my hand , of PAULOS .
46016022	Whosoever loveth not our Lord Jeshu Meshiha , let him be accursed . Our Lord cometh .
46016023	The grace of our Lord Jeshu Meshiha be with you .
46016024	And my love be with you all in the Meshiha Jeshu Amen .
47001001	PAULOS , apostle of Jeshu Meshiha , by the will of Aloha ; and Timotheos a brother : to the church of Aloha which is in Kurinthos , and to all the saints who are in all Akaia .
47001002	Grace be with you and peace , from Aloha our Father , and from our Lord Jeshu Meshiha .
47001003	Blessed be Aloha , the Father of our Lord Jeshu Meshiha , the Father of mercies , and the God of all consolation , who consoleth us in all our afflictions ,
47001004	that we may be able to console those who are in all afflictions by that consolation by which we are consoled of Aloha .
47001005	For as the sufferings of the Meshiha abound in us , so , through the Meshiha , our consolation aboundeth also .
47001006	But if we are afflicted , it is for your consolation and for your salvation that we be afflicted : and if we are consoled , it is that you may be consoled , that there may be in you perseverance to endure those sufferings which we also suffer .
47001007	And our hope concerning you is steadfast : for we know that if you participate in the sufferings , you also participate in the consolation .
47001008	FOR I would have you to know , my brethren , of the affliction that befell us in Asia : for we were greatly pressed beyond our strength , until our life was nigh to be dissolved ,
47001009	and because of these we had concluded ( for ) death ; that we should not have hope in ourselves , but in Aloha , who raiseth the dead :
47001010	who from deaths of violence delivered us , and who will again , we trust , deliver us ,
47001011	through the help of your prayers for us ; that his gift towards us may be a benefit effected for many , and many may praise him on our behalf .
47001012	For our glorying is this , the testimony of our conscience , that in simplicity and purity , and by the grace of Aloha , we are conversant in the world ; and not with the wisdom of the flesh , and especially with you yourselves .
47001013	For we write no other ( things ) to you than those which you know and acknowledge , and which I am confident you will acknowledge unto the end :
47001014	even as you have in part acknowledged that we are your glorying , as you also are ours in the day of our Lord Jeshu Meshiha .
47001015	And in this confidence I have willed from the first to come to you , that doubly you may receive benefit ,
47001016	and that I may pass by you to Makedunia , and again from Makedunia I may come to you , and you may lead me forth unto Jihud .
47001017	This then that I have purposed , have I purposed boastingly ? or are they things of the flesh that I purpose , that I should have in them Yes , yes , or No , no ?
47001018	Faithful is Aloha that our word with you was not Yes and No .
47001019	For the Son of Aloha , Jeshu Meshiha , who by us hath been preached unto you , by me and by Sylvanas and by Timotheos , was not Yes and No , but it was Yes in him .
47001020	For all the promises of Aloha in him , in the Meshiha , are Yes ; for which by him we give Amen to the glory of Aloha .
47001021	But Aloha himself confirmeth us with you in the Meshiha , who himself hath anointed us ,
47001022	and hath sealed us , and given us the earnest-pledge of his Spirit in our hearts .
47001023	BUT I testify to Aloha on my soul that because I am sparing of you , I have not come to Kurinthos .
47001024	Not because we are lords of your faith , but are helpers of your joy ; for by faith you stand .
47002001	But I have determined this in myself , that I will not with sorrow again come to you .
47002002	For if I grieve you , who shall refresh me , but he whom I had grieved ?
47002003	And I have written to you this very , lest when I come they grieve me , they who ought to refresh me . But I confide in you , that my joy is that of all of you .
47002004	And from great affliction and anxiety of heart I wrote those things to you with many tears , not that you might grieve , but ( also ) that you might know the abundant love I have towards you .
47002005	But if any one hath caused grief , he hath not grieved me ( only ) , but a part of you all : that the word may not weigh upon you .
47002006	But sufficient for him was this chastisement , which was from many .
47002007	And now on the other hand it behoves you to forgive him and console him , lest he who is such an one be swallowed up of excessive grief .
47002008	Therefore I entreat of you to confirm to him your love .
47002009	On this account also I have written , to ascertain by experiment whether in every thing you will obey me .
47002010	But to whom you forgive , I also . For I , too , what I have forgiven , have on your account forgiven in the presence of the Meshiha :
47002011	lest Satana get the advantage of you ; for we know his devices .
47002012	WHEN , in preaching the gospel of the Meshiha , I had come to Troas , and a door was opened to me by the Lord ,
47002013	I had no rest in my spirit because I found not Titos my brother . But leaving them , I went forth to Makedunia .
47002014	But thanks unto Aloha , who in all time maketh us a triumph in the Meshiha , and maketh manifest by us the perfume of his knowledge in every place .
47002015	For we are a fragrant perfume in the Meshiha unto Aloha in those who are saved , and in those who perish .
47002016	To these as a perfume of death unto death , and to those as a perfume of life unto life . And unto these who is equal ?
47002017	For we are not as the rest who commix the word of Aloha ; but as in truth , and as from Aloha , before Aloha in the Meshiha do we speak .
47003001	Do we begin again anew to show who we are ? or do we need as others to write epistles of commendation to you concerning ourselves , or that you should write to commend us ?
47003002	But you yourselves are our epistle , written in our hearts , and known and read of every man .
47003003	For you know that you are an epistle of the Meshiha , who hath been ministered by us ; written , not with ink but by the Spirit of Aloha the Living ; not on tablets of stone , but on the fleshly tablets of the heart .
47003004	BUT such confidence we have through the Meshiha toward Aloha .
47003005	For we are not sufficient to think any thing as of ourselves ; but our power is from Aloha ,
47003006	who hath made us fit to be ministers of the new covenant , not in the writing , but in the spirit . For the writing killeth , but the Spirit maketh alive .
47003007	But if the ministry of death in the writing engraven on stones was with glory , as that the sons of Israel could not look on the face of Musha because of the glory of his face which is abolished ,
47003008	how much more then doth not the ministry Of the Spirit excel in glory ?
47003009	For if the ministry of condemnation was glorious , how much more doth not the ministry of justification excel in glory ?
47003010	For that which was glorified had no glory , in comparison of this excelling glory .
47003011	For if that which was abolished was with glory , how much more shall that which endureth be with glory ?
47003012	Therefore because we have this hope , we speak the more boldly ,
47003013	and ( are ) not as Musha , who threw the veil upon his face , that the sons of Israel might not look upon the End of that which was to be abolished .
47003014	But they are blinded in their minds unto this day . For when the old covenant is read , that very veil standeth upon them , nor is it apparent ( to them ) that in the Meshiha it hath been abolished .
47003015	And unto this day , when Musha is read , the veil is thrown upon their heart .
47003016	And when any one of them is converted unto the Lord , the veil from him is uplifted .
47003017	But the Lord himself is the Spirit ; and where the Spirit of the Lord , ( there ) is liberty .
47003018	But we all with disclosed faces behold the glory of the Lord as in a mirror , and into the resemblance of it are changed from brightness to brightness , as by the Lord the Spirit .
47004001	ON this account we have not weariness in this ministry which we have received , according to the mercies that are upon us .
47004002	But we have rejected the secrets of shamefulness ; and walk not with craft , nor deal deceitfully ( with ) the word of Aloha ; but by the revelation of the truth make we ourselves manifest to the minds of all men before Aloha .
47004003	But if our gospel is hid , to those who perish is it hid :
47004004	( to ) them whose minds the god of this world hath blinded because they believe not ; lest the light of the gospel of the glory of Meshiha , who is the image of Aloha , should arise upon them .
47004005	For we preach not ourselves , but the Meshiha , Jeshu our Lord ; but ourselves that we are your servants for the sake of Jeshu .
47004006	For Aloha , who said , Let light arise from darkness , hath arisen in our hearts ; that we should be illuminated by the knowledge of the glory of Aloha in the face of Jeshu Meshiha .
47004007	BUT we have this treasure in a vase of earth , that the greatness of the power might be from Aloha , and not from us .
47004008	But in every thing we are afflicted , yet not strangled ; we are beaten , yet not condemned ;
47004009	persecuted , yet not forsaken ; cast down , yet we perish not .
47004010	In all time the dying of Jeshu in our bodies we bear , that the life also of Jeshu might in our bodies be revealed .
47004011	For if we , the living , unto death are delivered on account of Jeshu , so also will the life of Jeshu be revealed in this our body of death .
47004012	Now death in us worketh earnestly , but life in you .
47004013	We then also who have one spirit of faith , as it is written , I have believed , and therefore also spoken ; we believe , therefore also we speak .
47004014	And we know that He who raised up our Lord Jeshu , will by Jeshu raise us also , and will present us with you unto himself .
47004015	For every thing is for your sake , that grace , abounding by many , may multiply praise to the glory of Aloha .
47004016	For this cause we have not weariness ; for if our outward man is wasted , yet the interior man is renovated day by day .
47004017	For the affliction of this time , while small and light , a glory without end for ever and ever prepareth for us .
47004018	While we look not on these which are seen , but at those which are unseen . For the seen are of time , but the unseen are of eternity .
47005001	FOR we know that if our earthly house of this body were dissolved , we have nevertheless a building that is by Aloha ; a house which is not made with hands , in the heaven , eternal .
47005002	For concerning this also we groan , and long to put on our house which is from heaven ,
47005003	if , when that we have clothed , we may not be found naked .
47005004	For now while we are in this house , we groan from the weight of it : yet are we not willing to cast it off , but to be clothed upon of it , that its mortality might be swallowed up in life .
47005005	And he who prepareth us for this is Aloha , who hath given to us the earnest-pledge of his Spirit .
47005006	For therefore do we know and are persuaded , that so long as we remain in the body we are in pilgrimage from our Lord .
47005007	For by faith we walk , and not by sight .
47005008	On this account we confide , and long to pass away from the body , and to be with our Lord .
47005009	We give diligence , that whether we are pilgrims or inhabitants , we may be pleasing unto Him .
47005010	For we are all to stand before the tribunal of the Meshiha , that every man may be recompensed in his body ( for ) that which is done in it , whether of good or of evil .
47005011	THEREFORE , because we know the terror of our Lord , we persuade men ; and to Aloha we are manifest ; but I hope that to your minds also we are manifest .
47005012	For we commend not ourselves again to you , but we give you cause to be boastful of us to them who in appearance boast , but not in heart .
47005013	For if we be beside ourselves , ( it is ) unto Aloha ; and if we be right , ( it is ) unto you .
47005014	For the love of the Meshiha constraineth us , because we judge this , That if one for every man hath died , then ( was ) every man dead .
47005015	And for every man he died , that they who live should not live to themselves , but to him who on their behalf died and arose .
47005016	And henceforth we no man know according to the flesh ; and if we have known the Meshiha according to the flesh , yet from now we know not .
47005017	Whoever therefore is in the Meshiha is a new creature ; the old things have passed , and every thing hath become new
47005018	from Aloha , who hath reconciled us to himself in the Meshiha , and given to us the ministry of reconciliation .
47005019	For Aloha is in the Meshiha , who hath reconciled the world with his greatness ; and he hath not reckoned unto them their sins , and hath put in us the word of reconciliation .
47005020	WE are ambassadors then for the Meshiha , and as if Aloha himself besought you by us : instead of the Meshiha , therefore , we beseech , Be you reconciled unto Aloha .
47005021	For Him who knew not sin , on our account hath he made sin , that we might be in him the righteousness of Aloha .
47006001	And as helpers , we beseech of you that the grace of Aloha which you have received be not made ineffectual in you .
47006002	For he hath said , In the time acceptable I have heard thee , And in the day of salvation I have helped thee . Behold , Now is the time acceptable ; behold , Now is the day of salvation .
47006003	Nor in any thing give to any man occasion of stumbling , that no blemish may be upon our ministry ;
47006004	but in every thing will we demonstrate ourselves that we are the ministers of Aloha ; by much patience , by afflictions , by necessity , by imprisonments ,
47006005	by stripes , by chains , by tumults , by labour , by watching , by fasting ,
47006006	by purity , by knowledge , by prolonging the mind , by benignity , by the Spirit of Holiness , by love without deceit ,
47006007	by the doctrine of truth , by the power of Aloha , by the arms of righteousness for the right hand and for the left ,
47006008	by glory and by shame , by praise and by abuse ; as deceivers , and true ;
47006009	as unknown , and yet we are known ; as dead , yet , lo , we live ; as chastened , yet we die not ;
47006010	as sorrowful , yet always rejoicing ; as poor , yet many making rich ; as having nothing , yet possessing every thing .
47006011	OUR mouth is opened to you , Kurinthoyee , and our heart expanded .
47006012	You are not constrained in us , but you are constrained in your own bowels .
47006013	But as unto ( my ) children , I say to you , Render to me my gains which are with you , and expand your love towards me .
47006014	And be not sons of the yoke with them who believe not . For what participation hath righteousness with iniquity ? Or what commixture hath the light with darkness ?
47006015	Or what concord hath the Meshiha with Satana ? Or what portion hath the believer with the unbeliever ?
47006016	Or what union hath the temple of Aloha with ( that ) of demons ? For you are the temple of Aloha the living ; as it is written , I will dwell in them , and walk in them ; And I will be their God , And they shall be to me a people .
47006017	Wherefore come out from among them , And be separate from them , ( saith the Lord , ) And the impure touch not ; And I will receive you ,
47006018	And I will be to you a Father , And you shall be to me for sons and daughters , Saith the Lord , who holdeth all .
47007001	Because then we have these promises , my beloved , let us cleanse ourselves from all impurity of the flesh and of the spirit , and accomplish sanctification in the fear of Aloha .
47007002	Bear with us , my brethren ; we have wronged no man , we have corrupted no man , we have injured no man .
47007003	I speak not to your condemnation ; for I have said already , that you are laid up in our hearts to die together and to live .
47007004	GREAT is the freedom I have with you , and great in you is my glorying ; I am full of consolation , and my joy greatly aboundeth in me in all my afflictions .
47007005	When , also , we had come into Makedunia , no repose had we for our body , but in every thing were we afflicted ; without fighting , and within , fear .
47007006	But Aloha , who consoleth the humble , consoled us by the coming of Titos ;
47007007	and not only by his coming , but also by his refreshment wherewith he had been refreshed among you . For he told us of your love toward us , and of your lamentation and your zeal on our behalf . And when I heard , my joy was great .
47007008	For though I grieved you in an epistle , I repent me not , though I did repent . For I perceive how that epistle , though for an hour , did make you sorry ;
47007009	but now I exercise joy , not because you were made sorry , but because your sorrow hath brought you to repentance . For you were sorry towards Aloha ; so that in nothing will you suffer loss from us .
47007010	For the sorrow that is for the sake of Aloha worketh soul-penitence , which turneth not and converteth , unto salvation ; but the sorrow of the world worketh death .
47007011	For , behold , ( in ) this very ( case ) that you were made contrite for the sake of Aloha ; what carefulness it wrought in you , and vindication , and displeasure , and fear , and love , and zeal , and punishment ! And by every thing have you shown yourselves to be pure in this matter .
47007012	But , it was for this we wrote to you ; not on account of the injurer , nor on account of the injured one , but that you may know before Aloha our carefulness over you .
47007013	For this cause we were consoled , and with our consolation more abundantly did we rejoice in the joy of Titos ; because his spirit had been refreshed with you all .
47007014	Because in whatever I had boasted to him concerning you , I have not been ashamed ; but , as of every thing we had spoken truth with you , so also our boasting unto Titos hath been found in truth .
47007015	And his affection is greatly enlarged toward you , when he remembers your obedience ; because with fear and with trembling you received him .
47007016	I rejoice that in every thing I can confide in you .
47008001	BUT we make known to you , my brethren , the grace of Aloha which hath been given to the churches of Makedunia ;
47008002	that in the great trial of their affliction there hath been an abounding of their joy ; and the depth of their poverty hath been exceeded by the riches of their simplicity .
47008003	For I testify , that according to their power , and more than their power , in the willingness of their soul ,
47008004	they besought of us , with much supplication , that they might participate in the beneficence of the ministry for the saints .
47008005	And not as we had supposed , but they gave themselves up first to the Lord , and also to us by the will of Aloha .
47008006	For we would request of Titos , that as he had begun , so he would carry into accomplishment this beneficence among you also .
47008007	But as you have excelled in every thing , in faith , and in doctrine , and in knowledge , and in all diligence , and in our love toward you , so also in this beneficence may you excel .
47008008	Not as though commanding I command you , but , from the diligence of your companions , the truth of your love would I put to the test .
47008009	FOR you know the beneficence of our Lord Jeshu Meshiha , that for your sake he became poor , though he was rich , that you through his poverty might be enriched .
47008010	But counselling I counsel you this which helpeth you ; because from the last year you began not to will only , but also to do .
47008011	But now accomplish in work that which you willed , that as there hath been an incitement to will , so accomplish it in work from what you have .
47008012	For if there be the will , according to what one hath , so is ( he ) accepted , and not according to what he hath not .
47008013	Neither must there be to others ease , and to you anxiety ,
47008014	but in equality be you at this time ; that your abundance may be a supply to their want , that also their abundance may be for to your want , that there may be equality .
47008015	As it is written , He who took up much had no superfluity , and he who took up little was not deficient .
47008016	But praise to Aloha who in-gave this solicitude for you to the heart of Titos .
47008017	For our request he accepted ; and because he had great concern , of his own will he hath come forth among you .
47008018	But we have sent with him our brother , whose praise in the gospel is in all the churches ;
47008019	who hath , moreover , been chosen by the churches to go forth with us with this bounty which is ministered by us to the glory of Aloha himself , and unto our cordiality .
47008020	For we are precautious in this , that no one should lay upon us any imputation
47008021	with regard to this great bounty which is to be administered by us . For we are careful for the things which are comely , not only before Aloha , but also before men .
47008022	But we have also sent with them our brother , whom we have often proved in many to be diligent ; but now still more diligent from the great confidence he hath concerning you .
47008023	Whether , then , ( you regard ) Titos , he is my companion and helper among you , or the other brethren , they are the apostles of the churches of the glory of Meshiha .
47008024	Wherefore the demonstration of your love , and of our boasting concerning you in these , make manifest in the sight of all the churches .
47009001	BUT concerning the administration of the saints , I do more ( than enough ) if I write to you .
47009002	For I know the goodness of your mind , of which I boasted of you to the Makedunoyee , that Akaia was ready since last year , and your zeal hath stirred up many .
47009003	But I have sent the brethren to you , that our boasting which we boasted of you may not in this affair be vain ; but , as I have said , you may be ready :
47009004	lest , if the Makedunoyee should come with me , and find you not ready , we be shamed-that I may not say , you be shamed-of the boasting which we have boasted .
47009005	For this cause I have been careful to entreat of these brethren to go before to you , to make ready that blessing of which you have caused to be heard before ; that it may be prepared , so as that it may be a blessing , not as avarice .
47009006	But this , He who soweth with scantiness , with scantiness also reapeth ; and he who soweth with blessing , with blessing also shall reap .
47009007	Every man as he hath in his mind : not as of vexation or as of constraint ; for a cheerful giver the Lord loveth .
47009008	For it is in the power of Aloha to increase in you every good , that you may always have every thing sufficient , and that you may abound in every good work .
47009009	As it is written , He hath dispersed and given to the poor , And his righteousness standeth for ever .
47009010	But may He who giveth seed to the sower and bread for food , himself give and multiply your seed , and increase the fruits of your righteousness ,
47009011	that in every thing you may be enriched in all simplicity , which worketh out through us , thanksgiving to Aloha .
47009012	For , on account of the performance of this service , we not only supply the deficiency of the saints , but also cause many thanks givings to abound unto Aloha .
47009013	For on account of the proof of this service we glorify Aloha , because you are subject to the confession of the gospel of Meshiha , and you have communicated in simplicity with them and with every man .
47009014	And prayer they offer on your behalf in great love , on account of the greatness of the grace of Aloha which is upon you .
47009015	But thanks to Aloha over his gift which is unspeakable .
47010001	BUT I Paulos beseech of you by the peacefulness and humility of the Meshiha , ( I ) who also in presence am humble with you , but while far off am confident over you ,
47010002	beseech of you , that when I come I may not be constrained with the confidence I have to be bold , as I think , over those men who imagine that we walk in the flesh .
47010003	For if we walk in the flesh , yet we war not according to the flesh .
47010004	For the armour of our warfare is not of the flesh , but of the power of Aloha ; and by it we cast down the strong-holds of rebels ,
47010005	and demolish reasonings and every lofty thing that is exalted against the knowledge of Aloha , and captivate all thoughts unto the obedience of the Meshiha .
47010006	And we are prepared to execute the punishment of those who obey not , when your obedience shall be fulfilled .
47010007	Do we regard persons ? If any man confide in himself that he is of the Meshiha , let this one know of himself , that as he is of the Meshiha , so also are we .
47010008	For if I should boast somewhat more of the authority which our Lord hath given me , I should not blush ; because for your edification he gave it to me , and not for your destruction .
47010009	But I insist not , that I may not be considered as one who would terrify you by my epistles .
47010010	For there are men who say , His epistles are weighty and forcible ; but his bodily presence is weak , and his speech contemptible .
47010011	But he who after this manner speaks , shall conclude that what we are by the word of our epistle when absent , so are we in the deed when we are present .
47010012	For we dare not value or compare ourselves with those who glorify themselves ; but because they compare themselves with themselves , they do not understand .
47010013	For we do not boast beyond our measure , but in the measure of the boundary which Aloha hath apportioned to us , that we might come also unto you .
47010014	For it is not as not reaching to you we extend ourselves ; for unto you we come with the gospel of the Meshiha .
47010015	Neither boast we beyond our measure in the labour of others ; but we have hope , that with the increase of your faith , we shall be enlarged according to our measure ;
47010016	and be progressive also beyond you to evangelize . Not as within the measure of others in the things that are prepared will we glory .
47010017	But let him who glorieth glory in the Lord .
47010018	For it is not he who glorifieth himself who is approved , but he who is glorified of the Lord .
47011001	BUT I could desire that you could tolerate me a little that I may speak foolishly .
47011002	Nevertheless tolerate me , for I am zealous towards you with the zeal of Aloha ; for I have betrothed you to one man , a pure virgin , whom I would bring unto the Meshiha .
47011003	But I fear lest , as the serpent deceived Hava by his guile , so your minds may be corrupted from the simplicity that is toward the Meshiha .
47011004	For if he who hath come to you shall preach to you another Jeshu , whom we have not preached , or you receive another Spirit which you have not received or another gospel which you have not accepted , you would have been well persuaded .
47011005	For I consider that I am nothing inferior to those apostles who are most excellent .
47011006	For if I am rude in my speech , I yet am not in my knowledge ; but in every thing we are manifest among you .
47011007	Or , offending have I offended in humbling myself that you may be exalted , and have gratuitously preached to you the gospel of Aloha ?
47011008	And other churches have I despoiled , receiving of them expenses , for your service .
47011009	And being come among you , I burdened no man of you ; for my want the brethren who came from Makedunia supplied : and in every thing have I kept myself , and will keep , that I may not be burdensome to you .
47011010	The truth of the Meshiha is in me , that this boasting shall not be abolished respecting me in the regions of Akaia .
47011011	Why ? because I love you not ? Aloha himself knoweth !
47011012	But I do this , and also will do it , to cut off the occasion of them who seek an occasion , that in the thing in which they boast they may be found as we are .
47011013	For these are apostles of falsehood and workers of deceits , assimilating themselves to the apostles of the Meshiha .
47011014	Nor in this may we wonder , if Satana himself be transformed into an angel of light .
47011015	Nor is it a great thing if his ministers also are transformed into ministers of righteousness ; - whose end will be according to their works .
47011016	BUT I say again , Let no man think of me as a fool ; or if otherwise , let him receive me as a fool , that I also may boast a little .
47011017	The thing which I ( now ) speak , I do not speak in our Lord , but as in foolishness in this place of boasting .
47011018	Because many boast in the flesh , I also will boast .
47011019	For you are content to listen to the feebleminded , you yourselves being wise .
47011020	For you are ruled by one who subjugates you , and by one who devours you , and by one who takes away from you , and by one who exalts himself over you , and by one who smites you on your faces !
47011021	As in abasement I speak ; as though we were weak through defectiveness of mind , I speak . In whatever any man dareth , I also dare .
47011022	If they are Ebroyee , so am I ; if they are Isroloyee , so am I ; if they are the seed of Abraham , so am I ;
47011023	if they are ministers of the Meshiha , - I speak with defectiveness of mind , - I exceed then ! In labours I exceed them , in stripes I exceed them , in chains I exceed them , in deaths many times .
47011024	From the Jihudoyee , five times , forty ( stripes ) wanting one have I devoured ;
47011025	three times with staves have I been beaten , once was I stoned , three times have I been in shipwreck , a day and a night without a ship have I been in the sea .
47011026	In journeys many , in danger of rivers , in danger of robbers , in danger from my own race , in danger from the Gentiles ; I have been in danger in cities , I have been in danger in the waste , in danger by sea , in danger from false brethren ;
47011027	in labour and weariness , in much watching , in hunger and thirst , in much fasting , in cold and in nakedness ;
47011028	besides the aboundings and the gathering which are upon me daily even my care which is for all the churches .
47011029	Who is weak , and I am not weak ? Who is offended , and I burn not ?
47011030	If I must boast in my infirmities , I will boast .
47011031	Aloha , the Father of our Lord Jeshu Meshiha , the Blessed for ever and ever , knoweth that I lie not .
47011032	In Darmsuk the great force of Aretos the king kept the city of the Darmsukoyee to apprehend me .
47011033	And from a window in a basket they sent me from the wall , and I was delivered from his hands .
47012001	I might boast , but it is not expedient ; for I come to visions and revelations of the Lord .
47012002	I knew a man in the Meshiha fourteen years ago , - whether in the body , or out of the body , I know not , Aloha himself knoweth , - who , this one himself , was rapt unto the third of heaven .
47012003	And I know this man himself , - but whether in the body , or out of the body , I know not , Aloha himself knoweth ,
47012004	- and he was rapt into paradise , and heard words which are not uttered , those which it is not lawful for a man to utter .
47012005	Of this I boast ; but of myself I will not boast , except in my infirmities .
47012006	Yet if I willed to boast , I should not be a fool , for I say the truth ; but I spare , lest any one think of me beyond that which he seeth me ( to be ) , and what he heareth of me .
47012007	And that I might not be exalted by the abundance of revelations , there was delivered to me a stimulus of my flesh , an angel of Satana to buffet me , that I might not be exalted .
47012008	Concerning this three times I entreated of my Lord that it might be removed from me .
47012009	And he said to me , My grace sufficeth thee ; for my power in weakness is perfected . Gladly therefore will I boast in my infirmities , that the power of the Meshiha may overshadow me .
47012010	For this cause I am willing in infirmities , in reviling , in affliction , in persecutions , in distresses , for the sake of the Meshiha ; for when I am weak , then am I strong .
47012011	Behold , I have been deficient in mind in my boasting , because you have constrained me ; for you were debtors to bear witness concerning me ; because in nothing am I less than those apostles who are the most eminent , nevertheless I am not any thing .
47012012	The signs of the apostles I have wrought among you in all patience , and with mighty acts and miracles and with powers .
47012013	For in what have you been less than the other churches , except in this , that I have not burdened you ? Forgive me this offence .
47012014	Behold , this is three times that I prepare to come to you , and not to burden you ; for I seek not yours , but you . For the children ought not to lay up treasures for the parents , but the parents for their children .
47012015	But I gladly the expenses will spend , and also myself will I give for the sake of your souls : though , while the more I love you , you the less love me .
47012016	And , perhaps , ( though ) I did not burden you , yet ( it may be said ) , as a crafty man with deceit I have robbed you .
47012017	By any other whom I have sent to you have I made prey of you ?
47012018	Of Titos I requested , and sent with him the brethren . In any thing has Titos made prey of you ? Have we not walked in one spirit , and in the same steps ?
47012019	DO you again consider that we apologize to you ? Before Aloha in the Meshiha do we speak ; and all , my beloved , for the sake of your up-building .
47012020	For I fear lest , when I come to you , I should not find you as I wish , but should find you what you would not wish : lest there be contention and envy , and wrath and angry talk , and accusations and murmurings , and pompousness and agitation :
47012021	and lest , when I come to you , my God may humiliate me , and I may have to lament over many who have sinned , and have not repented of the uncleanness and of the fornication and of the lasciviousness which they have committed .
47013001	This is the third time that I prepare to come to you ; and in the mouth of two or three witnesses shall every word be established .
47013002	I have foretold you , and again I foretell you ; as also twice while I was with you I told you , ( so ) now also being distant I write to those who have sinned , and to the rest of the others ; that if I come again I will not spare .
47013003	Inasmuch as you demand the proof of the Meshiha who speaketh in me , ( of ) Him who is not weak among you , but is mighty among you :
47013004	- for though he was crucified in weakness , yet he liveth with the power of Aloha : - so also we are weak with you , but we live with him through the power of Aloha which is among you .
47013005	Prove yourselves , whether in the faith itself you stand ; try yourselves . Are you not assured that Jeshu the Meshiha is in you , if you be not reprobates ?
47013006	But I trust you will know that we are not reprobate .
47013007	But I implore of Aloha that there may not be any thing in you that is evil , that our proving may be seen ; but that you may do good , and that we may be as unproved .
47013008	For we are not able to do any thing against the truth , but for the truth .
47013009	For we rejoice when we are weak , and you are strong : but this also we pray , that you may be perfect .
47013010	Therefore while distant I write these ( things ) , that when I am come I may not act severely , according to the power which my Lord hath given me for your edification , and not for your destruction .
47013011	Wherefore , my brethren , rejoice , and be perfect , and be comforted , and let agreement and peace be among you ; and the God of love and of peace shall be with you .
47013012	Salute one another with the holy kiss .
47013013	All the saints ask for your peace .
47013014	THE PEACE OF OUR LORD JESHU MESHIHA , AND THE LOVE OF ALOHA , AND THE COMMUNION OF THE SPIRIT OF HOLINESS , BE WITH YOU ALL . AMEN .
48001001	Paulos , an apostle , not from men , nor by men , but by Jeshu the Meshiha , and Aloha his Father , who raised him from among the dead ,
48001002	and all the brethren who are with me , to the churches which are in Galatia :
48001003	Grace be with you and peace , from Aloha the Father , and from our Lord Jeshu Meshiha ,
48001004	who gave himself for our sins to deliver us from this evil world , according to the will of Aloha our Father :
48001005	to whom be glory to the age of ages . Amen .
48001006	I am amazed how soon you have been turned from the Meshiha himself , who called you by his grace ,
48001007	unto another gospel , which it is not ; but there are men who disturb you , and ( who ) wish to remove you from the gospel of the Meshiha .
48001008	But if we also , or an angel from heaven , should preach to you other than what we have preached to you , let him be accursed .
48001009	As I have said before , and now again say to you , If any man preach to you other than what you have received , let him be accursed .
48001010	For now do I persuade men , or Aloha ? or do I seek to please men ? For if until now I had pleased men , I should not have been the servant of the Meshiha .
48001011	But I make known to you , my brethren , that the gospel which is preached by me was not from man :
48001012	for neither from man had I received it and taught it , but by the revelation of Jeshu the Meshiha .
48001013	For you have heard of my former manners in Judaism , that I exceedingly persecuted the church of Aloha , and made it desolate .
48001014	And I excelled in Judaism more than many of the sons of my years who were of my kindred , and was exceedingly zealous for the doctrine of my fathers .
48001015	But , when He willed who separated me from my mother's womb , and called me by his grace ,
48001016	to reveal his Son in me , that I should preach among the nations , immediately I did not disclose to flesh and to blood ;
48001017	neither went I to Urishlem , to the apostles who were before me , but I went into Arabia , and again returned unto Darmsuk .
48001018	And after three years I went unto Urishlem , that I might see Kipha , and I remained with him days fifteen .
48001019	But others of the apostles I saw not , only Jakub , the brother of our Lord .
48001020	But these which I write to you , behold , before Aloha , that I lie not .
48001021	And after these I went to the regions of Syria and of Cilicia .
48001022	Neither did the churches of Jihud which are in the Meshiha know me by face .
48001023	But this only they had heard , that he who had formerly persecuted us , behold , now preacheth he that faith which he beforetime had overthrown .
48001024	And in me they glorified Aloha .
48002001	Again , from fourteen years I went up to Urishlem with Bar Naba , and took with me Titos .
48002002	But I went up by revelation ; and I disclosed to them the gospel which I proclaim among the nations ; and I showed it to those who were considered to be somewhat between myself and them , lest in vain I had run or should run .
48002003	Titos also who was with me , who was an Aramoya , was not constrained to be circumcised .
48002004	But on account of false brethren , who entered upon us that they might espy the liberty which we have in Jeshu Meshiha as that they might bring me into subjection ;
48002005	yet not for the space of an hour did we cast ourselves down to be subject to them ; that the truth of the gospel might continue with you .
48002006	But , they who were considered to be somewhat , --- but what they were I care not , for Aloha accepteth not men ? s faces , --- they themselves added nothing unto me ;
48002007	but otherwise : for seeing that I was intrusted with the gospel of the uncircumcision , as Kipha was intrusted with the circumcision ;
48002008	--- for he who wrought effectually with Kipha for the apostleship of the circumcision , wrought effectually also with me for the apostleship of the Gentiles ;
48002009	--- and knowing the grace which had been given to me , Jakub and Kipha and Juchanon , who were considered to be pillars , the right hand of fellowship gave to me and to Bar Naba , that we ( should preach ) among the Gentiles , and they among the circumcision :
48002010	only ( requiring ) that of the poor we should be mindful ; and I have been solicitous to do this same thing .
48002011	But when Kipha had come to Antiokia , I rebuked him to his face , because they were offended by him .
48002012	For until certain men came from Jakub , he had eaten with the Gentiles ; but when they were come , he withdrew himself and separated , because he was afraid of those who were of the circumcision .
48002013	And the rest of the Jihudoyee also were thrown with him in this , so that Bar Naba also was led away by their partiality .
48002014	And when I saw that they were not walking rightly in the truth of the gospel , I said to Kipha in the presence of them all : If thou who art a Jihudoya live as an Aramoya and not Judaically , why forcest thou the Gentiles to live Judaically ?
48002015	If we who by our nature are Jihudoyee , and are not of the Gentile sinners ,
48002016	because we know that man is not justified by the works of the law , but by the faith of Jeshu Meshiha , also in him , in Jeshu Meshiha , have believed , that from the faith of the Meshiha we may be justified , and not from the works of the law ; because from the works of the law shall no flesh be justified :
48002017	--- If , while we seek to be justified through the Meshiha , we also ourselves are found sinners , is Jeshu Meshiha therefore the minister of sin ? It cannot be .
48002018	For , if those things which I destroyed I build again , I make it manifest of myself that I transgress the commandment .
48002019	For I by the law to the law am dead , that unto Aloha I may live :
48002020	and with the Meshiha am I crucified , and from henceforth I live not , but in me liveth Meshiha ; and this that I now live in the flesh I live by the faith of the Son of Aloha , who loved me and gave himself for me .
48002021	I do not deny the grace of Aloha ; for if righteousness is by the law , the Meshiha died in vain !
48003001	O deficient-minded Galatoyee , who bewildereth you ? For , behold , as if depicted before your eyes , hath Jeshu the Meshiha been crucified .
48003002	This only would I know from you : Through the works of the law received you the Spirit , or through the hearing of faith ?
48003003	Are you so foolish that having begun in the Spirit you are now finishing in the flesh ?
48003004	And all these have you borne in vain ? But would it be in vain ?
48003005	Then , he who imparted to you the Spirit , and wrought miracles among you , ( did he so ) through the works of the law , or through the hearing of faith ?
48003006	As Abraham believed Aloha , and it was reckoned to him for righteousness ,
48003007	know therefore that they who are of faith are the children of Abraham .
48003008	For Aloha who knew before that he would justify the Gentiles through faith , evangelized before unto Abraham ; as saith the holy scripture : In thee all the nations shall be blessed :
48003009	therefore believers are blessed with Abraham the believer .
48003010	For they who are of the works of the law are under the curse : for it is written , Cursed is every one who doeth not all that is written in this law .
48003011	But that man is not justified by the law before Aloha , this maketh manifest : because it is written , The just by faith shall live .
48003012	But the law is not of faith : but he who doeth those things that are written in it shall live by them .
48003013	But us hath the Meshiha bought from the curse of the law , and hath been made a curse instead of us : for it is written , Accursed is every one who is hanged on the wood :
48003014	in order that upon the nations there might be the blessing of Abraham in Jeshu the Meshiha , that we might receive the promise of the Spirit through faith .
48003015	My brethren , I speak as among men : That a covenant of man because confirmed no one rejecteth , or changeth in any thing .
48003016	But to Abraham was promised the promise , and to his seed . And he did not say to him , Unto thy seeds , as of many ; but , To thy seed , as of one , him , ( namely , ) who is the Meshiha .
48003017	But I say this , that the covenant which was confirmed before by Aloha , in the Meshiha , the law which was after , four hundred and thirty years , cannot nullify , nor ( can it ) abolish the promise .
48003018	But if the inheritance was by the law , it could not have been by the promise ; but Aloha gave it unto Abraham by promise .
48003019	Wherefore then was the law ? It was added on account of transgression , until the Seed should come , he , of whom was the promise ; and the law was given by angels into the hand of a Mediator .
48003020	But a Mediator is not of one ; but Aloha is one .
48003021	Is the law therefore against the promise of Aloha ? Impossible : for if a law had been given which could make to live , certainly righteousness would have been by the law .
48003022	But the scripture hath included all under sin , that the promise through faith of Jeshu Meshiha might be given to them who believe .
48003023	But until ( the dispensation of ) faith came , the law kept us , as shut up unto the faith which was to be revealed .
48003024	The law therefore was our conductor to the Meshiha , that we might be justified by faith .
48003025	But faith being come , we are not under the conductor .
48003026	For you are all the children of Aloha through the faith of Jeshu the Meshiha .
48003027	For they who into the Meshiha are baptized have been clothed with the Meshiha .
48003028	Jihudoya or Aramoya is not ; the slave or the free is not ; male or female is not ; for you are all one in Jeshu Meshiha .
48003029	And if you are of the Meshiha , therefore are you the seed of Abraham , and heirs by the promise .
48004001	But I say that what time the heir is a child , he differeth not from a servant , though he be lord of all ,
48004002	but is under curators and stewards until the time which his father appointeth .
48004003	So we also , while children , under the principles of the world were subjected .
48004004	But when the fulness of the time had come , Aloha sent his Son , and made from a woman , and made under the law ,
48004005	that them who were under the law he might redeem , and we might receive the constitution of sons .
48004006	And because you are sons , Aloha hath sent the Spirit of his Son into your hearts , who crieth , Father , our Father .
48004007	Therefore you are not servants , but sons ; and if sons , heirs also of Aloha , through Jeshu Meshiha .
48004008	For , while not knowing Aloha , you served them who by their nature are not gods :
48004009	but now that you have known Aloha , and especially that you have been acknowledged of Aloha , turn you again to those diseased and beggarly principles , and will to be subject to them afresh ?
48004010	Days , and months , and times , you observe .
48004011	I am afraid , lest vain in I have laboured among you .
48004012	Be you as I am , for I am as you are , my brethren , I beseech you . In nothing have you injured me .
48004013	For you know that in infirmity of my flesh I preached to you at the first .
48004014	And the temptation of my flesh you did not despise nor execrate ; but as an angel of Aloha you received me , and as of Jeshu Meshiha .
48004015	Where then is your happiness ? For I testify of you , that had it been possible , your eye you would have plucked out and given to me .
48004016	Have I become your adversary , because I have preached to you the truth ?
48004017	They are emulous of you not for good ; but they would shut you in , that you might be emulous of them .
48004018	But it is well to be emulous in good things at all time , and not only when I am with you .
48004019	My children , with whom I travail afresh until the Meshiha be formed in you ,
48004020	I would be with you now , and change the sound of my voice , because I am astonished at you .
48004021	Tell me , you who are willing to be under the law , do you not hear the law ?
48004022	For it is written , that Abraham had two sons , one of the bondmaid , and one of the free .
48004023	But he who was of the bondmaid was born according to the flesh , and he who was of the free was by the promise .
48004024	But these are parables of the two covenants : the one which was from Mount Sinai bringing forth into bondage , which is Hagar :
48004025	for Hagar is Mount Sinai which is in Arabia , and answers to this Urishlem , and serves in bondage , she and her children .
48004026	But she , Urishilem the high , is the free , who is our mother .
48004027	For it is written , Be glad , O barren , who hast not borne ; Exult and cry , thou who hast not travailed ; Because multiplied are the sons of the desolate , More than the sons of the married wife .
48004028	But we , my brethren , as Ishak , are the children of promise .
48004029	And as then he who was born of the flesh persecuted him who was after the Spirit , so also now .
48004030	But what saith the scripture ? Cast out the bondmaid and her son ; for the son of the bondmaid shall not inherit with the son of the free .
48004031	We therefore , my brethren , are not the children of the bondmaid , but the children of the free .
48005001	Stand therefore in that liberty with which the Meshiha hath freed you , and be not enthralled with the yoke of bondage .
48005002	Behold , I , Paulos , tell you , that if you be circumcised , the Meshiha profiteth you nothing .
48005003	But I attest again to every man who is circumcised , that he is obligated to fulfil the whole law .
48005004	You have ceased from the Meshiha who are justified by the law , and from grace you have fallen .
48005005	But we through the Spirit , who is from faith , expect the hope of righteousness .
48005006	For , in the Meshiha Jeshu , circumcision is not any thing , nor uncircumcision , but faith which is made perfect by love .
48005007	Well did you run ; who hath impeded you , that to the truth you should not be in obedience ?
48005008	Your persuasion is not from him who called you .
48005009	A little leaven the whole mass leaveneth .
48005010	I am confident of you in our Lord , that no other thing you will think ; and he who disturbeth you shall bear judgment , whoever he is .
48005011	But I , my brethren , if yet I have preached for circumcision , why have I been persecuted ? Hath the scandal of the cross ceased ?
48005012	But I would that they who disturb you were even cut off .
48005013	But you have been called unto liberty , my brethren : only let not your liberty be for an occasion of the flesh ; but in love be subjected one to another .
48005014	For all the law in one word is fulfilled , in this : Thou shalt love thy neighbour as thyself .
48005015	But if you bite and devour one another , beware lest one by another you be consumed .
48005016	But I say to you , Walk in the Spirit , and the desires of the flesh you will not work .
48005017	For the flesh desireth that which is repugnant to the Spirit , and the Spirit desireth that which is repugnant to the flesh ; and the two are adverse one to the other , that not any thing that you will you may do .
48005018	But if by the Spirit you are led , you are not under the law .
48005019	For the works of the flesh are known , which are ( these ) , fornication , uncleanness , lasciviousness ,
48005020	the worship of idols , sorcery , enmity , contention , ambition , wrath , calumny , divisions , rendings ,
48005021	envy , murder , drunkenness , revelling , and all that are like these ; and they who do them , as I told you before , so now I tell you , the kingdom of Aloha do not inherit .
48005022	But the fruits of the Spirit are , love , joy , peace , prolonging of the spirit , benignity , goodness , fidelity ,
48005023	meekness , patience ; against these the law is not set .
48005024	But they who are of the Meshiha have crucified their flesh , with all its passions and its lusts :
48005025	live we therefore in the Spirit ,
48005026	and let us not be vain-glorious , contemning one another , envying one another .
48006001	My brethren , if a man of you be overtaken by a fault , you who are in the Spirit , regain him , in the spirit of meekness , and beware lest you also be tempted .
48006002	And bear the burden of one another , and so fulfil the law of the Meshiha .
48006003	For if a man consider that he is something , while he is not , he deceiveth himself .
48006004	But let every man prove his work , and then in himself he shall exult , and not in others .
48006005	For every man shall bear his own burden .
48006006	But let him who heareth the word , communicate to him from whom he heareth it , in all good things .
48006007	Do not err . Aloha is not mocked : for whatever a man soweth , that he reapeth .
48006008	He who in the flesh soweth , from the flesh corruption reapeth ; and he who in the Spirit soweth , from the Spirit the life that is eternal shall reap .
48006009	And while we do that which is good , let it not weary us ; for the time will be when we shall reap , and it will not weary us .
48006010	Now , therefore , while the time is ours , let us do good unto every man , and especially to the sons of the house of the faith .
48006011	You see these letters which I have written to you with my hands .
48006012	They who would glory in the flesh would constrain you to be circumcised ; only lest for the cross of the Meshiha they might be persecuted .
48006013	For neither do these who are circumcised keep the law ; but they will that you be circumcised , that in your flesh they may glory .
