48006014	But to me let it not be that I shall glory except in the cross of our Lord Jeshu Meshiha , by which the world is crucified unto me , and I am crucified to the world .
48006015	For circumcision is not any thing , nor uncircumcision , but the new creature .
48006016	And they who this pathway accomplish , peace be upon them and mercy , and upon the Israel of Aloha .
48006017	Henceforth upon me let no man throw a burden ; for the signatures of our Lord Jeshu Meshiha in my body I bear .
48006018	The grace of our Lord Jeshu Meshiha be with your spirit , my brethren . Amen .
49001001	PAULOS , an apostle of Jeshu Meshiha by the will of Aloha , to those who are in Ephesos , saints and believers in Jeshu Meshiha :
49001002	peace be with you , and grace from Aloha our Father , and from our Lord Jeshu Meshiha .
49001003	Blessed be He , Aloha , the Father of our Lord Jeshu Meshiha , who hath blessed us with all blessings of the Spirit in heaven , in the Meshiha ;
49001004	as he before elected us in him , from before the foundations of the world , that we should be saints , and without blemish before him ,
49001005	and in love predesignated us unto himself , and constituted us children in Jeshu Meshiha , according to the pleasure of his will ;
49001006	that the glory of his grace might be glorified , that ( grace ) which he hath poured upon us by the hand of his Beloved :
49001007	in whom we have redemption , and by his blood the remission of sins , according to the riches of his grace
49001008	which he hath made to abound in us in all wisdom and in all understanding of the Spirit ;
49001009	and hath made known to us the mystery of his will , which before he had determined in himself should be done :
49001010	that in the dispensation of the fulness of the times , every thing from the first might be renovated in the Meshiha , in heaven and in earth . And by him
49001011	we have been chosen , even as he predesignated and willed , who worketh all according to the mind of his will ;
49001012	that we who first hoped in the Meshiha , should be to the honour of his glory .
49001013	In whom you also heard the word of truth , which is the gospel of your salvation ; and in whom you believed and were sealed with the Spirit of Holiness who was promised ;
49001014	who is the earnest of our inheritance , until the redemption of those who are saved , and unto the praise of his majesty .
49001015	ON account of this , behold , I also , since I heard of your faith in our Lord Jeshu Meshiha , and your love to all the saints ,
49001016	have not ceased to give thanks on your behalf , and to remember you in my prayers ;
49001017	that the God of our Lord Jeshu Meshiha , the Father of glory , would give to you the Spirit of wisdom and of revelation in his knowledge ,
49001018	and would enlighten the eyes of your hearts to know what is the hope of his calling , and what the riches of the glory of his inheritance for the saints ,
49001019	and what is the inheritance of his power in us who believe , according to the operation of the might of his power ,
49001020	which he wrought in the Meshiha , and raised him from among the dead , and set him at his right hand in heaven , above all the principalities ,
49001021	and powers , and mighty ones , and rulers , and above every name that is named , not only in this world , but also in ( that ) to come ;
49001022	and subjected every thing beneath his feet : and Him who is over all he hath given to be the head of the church ,
49001023	which is His body , the completeness of Him who all in all completeth .
49002001	You also who were dead in your sins and in your transgressions ,
49002002	in which from the first you walked according to the worldliness of this age , and according to the will of the prince of the power of the air , of that Spirit who urgeth in the sons of disobedience ;
49002003	in those works in which we also walked from the first in the lusts of our flesh , doing the will of our flesh and of our mind , and were the sons of wrath fully as the rest .
49002004	BUT Aloha , who is rich in his mercies , for his great love wherewith he loved us
49002005	while we were dead in our sins , made us alive with the Meshiha , and through his grace delivered us ,
49002006	and raised us with him , and made us to sit with him in heaven in Jeshu the Meshiha ,
49002007	that he might show to the ages to come the greatness of the riches of his grace and his goodness , which hath been upon us in Jeshu the Meshiha .
49002008	For by his grace are we saved through faith , and this was not of you , but is the gift of Aloha ,
49002009	not of works , that no man should glory .
49002010	For we are his creation , who are created in Jeshu Meshiha unto good works , which Aloha hath prepared before , that in them we should walk .
49002011	Wherefore be mindful , that you Gentiles at first were carnal , and were called the Uncircumcision by that which is called the Circumcision , and is the work of the hands in the flesh ;
49002012	and were at that time without the Meshiha , and were aliens from the polity of Israel , and strangers to the covenant of the promise , and , without hope , were without Aloha in the world .
49002013	But now , by Jeshu the Meshiha , you who before were far off , are brought nigh by the blood of the Meshiha .
49002014	For he is our peace , he who hath made the two one , and hath destroyed the wall which stood in the midst ,
49002015	and the enmity , through his flesh ; and the law of prescriptions , with its requirements , he hath abolished , that of the two he might create in himself one new man , and make peace ;
49002016	and hath reconciled the two in one body with Aloha , and by his cross hath slain the enmity .
49002017	And coming , he preached peace to you , to the far off , and to the nigh ; therefore ,
49002018	through Him there hath been made for us both an access by one Spirit unto the Father .
49002019	THEREFORE are you no more strangers and sojourners but sons of the city of the saints , and sons of the house of Aloha ;
49002020	and you are builded upon the foundation of the apostles and of the prophets , and Jeshu the Meshiha himself is the chief corner of the building ;
49002021	and in him is the whole building increased and enlargeth into a holy temple in the Lord ,
49002022	while you also in him are being builded the dwelling of Aloha by the Spirit .
49003001	On account of this I , Paulos , am bound for Jeshu Meshiha for the sake of you Gentiles :
49003002	if you have heard the dispensation of the grace of Aloha which was given me for you ;
49003003	that by revelation he made known to me the mystery , as I have written to you in few ( words ) ;
49003004	so that while you read you are able to understand my knowledge of the mystery of the Meshiha ,
49003005	which in other generations was not known to the sons of men , as it hath now been revealed to his holy apostles and to his prophets by the Spirit ;
49003006	that the Gentiles should be sons of his inheritance and partakers of his body , and in the promise which is given concerning him by the gospel ,
49003007	of which I am made a minister , according to the gift of the grace of Aloha , which he hath given me by the operation of his power .
49003008	To me , who am the least of all the saints , is given this grace , that I should preach among the Gentiles the riches of the Meshiha ,
49003009	which are not searched ; and to bring to light unto all men what is the dispensation of the mystery which was hidden from the ages in Aloha , who created all :
49003010	that through the church might be made known the wisdom of Aloha , which is full of diversities , to the principalities and powers who are in heaven ,
49003011	that which he prepared from of old , and which he hath executed by Jeshu our Lord ,
49003012	by whom we have freedom and access with the confidence of the faith of him .
49003013	WHEREFORE I pray that I may not weary in my affliction , which is on your account ,
49003014	for this is your glory ; and I bow my knees unto the Father of our Lord Jeshu Meshiha ,
49003015	from whom is named the whole family who are in heaven and in earth ;
49003016	that he would give to you , according to the riches of his glory , with power to be confirmed by his Spirit in your interior man ;
49003017	that the Meshiha may dwell by faith in your hearts in love ; your root and your foundations being confirmed ,
49003018	that you may be able to follow out with all the saints , what the height , and depth , and the length , and breadth ;
49003019	and know the grandeur of the love of the Meshiha , and be filled with all the fulness of Aloha .
49003020	But to Him who is able with power beyond all to do for us above what we ask or conceive , according to his power which worketh in us ,
49003021	to Him be glory in his church , by Jeshu Meshiha , in all ages , for ever and ever . Amen .
49004001	I BESEECH of you , therefore , I , the bound one for our Lord , that you walk as is worthy of the calling wherewith you are called ,
49004002	in all lowliness of mind , and composedness , and long-suffering ; and be patient towards one another in love .
49004003	And be diligent to keep the unity of the Spirit in the bond of peace ,
49004004	that you may be in one body and in one Spirit , even as you are called in one hope of your calling .
49004005	For one is the Lord , and one the faith , and one the baptism ;
49004006	and one is Aloha , the Father of all , and over all , and by all , and in us all .
49004007	But unto each of us is given grace according to the measure of the gift of the Meshiha .
49004008	Wherefore it is said , He ascended on high ; He led captive captivity , And gave gifts unto men .
49004009	But he who ascended , what is it but that he also descended first into the low places of the earth ?
49004010	He who descended , is he who also ascended above all the heavens , to fulfil all .
49004011	And he gave some who ( are ) apostles , and some who ( are ) prophets , and some who ( are ) evangelists , and some who ( are ) pastors , and some who ( are ) doctors ;
49004012	for the perfecting of the saints , for the work of the ministry , for the edification of the ( church of the ) Meshiha ,
49004013	until we be all one in the faith and in the knowledge of the Son of Aloha , and one man perfect in the measure of the stature of his completeness ;
49004014	and that we be no children , agitated and altered by every wind of fraudulent doctrines of men , which in their craftiness they fabricate deceptively in order to seduce ,
49004015	but be confirmed in our love , that whatever is ours may increase in the Meshiha ,
49004016	who is the head , by whom the whole body is increased and compacted in all the limbs , according to the gift which is given in proportion to every member for the increase of the body itself , that in love its structure might be completed .
49004017	BUT this I say and testify in the Lord , that from henceforth you may not walk as the rest of the Gentiles , who walk in the vanity of their minds ,
49004018	and are darkened in their understandings , and are alienated from the life of Aloha on account of their ignorance , and on account of the blindness of their hearts ;
49004019	who are cut off from their hope , and have delivered themselves up to lasciviousness and to the working of all uncleanness in their greediness .
49004020	But you have not thus learned the Meshiha ,
49004021	if really you have heard him and learned as the truth is in Jeshu ;
49004022	but that you put from you your former habitudes , the old man who is corrupt in deceitful lusts ,
49004023	and be renewed in the spirit of your minds ,
49004024	and wear the new man , who by Aloha is created in righteousness and in the sanctity of truth .
49004025	WHEREFORE let lying cease from you , and speak the truth every man with his neighbour : for we are members one of another .
49004026	Be angry and sin not , and let not the sun set upon your wrath ,
49004027	and give no place to the accuser .
49004028	And let him who hath stolen henceforth steal not , but labour with his hands and do good , that he may have to give to him who needeth .
49004029	Let no hateful word come out of your mouth , but that which is comely and useful for edification , that it may communicate grace to those who hear .
49004030	And grieve not the Holy Spirit of Aloha , by whom you have been sealed unto the day of redemption .
49004031	Let all bitterness , and heat , and anger , and clamour , and scandal be taken from you , with all malice ;
49004032	and be gentle one with another , and affectionate , and forgive one another , even as Aloha in the Meshiha hath forgiven us .
49005001	Be therefore imitators of Aloha , as beloved children ;
49005002	and walk in love , as the Meshiha also loved us , and delivered himself for us , an offering and a sacrifice to Aloha of a fragrant smell .
49005003	BUT fornication and all uncleanness and covetousness , let them not be even heard among you , as it becometh the saints ;
49005004	neither filthiness , nor words of folly , or of jeering , or fables , which are not necessary , but , instead of these , thanksgiving .
49005005	But this know , that any man who is a fornicator , or impure , or covetous , or an idolater , hath no inheritance in the kingdom of the Meshiha and of Aloha ;
49005006	lest any man deceive you with vain words ; for because of these cometh the anger of Aloha upon the sons of disobedience .
49005007	Be not , therefore , participators with them .
49005008	For you were before darkness , but now you are light in our Lord . As the sons of light , then , so walk .
49005009	For the fruits of the light are in all goodness and rectitude and truth .
49005010	And be discerning of that which is good before our Lord .
49005011	And have no communion with the works of darkness , which have no fruits , but reprove them .
49005012	For that which in secrecy they do it is execrable even to mention .
49005013	For every thing is exposed by the light , and is revealed , and whatever revealeth is light .
49005014	Wherefore it is said , Awake thou who sleepest , And arise from the dead , And the Meshiha shall enlighten thee .
49005015	See then that you walk vigilantly , not as fools ,
49005016	but as the wise who redeem their opportunity , because the days are evil .
49005017	On account of this , be not wanting in mind , but understand what is the will of Aloha .
49005018	And be not drunk with wine , in which is intemperance , but be filled with the Spirit .
49005019	And discourse with yourselves with psalms and with hymns and with songs of the Spirit , singing with your hearts unto the Lord .
49005020	And give thanks always on behalf of every man in the name of our Lord Jeshu Meshiha unto Aloha the Father .
49005021	And be subject one to another in the love of the Meshiha .
49005022	WIVES , be subject to your husbands as to our Lord .
49005023	For the husband is the head of the wife , as the Meshiha is the head of the church , and he himself is the Saviour of the body .
49005024	But as the church is subject to Meshiha , so also ( should ) wives be unto their husbands in every thing .
49005025	Husbands , love your wives , as also the Meshiha loved his church , and gave himself for her ,
49005026	that he might sanctify her and purify her in the laver of waters and by the word ,
49005027	and that he might constitute her a church unto himself , being glorified , and not having blemish or wrinkle or any thing like these ; but to be holy and spotless .
49005028	So it becometh husbands to love their wives , as their own bodies . For he who his wife loveth , himself he loveth .
49005029	For no man ever hated his own body , but nourisheth it , and taketh care of it ; so also the Meshiha ( taketh care ) of the church .
49005030	For we are members of his body , and of his flesh are we , and of his bones .
49005031	Because of this a man leaveth his father and his mother , and cleaveth unto his wife , and they two become one flesh .
49005032	This mystery is great ; but I speak of the Meshiha and of his church .
49005033	Nevertheless let every one of you so love his wife as his own self ; but let the wife reverence her husband .
49006001	Children , obey your parents in our Lord , for this is right ; and this is the first commandment which promiseth .
49006002	Honour thy father and thy mother ,
49006003	that it may be well with thee , and thy life be prolonged upon the earth .
49006004	Parents , make not your children angry , but make them to grow in the discipline and in the doctrine of our Lord .
49006005	Servants , be subject to your masters who are according to the flesh , with fear and trembling , and with simplicity of heart , as unto the Meshiha :
49006006	not in the sight of the eyes , as if you were pleasing men ( only ) , but as the servants of Meshiha who do the will of Aloha .
49006007	And serve them from all your soul , in love , as unto our Lord , and not as unto men ;
49006008	knowing that whatever good a man doeth he is rewarded by our Lord , whether he be a servant or a son of freedom .
49006009	So you , masters , do likewise to your servants ; forgiving them a fault ; for you know also that your Master is in heaven , and there is no respect of persons with him .
49006010	HENCEFORTH , my brethren , be strong in our Lord , and in the power of his strength .
49006011	And clothe you in all the armour of Aloha , that you may be able to stand against the wiles of the accuser .
49006012	For your wrestling is not with flesh and blood ( only ) , but with princes , and with powers , and with the possessors of this dark world , and with the evil spirits who are under heaven .
49006013	Wherefore clothe you with all the armour of Aloha , that you may be able to meet the evil one , and being prepared in every thing you may stand .
49006014	Stand , therefore , with your loins strengthened with the truth , and wear the breastplate of righteousness ,
49006015	and let your feet be shod with the preparation of the gospel of peace ;
49006016	and with these take to you the shield of faith , that therewith you may be empowered with strength to extinguish all the burning shafts of that evil one ;
49006017	and put on the helmet of salvation , and take the sword of the Spirit which is the word of Aloha .
49006018	And with all prayers , and with all supplications , pray at all times in the Spirit , and in that prayer be watchful in all seasons ,
49006019	praying constantly and invoking on behalf of all the saints ; and for me also , that the word may be given me with openness of my mouth , that I may boldly proclaim the mystery of the gospel ,
49006020	for which I am an ambassador in chains , that I may speak with freedom , as it behoveth me to speak it .
49006021	But that you may know also what relateth to me , and what I am doing , behold , Tykikos , a brother beloved , and a faithful minister of our Lord , will make known to you ;
49006022	whom I have sent to you on account of this , that he may make you acquainted with what relateth to me , and may comfort your hearts .
49006023	Peace be with the brethren , and love with faith from Aloha our Father , and from our Lord Jeshu Meshiha .
49006024	Grace be with all them who love our Lord Jeshu Meshiha incorruptibly . Amen .
50001001	PAULOS and Timotheus , servants of Jeshu the Meshiha , to all the saints who are in Jeshu Meshiha at Philipos , with the presbyters and deacons .
50001002	Grace be with you and peace from Aloha our Father , and from our Lord Jeshu Meshiha .
50001003	I offer thanks unto Aloha upon the remembrance of you constantly ,
50001004	in all my prayers on your behalf ; and while rejoicing ,
50001005	I pray , for your fellowship which is in the gospel from the first day until now ;
50001006	because I am confident of this , that he who hath begun good workings in you will himself make perfect until the day of our Lord Jeshu Meshiha .
50001007	For so it is right for me to think concerning you all , because you are laid up in my heart ; and in my bonds , and in the defence of the truth of the gospel , you are partakers with me in grace .
50001008	For Aloha is my witness how I love you with the bowels of Jeshu Meshiha .
50001009	And this I pray , that your love may still increase and abound in knowledge and in all spiritual understanding ;
50001010	that you may distinguish those things that are proper , and may be pure and without offence in the day of the Meshiha ,
50001011	and filled with the fruits of righteousness which are in Jeshu Meshiha , to the glory and the honour of Aloha .
50001012	BUT I wish you to know , my brethren , that my business tendeth the more to the forwarding of the gospel .
50001013	For so also my bonds are manifest for the Meshiha in the whole palace , and unto all besides .
50001014	And a multitude of brethren who are in our Lord are strengthened on account of my bonds , and have dared the more fearlessly to speak the word of Aloha .
50001015	Some preach from envy and contention , but some from good-will ,
50001016	and in the love of the Meshiha ; for they know that for the defence of the gospel I am appointed .
50001017	But those who preach the Meshiha from contention do it not sincerely , but think to add affliction to my bonds .
50001018	Yet in this I have rejoiced , and do rejoice , that in every way , if for an occasion , or if in truth , the Meshiha shall be preached .
50001019	For I know that these things shall be found unto my life by your prayers , and by the gift of the Spirit of Jeshu Meshiha ;
50001020	even as I hope and expect , that in nothing I shall be confounded , but manifestly , as at all times , so also now , the Meshiha shall be magnified in my body , whether by life or by death .
50001021	For my life is the Meshiha ; and if I die , it is gain to me .
50001022	But if in this life of the flesh there be also fruit to me from my works , I know not what to choose .
50001023	For these two straiten me . I desire to be set free , that I might be with the Meshiha , and this is greatly preferable to me ;
50001024	but also to remain in my body is the thing which constraineth me on your account .
50001025	For I know this confidently , that I am to remain and tarry for your joy and for the increase of your faith :
50001026	that when I come again to you , your glorying which is in Jeshu Meshiha alone shall abound in me .
50001027	As it becometh the gospel of the Meshiha , so have your conversation ; that if coming I see you , or absent , I may hear of you , that you stand in one spirit and in one soul , conquering together for the faith of the gospel ;
50001028	in nothing moved by them who stand against us , to the forthshowing of their perdition , and of our salvation ,
50001029	And this from Aloha hath been given to you , not only believing to believe in the Meshiha , but also for his sake to suffer ,
50001030	and to sustain a conflict , as you have seen in me , and now hear concerning me .
50002001	IF , therefore , you have consolation in the Meshiha , and if there be comfort in love , and if communion of the Spirit , and if compassions and mercies ,
50002002	complete my gladness by having one sentiment and one love , and one soul and one mind .
50002003	And do nothing in contention or vainglorying , but in meekness of mind let a man consider his neighbour as better than himself .
50002004	And let no one care for himself ( only ) , but every one for his neighbour also .
50002005	And feel this in yourselves , which Jeshu the Meshiha ( did ) also :
50002006	who , when he was in the form of Aloha , considered this not to be robbery , ( this , namely , ) that he was the co-equal of Aloha :
50002007	yet emptied he himself , and took the form of a servant , and was made in the form of men ;
50002008	and in fashion was found as a man , and humbled himself , and was obedient unto death , but the death of the cross .
50002009	Wherefore also Aloha greatly exalted him , and gave him a name that is more excellent than all names ,
50002010	that at the name of Jeshu every knee should kneel , of those in heaven , and on earth , and under the earth ;
50002011	and that every tongue should confess that Jeshu the Meshiha is the Lord , to the glory of Aloha his Father .
50002012	WHEREFORE , my beloved , as you have all time obeyed , not while I am near you only , but now that I am far from you , the more with fear and trembling work the work of your salvation ;
50002013	for Aloha himself effectuates in you also to will , also to do , the thing which you will .
50002014	Do every thing without murmuring and without division ;
50002015	that you may be perfect and without spot , as the pure children of Aloha , who dwell in a generation depraved and perverse ; and be manifest among them as luminaries in the world ,
50002016	to be unto them for a place of salvation , for my exultation in the day of the Meshiha , that I may not have run in vain , nor laboured to no purpose .
50002017	But , also , offered on the sacrifice and service of your faith , I am glad , and rejoice with you all ;
50002018	so also you be glad and rejoice with me .
50002019	But I hope in our Lord Jeshu to send Timotheos to you soon , that I also may have quietness when I learn concerning you .
50002020	For I have no other who is so as my ( own ) soul , who will diligently take care for yours .
50002021	For all are seeking what is theirs , and not what is of Jeshu Meshiha .
50002022	But the proof of this you know , that as a son with his father , so hath he wrought with me in the gospel .
50002023	Him , therefore , I hope to send to you speedily , when I shall have seen what with me .
50002024	And I confide on my Lord , that I also speedily shall come unto you .
50002025	But now the matter hath pressed me to send to you the brother Epaphroditos , who is a helper and labourer with me , but your messenger and minister to my necessity ;
50002026	for he desired to see you all , and was anxious , because he knew that you had heard that he was sick .
50002027	Yes , he was sick , unto death ; but Aloha had mercy upon him ; but not upon him only , but upon me also , lest I should have sorrow upon sorrow .
50002028	Urgently , therefore , have I sent him to you , that when you have seen him again you may rejoice , and that I may have a little breathing .
50002029	Receive him , then , in the Lord with all joy ; and those who are such , hold in estimation :
50002030	because for the work of the Meshiha he had come nigh unto death , and was disregardful of his life , that he might accomplish that which you had wanted in the service which concerned me .
50003001	HENCEFORTH , my brethren , rejoice in our Lord . To write the very same ( things ) to you , to me is not weariness , because they make you cautious .
50003002	Beware of dogs , beware of evil workers , beware of the cutting of the flesh .
50003003	For the circumcision are we , who serve Aloha in the spirit , and glory in Jeshu the Meshiha , and confide not on the flesh .
50003004	Yet I may have confidence on the flesh . For if any one consider that his confidence is in the flesh , I more than he .
50003005	Circumcised the son of eight days , of the family of Israel , of the tribe of Benyomin , Ebroia of Ebroyee ; in the law , Pharisha ;
50003006	in zeal , a persecutor of the church ; and in the righteousness of the law , without fault have I been .
50003007	But these things which were my gain , I have reckoned loss for the Meshiha ;
50003008	and I also ( still ) reckon them all loss , for the grandeur of the knowledge of Jeshu Meshiha my Lord ; for whose sake I have lost all things , and have reckoned as dung , that the Meshiha I may gain ,
50003009	and be found in him , not having my own righteousness , which is of the law , but that which is by the faith of the Meshiha , which is righteousness that is from Aloha :
50003010	that in it I may know Jeshu , and the power of his resurrection , and have fellowship in his sufferings , and be conformed into his death ,
50003011	that any how I may be able to come to the resurrection which is from among the dead .
50003012	I have not yet received , nor ( am I ) yet perfected ; but I run , that so I may lay hold on that for the sake of which Jeshu the Meshiha hath laid hold on me .
50003013	MY brethren , I think not concerning myself that I have laid hold ( of the final prize ) ; but one ( thing ) I know , that what is behind me I forget , and to that which is before me
50003014	I stretch , and run towards the sign , to obtain the victory of the high vocation of Aloha by Jeshu Meshiha .
50003015	Let those , then , who are mature consider these things ; and if otherwise you consider , this also will Aloha reveal to you .
50003016	Nevertheless , that to this we may attain , in one way let us proceed , and with one consent .
50003017	Be like me , my brethren , and consider them who so walk according to the pattern you have seen in us .
50003018	For there are many who walk otherwise , of whom many times I have told you , but now weeping I tell you , they are adversaries of the cross of the Meshiha ;
50003019	they , whose end is perdition , whose god is their belly , and whose glory is their shame ; they , whose mind is in the earth .
50003020	But our employment is in heaven , and from thence we expect the Saviour , our Lord Jeshu Meshiha ,
50003021	who will change the body of our abasement to make ( it ) in the fashion of his glorious body , according to his great power , by which all is subjected unto him .
50004001	Wherefore , my brethren , beloved and tenderly-regarded , my joy and my crown , so stand in our Lord , my beloved .
50004002	Of Evhodia I beseech , and of Syntika , that one mind they have in our Lord .
50004003	Also of thee I beseech , my true yokefellow , to be helpful to those who are labouring with me in the gospel , with Klimis , and with the rest of my helpers , whose names are written in the book of life .
50004004	Rejoice in our Lord in all time , and again I say , Rejoice .
50004005	And let your meekness be known unto every man : our Lord is near .
50004006	For nothing be anxious ; but in all time , with prayer and with supplication , let your requests be made known before Aloha :
50004007	And the peace of Aloha , which is greater than all knowledge , shall keep your hearts and your minds , through Jeshu Meshiha .
50004008	FINALLY , my brethren , those ( things ) which are true , and those which are honest , and those which are just , and those which are pure , and those which are lovely , and those which are laudable , and those ( which are ) works of praise and of celebration , these consider .
50004009	These which you have learned , and received , and heard , and seen in me , these perform ; and the God of peace will be with you .
50004010	But greatly do I rejoice in our Lord , that you have begun to care ( again ) for me , as also you were careful , but you have not had ability .
50004011	But I have not spoken because I have had need ; for I have learned to make sufficient to me that which I have had .
50004012	I know ( how ) to be abased , I know also how to abound in all ; and in every thing I am trained with sufficiency and with hunger , with abundance and with destitution :
50004013	for every thing I am empowered through the Meshiha who strengtheneth me .
50004014	Nevertheless , you have done well to communicate unto my afflictions .
50004015	Know also , you Philipisoyee , that in the commencement of the gospel , when I went forth from Makedunia , not one of the churches communicated to me in the account of receiving and giving , but you only .
50004016	For also to Thessalonika one time and twice to my necessity you sent .
50004017	Not because I seek the gift , but I seek that fruit may multiply unto you .
50004018	But I have received every thing , I abound ; and am full ; and I have accepted all that you sent me by Epaphroditos , a sweet fragrance and a sacrifice , acceptable , which pleaseth Aloha .
50004019	And my God shall supply all your necessity , according to his riches in the glory of Jeshu Meshiha .
50004020	To Aloha our Father be praise and glory to the age of ages . Amen .
50004021	Ask for the peace of all the saints who are in Jeshu the Meshiha . The brethren who are with me ask for your peace .
50004022	All the saints ask for your peace , especially those who are of the house of Caesar .
50004023	The grace of our Lord Jeshu the Meshiha be with you all . Amen .
51001001	PAULOS , an apostle of Jeshu the Meshiha by the will of Aloha , and the brother Timotheos ,
51001002	to those who are in Kulosos , the holy brethren and believers in Jeshu Meshiha : peace be with you , and grace from Aloha our Father .
51001003	We give thanks to Aloha the Father of our Lord Jeshu Meshiha in all time , and pray on your behalf ,
51001004	even from our hearing of your faith in Jeshu Meshiha , and of your love to all the saints ;
51001005	for the hope which is kept for you in heaven , which at the first you heard through the word of the truth of the gospel ,
51001006	which is preached to you , as also to all the world , and increaseth and giveth fruits , as also in you from the day that you heard , and knew the grace of Aloha in truth ,
51001007	as you learned from Epaphra our beloved companion , who is himself for you a faithful minister of the Meshiha ,
51001008	and who hath made known to us your love , which is in the Spirit .
51001009	ON account of this also we , from the day that we heard , have not ceased to pray for you , and to supplicate that you may be filled with the knowledge of the will of Aloha in all wisdom and in all spiritual understanding ,
51001010	and may walk according to that which is just , and may please Aloha in all good works , and may yield fruit , and increase in the knowledge of Aloha ;
51001011	and in all power be empowered according to the greatness of his glory in all patience and prolongedness of spirit :
51001012	and with joy may give thanks to Aloha the Father , who hath fitted us for a portion of the inheritance of the saints in light ,
51001013	and hath delivered us from the power of darkness , and brought us into the kingdom of his beloved Son ,
51001014	in whom we have redemption and the forgiveness of sins :
51001015	who is the image of Aloha the unseen , and the first-born of all the creatures .
51001016	And by him was every thing created that is in heaven and in earth ; all that is seen , and all that is unseen , whether thrones or dominions , or princes or powers ; all things by his hand and through him were created ;
51001017	and he is before all , and every thing by him subsisteth .
51001018	And he is the head of the body of the church , ( he ) who is the chief and first-born from among the dead , that he should be preeminent in all .
51001019	For in him ( the Father ) hath willed all fulness to dwell ;
51001020	and by him to reconcile all things to himself , and to make peace through the blood of his cross , ( even ) by him , whether they be inhabitants in earth or in heaven .
51001021	YOU also , who before were aliens and adversaries in your minds by your evil works ,
51001022	hath he reconciled now in the body of his flesh and through his death , to constitute you saints before him without spot and without blame ;
51001023	if you continue in your faith , your foundation being firm , and be not moved from the hope of the gospel which you have heard , and which is proclaimed to every creature who is under heaven , of which I , Paulos , am made a minister .
51001024	I rejoice in the sufferings which are on your account , and fulfil the void of the afflictions of the Meshiha in my flesh for the sake of his body ,
51001025	which is the church ; of which I am made a minister according to the dispensation of Aloha , which was given to me for you , to accomplish the word of Aloha ;
51001026	that mystery which was hidden from ages and generations , but now hath been revealed unto his saints .
51001027	To whom Aloha hath willed to make known what is the opulence of the glory of this mystery among the Gentiles ; which is , The Meshiha , who in you ( is ) the hope of glory ;
51001028	whom we proclaim , and ( concerning whom ) we teach and inform every man in all wisdom , that we may present every man perfect in Jeshu Meshiha ;
51001029	for which also I labour and contend , according to the help of the power which is given to me .
51002001	But I wish you to know what an agony I have for you and for those who are in Laodikia , and for the rest who have not seen my person in the flesh ;
51002002	that their hearts may be comforted , and that they may approach in love to all the riches of assurance , and to the understanding of the knowledge of the mystery of Aloha the Father and of the Meshiha ,
51002003	in whom are hidden all the treasures of wisdom and of knowledge .
51002004	But this I say , Let no man deceive you with the persuasion of words .
51002005	For though in the flesh I am far from you , yet in the spirit I am with you ; and I rejoice to behold your order , and the firmness of your faith in the Meshiha .
51002006	As , then , you have received Jeshu Meshiha our Lord , ( so ) in him walk ,
51002007	your roots strengthened , and you builded in him , and established in that faith which you have learned , that you may abound therein with thanksgiving .
51002008	Beware lest any man strip you by philosophy and by vain deceit , according to the teaching of men , and according to the principles of the world , and not according to the Meshiha ,
51002009	in whom dwelleth all the fulness of the Godhead bodily .
51002010	And in him also you are complete ; for he is the head of all principalities and powers .
51002011	And in him you have been circumcised with the circumcision which is not with hands , by the putting away of the flesh of sins , ( even ) by the circumcision of the Meshiha .
51002012	And you have been buried with him by baptism , and in him have risen with him , who have believed in the power of Aloha who raised him from among the dead .
51002013	And you who were dead in your sins , and in the uncircumcision of your flesh , he hath made alive with him , and forgiven us all our sins ;
51002014	and hath blotted out in his mandates the writing of our debts that was against us , and hath taken it from the midst , and affixed it to his cross ;
51002015	and by the yielding up of his body he hath prostrated principalities and powers , and hath shamed them openly by himself .
51002016	LET no man therefore judge you in meat and in drink , or in the distinctions of festivals , and of new moons , and of shabeths ,
51002017	which are shadows of those to come , but the body is the Meshiha .
51002018	And lest any man wish by abasement of mind to fetter you to be subject to the worship of angels , intruding upon that which he hath not seen , and vainly inflated in his fleshly mind ;
51002019	and not holding the Head , from whom all the body is composed and constituted in joints and limbs , and increaseth ( with ) the increase of Aloha .
51002020	For if you are dead with the Meshiha from the principles of the world , why as if you lived in the world are you judged ? as that
51002021	you are not to touch , nor to taste , nor to handle ?
51002022	For these are of perishable use , and are ordinances and doctrines of men ;
51002023	and appear to have in them a reason of wisdom , with the look of humility and the fear of Aloha , ( as ) not sparing the body , ( yet ) not in that which is ( really ) of value , but in those ( things ) whose use pertains to the flesh .
51003001	IF , then , you have risen with the Meshiha , seek ( the realities ) which are on high , where the Meshiha sitteth at the right hand of Aloha .
51003002	Think of that which is on high , and not of that on earth .
51003003	For you are dead , and your life is hid with the Meshiha in Aloha ;
51003004	and when the Meshiha , who is our life , shall be manifested , then also will you be manifested with him in glory .
51003005	Put to death , then , your members that are upon the earth : fornication , uncleanness , and passions , and evil desires , and covetousness , which itself is idolatry .
51003006	For on account of these cometh the anger of Aloha upon the sons of disobedience .
51003007	In these also you walked aforetime , when you were conversant in them .
51003008	But now cease you from all these ; anger , wrath , malice , reviling , impure speech :
51003009	and lie not one to another , but put off the old man with all his manners ,
51003010	and wear the new , who is renovated by knowledge in the image of his Creator ,
51003011	where there is not Jihudoya and Aramoya , nor circumcision and uncircumcision , nor Javanoya and Barbaroya , nor slave and freeman , but the Meshiha is all and in all .
51003012	Wear , therefore , as the chosen of Aloha , saints and beloved , compassions and tenderness , and benignity , and lowliness of mind , and composure , and patience .
51003013	And bear with one another , and forgive one another , if any man have a complaint against his neighbour ; even as the Meshiha hath forgiven you , so also forgive ;
51003014	and with all these charity , which is the girdle of perfection .
51003015	And let the peace of the Meshiha direct your hearts , for to it you have been called in one body ; and give thanks to the Meshiha ,
51003016	whose word shall dwell in you abundantly , in all wisdom . And teach and admonish yourselves in psalms and in hymns and in songs of the Spirit , and with grace sing with your hearts unto Aloha .
51003017	And whatsoever you do , either in word or work , do ( it ) in the name of our Lord Jeshu Meshiha , and with thanksgiving through him unto Aloha the Father .
51003018	WIVES , be subject to your husbands , as it is right in the Meshiha .
51003019	Men , love your wives , and be not bitter against them .
51003020	Children , obey your parents in every thing , for so it is pleasing before our Lord .
51003021	Fathers , exasperate not your children , that they be not discouraged .
51003022	Servants , obey in every thing your masters according to the flesh , not in the sight of the eye ( only ) , as those who please men , but from a simple heart , and in the fear of the Lord .
51003023	And all that you do , from all your heart do ( it ) , as to our Lord , and not as to men .
51003024	And know that from our Lord you receive the reward in the inheritance ; for the Lord the Meshiha you serve .
51003025	But he who injureth is recompensed as he had injured , and there is no acceptance of persons .
51004001	Masters , do equity and justice to your servants , knowing that you also have a Master in heaven .
51004002	In prayer be constant , and be watchful in it , and ( in ) giving thanks ;
51004003	praying also for us , that Aloha may open to us the gate of the word , to speak the mystery of the Meshiha , for the sake of which I am bound ,
51004004	that I may fully make it manifest , as it behoveth me .
51004005	In wisdom walk towards the outward ones , and redeem your opportunity .
51004006	And let your speech at all time be with grace as sprinkled with salt , each one knowing how it becometh him to return the answer .
51004007	What concerneth me will Tykikos , a beloved brother and faithful minister , and our companion in the Lord , make known to you :
51004008	whom I have sent to you for this , that he may know how it is with you , and may comfort your hearts ;
51004009	with Onesimos , the faithful and beloved brother who is of you . These will make you know what concerneth us .
51004010	Aristarchos , a captive with me , asketh for your peace , and Markos , the nephew of Bar Naba , regarding whom you are directed , that if he come to you , receive him ,
51004011	and Jeshu who is called Justos : these are of the circumcision , and these only have helped me in the kingdom of Aloha , and these have been a consolation to me .
51004012	Epaphra , who is of you , asketh for your peace ; a servant of the Meshiha , who is always labouring on your behalf in prayer , that you may stand perfect and complete in all the will of Aloha .
51004013	For I testify of him that he hath a great zeal for you and for those in Laodikia and in Iropolis .
51004014	Lukos our beloved physician , and Dima , ask for your peace .
51004015	Ask the peace of the brethren who are in Laodikia , and of Nymfa , and of the church which is in his house .
51004016	And when this epistle shall have been read to you , cause it also to be read in the church of the Laodikoyee ; and that which is written from the Laodikoyee , read you it .
51004017	And say to Arkipos , Be vigilant in the ministry which thou hast received in our Lord , that thou fulfil it .
51004018	This salutation with the hand of me , PAULOS . Remember my bonds . Grace be with you . Amen .
52001001	PAULOS , and Sylvanos , and Timotheos , to the church of the Thesalonikoyee which ( is ) in Aloha the Father , and in our Lord Jeshu Meshiha . Grace be with you and peace .
52001002	We give thanks to Aloha at all time for you all and are mindful of you in our prayers constantly ,
52001003	and remember before Aloha the Father the works of your faith , and the labour of your love , and the perseverance of your hope , which is in our Lord Jeshu Meshiha .
52001004	For we know your election , my brethren , beloved of Aloha ,
52001005	because our preaching was not in words only with you , but with power , and with the Spirit of Holiness , and with the persuasion of truth . Also you know how we were among you , on account of you ;
52001006	and you became imitators of us and of our Lord , and you received the word in great affliction , and with the joy of the Spirit of Holiness ,
52001007	and became an example to all the believers who are in Makedunia and in Akaia .
52001008	For from you was made to be heard the word of our Lord , not only in Makedunia and in Akaia , but in every place your faith which is in Aloha was made to be heard , so that we have no need to say of you any thing .
52001009	For they learned what an entrance we had unto you , and how you turned to Aloha , from the fear of idols , to worship Aloha the living and the true ;
52001010	awaiting his Son from heaven , Jeshu himself , whom he raised from among the dead , and who delivered us from the wrath that cometh .
52002001	And you know , my brethren , that our entrance unto you was not in vain ,
52002002	but having suffered before and been shamefully treated , as you know , in Philipos , and then ( even ) in great conflict we spoke with you with the confidence of our God the gospel of the Meshiha .
52002003	For our exhortation was not from deceit , nor from uncleanness , nor from guile ;
52002004	but as approved of Aloha to be intrusted with his gospel , so speaking as not to please men , but Aloha who trieth our hearts .
52002005	For never have we used flattering speech , as you know , nor for an occasion of covetousness , Aloha witnesseth .
52002006	Neither have we sought glory from men , either from you or from others , though we could have been honoured ones , as the apostles of the Meshiha ;
52002007	but we were humble among you , and , as a nurse who loveth her children ,
52002008	so also we loved , and were desirous to impart to you , not only the gospel of Aloha , but also our life , because we loved you .
52002009	Remember , therefore , my brethren , how we laboured and toiled in the work of our hands by night and by day , that we might not be a burden on one of you .
52002010	You witness and Aloha , how we preached to you the gospel of Aloha , purely and justly , and were without blame with all the faithful .
52002011	As you know how every one of you , as a father his children , we exhorted , and spoke with your hearts ;
52002012	and ( now ) we testify to you how you should walk worthy of Aloha himself who hath called you to his kingdom and to his glory .
52002013	WHEREFORE we also give thanks constantly unto Aloha , that the word of Aloha which you received from us , was not as the word of man ( that ) you received ( it ) , but , as it is truly , the word of Aloha , which in operation worketh ( alike ) in you and in all them who believe .
52002014	But you , my brethren , have become like the churches of Aloha which are in Jihud , who are in Jeshu Meshiha , because you likewise suffer from your fellow-country-men , as they also from the Jihudoyee ;
52002015	who killed our Lord Jeshu Meshiha , and the prophets who were of them , and ourselves have persecuted , and Aloha have not pleased ,
52002016	and have acted adversely to all men ; who forbid us to speak with the Gentiles that they might be saved ; to fill up their sins for all time : but upon them cometh the wrath unto the end !
52002017	BUT we , my brethren , having been bereaved-ones of you the time of an hour , as to our presence , but not in our heart , have been the more solicitous to see your faces with great love ,
52002018	and have wished to come to you ( even ) I , Paulos , one time and two ; but Satana hindered me .
52002019	For what is our hope and our joy , and the crown of our glorying , but you , before our Lord Jeshu at his coming ?
52002020	For you are our glory and our joy .
52003001	And because we could not endure , we were willing to be left at Athinos alone ,
52003002	and to send to you Timotheos our brother , a minister of Aloha and our helper in the gospel of the Meshiha , to fortify you , and inquire of you concerning your faith ,
52003003	that none of you should be slain through these afflictions ; for you know that to this we are set .
52003004	For while also we were with you , we foretold you that we were to be afflicted , as you know that it hath been .
52003005	On account of this also , I , not enduring until I had sent to know your faith , lest the tempter should tempt you , and we should have laboured in vain ;
52003006	but now when Timotheos came to us from among you , and gave us intelligence of your faith and of your love , and that you have a good remembrance of us in every season , and desire to see us as we also ( to see ) you ;
52003007	on this account we were comforted in you , my brethren , in all our anxieties and our afflictions because of your faith .
52003008	And now we live , if you are established in our Lord .
52003009	For what thanks giving can we render on account of you to Aloha , over all the joy with which we rejoice on your behalf ,
52003010	unless before Aloha we supplicate exceedingly by night and by day to see your faces , and to perfect what is wanting to your faith ?
52003011	But Aloha himself , the Father of our Lord Jeshu Meshiha , will make straight our way to you ,
52003012	and he will cause your love to increase to one another , and to every man , even as we love you ;
52003013	and will establish your hearts without blame in holiness , before Aloha our Father , at the advent of our Lord Jeshu Meshiha with all his saints .
52004001	HENCE then , my brethren , we pray of you , and beseech of you by our Lord Jeshu , that as you have received of us how it behoveth you to walk and to please Aloha , the more to increase .
52004002	For you know those precepts we gave to you in our Lord Jeshu Meshiha .
52004003	For this is the will of Aloha , your sanctification ; and that you be distant from all fornication ;
52004004	and that every man of you know to possess his vessel in sanctification and in honour ,
52004005	and not in the passions of concupiscence , as the rest of the Gentiles who know not Aloha .
52004006	And that you dare not transgress , and defraud the one man his brother in this matter , because our Lord is the avenger of all these , as we have also before told you and testified .
52004007	For Aloha hath not called us to uncleanness , but unto sanctification .
52004008	Therefore , whoever despiseth , not man he despiseth , but Aloha , who hath ingiven you his Holy Spirit .
52004009	But concerning the love of the brethren , you need not ( that I ) write to you ; for you yourselves are taught of Aloha to love one another .
52004010	And so do you to all the brethren who are in all Makedunia ; but I beseech of you , my brethren , to excel .
52004011	And study to be quiet and be occupied with your own employments , and work with your hands , as we have admonished you ;
52004012	that you may walk becomingly towards the outward-ones , and of man you may not need .
52004013	BUT I wish you to know , my brethren , that for those who are asleep you should not have sorrow , as the rest of men , who have no hope .
52004014	For if we believe that Jeshu died and arose , so also Aloha those who have slept in Jeshu will bring with him .
52004015	But this we say to you by the word of our Lord , that we who remaining at the coming of our Lord , who live , will not precede those who have slept .
52004016	For our Lord himself with the mandate , and with the voice of the chief of angels , and with the trumpet of Aloha , will come down from heaven , and the dead who are in the Meshiha will arise first ;
52004017	and then we who remaining alive , shall be rapt with them together in clouds , to the meeting of our Lord in the expanse ; and so always with our Lord shall we be .
52004018	Wherefore comfort one another with these words .
52005001	But of the times and the seasons , my brethren , you need not that I write to you ;
52005002	for you truly know that the day of our Lord as a thief in the night so cometh .
52005003	While they shall be saying , Peace and tranquillity , then unawares will destruction arise against them , as distress upon the child-bearer , and they shall not escape .
52005004	But you , my brethren , are not in darkness , that that day as a thief should overtake you .
52005005	For all of you are sons of light , and sons of the day ; and are not sons of the night , nor sons of darkness .
52005006	Sleep we not , therefore , as the rest ; but be wakeful and sober .
52005007	For they who sleep , in the night sleep ; and they who are drunken , in the night are drunken .
52005008	But we who are sons of the day must be wakeful in our minds , and wear the mail-coat of faith and of love , and put on the helmet of the hope of salvation .
52005009	For Aloha hath not appointed us to wrath , but to the possession of salvation in our Lord Jeshu Meshiha ,
52005010	who died on our behalf , that , whether we wake or sleep , together with him we may live .
52005011	Wherefore comfort one another , and edify one another , as also you do .
52005012	BUT I entreat of you , my brethren , to know them who labour among you , and stand before your faces teaching you ,
52005013	that they be esteemed by you in abundant love ; and on account of their work be at peace with them .
52005014	And I entreat of you , my brethren , ( to ) admonish the offenders , and encourage the little of soul , and bear the burden of the weak , and prolong your spirit toward every man .
52005015	And beware , lest any of you evil render for evil ; but always follow after ( those things which are ) good ( pl . ) toward one another , and toward every man .
52005016	Be joyful always ,
52005017	and pray without ceasing ,
52005018	and in every thing give thanks ; for this is the will of Aloha in Jeshu Meshiha concerning you .
52005019	The Spirit quench not .
52005020	Prophecy do not despise .
52005021	Prove every thing , and what is good retain .
52005022	And from every evil thing flee .
52005023	But the God of peace himself will sanctify perfectly all of you ; and your whole spirit , and your soul , and your body will he keep without fault , to the coming of our Lord Jeshu Meshiha .
52005024	Faithful is he who hath called you , who himself will do it !
52005025	My brethren , pray for us .
52005026	Ask the peace of all our brethren , with the holy kiss .
52005027	I adjure you , by our Lord , that this epistle be read to all the holy brethren .
52005028	The grace of our Lord Jeshu Meshiha be with you . Amen .
53001001	PAULOS , and Sylvanos , and Timotheos , to the church of the Thesalonikoyee , which is in Aloha our Father , and our Lord Jeshu Meshiha .
53001002	Grace be with you , and peace , from Aloha our Father , and from our Lord Jeshu Meshiha .
53001003	To give thanks we owe to Aloha at all time on behalf of you , my brethren , as it is proper ; because your faith greatly increaseth , and the love of you all , of every man toward his neighbour , enlargeth ;
53001004	as that we also boast of you in the churches of Aloha , of your faith and of your patience , in all your persecution and your affliction which you endure ;
53001005	for a demonstration of the just judgment of Aloha , that you may be worthy of his kingdom , for the sake of which you suffer ;
53001006	and whether it is ( not ) righteous to render afflictions to them who afflict you .
53001007	And you who are afflicted will he save with us , at the revelation of our Lord Jeshu Meshiha from heaven , with the host Of his angels , when he executeth the punishment , with burning of fire ,
53001008	on them who have not known Aloha , and on them who have not acknowledged the gospel of our Lord Jeshu Meshiha .
53001009	For these in the judgment will be punished ( with ) the perdition of eternity , from the presence of our Lord , and from the glory of his power ;
53001010	when he cometh to be glorified in his saints , and to show his wonders in his faithful ones , that our testimony that was concerning you may be believed in that day .
53001011	On account of this at all time pray we for you , that Aloha may make you meet for your calling , and complete in you all the will of good ( things ) , and the operations of faith with power ;
53001012	that the name of our Lord Jeshu Meshiha may be glorified in you , and you also in him , according to the grace of Aloha and our Lord Jeshu Meshiha .
53002001	But we beseech of you , my brethren , as it regards the coming of our Lord Jeshu Meshiha , and our assemblage with him ,
53002002	that you be not soon moved in your minds , nor perturbed , nor by word , nor by spirit , nor by letter , which ( may be ) as ( if it were ) from us , that , Behold , the day of our Lord cometh !
53002003	Let no one deceive you by any one of the methods , because unless there shall come first the rebellion , and there be revealed the man of sin , the son of perdition ;
53002004	He who is the adversary , and is exalted over all who is called God and Venerable ; so that also in the temple of Aloha as Aloha he will sit , and will make manifest of himself as that he is Aloha .
53002005	Do you not remember , that , when I was with you , these I told you ?
53002006	And now you know what holdeth , that he may be revealed in his time .
53002007	For the mystery of iniquity already beginneth to be effective ; only if that which now holdeth be taken from the midst ,
53002008	then will be revealed that evil one , whom our Lord Jeshu will consume by the spirit of his mouth , and will abolish by the revelation of his advent .
53002009	For the coming of that ( wicked one ) is the working of Satana , with all power , and ( with ) signs and false miracles ,
53002010	and with all unrighteous deception which is done in them who perish , because they have not received the love of the truth by which they might have been saved .
53002011	Wherefore Aloha will send them the working of deception ,
53002012	that they will believe the lie , and all of them will be judged who have not believed in the truth , but have had pleasure in unrighteousness .
53002013	But we are bound to give thanks unto Aloha at all time for you , our brethren , beloved in our Lord , because Aloha hath chosen you from the beginning unto salvation , by sanctification of the Spirit , and by the belief of the truth .
53002014	For unto these Aloha called you by our preaching , that you should be the glory of our Lord Jeshu Meshiha .
53002015	Wherefore , my brethren , stand fast , and persevere in the precepts which you have been taught , whether by word , or by our epistle .
53002016	But our Lord Jeshu Meshiha himself , and Aloha our Father , who hath loved us , and given us everlasting consolation , and a good hope through grace ,
53002017	will comfort your hearts , and establish in every word and in every work of good .
53003001	Henceforth , my brethren , pray for us , that the word of our Lord may run and be glorified in every place , as among you .
53003002	And that we may be delivered from wicked men and perverse ; for every man hath not faith .
53003003	But the Lord is faithful , who will keep you and deliver you from evil .
53003004	But we confide concerning you in our Lord , that what we have commanded you , you have done ,
53003005	and also are doing . And our Lord will direct your hearts to the love of Aloha , and to the patience of the Meshiha .
53003006	But we command you , my brethren , in the name of our Lord Jeshu Meshiha , that you remove from every brother who walketh wickedly , and not according to the precepts which he hath received from us .
53003007	For you know how it behoveth to imitate us who walked not wickedly among you .
53003008	Neither did we eat bread for nothing from any one of you ; but with labour and weariness by night and by day we wrought , that upon no one of you we might be burdensome .
53003009	Not because we had not power , but because in ourselves we would give you an example , that you may imitate us .
53003010	For while we were with you , this we commanded you , that every one who willeth not to work , neither should he eat .
53003011	For we hear that there are some among you who walk wickedly , and nothing work , unless vain things .
53003012	But these we command , and entreat of them by our Lord Jeshu Meshiha , that with quietness they work , and eat their ( own ) bread .
53003013	But you , my brethren , be not weary in doing what is good .
53003014	And if any man hearken not to these our words in the epistle , let this be separate from you , and be not mixed with him , that he be shamed .
53003015	Yet , not as an enemy hold him , but admonish him as a brother .
53003016	But the Lord of peace himself will give you peace always , in every thing . Our Lord be with you all .
53003017	Salutation , by the writing of my hand , I , PAULOS , have written ; which is the sign in all my epistles , so I write .
53003018	The grace of Jeshu Meshiha be with you all , my brethren . Amen .
54001001	PAULOS , an apostle of Jeshu Meshiha , by the commandment of Aloha our Saviour , and of Jeshu Meshiha our hope ;
54001002	to Timotheos , my true son in the faith : grace and mercy and peace from Aloha our Father and Jeshu Meshiha our Lord .
54001003	I requested of thee , when I would go into Makedunia , to remain at Ephesos , and instruct certain men that they teach not various doctrines ,
54001004	nor throw themselves ( away ) upon stories and tales of generations which have no end , ( but ) which rather subserve contentions , and not edification in the faith of Aloha .
54001005	But the end of the commandment is love , from a pure heart , and from a good conscience , and from genuine faith .
54001006	And from them that have erred , and have declined to vain words ,
54001007	seeking to become teachers of the law , while they understand not what they speak , nor that concerning which they contend .
54001008	But we know that the law is good , if a man according to the law converse in it ;
54001009	knowing that against the righteous the law is not set , but against the evil , and rebels , and the wicked , and sinners , and the dishonest , and those who are not pure , and those who strike their fathers , and those who strike their mothers , and murderers ,
54001010	and fornicators , and liers with men , and stealers of the free , and liars , and doers against an oath
54001011	and whatever ( else ) is opposed to the healthful doctrine of the gospel of the glory of the blessed Aloha , with which I have been intrusted .
54001012	And I thank him who hath empowered me , our Lord Jeshu Meshiha , who accounted me faithful , and constituted me his minister ; me ,
54001013	who before was a blasphemer , and a persecutor , and injurious ; but I received mercy , because while ignorant I did it , without faith .
54001014	But in me hath abounded the grace of our Lord , and faith and love which are in Jeshu Meshiha .
54001015	Faithful is the word , and worthy of reception that Jeshu the Meshiha came into the world to save sinners , of whom I am first .
54001016	But for this he had compassion upon me , that in me first Jeshu Meshiha might show all long-suffering , as an exhibition for them who should believe in him unto everlasting life .
54001017	But to the King who is eternal , incorruptible , and unseen , who is one Aloha , be honour and glory for ever and ever . Amen .
54001018	This commandment I commit to thee , my son Timotheos , according to the early prophecies which were concerning thee , that thou mayest war through them this good warfare with faith and with a good conscience .
54001019	For those who this have put away from them of faith have been emptied ;
54001020	as Hymeneos and Alexandros , whom I have delivered to Satana , that they may not blaspheme .
54002001	I REQUIRE then from thee , that , before every thing supplication be offered to Aloha , and prayer and intercession and thanksgiving for all men ;
54002002	for kings and princes , that an habitation quiet and tranquil we may inhabit in all the fear of Aloha and purity .
54002003	For this is good and acceptable before Aloha our Saviour ;
54002004	who willeth that all men should be saved , and turn to the knowledge of the truth .
54002005	For one is Aloha , and one is the Mediator of Aloha and of men ; the man Jeshu Meshiha ,
54002006	who gave himself a ransom for every man ; a testimony which cometh in its time ,
54002007	of which I am constituted an herald and an apostle , I say the truth and lie not , to be a teacher of the nations in the faith of the truth .
54002008	I wish then for men to pray in every place , uplifting their hands purely and without wrath and without disputations .
54002009	So also let women with decorous simplicity of apparel , with modesty and with chastity , adorn themselves , not with braidings , and with gold , and with pearls , and with fine vestments ,
54002010	but with good works , as becometh women who profess the fear of Aloha .
54002011	Let the wife in quietude learn with all submission :
54002012	for unto the wife to teach I permit not , neither to be authoritative over the husband , but to be in quietude .
54002013	For Adam was formed first , then Hava ;
54002014	and Adam was not deceived , but the wife was deceived , and transgressed the commandment .
54002015	But she is saved by her children , if they continue in faith , and in love , and in sanctification , and in chastity .
54003001	This saying is faithful , that if a man desire the presbyterate , a good work he desireth .
54003002	But it behoveth that a presbyter be as that blame be not found in him ; and that he be the husband of one wife ; ( a man ) who is of a vigilant mind , chaste , and orderly , and a lover of guests , and instructful ;
54003003	and not a transgressor over wine , nor ( one ) whose hand hastens to strike ; but he is to be gentle and not contentious , nor a lover of money ;
54003004	and ( one who ) ruleth his house well , holding his children in subjection with all purity .
54003005	For if his own house he know not to rule well , how is he able to rule the church of Aloha ?
54003006	Neither shall his discipleship be recent , lest he be lifted up , and fall into the judgment of Satana .
54003007	But it is needful that he have also a good testimony from those without , that he may not fall into reproach , and into the net of Satana .
54003008	And also the ministers must be pure , not speaking doubly , not inclined to much wine , nor shall they love unclean gains .
54003009	But they shall hold the mystery of the faith with a pure conscience .
54003010	And these are to be proved first , and then to minister , being without blame .
54003011	Thus also must the woman be chaste , and they shall be vigilant ( in their ) minds , and faithful in every thing ; and they shall not be accusers .
54003012	The ministers shall be ( of them ) severally who have one wife , and shall rule each his children and his household well .
54003013	For they who minister well , a good degree acquire for themselves , and much openness of face in the faith of Jeshu Meshiha .
54003014	These I write to thee , hoping soon to come to thee ;
54003015	but if I should delay , that thou mayest know how to converse in the house of Aloha , which is the church of Aloha the Living , the column and foundation of the truth .
54003016	And truly great is this mystery of righteousness , which was revealed in the flesh , and justified by the Spirit , and seen of angels , and preached among the peoples , and believed in the world , and taken up into glory .
54004001	But the Spirit distinctly saith , that in the last times some will remove from the faith , and will go after deceiving spirits , and after doctrines of demons .
54004002	These , with a false appearance , will deceive , speaking a lie , and seared in their conscience ,
54004003	and prohibiting to marry , and abstaining from meats , which Aloha created to be used with thanksgiving by them who believe and know the truth ;
54004004	because every creature of Aloha is good , and nothing to be abominated , if with thanksgiving it be received ;
54004005	for it is sanctified by the word of Aloha , and by prayer .
54004006	These if thou shalt teach thy brethren , a good minister wilt thou be of Jeshu Meshiha , while thou wilt be enlarged with words of faith and of the good doctrine which thou hast learned .
54004007	But from the foolish stories of old women abstain ; and exercise thy soul in righteousness .
54004008	For the exercise of the body a little time profiteth ; but righteousness in every thing profiteth , and hath the promise of the life of this time , and of the future .
54004009	FAITHFUL is the saying and worthy is it of reception :
54004010	for on this account we labour and are reproached , because we hope in Aloha the Living , who is the Saviour of all men , and especially of the believers .
54004011	These teach and command .
54004012	And let no man despise thy youth ; but be an example to the believers in word , and in conduct , and in charity , and in faith , and in purity .
54004013	Till I come be diligent in reading , and in prayer , and in teaching .
54004014	Neglect not the gift that is in thee , which was given thee with prophecy , and the hand-laying of the presbytery .
54004015	In these meditate , and in them be , that it may be known to every man that thou goest onward .
54004016	And take heed to thyself , and to thy doctrine , and persevere in them ; for while these thou doest , thyself wilt thou save , and them who hear thee .
54005001	An elder do not reprimand , but persuade him as a father , and those who are young as thy brethren ,
54005002	and the elderly women as mothers , and those who are young as thy sisters , with all purity .
54005003	The widows honour them who are widows in truth .
54005004	And if there be a widow who hath children , or children's children , let them learn first to do justly for their families , and to repay the debts ( owing ) to their parents ; for this is acceptable before Aloha .
54005005	But she who is truly a widow and solitary ( is one ) whose hope is in Aloha , and who persevereth in prayer and in supplication by night and by day .
54005006	But she who serveth pleasure is dead while she liveth .
54005007	These things prescribe to them , that they be without blame .
54005008	For if a man hath not care of them who are his own , and especially of them who are children of the household of faith , he hath denied the faith , and is worse than those who believe not .
54005009	Elect , then , the widow who is not less than sixty years , who hath had one husband ,
54005010	and who hath the testimony of good works : if she have brought up children , if she have received guests , if she have washed the feet of the saints , if she have cheered the afflicted , if she have walked in every gracious work .
54005011	But from the widows who are young , withhold ( the election ) ; for these become schismatical against the Meshiha , and seek to marry ,
54005012	and their condemnation is confirmed , because they have rejected their first fidelity .
54005013	They also learn idleness , wandering from house to house ; and not only idleness , but also to multiply words , and to follow vain ( pursuits ) , and to speak things which they ought not .
54005014	I will therefore that those who are young should marry , and bear children , and conduct their households ,
54005015	and not give to the adversary any occasion to revile . For already have some begun to turn aside after Satana .
54005016	If any believing man or believing woman have widows , let them support them , that they may not be burden-some on the church , that they who are widows indeed may have sufficient .
54005017	Those presbyters who well conduct themselves shall be worthy of double honour , especially they who labour in the word and in doctrine .
54005018	For the scripture saith , Thou shalt not muzzle the ox in the treading out ; and , Worthy is the labourer of his hire .
54005019	Against a presbyter an accusation receive not , except on the mouth of two or three witnesses .
54005020	Those who sin before all men reprove , that the rest may be afraid .
54005021	I attest thee before Aloha and our Lord Jeshu Meshiha and his elect angels , that thou keep these , ( precepts , ) and let not thy mind be pre-occupied by any thing , and do nothing with acceptance of persons .
54005022	The hand suddenly on any man lay not , neither participate in others' sins . Keep thyself in purity .
54005023	And henceforth water drink not , but wine a little drink , on account of thy stomach , and on account of thy constant infirmities .
54005024	THERE are men whose sins are known , and they precede them to the place of judgment ; and there are whose ( sins ) go after them .
54005025	So also good men are known ; and those who are otherwise cannot be hid .
54006001	Let those who are under the yoke of servitude hold their masters in all honour , that the name of Aloha and his doctrine be not blasphemed .
54006002	But let not those who have believing masters slight them , because they are their brethren ; but serve them the more , because they are believers , and beloved who are refreshed by their ministry . These things teach and require of them .
54006003	But if there be a man who teacheth other doctrine , and who accedeth not to the healthful words of our Lord Jeshu Meshiha , and to the doctrine of the fear of Aloha ,
54006004	this ( is one ) who extolleth himself while knowing nothing , but is infirm with disputation and questioning of words , from which are envy , and contention , and evil speaking , and supposition in the evil mind ,
54006005	and conflicts of men whose minds are corrupt and deprived of the truth , and who consider that gain is the fear of Aloha .
54006006	But thou , remove thyself from them . For our gain is great which is the fear of Aloha , with the use of our sufficiency .
54006007	For nothing brought we into the world , and we know that nothing we are able to take from it .
54006008	Therefore sufficient to us are food and raiment .
54006009	But they who will be rich fall into temptations and snares , and many lusts which befool and injure , and which plunge men into destruction and perdition .
54006010	For the root of all evil is the love of money ; and there are who have coveted it , and from the faith have erred , and have made themselves enter into many sorrows .
54006011	But thou , O man of God , from these things flee , and follow after righteousness , and after equity , and after faith , and after charity , and after patience , and after meekness .
54006012	And contend in the good agony of faith , and lay hold of the life which is eternal , unto which thou art called , and hast confessed a good confession before many witnesses .
54006013	I ATTEST thee before Aloha , who vivifieth all , and Jeshu Meshiha , who witnessed before Pontius Pilatos the good testimony ,
54006014	that thou keep ( this ) commandment without spot and without blemish , until the manifestation of our Lord Jeshu Meshiha ,
54006015	whom in his time will show Aloha the blessed and only Strong One , the King of kings , and Lord of lords ;
54006016	he who only is incorruptible , and ( who ) dwelleth in light which no man can approach ; whom no man of men hath seen , nor is able to see : to him be honour and power for ever and ever . Amen .
54006017	The rich of this world instruct , that they be not uplifted in their minds , nor be trustful upon riches which have no security , but upon Aloha the living , who giveth to us all abundantly for our comfort ;
54006018	and that they perform good works , and become rich in welldoings , and be ready to give and to communicate ,
54006019	and lay for themselves a good foundation for that which is to be , that they may lay hold on the true life .
54006020	O Timothy , watch over that which is confided to thee , and fly from vain words , and the turnings of false knowledge .
54006021	For they who pursue it err from the faith . Grace be with thee . Amen .
55001001	PAULOS , an apostle of Jeshu Meshiha by the will of Aloha , and on account of the promise of life which is in Jeshu Meshiha ,
55001002	to Timotheos my beloved son : grace and mercies and peace from Aloha our Father , and from our Lord Jeshu Meshiha .
55001003	I thank Aloha , whom I serve from my fathers with a pure conscience , that constantly I remember thee in my prayers of the night and of the day ;
55001004	and have longed to see thee , being mindful of thy tears , that I may be filled with joy :
55001005	in remembrance of thee ( and ) of thy true faith which dwelt first in the mother of thy mother Lois , and in thy mother Eunika , and which , I am persuaded , ( is ) in thee also .
55001006	On account of this I put thee in mind to keep awake the gift of Aloha , which is in thee by the laying on of my hands .
55001007	For Aloha hath not given to us the spirit of fear , but of power and of love and of discipline .
55001008	Wherefore be not thou ashamed of the testimony of our Lord , nor of me his prisoner ; but sustain evil with the gospel , through the power of Aloha ,
55001009	who hath saved us , and called us with an holy calling ; not according to our works , but according to his will , and that grace of his which was given to us in Jeshu Meshiha before the time of the worlds ,
55001010	and is now revealed by the revelation of our Saviour Jeshu Meshiha , who hath abolished death , and hath demonstrated life and incorruption , through the gospel ,
55001011	of which I am appointed an herald and an apostle and a teacher of the nations :
55001012	on account of which I suffer these , and am not ashamed . I know in whom I have believed , and am persuaded that there is power in his hands my deposite to keep for me unto that day .
55001013	Let the outline of sound words be with thee , which thou hast heard from me , with the faith and love which are in Jeshu Meshiha :
55001014	that good deposite keep through the Spirit of Holiness who dwelleth in us .
55001015	Know this , that all those of Asia are turned from me , of whom are Phygellos and Harmogenes .
55001016	Our Lord give mercies to the house of Onesiphoros , who many times hath refreshed me , and of the chains of my bonds hath not been ashamed .
