55001017	But when also he came to Ruma , with diligence he sought me , and found me .
55001018	Our Lord grant that he may find mercies with our Lord in that day : and how he ministered to me in Ephesos thou especially knowest .
55002001	Thou therefore , my son , be strong in the grace of our Lord Jeshu Meshiha .
55002002	And those ( doctrines ) which thou hast heard from me by many witnesses , them commit to faithful men , who are also able to teach others .
55002003	And endure evils as a good soldier of Jeshu Meshiha .
55002004	No man serveth as a soldier , and entangleth himself with the affairs of the world , that he might please him who hath chosen him .
55002005	And if one contendeth , he is not crowned , unless according to his law he contend .
55002006	It becometh the husbandman who laboureth that he should first eat of his fruits .
55002007	Understand what I say to thee . Our Lord give thee wisdom in all things .
55002008	Remember Jeshu Meshiha , that he arose from among the dead , he who is of the seed of David , according to my gospel ;
55002009	for which I endure evils unto bonds , as an evil-doer : but the word of Aloha is not bound .
55002010	Therefore I endure every thing on account of the elect , that they also may find salvation in Jeshu Meshiha , with the glory that is eternal .
55002011	Faithful is the word : For if we be dead with him , With him also we shall live ;
55002012	And if we endure , We shall also reign with him ; But , if we deny him , He also will deny us !
55002013	And if we believe him not , He in his faithfulness abideth ; For deny himself he cannot .
55002014	Of these ( truths ) remind them , and testify before our Lord , that they contend not with unprofitable words , to the overturning of those who hear them .
55002015	And be careful to establish thyself perfectly before Aloha , a workman without shame , preaching rightly the word of truth .
55002016	From vain words which have no utility in them withdraw ; for they add greatly to the wickedness of those who are occupied with them .
55002017	And their words as an eating cancer will lay hold upon many : but one of them is Hymeneos , and another Philetos ,
55002018	who have erred from the truth , saying , that the resurrection of the dead hath been , and the faith of some overturning .
55002019	But the true foundation of Aloha standeth ; and it hath this signature : And the Lord knoweth them who are his . And , Let every one who invoketh the name of the Lord depart from iniquity .
55002020	But in a great house there are not vessels of gold only or of silver , but also of wood , also of clay : of them ( some are ) to honour , and of them ( some ) to dishonour .
55002021	If a man then purify himself from these , he will be a pure vessel unto honour , fitted for the use of his Lord , and prepared for every good work .
55002022	From all the lusts of youth escape ; and pursue after righteousness , and faith , and charity , and peace , with them who call upon the Lord with a pure heart .
55002023	From foolish controversies which are without instruction withdraw ; for thou knowest that they beget strifes .
55002024	But a servant of the Lord oweth not to strive , but to be gentle towards every man , and teaching , and long-suffering ,
55002025	that he may instruct them who would contend against him with meekness , if by any means Aloha may give them conversion , and they may acknowledge the truth ,
55002026	and be mindful of themselves , and remove from the snare of Satana , by whom they have been entrapped at his will .
55003001	But know this , that in the last days hard times will come ;
55003002	and men will be lovers of themselves , and lovers of money , boastful , lofty , blasphemous , to their men not obedient , deniers of grace , impious , calumniators ,
55003003	subjected to lust , brutal , haters of the good ,
55003004	traitors , impetuous , puffed up , lovers of lusts rather than the love of Aloha ;
55003005	having a form of the worship of Aloha , but from the power of Aloha afar off : ( them ) who are such put from thee .
55003006	For of them are they who creep into houses , and captivate women who are overladen with sins , and led away by divers lusts ;
55003007	who , in all time learning , never to the knowledge of the truth are able to come .
55003008	But as Yonis and Yanbris stood against Musha , so also these stand against the truth : men whose understanding is corrupted , and reprobate from the faith .
55003009	But they shall not come further , for their folly is known to all men , as also of them it is known .
55003010	BUT thou hast followed my doctrine and my manners , and my purpose , and my faith , and my prolongedness of mind , and my charity , and my patience ,
55003011	and my persecution , and my sufferings . And thou knowest what things I endured in Antioch , and in Ikonion , and in Lystra , what persecution I endured ; and out of all these my Lord delivered me .
55003012	But all they who will in the fear of Aloha to live in Jeshu Meshiha , are persecuted .
55003013	But wicked men and seducers add to their wickedness , deceiving , and being deceived .
55003014	But abide thou in those things that thou hast learned , and in which thou art confirmed ; for thou knowest from whom thou hast learned :
55003015	and that from thy childhood thou hast learned the holy writings , which are able to make thee wise to salvation , through faith which is in Jeshu Meshiha .
55003016	FOR all scripture which from the Spirit is written , is profitable for doctrine , and for rebuke , and for correction , and for instruction which is in righteousness :
55003017	that the man of God may be perfect unto every good work , and completed .
55004001	I attest thee before Aloha , and our Lord Jeshu Meshiha , who is to judge the living and the dead at the revelation of his kingdom :
55004002	preach the word , and stand with diligence in season , and ( that ) which is not season ; confute , and rebuke with all prolongedness of mind and doctrine .
55004003	For the time will come , when sound doctrine they will not hear ; but according to their desires will multiply to themselves teachers , in the itching of their hearing .
55004004	And from the truth they will turn away their ear , but to fables will decline .
55004005	But watch thou in every thing , and endure evils , and work the work of an evangelist , and thy ministry fulfil .
55004006	But I am sacrificed , and the time when I shall be dissolved cometh .
55004007	The good agony I have fought , and my running I have completed , and my faith I have kept .
55004008	And from now there is kept for me the crown of righteousness , which my Lord will give me in that day , because he is a righteous judge : yet , not only to me , but to all them who love his manifestation .
55004009	BE careful to come to me speedily ;
55004010	for Dema hath left me , and hath loved this world , and is gone to Thessalonika ; Krispos to Galatia , Titos to Dalmatia ;
55004011	Luka only is with me . Take Markos and bring him with thee ; for helpful to me is he in the ministry .
55004012	But Tykikos have I sent to Ephesos .
55004013	The case ( for ) books which I left at Troas with Karpos , when thou comest bring , and the books , and especially the roll of parchments .
55004014	Alexander the brass-worker many evils hath showed me : our Lord awardeth to him according to his deeds .
55004015	But be thou also aware of him , for he is much uplifted against our words .
55004016	In the first defence no man was with me , but all of them left me . May this not be reckoned to them !
55004017	But my Lord stood with me , that by me the preaching might be fulfilled , and ( that ) all the Gentiles might hear : and I was delivered from the mouth of the lion .
55004018	And my Lord will deliver me from every evil work , and will save me into his kingdom , which is in heaven . To Him be glory for ever and ever . Amen .
55004019	Give salutation to Priskela , and to Akilos , and to the house of Onesiphoros .
55004020	Erastos remains at Kurinthos ; but Trophimos I left ill in Miletos the city .
55004021	Be careful to come before winter . Ebulos and Pudis , and Linos , and Klaudia , and all the brethren , ask for your peace .
55004022	Our Lord Jeshu Meshiha be with thy spirit . Grace be with thee . Amen .
56001001	PAULOS , a servant of Aloha , and apostle of Jeshu Meshiha , for the faith of the chosen ones of Aloha , and the knowledge of the truth which is in the fear of Aloha ;
56001002	unto the hope of eternal life , which Aloha the true counselled before the times of the ages ,
56001003	and his word hath revealed in his time by our preaching , which was confided to me by the command of Aloha our Saviour :
56001004	To Titos , my true son in the common faith . Grace and peace from Aloha the Father and from our Lord Jeshu Meshiha our Saviour .
56001005	For this I left thee in Kreta , that those things which were wanting thou mayest rectify , and constitute presbyters in every city as I commanded thee .
56001006	Him who is without blame , and is the husband of one wife , and who hath believing children , who are not vicious nor addicted to intemperance .
56001007	For a presbyter is bound to be without blame , as the steward of Aloha ; he shall not be led by the will of self , nor be irascible , nor a transgressor over wine , neither shall his hand be hasty to strike , nor shall he be a lover of sordid gains .
56001008	But he shall be a lover of guests , and a lover of the good , and be chaste , and equitable , and holy , and withholding himself from lusts ;
56001009	and careful over the doctrine of the word of faith , that he may be able also to comfort by his teaching the healthy , and to reprove those who are contentious .
56001010	For there are many who are not in subjection , and whose words are vain , and make the minds of men to err , especially those of the circumcision ,
56001011	those , whose mouths it behoves to stop . Many houses they destroy , and teach what they ought not , for the sake of filthy gain .
56001012	One of them , a prophet of their own , hath said , The sons of Kreta are always liars , evil beasts , and lazy bellies .
56001013	And true is this testimony . Wherefore reprove them severely , that they may be sound in the faith ,
56001014	nor cast themselves to the fables of the Jihudoyee , and to the mandates of men who hate the truth .
56001015	For every thing is pure to the pure ; but to those who are polluted and unfaithful nothing is pure ; but their understanding and their conscience are polluted .
56001016	And they profess to know Aloha , but in their works they deny him , and are abominable and disobedient , and reprobate to every good work .
56002001	But speak thou that which becometh sound doctrine ,
56002002	and teach , That the elders be watchful in their minds , and be chaste and pure , and sound in the faith , and in charity , and in patience .
56002003	And so also the aged women , that they be in behaviour what becometh the fear of Aloha , and not slanderers , nor enslaved to much wine , and that they teach good things ;
56002004	making those who are young modest , to love their husbands and their children ,
56002005	and to be chaste and holy , well mindful of their houses , and submissive to their husbands , that no man blaspheme the word of Aloha .
56002006	And of those who are young men , likewise , require that they be chaste .
56002007	But in every thing show thyself the example in all good works , and in doctrine let there be with thee sound speech which is sincere and incorrupt ,
56002008	and which no man will despise , that he who riseth against us may be ashamed when he cannot say any thing hateful against us .
56002009	Let servants to their masters be submissive in every thing , and please them , not contradicting ,
56002010	nor pilfering ; but let them show their good-trustiness in every thing , that they may adorn in every thing the doctrine of Aloha our Saviour .
56002011	FOR the all-saving grace of Aloha hath appeared to all men ,
56002012	and teacheth us to deny wickedness and the lusts of the world , and to live in this world in purity , and in rectitude , and in the fear of Aloha ,
56002013	while expecting the blessed hope and the manifestation of the glory of the great God and our Saviour Jeshu Meshiha ;
56002014	who gave himself for us , to redeem us from all iniquity , and to cleanse unto himself a new people , who are zealous of good works .
56002015	These speak , and require , and maintain with all authority , and no man shall despise thee .
56003001	Put them in mind that to princes and to powers they are to hearken and to be obedient , and to be prepared for every good work .
56003002	And against no man to rail , nor be contentious , but gentle , and in every thing to show their benignity towards all men .
56003003	For we also were afore-time without understanding , and disobedient and erring , and were subjected to various lusts ; and in malice , and in envy we conversed , and were hateful , and also hating one another .
56003004	But when appeared the goodness and mercy of Aloha our Saviour ,
56003005	not by works of righteousness which we had done , but by his own mercy he saved us , by the laving of the birth which is afresh , by the renewing of the Spirit of Holiness ,
56003006	which he shed upon us abundantly , by Jeshu Meshiha our Saviour ;
56003007	that by his grace we might be justified , and be made heirs according to the hope of the life which is eternal .
56003008	Faithful is the word ; and in this I will that thou also establish them , that they should be careful to perform good works , they who have believed in Aloha . These are good and profitable unto men .
56003009	But from foolish disputations , and from tales of genealogies , and from contentions , and strifes of the sophree , withdraw ; for profit is not in them , and they are vain .
56003010	From an heretical man , after one time and twice thou hast admonished him , withdraw ;
56003011	and know that he who is such is perverse , and sinneth , and condemneth himself .
56003012	When I have sent to thee Artema , or Tykikos , be careful to come to me at Nikopolis ; for there I have determined in my mind to winter .
56003013	But concerning Zina the sophra , and Apolo , be careful to provide them well , that nothing may be wanting to them .
56003014	And let those also who are of us , learn to perform good works in things which are necessary , that they may not be without fruits .
56003015	All they who are with me ask for thy peace . Ask for the peace of all who love us in the faith . Grace be with all of you . Amen .
57001001	PAULOS , the bondman of Jeshu Meshiha , and the brother Timotheos , to the beloved Philemon , our fellow-labourer ,
57001002	and to our beloved Aphia , and to Arkipos our fellowlabourer , and to the church which is in thy house .
57001003	Grace be with thee , and peace , from Aloha our Father , and from our Lord Jeshu Meshiha .
57001004	I give thanks to Aloha at all time , and remember thee in my prayers .
57001005	Behold , from ( the time ) when I heard of thy faith , and the love which thou hast to our Lord Jeshu Meshiha , and to all the saints ,
57001006	( I have prayed ) that there may be communication of thy faith ( in ) yielding fruits , in works and in the ( manifestation of the ) knowledge of all good which thou hast in Jeshu Meshiha .
57001007	For we have great joy and consolation , that by thy love the bowels of the saints are refreshed .
57001008	Wherefore I have great confidence in the Meshiha to command thee those acts which are righteous ,
57001009	but for love's sake entreating I entreat of thee , I , Paulos , who am the aged as thou knowest , but now also the bondman of Jeshu Meshiha .
57001010	And I entreat of thee for my son , whom I have begotten in my bonds , Onesimos ,
57001011	who once was of no use to thee , but ( who will ) now to thee , as also to me , be greatly useful ;
57001012	and I have sent him to thee . But thou , as ( one ) who is my offspring , so receive him .
57001013	For I would have retained him with me , that he might have served me for thy sake in the bonds of the gospel ;
57001014	but without thy counsel I was not willing to do any thing , that thy goodness might not be as by constraint , but of thy will .
57001015	But , perhaps , for this he passed away for an hour , that thou mayest hold him for ever ;
57001016	not henceforth as a servant , but as more than a servant , a beloved brother of mine , and how much more of thine , both in the flesh and in our Lord !
57001017	If then thou art with me a partaker , receive him as mine .
57001018	And if of any thing he hath deprived thee , or oweth , that reckon unto me .
57001019	I , Paulos , have written with my hands , I will repay thee ; for I will not tell thee that thou owest thyself to me .
57001020	Yes , my brother , I will be refreshed by thee in our Lord ; refresh my bowels in the Meshiha .
57001021	Because I am confident of thy hearing me , I have written to thee , and I know that more than I have asked thou wilt do .
57001022	But at once also prepare me a house of lodging , for I hope through your prayers I shall be given to you .
57001023	Epaphra , a captive with me in Jeshu Meshiha ,
57001024	and Markos , and Aristarkos , and Dema , and Luka , my helpers , ask for your peace .
57001025	The grace of our Lord Jeshu Meshiha be with your spirit , my brethren . Amen .
58001001	In manifold portions and in all manners , spake Aloha with our fathers by the prophets from the first : but in these last days he hath spoken with us by his Son ;
58001002	whom he constituted the heir of every thing , and by whom he made the worlds ;
58001003	who himself is the resplendence of his glory , and the image of his Being , and upholdeth all ( things ) by the power of his word ; and he , in his ( own ) person , hath made purification of sins , and hath sat down at the right hand of the Majesty on high .
58001004	And this ( person ) is altogether more excellent than the angels , by so much as the name he hath inherited ( is ) more excellent than theirs .
58001005	For unto which one from ( among ) the angels at any time said Aloha , Thou art MY SON ; I to-day have begotten thee ? And again , I will be to him the Father , and he shall be to me the Son ?
58001006	But again , when bringing in the First-begotten into the world , he said , Let all the angels of Aloha worship him .
58001007	But concerning the angels , thus hath he spoken : Who hath made his angels spirit , and his ministers a flaming fire .
58001008	But concerning the Son he hath said , Thy throne , Aloha , ( is ) for ever and ever , a right sceptre ( is ) the sceptre of thy kingdom .
58001009	Thou hast loved righteousness , and hast hated iniquity ; therefore Aloha thy God hath anointed thee with the oil of exultation more ( abundantly ) than thy fellows .
58001010	And again , Thou in the beginning hast laid the foundations of the earth , and the heavens are the work of thy hands .
58001011	They pass away , but thou art enduring ; and all they as vestments shall become old ,
58001012	and as a garment thou shalt fold them up , they shall be changed ; but thou ( shalt be ) as Thou Art , and thy years shall not fail
58001013	But to which from ( among ) the angels hath he said at any time , Sit at my right hand , until I put thine adversaries a footstool beneath thy feet ?
58001014	Are not all they spirits of ministration , who ( are ) sent forth in service on behalf of those who are hereafter to inherit salvation ?
58002001	Therefore we are obligated to be more exceedingly heedful in what we have heard , that we fall not .
58002002	For if the word which was uttered by angels was confirmed , and every one who heard it , and transgressed against it , received a just retribution ,
58002003	how shall we escape if we despise those ( words ) which themselves are our salvation ? Those which began by our Lord to be spoken , and by them who from him heard them in us were confirmed ,
58002004	when Aloha witnessed concerning them by signs , and by miracles , and by various powers , and by distributed gifts of the Spirit of Holiness , that were bestowed according to his will .
58002005	For it was not to the angels he subjected the world which is future , of which we discourse .
58002006	But , as the scripture testifieth and saith , What is man , that thou rememberedst him , and the Son of man , that thou didst visit him ?
58002007	Thou didst humble him ( to be ) less than the angels ; glory and honour hast thou placed upon his head , and hast empowered him over the work of thy hands ,
58002008	and every thing hast thou put in subjection under his feet . in this , that he subjected every thing to him , he hath left nothing which he hath not subjected . Yet hitherto we see not that every thing is subjected to him .
58002009	But him who was humbled to be less than the angels , we see to be JESHU himself , for the sake of the passion of his death ; and glory and honour set upon his head ; for He Aloha , in his grace , for every man hath tasted death !
58002010	For it was proper to him by whose hand are all , and on account of whom all are , ( and who ) would lead many sons to his glory , that the Prince of their salvation by sufferings should be perfected .
58002011	For he who sanctified , and they who are sanctified , are all from one : wherefore he has not been ashamed to call them his brethren .
58002012	( As ) when he saith , I will announce thy name unto my brethren , and in the midst of the church I will praise thee .
58002013	And again , I will put my confidence in him . And again , Behold me , and the sons whom thou hast given me , Aloha .
58002014	Forasmuch as the sons have been made to participate in flesh and blood , he also likewise was made a partaker of these very things ; that by his death he might abolish him who held the power of death , who is Satana ,
58002015	and set loose them who in the fear of death had been all their lives subjected to servitude .
58002016	For not from the angels he took , but from the seed of Abraham he took .
58002017	Therefore it was right that in every thing he should be rendered like unto his brethren , that he might be compassionate , and a High Priest faithful in to Aloha , and become an expiation for the sins of the people .
58002018	For in this , that he hath suffered and been tempted , he is able to help those who are tempted .
58003001	Wherefore , my holy brethren , who have been called with the calling that from heaven , contemplate this Apostle and High Priest of our confession , JESHU MESHIHA !
58003002	who was faithful to him who made him , as ( was ) Musha in all his house .
58003003	For greater is the glory of this ( One ) by far than ( the glory ) of Musha , even as the honour of him who built the house is far greater than his building .
58003004	For every house by some man is builded ; but He who built all is Aloha .
58003005	And Musha , as a servant , was faithful in all his house , for the testimony of those that were to be announced him ;
58003006	but the Meshiha as THE SON over his house : and his house are we , if , unto the end , we shall hold fast our confidence , and the triumph of his hope .
58003007	Therefore the Spirit of Holiness hath said , to-day if ye will hear his voice ,
58003008	harden not your hearts unto the angering of him , as ( did ) the embitterers , and as the day of temptation in the desert ,
58003009	when your fathers tempted me , and proved ( and ) saw my works forty years .
58003010	On which account I was wearied with that generation ; and said , It is a people that doth err ( in ) their heart , and that hath not known my ways .
58003011	So that I sware in my wrath , that they should not enter into my rest .
58003012	Beware , therefore , my brethren , lest there be in any man among you an evil heart which believeth not , and ye depart from Aloha the living .
58003013	But examine yourselves all the days , until the day which is called THAT DAY , lest any one of you be hardened by the deceptiveness of sin .
58003014	For we are made participators with the Meshiha , if , from the beginning and unto the end , in this very standing we steadfastly persist .
58003015	As that it is said , To-day , if ye will hear his voice , harden not your hearts to provoke him .
58003016	For who are they who heard and provoked him ? Not all they who came out of Metsreen by the hand of Musha .
58003017	And with whom was he wearied forty years , but with them who sinned , and whose bones fell in the desert ?
58003018	And of whom did he swear that they should not enter into his rest , but of them who would not be persuaded ?
58003019	And we see that they were not able to enter in , because they did not believe .
58004001	Let us fear , therefore , lest , while there is a confirmed promise of an entrance into his rest , any one shall be found among you remaining from entering in .
58004002	For we have been evangelized as well as they : but the word which they heard did not profit them , because not contempered with faith in them who heard it .
58004003	But we enter into the rest , we ( being of ) those ( who ) have believed . But as He hath said , So I sware in my wrath , that they should not enter into my rest : for , behold , the works of Aloha from the beginning of the world were .
58004004	As he said concerning the shabath , God rested on the seventh day from all his works .
58004005	Yet here again he saith , They shall not enter into my rest .
58004006	Therefore , because there was a place into which every one of them might have entered , and they who had it announced first did not enter in , forasmuch as they would not be persuaded ;
58004007	--- moreover , ( as ) another day he appointeth , after much time ; as above it is written , that David hath said , To-day if his voice ye will hear , harden not your hearts ;
58004008	--- but if Jeshu-bar-Nun had established them in rest , he not have spoken afterwards of another day :
58004009	--- Therefore , yet to enjoy a shabathism is confirmed to the people of Aloha .
58004010	For he who is entered into his rest hath also reposed himself from his works , as Aloha ( did ) from his .
58004011	Let us , therefore , anxiously endeavour to enter into that rest , that we fall not after the manner of those who were not persuaded .
58004012	For living is the Word of Aloha , and all-acting , and more penetrating than a two-edged sword , and entereth to the separation of the soul and the spirit , and of the joints , and of the marrow , and the bones , and discerneth the reasonings and counsel of the heart .
58004013	Neither is there any creature that is concealed from before him ; but every thing ( is ) naked and manifest before his eyes , to whom they shall give account .
58004014	Therefore having such a great High Priest , Jeshu Meshiha , the Son of Aloha , who hath ascended to heaven , let us persevere in the confession of him .
58004015	For we have not an high priest who cannot suffer along with our infirmity , but ( one ) who , tempted in every thing as we , ( was ) separate from sin .
58004016	Let us therefore approach with confidence to the throne of his grace , that we may receive mercy , and find grace for help in the time of affliction .
58005001	For every high priest who is from among men , on the behalf of men , standeth over those things which are of Aloha , to offer oblation and sacrifices for sins :
58005002	and ( is one ) who can humble himself , and suffer with those who know not and err , since he also himself with infirmity is clothed .
58005003	And on this account he is obligated as on the behalf of the people , so ( also ) for himself , to offer up for his sins .
58005004	Yet no man to himself taketh the honour , but he who is called by Aloha , as of Aharun .
58005005	Thus also the Meshiha glorified not himself to be a High Priest ; but He who said to him , Thou art my Son , I to-day have begotten thee .
58005006	So , too , in another place he saith , Thou art the Priest for ever , after the likeness of Malki-Zedek .
58005007	When also with flesh he had been clothed , prayer and supplication , with a powerful cry , and with tears , he offered up unto Him who was able from death to revive him , and was heard .
58005008	And though he was the Son , yet from the fear and the sufferings which he sustained he learned obedience .
58005009	And so was he perfected , and became unto all them who obey him the Cause of eternal salvation ;
58005010	and was named by God , The High Priest after the likeness of Malki-Zedek .
58005011	But concerning this Malki-Zedek himself , we have much discourse to utter , and hard to explain , because ye are infirm in your hearing .
58005012	For ye ought to be teachers , on account of the time by you in learning ; but now ye have need again to be taught those which are the first scriptures of the beginningwords of Aloha ; and need have ye for milk , and not for solid food .
58005013	But every one whose food is milk is not versed in the doctrine of righteousness , because he is a babe .
58005014	But for the perfect is solid food ; those , ( namely , ) who , because exercised , have trained their senses to distinguish the good and the evil .
58006001	Wherefore let us leave the beginning of the word of the Meshiha , and let us come unto perfection . Or why again another foundation lay you for repentance from dead works , and for faith which is in Aloha ,
58006002	and for the doctrine of ablution and of imposition of the hand , and for the resurrection from the place of the dead , and for the judgment which is eternal ?
58006003	If the Lord permit , we will do this .
58006004	But they who once unto baptism have descended , and have tasted the gift which is from heaven , and have received the Spirit of Holiness ,
58006005	and have tasted the good word of Aloha , and the power of the world to come ,
58006006	( and ) who again shall sin , cannot again be renewed unto conversion , who would afresh crucify and put to shame the Son of God .
58006007	For the earth that hath drunk the rain which hath come upon it many times , and shall have brought forth the herb that is useful for them on whose account it is cultured , receiveth blessing from Aloha ;
58006008	but that which shall produce thorns and briers hath reprobation ; nor is it far from the curse , but its end is burning .
58006009	But we are persuaded concerning you , my brethren , those things which are good , and that draw nigh unto salvation , though thus we speak .
58006010	For not unrighteous is Aloha , that he should forget your works and your charity which ye have manifested in his name , who have ministered unto the saints , and do minister .
58006011	But we desire that every one of you manifest the same diligence for the full completion of your hope until the end ;
58006012	and that it be not cut off from you , but that ye be imitators of them who by fidelity and patience have become heirs of the promise .
58006013	For when to Abraham Aloha gave promise , because there was no one greater than himself to swear by , he sware by his own Self ,
58006014	and said , Blessing I will bless thee , and multiplying I will multiply thee .
58006015	And so he waited patiently , and obtained the promise .
58006016	For men swear by one greater than themselves : and every controversy which occurs among them hath a sure conclusion in the oath .
58006017	On this account Aloha , willing abundantly to manifest to the heirs of the promise that his engagement is changeless , hath bound it in an oath :
58006018	that by two things that are not changed , in which it cannot be that Aloha should lie , great consolation should be ours who have fled unto him : and that we may retain the hope that is promised to us ,
58006019	which we have as an anchor that holdeth our soul , that it may not be moved , and entereth within the veil ,
58006020	where Jeshu hath first entered for us , and become the Priest for ever in the likeness of MALKI-ZEDEK .
58007001	For this Malki-Zedek is king of Sholim , the priest of Aloha the Most High . And he ( it was who ) met Abraham when he returned from the slaughter of the kings , and blessed him .
58007002	And to him Abraham separated the tenth from every thing which he had with him . Now his name , being expounded , ( is , ) the King of Righteousness ; and again , MalekSholem , which is , King of peace :
58007003	whose father and mother were not written in the genealogies ; neither the beginning of his days , nor the conclusion of his life ; but in the likeness ( of that ) of THE SON OF ALOHA standeth his priesthood for ever .
58007004	But see how great this ( person was , ) that Abraham , head of the fathers , gave to him the tenths and the choicest things .
58007005	For they of the sons of Levi who have received the priesthood , have a commandment of the law to receive tenths from the people , they from their brethren , they also from the loins of Abraham having sprung .
58007006	But he who is not written in their genealogies took tithes from ABRAHAM , and blessed him who had received the promise .
58007007	But , without controversy , he who is less is blessed by one who is Greater than himself .
58007008	And here the sons of men who die receive the tithes ; but there he concerning whom the scripture testifieth that he liveth .
58007009	And as one may say , by the hand of Abraham , even Levi , he who taketh tithes , himself also is tithed .
58007010	For he was yet in the loins of his father when he met Malki-Zedek .
58007011	If , therefore , Perfection were to be through the priesthood of the Levoyee , by which the law has been put upon the people , why was there another Priest required , who should arise in the resemblance of Malki-Zedek ? For he had said , In the likeness of Aharun he shall be .
58007012	But as a change hath been made in the priesthood , so is there also a change made in the law .
58007013	For he concerning whom these things are said was born from another tribe , from which no man hath ministered at the altar .
58007014	For it is manifest that from Jihuda arose our Lord , from the tribe of whom Musha hath said nothing concerning priesthood .
58007015	And again : it is more fully known by that which hath said , In the likeness of MalkiZedek ariseth another Priest ;
58007016	who was made not by the law of bodily commandments , but in the power of a life which is indissoluble .
58007017	For he testifieth concerning him , Thou art a Priest for evermore according to the likeness of Malki-Zedek .
58007018	But the change which was made in the first institution was on account of its powerlessness , and because profit was not in it .
58007019	For the law perfected nothing : but instead of it a hope has entered which is more excellent , ( and ) by which we are brought nigh unto Aloha .
58007020	And he hath confirmed it unto us in an oath .
58007021	For they were made priests without an oath ; but this with an oath : as he said unto him by the hand of David , The Lord hath sworn and will not lie , that thou art the Priest for ever in the likeness of Malki-Zedek .
58007022	In all this more excellent is the covenant of ( which ) Jeshu is the sponsor .
58007023	There were ( moreover ) many priests , because they were dying , and were not permitted to remain .
58007024	But because this ( one ) standeth for ever , his priesthood passeth not away .
58007025	And he is able to save for eternity them who approach by him unto Aloha ; for he liveth through all time , and offereth up prayers on their behalf .
58007026	For such an High Priest as this was adequate for us ; pure , and without evil , and without spot ; who was separate from sins , and exalted higher than heaven .
58007027	With him there was no necessity daily , like the chief of the priests , that first for his own sins he should offer sacrifices , and then on behalf of the people : for this he did once when in himself he offered .
58007028	For the law constituted infirm men priests ; but the word of the oath , which was subsequent to the law , ( hath constituted ) THE SON perfect for evermore .
58008001	But the sum of them all ( is ) --- We have a High Priest who hath sat down at the right hand of the throne of the Majesty in heaven ;
58008002	and who hath become a Minister of the holy place , and of the true tabernacle , which Aloha hath framed , and not man .
58008003	And every high priest is appointed to offer oblations and victims : hence it was right that this one should also have that which he might offer .
58008004	But were he upon the earth , he would not be a priest , because there were priests who offered oblations as by the law ;
58008005	they , ( namely , ) who minister at an emblem and shadow of those ( things ) that are in heaven . As it was said unto Musha when he made the tabernacle , See and make every thing according to the pattern which was showed to thee in the mountain .
58008006	But now a ministry which is better than that hath Jeshu Meshiha received , by so much as that covenant of which he is made the Mediator is better , and was given with better promises , than that .
58008007	For if the first covenant had been faultless , no place had there been for this second .
58008008	For reprehending them he saith , Behold , the days are coming , saith the Lord , and I will complete with the family of the house of Israel , and with the family of the house of Jihuda ,
58008009	THE NEW COVENANT : not as was that covenant which I gave to their fathers in the day that I took them by their hand , and led them from the land of Metsreen ; because they did not persevere in my covenant , therefore I have neglected them , saith the Lord .
58008010	But this is the covenant that I will give to the family of the house of Israel after these days , saith the Lord : I will in-give my law in their minds , and upon their hearts will I inscribe it ; and I will be to them , even I , Aloha , and they shall be unto me the people :
58008011	and no man shall ( have need to ) teach the son of his city , nor his brother , and say , Know the Lord ; because all shall know me , from the least of them to the eldest of them .
58008012	And I will purify them from their unrighteousness , and their sins again will I not remember unto them .
58008013	In that he said , THE NEW , he hath made the former old : and that which is antiquated , and hath grown old , is nigh unto decay .
58009001	But in the first there were ordinances of ministry , and a worldly sanctuary .
58009002	For in the first tabernacle that was made there were the candelabrum , and the table , and the presencebread ; and this was called the Holy place .
58009003	But the interior tabernacle , that was within the second veil , was called the Holy of Holies :
58009004	in it were the incense-vessel of gold , and the ark of the covenant , which was altogether covered with gold ; and within it were the golden urn , in which was the manna , and the rod of Aharun that budded , and the tablets of the covenant :
58009005	and above this the cherubim of glory overshadowing the mercy-seat . But time there is not to speak upon every one of these which were thus ordained .
58009006	Now , into the outer sanctuary at all times entered the priests , and fulfilled their offices ;
58009007	but into the tabernacle which was within , one day in the year , alone , entered the high priest , with that blood which he offered for himself and the sins of the people .
58009008	By this the Spirit of Holiness made known that the way of the holies was not yet manifested , so long as was the standing of the first tabernacle .
58009009	And this was a figurative representation for the time in which oblations and victims have been offered ; - those which have not been able to perfect the consciousness of him who offered them ;
58009010	but ( have consisted ) in meat and drink only , and in various kinds of baptism , being institutions of the flesh appointed until the time of setting right .
58009011	But the Meshiha who hath come was a High Priest of good things which he wrought out , and hath entered into the great and perfect tabernacle ( which was ) not made with hands , nor made from these creatures .
58009012	Nor entered he with the blood of goats and calves , but with the blood of himself he entered once the holy place , and hath found eternal redemption .
58009013	For if the blood of goats and of calves , and the dust of an heifer , sprinkled upon those who were unclean , sanctifieth them for the purification of their flesh ,
58009014	how much more then shall the blood of the Meshiha , who , by the Eternal Spirit , himself hath offered without spot unto Aloha , purify our conscience from dead works , to serve the Aloha the Living ?
58009015	For this was he made the Mediator of the new covenant , that by his death he might become the ransom for those who had transgressed against the first covenant , ( and ) that they might receive the promise , they , who are called unto the inheritance which is eternal .
58009016	For where a covenant is , there is indicated the DEATH of that which made it .
58009017	For upon death only is it confirmed ; because while he who made it lived there is no value in it .
58009018	Wherefore neither the first without blood was confirmed .
58009019	For when every precept had been enjoined by Musha to the whole people according to the law , Musha took the blood of the heifer , and water , with the scarlet wool , and hyssop , and sprinkled upon the books and upon all the people ,
58009020	and said to them , This is the blood of that covenant which is commanded by Aloha .
58009021	Also upon the tabernacle and upon all the vessels of the service from it with blood he sprinkled .
58009022	Because every thing with blood was purified under the law ; and without shedding of blood there is no remission .
58009023	For it was necessary that these which are a type of the heavenlies , with ( these ) things should be purified ; but the heavenlies themselves with sacrifices that are more excellent than they .
58009024	For not into the sanctuary made with hands hath the Meshiha entered , which is an emblem of the true one , but into heaven itself hath he entered , that he might appear before the face of Aloha for us .
58009025	Nor that he should offer himself many times , as did the chief of the priests , entering every year into the holy place with blood not his own ;
58009026	otherwise he would have been obligated many times to suffer from the beginning of the world . But now , in the end of the world , once hath he offered himself , that by his sacrifice he might abolish sin .
58009027	And as it is ordained to the sons of men , that they must once die , and after their death the judgment ;
58009028	so also the Meshiha was once offered , and in his ( own ) person sacrificed ( for ) the sins of many ; but the second time without sins he appeareth for the salvation of them who expect him .
58010001	For there was in the law the shadow of good things to come , not the subsistence of the very things , therefore ( though ) every year the same sacrifices were offered they could never perfect those who offered them .
58010002	For if they had perfected , they would have ceased afterward from the presentation of them ; because the conscience of those who had been once purified by them would not henceforth have been troubled by ( such ) sins .
58010003	But in those sacrifices their sins are brought to remembrance every year .
58010004	For it is impossible for the blood of bulls and of goats to purify ( from ) sins .
58010005	Wherefore when he cometh into the world he saith , Sacrifices and oblations thou hast not willed , but with a body hast thou clothed me :
58010006	and entire burnt-offerings for sins thou hast not required .
58010007	Then said I , Behold , I come ; in the sum of the books it is written concerning me , that I shall do thy will , Aloha .
58010008	Above he said , Victims , and oblations , and entire burnt-offerings for sin thou hast not willed ; those which are offered in the law .
58010009	And afterwards he said , Behold , I come , that I may do thy will , Aloha . In this he hath done away with the first , that he may establish the second .
58010010	For by this his will we are sanctified by the offering of the body of Jeshu Meshiha , which was once .
58010011	For every high priest who stood and ministered every day , offered the same sacrifices , which can never purify ( from ) sins .
58010012	But this one sacrifice hath offered for sins , and hath sat down at the right hand of Aloha for ever :
58010013	waiting from henceforth until his adversaries are set as a footstool beneath his feet .
58010014	For by one offering he hath perfected those who are sanctified through him for ever .
58010015	Now the witness unto us is the Spirit of Holiness , when he saith ,
58010016	This is the covenant that I will give to them from after those days , saith the Lord : I will give my law in their minds , and upon their hearts will I inscribe it ;
58010017	and their iniquity and their sins I will not remember against them .
58010018	BUT WHERE THERE IS REMISSION OF SINS , THERE IS NOT REQUIRED AN OFFERING FOR SINS .
58010019	We have , therefore , my brethren , confidence to enter the holy place through the blood of Jeshu ;
58010020	and a way of life which he hath now made new to us through the veil , which is his flesh ;
58010021	and we have the High Priest over the house of God .
58010022	Let us , therefore , draw near with a confirmed heart , and the full security of faith , with our hearts sprinkled and cleansed from an evil conscience , and our body washed with pure waters ;
58010023	and let us persevere in the confession of our hope , and not swerve ; for faithful is He who hath promised us .
58010024	And let us consider one another with incitement to charity and good works .
58010025	And let us not forsake our congregation , as is the custom with some ; but pray one with another ; ( and ) so much the more as ye see that day to be approaching .
58010026	For if with his will any man shall sin after he hath received the knowledge of the truth , there is not still a victim to be offered for sins ;
58010027	but a fearful judgment to come , and burning fire which devoureth the adversaries .
58010028	For if he who transgressed the law of Musha , upon the mouth of two or three witnesses , without mercy died ;
58010029	how much greater punishment , think ye , shall he receive who hath trampled upon the Son of Aloha , and hath counted the blood of the covenant of him by which he had been sanctified as that of every man and hath insulted the Spirit of grace ?
58010030	We know him who hath said , Retribution is mine , and I will repay : and again , The Lord shall judge his people .
58010031	How terrible to fall into the hands of Aloha the Living !
58010032	Be mindful , therefore , of the first days , those in which ye received baptism ; and when ye sustained a great agony of sufferings ,
58010033	with ignominy and affliction ; and when ye were made gazing-stocks , and were associated with men who also endured these ( things ) .
58010034	And it afflicted you on account of them who were bound ; and the pillage of your goods with joy ye sustained , as knowing that ye have a possession in heaven , which is better , and passeth not away .
58010035	Destroy not , therefore , the confidence which you have , for which there is a great reward .
58010036	But patience is needed by you , that ye may do the will of Aloha , and receive the promise .
58010037	Because ( yet ) a little time , and a very little , and He who cometh shall come , and not be slow .
58010038	But the just by the faith of me shall live ; but if he become weary , my soul delighteth not in him .
58010039	But we are not of the weariness which bringeth to perdition , but of the faith which maketh us to possess our soul .
58011001	Now FAITH is the persuasion concerning things which are in hope , as if they were in reality , and a revelation of those which are not seen .
58011002	And for this was the testimony concerning the elders .
58011003	For by faith we perceive that the worlds were ordained by the word of Aloha , and ( how ) these ( things ) which are seen were from those which are not seen .
58011004	By faith Habel offered a sacrifice which was far better than that of Koen unto Aloha ; and because of it there is respecting him a testimony that he was righteous ; and Aloha gave witness concerning his oblation ; and on account thereof also while dead he is speaking .
58011005	Through faith Hanak was translated , and did not taste death ; nor was he found , because Aloha had translated him : for before that he would translate him , there was respecting him the testimony that he pleased Aloha .
58011006	But without faith it is not possible for man to please Aloha ; for he who draweth near unto Aloha must believe that he is , and that of those who seek him he will be the rewarder .
58011007	By faith Nuch , when spoken with upon those things which had not been seen , feared , and made him the ark for the salvation of his family ; by which he condemned the world , and was an heir of the righteousness which is by faith .
58011008	By faith Abraham , when he was called , heard that he was to go forth to a place which he should receive for an inheritance ; and he went out , while he knew not whither he was going .
58011009	By faith he was a sojourner in the land that was promised to him , as in an alien state , and dwelt in tabernacles with Ishok and Jakub , sons of the inheritance which was his by the promise :
58011010	for he was expecting the city which hath foundations , whose builder and maker is Aloha .
58011011	By faith Saro , who was barren , received strength to conceive seed , and , which ( thing ) was not in the time of her years , gave birth ( to a son ) ; because she was sure that he who had promised to her was faithful .
58011012	Therefore from one who had failed from old age , were there begotten multitudes as the stars of heaven , and as the sand upon the shores of the sea , which have no number .
58011013	In faith died these all , not having gotten their promise , but from afar had beheld it , and exulted in it , and confessed that strangers they were , and sojourners in the earth .
58011014	For they who these things say , make manifest that their city they are seeking .
58011015	But if that city from which they had gone out they desired , they had opportunity to return and go to it .
58011016	But now it is known that a better ( one ) than that they desired ; that ( namely ) which is in heaven . Wherefore Aloha was not ashamed their God to be called ; for he hath prepared for them a city .
58011017	By faith Abraham offered Ishok in his temptation and his only-born he lifted upon the altar , even him whom he had received by the promise :
58011018	for it had been said to him , In Ishok shall be called to thee the seed .
58011019	For he thought within himself , that Aloha could even from the dead upraise : and on account of this in a similitude he was given to him .
58011020	By faith in that which was to come , Ishok blessed Jakub and Isu .
58011021	By faith , when dying , Jakub blessed each of the sons of Jauseph ; and worshipped upon the head of his staff .
58011022	By faith Jauseph , when dying , was mindful of the going forth of the sons of Israel , and commanded concerning his bones .
58011023	By faith the parents of Musha concealed him when he had been born three months , because they saw that he was a beautiful child ; and they feared not the edict of the king .
58011024	By faith Musha , when he became a man , refused to be called the son of the daughter of Pherun ;
58011025	and chose to himself to be in affliction with the people of Aloha , and not for a little time to delight ( himself ) in sin ;
58011026	and considered the riches of the reproach of Meshiha to be far greater than the treasures of Metsreen : for he contemplated the recompence of the reward .
58011027	By faith he forsook Metsreen , and feared not the wrath of the king ; and hoped , as one who beheld Aloha who is the invisible .
58011028	By faith they performed the passover , and the sprinkling of the blood , that he might not come near , - he , who was destroying the first-born .
58011029	By faith they traversed the sea of Sooph , as those who ( march ) upon dry land ; but the Metsroyee were swallowed up in it , when they had dared to enter it .
58011030	By faith the ramparts of Jirichu fell down , after they had been encompassed seven days .
58011031	By faith Rachob the harlot perished not with those who would not hearken , because she had received the explorers in peace .
58011032	What shall I yet say ? For ( too ) brief is the time for me to tell of Gedhun , and of Borok , and of Shemshun , and of Nephtoch , and of David , and of Shomuel , and of the rest of the prophets ;
58011033	they who through faith conquered kingdoms , and wrought righteousness , and received promises , and shut the mouths of lions ,
58011034	and quenched the powers of fire , and were delivered from the edge of the sword , and were made strong from infirmities , and became valiant in battle , and overthrew the camps of the adversaries .
58011035	And they gave unto women their sons by the resurrection of the dead ; and others in torments died , nor hoped to be delivered , that the better resurrection they might have .
58011036	But others went through mockings and scourgings ; others unto chains and imprisonments were given up ,
58011037	others were stoned , others divided , others died by the edge of the sword , others wandered about clothed with skins of sheep and of goats , necessitous , afflicted , and driven out .
58011038	Men , of whom the world was not worthy , became as wanderers in the desert , and in mountains , and in dens , and in caverns of the earth .
58011039	And these all , of whom there hath been ( such ) a testimony concerning their faith , received not the promise ;
58011040	because Aloha had afore contemplated for our help , that without us they should not be made perfect .
58012001	Wherefore we also , having all these witnesses , who as clouds encompass us , will set ourselves loose from every weight , and the sin which at all time is prepared for us , and with perseverance will we run this race which is appointed to us .
58012002	And let us look unto Jeshu , who hath become the chief and the perfecter of our faith ; who , for the joy that was before him , endured the cross , and unto shame delivered himself , and at the right hand of the throne of Aloha hath sat down .
58012003	Consider , therefore , how much he endured from sinners who were adversaries to themselves , that ye weary not , nor fail in your souls .
58012004	Not yet have ye come unto blood in the conflict which is against sin .
58012005	And ye have forgotten the instruction of him who , as unto children , hath said to you , My son , contemn not the discipline of the Lord , and let not thy soul fail when by him thou art corrected :
58012006	for whom the Lord loveth he chastiseth , and scourgeth those children in whom he taketh pleasure .
58012007	Endure , therefore , correction , because Aloha acteth towards you as with children : for who is a son whom his father doth not correct ?
58012008	And if ye be without the correction with which every one is corrected , ye are aliens , and not children .
58012009	And if ( when ) the fathers of the flesh have chastised us we have revered them , how much more are we bound to be subject to our spiritual fathers , that we may live ?
58012010	For they , during a little time , as they willed , chastised us ; but Aloha for our advantage , that we might partake of his holiness .
58012011	For all chastisement , in its time , is not considered as joy , but as grief ; but , in the end , the fruit of peace and righteousness it giveth unto them who with it have been exercised .
58012012	Wherefore your relaxed hands and your trembling knees make strong ;
58012013	and right ways make for your feet , that the member which is lame may not wander , but be healed .
58012014	Follow after peace with every man , and after holiness , without which man our Lord seeth not .
58012015	And be aware lest any one be found among you failing of the grace of Aloha ; or lest any root of bitternesses should put forth the flower and injure you , and many be contaminated :
58012016	or lest there be found among you any fornicator , or dissolute , as Isu , who for one meal sold his birthright .
58012017	For ye know , also , that afterward he desired to inherit the blessing , but was rejected ; for place for repentance he found not , though with tears he sought it .
58012018	For ye have not drawn nigh to the burning fire , and to that which may be touched , neither to darknesses , to mist , and to tempest ,
58012019	nor to the voice of the trumpet , and the voice of words , which they who heard withdrew ( from ) , that it might not be additionally spoken to them .
58012020	For they could not endure that which was commanded . For if an animal should approach to the mountain , it was to be stoned :
58012021	and so terrible was the sight , that Musha said , I fear and tremble
58012022	But ye have come nigh unto the Mount of Ziun , and to the city of Aloha the Living , to the Urishlem which is in heaven , and to the congregation of myriads of angels ,
58012023	and to the church of the firstborn ( ones ) who are written in heaven , and to Aloha the Judge of all , and to the spirits of the just who are perfected ,
58012024	and to Jeshu the Mediator of the new covenant , and to the sprinkling of his blood , which speaketh better than that of Habel .
58012025	Beware , therefore , lest ye be averse from Him who hath spoken with you ; for if they escaped not who were averse from one who spake with them on earth , how much less we , if we withdraw from one who hath spoken to us from heaven ?
58012026	Him whose voice moved the earth ? But now hath he promised and said , Yet once I will move not only earth , but also heaven .
58012027	But that which he hath said , ONCE , showeth the ( final ) changing of these which are moved , because they are made , that those may remain which are immutable .
58012028	Therefore because we have received the kingdom which is immoveable , let us hold the grace by which we may serve and please Aloha with reverence and with fear :
58012029	for our God is a devouring fire .
58013001	Let the love of the brethren continue in you ;
58013002	and kindness to strangers forget not ; for in this some who were made worthy , while not perceiving it , have received angels .
58013003	Remember those who are bound , as if with them ye were bound : be mindful of those who are afflicted , as men ( should ) who are clothed with flesh .
58013004	Honourable is marriage among all , and their bed is undefiled ; but whoremongers and adulterers Aloha judgeth .
58013005	Let not your mind love money ; but let whatever ye have suffice you : for the Lord hath said , I will not abandon thee , nor withhold from thee support .
58013006	And it is ours to say confidently , My Lord is my helper , I will not fear : what a man do to me ?
58013007	Remember your leaders ; those who have spoken to you the word of Aloha : reflect on the consummation of their course , and imitate their faith .
58013008	Jeshu Meshiha is yesterday , and to-day , and for ever .
58013009	Unto strange and variable doctrines be not led away ; for it is good that with grace we confirm our hearts , and not by meats , because they have not been helped who have walked in them .
58013010	But we have an altar of which it is not lawful for them to eat who minister in the tabernacle .
58013011	For those animals , whose blood the high priest took into the sanctuary for sins , had their flesh burned without the camp .
58013012	On this account Jeshu , that he might sanctify his people by his blood , without the city suffered .
58013013	Therefore let us also go forth unto him without the camp , being , clothed with his ignominy .
58013014	For we have no city which is permanent here ; but one that is to come we are expecting .
58013015	By him , therefore , let us offer up at all time unto Aloha the sacrifices of praise , which are the fruits of the lips which give thanks to his name .
58013016	And forget not compassion and communication to the poor : for with these sacrifices a man pleaseth Aloha .
58013017	Be persuaded by your leaders , and obey them ; for they watch for your souls as men who must render an account of you , that with joy they may do this , and not with groans ; for that is not profitable for you .
58013018	Pray for us ; for we are confident we have a good conscience , that in all things we desire to act aright .
58013019	And more especially I ask from you to do this , that I may be turned to you quickly .
58013020	But the God of peace , who brought up from the house of the dead the great Shepherd of the flock , by the blood of the eternal covenant , who is Jeshu Meshiha , our Lord ,
58013021	make you perfect in every good work , that ye may do his will , and effect in you whatever is good before him , by Jeshu Meshiha : to him be glory unto the age of ages . Amen .
58013022	Now I request from you , my brethren , that ye prolong your minds on the word of exhortation ; for in a few ( words ) I have written to you .
58013023	But know that our brother Timotheos is released ; and if he come soon , with him I will see you .
58013024	Ask for the peace of all your leaders , and of all the saints : they of Italia ask for your peace .
58013025	Grace be with you all . Amen .
59001001	JAKUB , a servant of Aloha and of our Lord Jeshu Meshiha , unto the twelve tribes who are dispersed among the nations : Peace .
59001002	All joy shall be to you , my brethren , when you shall have entered into temptations many and various .
59001003	For you know that the proving of faith maketh you to possess patience ;
59001004	but to patience let there be a perfect work , that you may be complete and perfected , and in nothing be deficient .
59001005	If any of you be deficient in wisdom , let him ask of Aloha , who giveth to all expansively , and upbraideth not , and it is given to him .
59001006	But let him ask in faith , not wavering . For he who wavereth is like the waves of the sea which the wind disturbeth .
59001007	And let not that man expect to receive any thing from the Lord ,
59001008	who is divided in his mind , and disturbed in all his ways .
59001009	But let the humble brother glory in his exaltation ,
59001010	and the rich in his humility ; for as the flower of an herb , so he passeth .
59001011	For the sun ariseth in his heat , and drieth the herb , and the flower of it falleth , and the beauty of its appearance perisheth ; so also the rich withereth in his reverses .
59001012	Blessed the man who endureth temptations : for when he hath been proved he shall receive the crown of life , which Aloha hath promised unto them who love him .
59001013	Let no man say , when he is tempted , From Aloha I am tempted ; for Aloha is not tempted with evils , and he no man tempteth .
59001014	But each man from his concupiscence tempteth himself , and desireth , and is drawn away .
59001015	And this desire conceiveth and beareth sin ; and sin , when it is perfected , beareth death .
59001016	Do not err , my beloved brethren ;
59001017	every good gift and perfect from above descendeth , from the Father of lights , with whom is no alteration , nor the shadow of vicissitude .
59001018	He willed , and begat us by the word of truth , that we might be the first-ones of his creatures .
59001019	And you , my beloved brethren , let every one of you be swift to hear , and slow to speak , and slow to be angry ;
59001020	for the wrath of man the righteousness of Aloha worketh not .
59001021	Wherefore , remove from you all impurity and the abounding of wickedness , and with meekness receive the word which is engrafted in our nature , which is able to save your souls .
59001022	BUT be doers of the word , and not hearers only , neither deceive yourselves .
59001023	For if a man be a hearer of the word and not a doer of it , this ( man ) is like one who vieweth his face in a mirror ;
59001024	for he seeth himself and passeth , and hath forgotten what ( manner of person ) he was .
59001025	But every one who looketh into the perfect law of liberty , and continueth therein , he is not a hearer of the hearing of forgetfulness , but a doer of works ; and this shall be blessed in his work .
59001026	And if a man thinketh that he serveth Aloha , and holdeth not his tongue , but deceiveth his own heart , of this man his service is vain .
59001027	For the service which is pure and true before Aloha the Father , is this , to visit the orphans and widows in their afflictions , and that a man keep himself from the world without blemish .
59002001	My brethren , do not hold with acceptance of faces the faith of the glory of our Lord Jeshu Meshiha .
59002002	For if there come into your congregation a man who hath rings of gold or beautiful vestments , and there come in a poor man in sordid vestments ,
59002003	and you look upon him who clothed in beautiful vestments , and say to him , Sit is here well ; and you say to the poor man , Stand thou there , or , Sit thou here before the stool of our feet ;
59002004	behold , are you not divided in yourselves , and become separaters for evil reasons ?
59002005	Listen , my beloved brethren : Hath not Aloha chosen the poor of the world , but rich in faith , to be heirs in that kingdom which Aloha hath promised to them who love him ?
59002006	But you have despised the poor . Behold , are not the rich uprisen against you ? and do they not drag you to the house of judgment ?
59002007	Do they not blaspheme against that Good Name which is pronounced upon you ?
59002008	And if the law of Aloha in this you accomplish , as it is written , Thou shalt love thy neighbour as thyself , you do well ;
59002009	but if you accept persons , you commit sin , and are convicted by the law as transgressors against the law .
59002010	For he who keepeth the whole law , and in one offendeth , of the whole LAW he is guilty .
59002011	For he who hath said , Thou shalt not commit adultery , is he who hath said , Thou shalt not steal ; but if thou do not commit adultery , yet steal , thou hast become a transgressor against the LAW .
59002012	So speak and so act , as those who by the law of liberty are to be judged .
59002013	For judgment is to be without mercy , upon him who hath not done mercy . Be you exalted by mercy over judgment .
59002014	WHAT is the use , my brethren , if a man say , I have faith , and works he hath not ? How can his faith save him ?
59002015	And , if a brother or sister be naked , and wanting the food of to-day ,
59002016	and any one of you shall say to them , Go in peace , be warm , and be satisfied , and give them not what is necessary for the body , what ( would be ) the use ?
59002017	Thus also the faith that hath not works is dead , ( being ) alone .
59002018	For a man saith , Thou hast faith , and I have works ; show me thy faith without thy works , and I will show thee my faith from my works .
59002019	Thou believest that Aloha is one : thou doest well ; the demons also believe and tremble .
59002020	Art thou willing to know , O weak man , that faith without works is dead ?
59002021	Our father Abraham , was he not by works justified , when he offered Ishok his son on the altar ?
59002022	Thou seest that his faith was helpful unto his works ; and by works his faith was perfected ,
59002023	and the scripture was accomplished which said , that Abraham believed in Aloha , and it was reckoned unto him for righteousness , and the friend of Aloha he was called .
59002024	Thou seest that by works man is justified , and not by faith alone .
59002025	So also Rachab the harlot , was she not by works justified when she received the spies , and by another way sent them forth ?
59002026	Thus , as the body without the spirit is dead , so also the faith which is without works is dead .
59003001	LET there not be many teachers among you , my brethren , but know that a greater condemnation we incur .
59003002	For ( in ) many we all offend . Every one who in word offendeth not , this is a perfect man , who is able to make subject also all his body .
59003003	For , behold , bridles into the mouth of horses we throw that we may make them submissive to us , and their whole body we turn .
59003004	Also the mighty ships , while the furious winds drive them , by a little wood are turned about to the region which the will of him who guideth doth contemplate .
59003005	So also the tongue is a small member , and uplifteth itself . A little fire also burneth many forests ;
59003006	and the tongue is a fire , a world of sin , like a forest is the tongue itself among our members ; it defileth all of our body , and burneth the course of our generations which run ( forward ) as a wheel , and kindleth also itself with fire .
59003007	For every nature of animals , and of birds , and reptiles of the sea , and of the dry land , have been subjected to the human nature ;
59003008	but the tongue no one can subdue ; this is an evil not ordered , ( and ) full of the poison of death .
59003009	For by it we bless the Lord and the Father , and by it we curse men who in the likeness of Aloha were made ;
59003010	and from the same mouth go forth curses and blessings . My brethren , it is not fit that these should so be done .
59003011	Can it be that one fountain shall send forth waters sweet and bitter ?
59003012	Or can the fig-tree , my brethren , make olives , or the vines figs ? thus also salt waters cannot be made sweet .
59003013	Who of you is wise and instructed ? let him show his works in good conversations in meek wisdom .
59003014	But if you have bitter envy among yourselves , or contention be in your hearts , be not inflated against the truth , nor lie ;
59003015	because this wisdom from above descendeth not ; but is earthly , from the reasonings of the soul , and from demons .
59003016	For where there are envy and contention , there also are tumult and every thing that is evil .
59003017	But the wisdom that is from above is pure , and full of peace , and meekness , and obedience , and full of mercies and good fruits , and is without division , and faces accepteth not .
59003018	But the fruits of righteousness in quietness are sown by them who make peace .
59004001	From whence are there among you wars and strifes ? Is it not from the lusts which war in your members ?
59004002	You desire , and have not ; you kill and are emulous , yet it cometh not into your hands ; you strive and make wars , and nothing have because you do not ask ;
59004003	you ask and receive not , because you ask wickedly , as that you may cherish your lusts .
59004004	Adulterers , know you not that the friendship of this world is enmity with Aloha ? He , therefore , who willeth to be the friend of this world , hath become the enemy of Aloha .
59004005	Or do you vainly think that the scripture saith , that In emulation desireth the Spirit who dwelleth in us ?
59004006	But more excellent grace hath our Lord given unto us . Wherefore he saith , Aloha humbleth the proud , and to the humble he giveth grace .
59004007	BE subject , therefore , unto Aloha ; withstand Satana , and he will flee from you ;
59004008	and draw nigh unto Aloha , and he will be nigh you . Purify your hands , sinners , and sanctify your hearts , divided of soul .
59004009	Be humbled and sorrowful , and let your laughter be turned into grief , and your gladness into anxiety .
59004010	Be humbled before the Lord , and he will exalt you .
59004011	Speak not against one another , my brethren ; for he who speaketh against his brother , or judgeth his brother , speaketh against the law , and judgeth the law . And if the law thou judgest , thou art not a doer of the law , but the judge of it .
59004012	For one is the appointer of the law and the Judge , who can save and destroy . But thou , who art thou , who judgest thy neighbour ?
59004013	But what shall we say of them who say , To-day or tomorrow we will go to this city , or that , and work there one year , and negotiate , and make gain ?
59004014	and they know not what shall be on the morrow : for what is our life , but a vapour which for a little while is seen , and vanisheth and endeth ?
59004015	For instead they should say , If the Lord will , and we live , we will do this or that .
59004016	They glory in their pride . All glorying such as this is from the Evil .
59004017	And he who knoweth the good and doeth it not , sin is to him .
59005001	O rich men , howl and weep for the miseries which are coming upon you .
59005002	Your riches are corrupt and stink , and your vestments are eaten of the moth ,
59005003	and your gold and your silver rusteth , and the rust of them is for a witness against you , and is to eat your flesh . You have gathered fire for you for the last days !
59005004	Lo , the hire of the labourers who have reaped your lands , which you have refused , clamoureth , and the cry of the harvests to the ears of the Lord of Sabaoth hath ascended .
59005005	For you have lived daintily on the earth , and have been wanton , and have nourished your bodies , as for the day of slaughter .
59005006	You have condemned and have killed the just , and he hath not resisted you .
59005007	BUT you , my brethren , prolong your spirit until the coming of the Lord ; as the husbandman who expecteth the precious fruits of his lands , and prolongeth his spirit for them , until he receive the rain the early and the latter ;
59005008	so also you , prolong your spirit , and your hearts confirm ; for the coming of our Lord draweth nigh .
59005009	Groan not one against another , my brethren , that you be not judged ; for , behold , the Judge standeth before the door .
59005010	The example of the prophets take to you , my brethren , to prolong your spirits in your afflictions , them who have spoken in the name of the Lord .
59005011	For , behold , we give blessedness to them who have endured . You have heard of the patience of Iob , and the end which the Lord wrought for him you have seen ; because that merciful is the Lord and compassionate .
59005012	But before every thing , my brethren , swear not ; by heaven nor by earth , nor with any other oath ; but let your word be Yes , yes , and No , no , that you be not bound under condemnation .
59005013	And if any of you be in affliction , let him pray ; and if he rejoice , let him sing ;
59005014	and if he be sick , let him call for the presbyters of the church , and they will pray over him and anoint him with oil in the name of our Lord .
59005015	And the prayer of faith shall make whole him who was sick , and our Lord shall raise him up ; and if he have committed sins , they shall be forgiven him .
59005016	But confess your faults one to another , and pray one for another , that you may be healed . For great is the power of that prayer which the righteous prayeth .
59005017	Elia also was a man of suffering , as we ; and he prayed that the rain should not fall upon the earth , and it fell not ( for ) three years and six months .
59005018	And again he prayed , and the heaven gave rain , and the earth gave her fruits .
59005019	my brethren , if any of you shall err from the way of truth , and one shall convert him from his error ,
59005020	let him know , that he who turneth a sinner from the error of his way , saveth his soul from death , and hideth the multitude of his sins .
60001001	PETROS , an apostle of Jeshu Meshiha , to the chosen-ones and sojourners who are scattered in Pontos and in Galatia , and in Kapadukia , and in Asia , and in Bithunia :
60001002	them who are elected by the foreknowledge of Aloha the Father , through sanctification of the Spirit , that they might be unto obedience , and unto the sprinkling of the blood of Jeshu Meshiha : grace and peace be multiplied with you .
60001003	Blessed be Aloha , the Father of our Lord Jeshu Meshiha , who by his abundant grace hath begotten us anew through the resurrection of our Lord Jeshu Meshiha unto the hope of salvation ,
60001004	and to the inheritance which is not corruptible , and not defiled , and not to be consumed , which is prepared for you in heaven ,
60001005	while you are kept by the power of Aloha and through faith , unto the salvation which is prepared to be revealed in the last times ;
60001006	wherein you will rejoice for ever , though in this little time you are afflicted by manifold temptations which pass over you ;
60001007	that the proof of your faith may be seen , which is more precious than gold refined which is proved in fire , unto praise and unto honour and unto glory , at the revelation of Jeshu Meshiha ;
60001008	whom you have not seen and ( yet ) love , and in whose faith you exult with glorious joy that is not spoken :
60001009	that you may receive the recompence of your faith , the salvation of your souls .
60001010	That salvation which the prophets investigated when they prophesied concerning the grace which was to be given unto you ,
60001011	and searched into , what time the Spirit of the Meshiha who dwelt in them showed and testified of the future sufferings of the Meshiha , and his glory which ( should be ) after them .
60001012	And all that they searched was revealed to them ; for not for themselves they inquired , but to us ( and ) of us they prophesied those ( blessings ) which now are revealed to you by them who have preached to you by the Spirit of Holiness which is sent from heaven ; for into these themselves the angels also desire to look .
60001013	Wherefore gird up the loins of your minds , and be fully wakeful , and hope for the joy that cometh to you at the revelation of our Lord Jeshu Meshiha ;
60001014	as obedient children , and not partaking again of the former desires which you desired when ignorant .
60001015	But be holy in all your conversations , as he is holy who calleth you ;
60001016	because it is written , Be ye holy , as I also am holy .
60001017	And if you call him Father before whom there is no respect of persons , and who judgeth every man according to his works , with fear conduct you in this time of your sojourn ;
60001018	while you know that not with silver which wasteth away , nor with gold , you have been redeemed from your vain works which you received from your fathers ,
60001019	but with the precious blood of the Lamb spotless and unblemished , who is the Meshiha ;
60001020	who was afore-separated for this from before the foundations of the world , and hath been manifested in these last times for you ,
60001021	who by him believe in Aloha , who raised him from the dead , and gave him glory , that your faith and your hope may be in Aloha .
60001022	Let your souls be sanctified in obedience to the truth , and be filled with the charity which respecteth not persons , that with a pure heart and perfect you may love one another ,
60001023	as men who are regenerated , not by a perishable seed , but by that which is imperishable , by the living word of Aloha which abideth for ever .
60001024	Because all flesh is grass , and all its beauty as the flower of the field . The grass withereth and the flower drieth up ,
60001025	but the word of our God abideth for ever ; and this is that word which is preached unto you .
60002001	MAKE to cease therefore from you all malice and all guile , and dissimulation , and envy , and slander ;
