60002002	and be as ( new ) - born babes , and be desirous of the word as of milk pure and spiritual , that by it you may increase unto life .
60002003	If you have tasted and seen how good is the Lord ,
60002004	unto whom you have come , who is the living stone whom men have rejected , yet ( who is ) chosen and honourable with Aloha .
60002005	And you also as living stones are builded , and become a spiritual temple , and holy priests to offer sacrifices , which are acceptable before Aloha by Jeshu Meshiha .
60002006	For it is said in the scripture , Behold , I lay in Zion a stone choice and honourable in the head of the corner : whosoever believeth in him shall not be ashamed .
60002007	To you therefore is given this honour , to them who believe : but to them who are disobedient he is a rock of offence ,
60002008	or a stone of stumbling , and they are offended at him in not obeying the word , because to this they are set .
60002009	But you are a chosen race , who minister as priests to the kingdom , a holy people , a congregation redeemed to announce the praises of him who hath called you from darkness to his transcendant light :
60002010	those who before were not reputed a people , but now the people of Aloha ; upon whom also mercies were not ; but now , mercies are poured upon you .
60002011	MY beloved , I beseech you as strangers and as sojourners , be separate from all the lusts of the body which make wars against the soul .
60002012	And let your conversation be good before all men ; and they who speak against you malicious words shall see your good deeds , and shall glorify Aloha in the day of the probation .
60002013	And be subject to all men for the sake of Aloha : to kings , on account of their authority ;
60002014	and to judges , because from him they are sent for the punishment of transgressors , and for the commendation of good works .
60002015	For so is the will of Aloha , that by your comely works you may shut the mouth of fools who know not Aloha .
60002016	As the sons of liberty , yet not as men who make their liberty a veil for their wickedness , but as the servants of Aloha .
60002017	Honour all ; your brethren love ; and Aloha revere ; and kings honour .
60002018	And those servants who are among you , be subject to your masters with reverence ; not only to the good and gentle , but also to the hard and the severe .
60002019	For these are pleasing before Aloha , who , for the sake of a good conscience , endure the afflictions that come upon them unjustly .
60002020	For they who on account of their offences suffer tribulations , what praise have they ? But when you do well and they afflict you , and you endure , then doth your praise become great with Aloha .
60002021	For unto this have you been called ; because the Meshiha also hath died for us , and left us this example , that in his steps we may walk .
60002022	Who did no sin , nor was guile found in his mouth ;
60002023	who was reviled and reviled not , and suffered and threatened not , but delivered his cause to the Judge of righteousness ;
60002024	and took all our sins and upbore them in his body on the cross ; that when dead to sin , in the righteousness of him we might live ; for by his stripes you are healed ,
60002025	who had wandered as sheep , and are returned now unto the Shepherd and Guardian of your souls .
60003001	So you also , wives , be subject to your own husbands , that them who have not obeyed the word , by your comely manners without labour you may win ,
60003002	while they see that with reverence and with chastity you conduct yourselves .
60003003	Neither be adorned with outward adornings of the entwinement of your hair , or necklaces of gold , or of excelling vestments ,
60003004	but adorn yourselves in the hidden man of the heart , with the spirit of gentleness which perisheth not , the ornament of excellence before Aloha .
60003005	For so also of old the holy women who confided in Aloha adorned themselves , and were subject to their husbands ,
60003006	even as Sara was subject to Abraham , and called him My Lord : of her be you the daughters in good works , not being perturbed by any fear .
60003007	AND you , men , dwell likewise with your wives with knowledge , and as feeble vessels in honour hold them ; for they also with you inherit the gift of the life of eternity ; that you be not hindered in your prayers .
60003008	But , finally be all unanimous , and suffer with those who suffer , and love one another , and be merciful and gentle ;
60003009	and let no man render evil for evil , nor invective for invective , but , that which is contrary to them , bless : for unto this are you called , that the blessing you may inherit .
60003010	Who then willeth life , And loveth good days to see ? Let him keep his tongue from evil , And his lips that they speak not guile .
60003011	Let him depart from evil and do good , And seek peace and run after it .
60003012	For the eyes of the Lord are upon the righteous , And his ears , to hear them ; And the face of the Lord is against the wicked .
60003013	And who ( is he ) who will do you evil if you be emulous of good ( actions ) ?
60003014	And ( yet ) if you suffer for the sake of righteousness , you are happy . And you will not fear them who would make you afraid , nor be shaken .
60003015	But sanctify in your hearts the Lord Meshiha . AND be prepared to make defence to every one who shall seek of you speech concerning the hope of the faith , with meekness and with seriousness , while you have a good conscience ;
60003016	that as they speak against you as against evil men , they may be made ashamed who have traduced your good conversations in the Meshiha .
60003017	For it helpeth you ( if ) while doing goodly works you have to sustain evil , if so it be the will of Aloha , and not while working evils .
60003018	Because the Meshiha also once died on account of sins , the just on account of sinners , that he might bring us unto Aloha . And dead in the body and alive in the Spirit ,
60003019	he preached unto those souls who were held in sheul ,
60003020	those who before were disobedient in the days of Nuch ; while the long-suffering of Aloha commanded that he should make the ark , upon the hope of their conversion , and eight souls only entered therein , and were saved in the waters .
60003021	After which very type also you are saved in baptism , not while you cleanse the body from filth , but while you make confession of Aloha with a pure conscience , and of the resurrection of Jeshu Meshiha ;
60003022	who is exalted unto heaven , and is at the right hand of Aloha , and unto whom are subject angels and authorities and powers .
60004001	If then the Meshiha hath suffered for you in the flesh , be you also armed in it with the same mind ; for every one who dieth in his body hath ceased from all sins ,
60004002	that henceforth to the lusts of men he should not live , what time he is in the body , but to the will of Aloha .
60004003	For the time which hath passed sufficeth to have served the will of the Gentiles in indulgence , in drunkenness , in vileness , in revellings , and in the service of demons .
60004004	And , behold , now they wonder and blaspheme at you because you riot not with them in that former indulgence ;
60004005	they who shall give account to Aloha , who will judge the dead and the living .
60004006	For on this account the dead also have been evangelized ; that they might be judged as men in the flesh , and live with Aloha in the Spirit .
60004007	BUT the end of all cometh ; therefore be sober , and watch unto prayer .
60004008	And before every thing have ardent love for one another ; for love covereth a multitude of sins .
60004009	And be lovers of guests without murmuring .
60004010	And every man of you the gift which he hath received from Aloha , let him minister thereof unto his neighbours as good stewards of the various grace of Aloha .
60004011	Whoever shall speak , as the word of Aloha let him speak and whoever ministereth , ( he shall minister ) as from the power which Aloha giveth to him , that in every thing which you do Aloha may be glorified through Jeshu Meshiha , whose are the glory and honour to the age of ages . Amen .
60004012	My beloved , be not amazed at the temptations which you have , as that something strange happeneth to you , because for your probation they have been ;
60004013	but rejoice that you are partakers of the sufferings of the Meshiha , that so also at the revelation of his glory you may rejoice and exult .
60004014	And if you be reviled for the sake of the name of the Meshiha , you are happy ; for the Spirit of the glory of Aloha resteth upon you .
60004015	Only , let no man of you suffer as a murderer , or as a thief , or as a doer of evils .
60004016	But if he suffer as a Christian , let him not be ashamed , but let him glorify Aloha in that very name .
60004017	For the time is , that judgment shall begin from the house of Aloha . But if from us it begin , what is the end ( to be ) of them who obey not the gospel of Aloha ?
60004018	And if the righteous scarcely be saved , the wicked and the sinner where shall he be found ?
60004019	Wherefore , let them who suffer according to the will of Aloha commend to him their souls in good works , as unto the Faithful Creator .
60005001	BUT I entreat of the presbyters who are among you , I , a presbyter , your companion , and a witness of the sufferings of the Meshiha , and a partaker of his glory that is to be revealed ;
60005002	feed the flock of Aloha which is delivered to you , and take care ( of it ) spiritually , not by constraint , but with the will ; not for corrupt gain , but with all your heart ;
60005003	not as lords of the flock , but that you may be to them a goodly example ;
60005004	that when the Chief of pastors shall be revealed , you may receive from him a crown of glory which fadeth not .
60005005	And you younger , be subject to your presbyters , and be clothed carefully with humility of mind towards one another ; because Aloha is against those who exalt themselves , and to the humble he giveth grace .
60005006	Be humbled , therefore , under the mighty hand of Aloha , that he may exalt you at the right time .
60005007	And all your anxiety cast upon Aloha , because he is careful over you .
60005008	Watch , and be mindful , because your adversary Satana , as a lion , roareth and walketh and seeketh whom he may devour .
60005009	Withstand him then , being confirmed in the faith ; and know that upon your brethren also who are in the world , these same sufferings come .
60005010	But the God of grace , who hath called us to his eternal glory by Jeshu Meshiha , will give to us while we endure these few afflictions to be strengthened , and confirmed , and established in him for ever .
60005011	To Him be glory and dominion and honour unto the age of ages . Amen .
60005012	These few , as I consider , I have written to you by the hands of Silvanos , a faithful brother ; and I persuade and testify , that this is the true grace of Aloha , this wherein you stand .
60005013	The elect church which is in Babel , asketh for your peace , and Markos my son .
60005014	Salute one another with the holy kiss . Peace be with all of you who are in the Meshiha . Amen .
61001001	SHEMUN PETROS , a servant of Jeshu Meshiha , to those who by faith the same in preciousness with us have been made equal , through the righteousness of our Lord and our Redeemer Jeshu Meshiha .
61001002	Grace and peace be multiplied to you through the knowledge of our Lord Jeshu Meshiha .
61001003	As He who all ( things ) which of the divine power are unto life and godliness hath given ( us ) , through the knowledge of Him who hath called us unto the glory of him and of virtue ,
61001004	by annunciations great and precious which he hath given to you , that by them you may be partakers of the divine nature , while you escape the corruption of the lusts which are in the world ;
61001005	So , with this , bringing in all diligence , add to your faith virtue ; but to virtue knowledge ,
61001006	but to knowledge perseverance , but to perseverance patience , but to patience godliness ,
61001007	but to godliness brotherly kindness , but to brotherly kindness love .
61001008	For while these are found with you , and abound , neither slothfulness nor unfruitfulness will stand against you in the knowledge of our Lord Jeshu Meshiha .
61001009	For he with whom these are not found is blind , and seeth not , and hath forgotten the purification of his former sins .
61001010	Upon this the more , my brethren , be careful , that by your good works your calling and your election you may confirm ; for , while you do these , you will never lapse ;
61001011	for so abundantly shall be given to you the entrance of the eternal kingdom of our Lord and our Saviour Jeshu Meshiha .
61001012	Wherefore it doth not weary me to remind you constantly of these , that you may know well , and be established upon this truth .
61001013	But I consider it right , so long as I am in this body , to stir you up in remembrance :
61001014	knowing that the decease of my body is shortly ( to be , ) as also our Lord Jeshu Meshiha hath made me know .
61001015	But be careful also that ( these ) you may continually have ; that also after my going forth the memorial of them you may observe .
61001016	For it is not after fables which are made with art that we have gone , in making known to you the power and coming of our Lord Jeshu Meshiha , but as we were spectators of his majesty .
61001017	For when he received from Aloha the Father honour and glory , while a voice came to him as this , after the glorious beauty of his majesty , This is my Son , the Beloved , in whom I have delighted ;
61001018	we also this voice heard from heaven , as it came to him when we were with him in the holy mount .
61001019	We have that which is sure also , the word of prophecy ; that into which you do well to look , as to a light shining in a dark place , until the day dawn , and the sun arise in your hearts .
61001020	While this first you know , that every prophecy of the scripture its own solution is not .
61001021	For not by the will of man came any prophecy , but while by the Holy Spirit led spake the holy men of God .
61002001	BUT there were false prophets in the world , as also among you there will be false teachers , they who introduce heresies of destruction , and , the Lord who bought them denying , bring upon themselves swift destruction .
61002002	And many will go after their wickedness ; they , on account of whom the way of truth will be blasphemed .
61002003	And with fraudulency of deceptive words will they make merchandise of you ; they , whose judgment ( denounced ) before tarrieth not , and whose destruction doth not sleep .
61002004	For if Aloha upon the angels who sinned was not lenient , but in chains of darkness shut them in the deeps , and delivered them to be kept to the judgment of pain ;
61002005	and on the former world was not lenient , but Nuch , who was the eighth preacher of righteousness , he preserved , when the deluge came upon the world of the wicked ;
61002006	the cities of Sadum and of Omuro he burned , and with overthrow condemned them , while an example to the wicked who should be he set them ;
61002007	also Lut the righteous , who was bruised with the impure conversation of the lawless , he delivered ;
61002008	- for in sight and in hearing , while ( that ) just ( man ) dwelt among them , from day to day , his righteous soul by their lawless works was tortured ; -
61002009	the Lord knoweth how to deliver from affliction them who fear him , but the evil unto the day of judgment to be tormented will he reserve .
61002010	But most those who after the flesh follow the concupiscence of impurity , and of authority are contemptuous ; daring and arrogant , ( and ) who by greatness are not moved while they blaspheme :
61002011	whereas angels , who in power and strength are ( so much ) greater than they , bring not against them a judgment of blasphemy .
61002012	But these , as the dumb animals , by nature ( ordained ) to the knife and to destruction , blaspheming what they know not , in their own destruction will be destroyed ;
61002013	while they in whom is iniquity the wages of iniquity shall receive . They repute as pleasure the luxury which is in the day . Blemishes ( are they ) , full of spots , who delighting in their refreshments are luxurious :
61002014	having eyes full of adultery , and sins which cease not , alluring souls that are not established . An heart have they which is disciplined in covetousness ; sons of malediction ,
61002015	who , forsaking the straight way , have erred , and gone in the way of Belam bar Beur , who the wages of iniquity loved . But he had reproof of his transgression ;
61002016	( for ) the dumb ass which spake with the voice of man rebuked the madness of the prophet .
61002017	These are wells without water , clouds driven from above , unto whom the blackness of darkness is reserved .
61002018	For while they speak scoffing words of vanity , they allure with impure desires of the flesh those who almost escaped from them who have their conversation in error .
61002019	And liberty to them they promise , while they ( themselves ) are the servants of corruption ; for the thing by which a man is overcome , to that he is subject .
61002020	For if they have escaped from the pollutions of the world through the knowledge of our Lord and Saviour Jeshu Meshiha , with those very things entangled they are again over-come , their end becomes worse than the beginning .
61002021	For it had been more tolerable for them not to have known the way of righteousness , than , when they knew , to turn backward from the holy commandment delivered to them .
61002022	But it hath happened to them according to the true proverb , that The dog hath turned unto his vomit ; the sow which had washed into the wallow of the mire .
61003001	Now this , my beloved , the second epistle I write to you ; in both of which I awaken to remembrance your fair mind .
61003002	That you may remember the words which were before spoken by the holy prophets , and the commandments of our Lord and our Saviour ( delivered ) by the apostles .
61003003	This first know you , that there will come in the last of the days deriders who will deride , as after their own lusts they walk ,
61003004	and saying , Where is the promise of his advent ? for , since our fathers have slept , every thing ( abideth ) as from the beginning of the creation .
61003005	Unknown to them is this while they are willing , that the heaven was from of old , and the earth from the waters and through the waters subsisted , by the word of Aloha :
61003006	those ( waters ) by which the world that then was , again ( was covered ) with waters , and perished .
61003007	But the heaven which is now , and the earth , by his own word are set , being reserved unto fire , unto the day of judgment and the perdition of wicked men .
61003008	But this one ( truth ) be not ignorant of , my beloved , That one day with the Lord ( is ) as a thousand years , and a thousand years as one day .
61003009	Not dilatory is the Lord in his promises , as some consider delay ; but is patient on your account , not willing that any man should perish , but ( that ) every man to repentance should come .
61003010	But the day of the Lord cometh as a thief : that ( day ) in which the heavens suddenly shall pass away , but the elements burning be dissolved , and the earth and the works that are in it be found not .
61003011	As , therefore , all these are to be dissolved , how behoveth it you to be holy in your conversation , and in the fear of Aloha ;
61003012	expecting and desiring the coming of the day of Aloha ; that ( day ) in which the heavens , tried with fire , shall be dissolved , and the elements burning shall melt ?
61003013	But new heavens and earth , according to his promise , we expect ; those wherein righteousness dwelleth .
61003014	Wherefore , my beloved , while these you expect , be diligent , that , without blemish and without spot , of Him you may be found in peace .
61003015	And the long-suffering of the Lord consider ( to be for ) salvation ; as also our beloved brother Paulos according to the wisdom which hath been given to him hath written to you .
61003016	As in all his epistles he speaks concerning these ; in which there is somewhat difficult for intelligence . Those who are not knowing nor settled pervert them , as also the remaining scriptures , to their perdition .
61003017	You therefore , my beloved , knowing this before , keep yourselves , lest , going after the error of those who are lawless , you fall from your support .
61003018	But increase in grace , and in the knowledge of our Lord and our Saviour Jeshu Meshiha , and ( of ) Aloha the Father , Whose be glory both now , and in all time , and to the days eternal . Amen .
62001001	WE announce to you that which was from the beginning , that which we have heard , and seen with our eyes , have seen , and touched with our hands , that which is the Word of life .
62001002	And the life was manifested , and we have seen , and testify , and preach to you the eternal life which was with the Father , and was manifested to us .
62001003	And what we have seen and heard , we make known also to you , that you may have communion with us ; and our communion is with the Father , and with his Son Jeshu the Meshiha .
62001004	And these write we unto you , that our joy which is in you may be complete .
62001005	And this is the annunciation which we have heard from him , and announce to you , that Aloha is light , and in him is no darkness at all .
62001006	And if we say that we have communion with him , and walk in darkness , we lie , and in the truth do not proceed ;
62001007	but if in the light we walk , as He is in the light , we have communion with one another , and the blood of Jeshu his Son cleanseth us from all our sins .
62001008	And if we say that we have no sin , we deceive ourselves , and the truth is not in us ;
62001009	but if we confess our sins , he is faithful and just to forgive us our sins , and to cleanse us from all unrighteousness .
62001010	And if we say we have not sinned , we make him a liar , and his word is not in us .
62002001	My sons , these write I to you , that you sin not . And if a man shall sin , we have an Advocate with the Father , Jeshu Meshiha , the Just ;
62002002	for he is the propitiation for our sins , and not on behalf of ours only , but also on behalf of the whole world .
62002003	And by this we feel that we know him , if we keep his commandments .
62002004	For he who saith that he knoweth him , and his commandments keepeth not , is a liar , and the truth is not in him .
62002005	But he who keepeth his word , in him is perfected truly the love of Aloha ; for by this we know that we are in him .
62002006	He who saith , I am in him , ought according to his walkings to walk .
62002007	MY beloved , a new commandment I write not to you , but the old commandment , that which was with you from the beginning ; but the old commandment is the word which you have heard .
62002008	Again , a new commandment I write to you , that which is true in him and in you ; because the darkness hath passed , and the true light beginneth to appear .
62002009	Whoever saith , then , that he is in the light , and hateth his brother , is in darkness until now .
62002010	He who loveth his brother , in the light abideth , and offence is not in him .
62002011	He who hateth his brother is in darkness , and in the darkness walketh , and knoweth not whither he goeth , because the darkness itself hath blinded his eyes .
62002012	I write to you , sons , because forgiven to you are your sins for the sake of his name .
62002013	I write to you , fathers , because you have known him who hath been from the beginning . I write to you , young men , because you have overcome the wicked . I have written to you , children , because you have known the Father .
62002014	I have written to you , fathers , because you have known Him who ( hath been ) from the beginning . I have written to you , young men , because you are strong , and the word of Aloha remaineth in you , and you have overcome the wicked .
62002015	Love not the world , nor any thing which is in it ; for whoever loveth the world , the love of the Father is not in him .
62002016	For every thing that is in the world , is the lust of the body , and the lust of the eyes , and the pride of the world . These which are not of the Father , but they are from the world itself .
62002017	And the world passeth , ( both ) it and its lusts ; but he who doeth the will of Aloha , continueth for ever .
62002018	my sons , it is the last time : and as you have heard , the false meshiha cometh ; and now there are many false meshihas , and from this we know that it is the last time .
62002019	From us they went forth , but they were not of us ; for if they had been of us , with us would they have remained . But they went forth from us , that it might be known that they were not of us .
62002020	And you have an anointing from the Holy , and you discern every man .
62002021	I have not written to you because you know not the truth , but you know it , and that no lie is of it , of the truth .
62002022	Who is a liar , if not he who denieth that Jeshu is the Meshiha ? and this ( one ) is a false meshiha . He who denieth the Father , denieth also the Son ;
62002023	and he who denieth the Son , disbelieveth also the Father . Whoso confesseth the Son , the Father also confesseth .
62002024	And you , what you have heard from the first , let it continue with you . For , if what you have heard from the first continue with you , you also will continue in the Father and in the Son .
62002025	And this is the promise which he promised to us , eternal life .
62002026	But these I have written to you , because of those who would seduce you .
62002027	And you , also , if the anointing continue with you which you have received from him , have not need that a man should teach you ; but as the anointing that is from Aloha itself teacheth you concerning every thing , and is true , neither is falsity in it ; and as it hath taught you , continue in it .
62002028	And now , my sons , continue in him : that when he is manifested we may not he confounded of him , but we may have confidence at his coming .
62002029	If you know that he is righteous , know also that every one who doeth righteousness is of him .
62003001	And see how great is the love of the Father toward us , that sons he hath called us , and also made us ! Therefore the world doth not know us , because that it hath also not known him .
62003002	MY beloved , now are we the sons of Aloha ; and it is not manifest , as yet , what we are to become , but we know , that when he is manifested , in his likeness we are and see him , according to that which he is .
62003003	And every one who hath in him this hope , purifieth himself , as He is pure .
62003004	But whoever committeth sin doeth iniquity ; for all sin is iniquity .
62003005	And you know that he was manifested to bear our sins , and sin in him is not .
62003006	And every one who in him abideth , sinneth not . And every one who sinneth , hath not seen him , nor known him .
62003007	My sons , let no man deceive you : he who worketh righteousness is righteous , as also the Meshiha himself is righteous .
62003008	And he who doeth sin is of Satana , because that from the commencement Satana was a sinner . And for this cause did the Son of Aloha appear , that he might destroy the works of Satana .
62003009	Every one who is born of Aloha , sin doth not work , because that his seed is in him , and he cannot sin , because of Aloha he is born .
62003010	In this are distinguished the sons of Aloha from the sons of Satana ; every one who doeth not righteousness , nor loveth his brother , is not of Aloha .
62003011	For this is the commandment which you have heard from before , that you love one another .
62003012	Not as Koen , who was from the Evil , and killed his brother . And on what account killed he him ? unless that his own works were evil and his brother's righteous .
62003013	Do not wonder , my brethren , if the world hate you .
62003014	We know that we have passed from death unto life , by this , that we love our brethren . He who loveth not his brother , in death continueth .
62003015	For every one who hateth his brother is a man-killer ; and we know that in no man-killer can abide the life which is eternal .
62003016	In this we know His love toward us , that he gave himself for us ; ( so ) also it is right for us for the sake of our brethren to give ourselves .
62003017	And he who hath the possession of the world , and shall see his brother that he needeth , and shall shut his compassions from him , how is there in him the love of Aloha ?
62003018	My sons , let us not love one another in words and in tongue , but in works and in truth .
62003019	And by this we make known that we are of the truth , and before that he cometh we make confident our hearts .
62003020	And if our heart condemn us , how much ( more ) Aloha , who is greater than our heart , and knoweth every thing !
62003021	My beloved , if our heart condemn us not , we have openness of face before Aloha .
62003022	And whatever we ask , we shall receive from him , because we keep his commandments , and do the things which are beautiful before him .
62003023	And this is his commandment , That we believe in the name of his Son Jeshu Meshiha , and love one another , as he hath commanded us .
62003024	And he who keepeth his commandments , is kept by him , and he dwelleth in him : and by this we perceive that he dwelleth in us , by his Spirit whom he hath given to us .
62004001	MY beloved , believe not all spirits , but discern the spirits whether they be from Aloha ; because many false prophets have gone forth into the world .
62004002	By this we know the Spirit of Aloha : Every spirit who confesseth that Jeshu Meshiha hath come in the flesh , is from Aloha .
62004003	And every spirit who confesseth not that Jeshu hath come in the flesh , is not from Aloha : but this is from that false meshiha , of whom you have heard that he cometh , and now is in the world already .
62004004	But you of Aloha are the children , and have overcome them ; because greater is he who is with you , than he who is in the world .
62004005	And these are of the world , therefore the world heareth them . But we are of Aloha ; and he who knoweth Aloha heareth us ;
62004006	and he who is not of Aloha heareth us not . In this itself we perceive the Spirit of truth and the spirit of deception .
62004007	my beloved , let us love one another , because love is of Aloha ; and every one who loveth from Aloha is born , and knoweth Aloha .
62004008	For Aloha is Love ; and every one who loveth not , knoweth not Aloha .
62004009	In this was made known the love of Aloha towards us , that Aloha sent his only Son into the world that we might live by him .
62004010	In this is love : it was not that we had loved Aloha , but that Aloha himself loved us , and sent his Son a propitiation for our sins .
62004011	MY beloved , if Aloha so hath loved us , we also are indebted to love one another .
62004012	Aloha no man hath seen but if we love one another , Aloha in us abideth , and his love is fulfilled in us .
62004013	And by this we know that in him we abide , and he abideth in us , because of his Spirit he hath given us .
62004014	And we have seen and we testify that the Father hath sent his Son , the Redeemer of the world .
62004015	Whosoever confesseth Jeshu that he is the Son of Aloha , in him Aloha abideth , and he abideth in Aloha .
62004016	And we have believed and known the love which Aloha hath toward us ; for Aloha is Love . And every one who abideth in love in Aloha abideth .
62004017	And in this is his love perfected with us , that openness of face we might have in the day of judgment ; because that as He was , so also we are in this world .
62004018	Fear in love is not : but perfect love hath cast out fear , because fear is in terror . He who feareth is not perfect in love .
62004019	We then will love Aloha , because he hath first loved us .
62004020	But if one shall say , I love Aloha , and his brother he hateth , he is a liar . For he who his brother whom he hath seen loveth not , how can he love Aloha himself whom he hath not seen ?
62004021	And this commandment we have received from him , That every one who loveth Aloha shall love also his brother .
62005001	WHOSOEVER believeth that Jeshu is the Meshiha of Aloha is born . And every one who loveth the Generator loveth also him who is generated of him .
62005002	And by this we know that we love the children of Aloha , when we love Aloha , and work his commandments .
62005003	For this is the love of Aloha , that we keep his commandments ; and his commandments are not heavy .
62005004	Because every one who is born of Aloha overcometh the world : and this is the victory which overcometh the world , our faith .
62005005	For who ( is he ) that overcometh the world , but he who believeth that Jeshu is the Son of Aloha ?
62005006	This is he who came by water and blood , Jeshu the Meshiha : it was not by water only , but by water and blood ; and the Spirit testifieth , because the Spirit himself is truth .
62005007	And there are three that testify , the Spirit , and the water , and the blood ;
62005008	and these three are in one .
62005009	If the testimony of men we receive , how much greater is the testimony of Aloha ? and this is the testimony which Aloha hath testified concerning his Son .
62005010	Whosoever believeth in the Son of Aloha hath this testimony in himself . Every one who believeth not Aloha hath made him a liar , in not believing the testimony that he hath testified concerning his Son .
62005011	And this is the testimony , That the life which is eternal , Aloha hath given to us , and this life is in his Son .
62005012	Every one who apprehendeth the Son , apprehendeth also life ; and every one who apprehendeth not the Son of Aloha , hath not life .
62005013	These I have written to you , that you may know that you have the life which is eternal , who believe in the name of the Son of Aloha .
62005014	And this is the assurance that we have toward him , that all that we ask of him according to his will , he heareth us .
62005015	And if we are persuaded that he heareth us concerning what we ask from him , we are confident of receiving already the requests that we ask from him .
62005016	if a man shall see his brother sin a sin not obnoxious to the death , he shall ask , and life be given to him , to those who sin not as unto the death . For there is the sin of death ; - it is not concerning this I say that a man shall pray .
62005017	For all iniquity is sin ; and there is sin which is not of death .
62005018	And we know that every one who is born of Aloha sinneth not . For he who is born of Aloha keepeth himself , and the Evil doth not approach him .
62005019	We know that we are of Aloha , and the whole world in the Evil is lying .
62005020	And we know that the Son of Aloha hath come , and hath given us knowledge to know the truth , and to be in him in the truth , in his Son Jeshu the Meshiha . This is Aloha the true , and the life which is eternal .
62005021	My sons , keep yourselves from the service of idols .
63001001	THE presbyter to the elect Kuria and to her sons , whom I love in truth , nor I only , but all they who know the truth ,
63001002	on account of the truth which abideth in us , and is with us for ever ;
63001003	Grace be with you and mercy and peace , from Aloha the Father , and from Jeshu Meshiha the Son of the Father , in truth and in love .
63001004	I have rejoiced much to have found of thy sons who walk in the truth , after the commandment we have received from the Father .
63001005	And now I entreat thee , Kuria , - no new commandment writing to thee , but that which we have had from the beginning , - that we love one another .
63001006	And this is love , that we walk according to the commandment ; this commandment is according to that which you have heard from the beginning , that in it we should walk .
63001007	Because many deceivers are come out into the world who confess not that Jeshu Meshiha came in the flesh . This is the deceiver and antichrist .
63001008	Be watchful of yourselves , that not any thing perish which you have wrought ; but ( that with ) a complete reward you may be recompensed .
63001009	Every one who transgresseth , and abideth not in the doctrine of the Meshiha , hath not Aloha . He who abideth in his doctrine , this hath both the Father and the Son .
63001010	If any one come to you , and this doctrine bring not , receive him not into the house , and " Joy to you , " and " Farewell , " say not to him .
63001011	For he who saith to him , " Farewell , " becometh a participator of his evil deeds .
63001012	Though I have many things to write to you , I will not with parchment and ink ; but I hope to come to you , and mouth with mouth to speak , that our joy may be complete .
63001013	The sons of thy elect sister ask your peace . Grace be with you . Amen .
64001001	THE presbyter unto Gaios my beloved , whom I love in truth .
64001002	Our beloved , in all things I pray for thee , that thou mayest prosper and be healthful , even as thy soul prospereth .
64001003	For I have rejoiced greatly when the brethren have come , and have testified concerning thy integrity , even as in the truth thou walkest .
64001004	And greater joy than this I have not ( than ) when I hear that my sons walk in the truth .
64001005	Our beloved , in faithfulness thou performest what thou doest unto the brethren , and especially to those who are strangers ,
64001006	who have testified of thy charity , before all the church , to whom thou hast done well according to that which is worthy of Aloha .
64001007	For after his name they went forth , taking nothing from the Gentiles .
64001008	We therefore ought to receive such , that we may be helpers of the truth .
64001009	I would have written to the church ; but he who loveth to be foremost of you , Diotrapas , receiveth us not .
64001010	On account of this , if I come , I will remember the works which he doeth , who words of evil maketh concerning us ; and these not satisfying him , he hath not received the brethren , and those who receive he forbiddeth , and also expelleth from the church .
64001011	Our beloved , be not imitative of the evil , but of the good . He who doeth good is of Aloha , and he who doeth evil hath not seen Aloha .
64001012	Concerning Demetrios is a testimony from every man , and from the church , and from the truth itself . But we also bear witness , and you know that our testimony is true .
64001013	I have many things which I would write to thee , but I will not with ink and reed write to thee .
64001014	But I hope that soon I shall see thee , and mouth to mouth we will speak . Peace be with thee . The friends ask thy peace . Ask the peace of the friends each by his name .
64001015	
65001001	JIHUDA , servant of Jeshu Meshiha , but brother of Jakub , to the called people , who are beloved of Aloha the Father , ( and ) in Jeshu Meshiha preserved :
65001002	Mercy and peace in love be multiplied unto you .
65001003	My beloved , while giving all diligence to write to you concerning our common salvation , it is needful for me to write to you , exhorting you ( in particular ) to do battle for the faith which was once delivered to the saints .
65001004	For certain men have obtained entrance , who from the beginning were proscribed in this condemnation ; depraved men , who the grace of Aloha turn unto lasciviousness , and him who is the only Lord GOD , our Lord Jeshu Meshiha , deny .
65001005	But I will to remind you , though all of you know , that Aloha , when once the people from Metsreen he had redeemed , yet afterward destroyed them who believed not .
65001006	And the angels who kept not their primacy , but left their habitation , unto the judgment of the great day in chains unknown , under darkness , he hath kept .
65001007	As Sadum and Omuro , and the cities which were around them , which in manner of them committed fornication , and went after other flesh , are lying under everlasting fire , condemned unto judgment .
65001008	In this manner also ( will perish ) those who , in sleep imagining , defile the flesh , but contemn government , and blaspheme majesty .
65001009	Yet Mikael , chief of angels , when , with the accuser speaking , he contended on account of the body of Musha , dared not bring against him a reviling judgment , but said , The Lord rebuke thee .
65001010	But these the things which they know not revile ; but through those by which naturally as the beasts they are swayed , they are corrupted .
65001011	Woe to them ; for in the way of Koen they have gone , and after the error of Belam for gain they have burned , and in the rebellion of Kurach they have perished .
65001012	These are they who , in their recreations contaminating , behave wantonly , feeding themselves without reverence ; clouds without rain , roaming with the winds ; trees whose fruit withereth , and which are unfruitful , twice dead , and uplifted from their root ;
65001013	turbulent waves of the sea , which , by their foaming , manifest their shame ; erring stars , unto whom the blackness of darkness that is eternal is reserved .
65001014	But Hanuk also , who was the seventh from Adam , prophesied of these , saying , Behold , the Lord cometh , with myriads of his saints ,
65001015	To execute judgment upon all ; And to convict all the wicked for all their deeds Which they have wickedly done ; And for all those obdurate words Which ungodly sinners have spoken .
65001016	These are they who murmur and complain of every thing , while walking according to their own desires ; their mouth speaking portentous things , and extolling persons for the sake of gain .
65001017	But you , my beloved , remember those words which before were spoken by the apostles of our Lord Jeshu Meshiha ,
65001018	who told you that in the last times there would be those who scoff , who according to their own desires go after wickedness .
65001019	These are they who separate ; - animals , in whom the Spirit is not .
65001020	But you , my beloved , in your holy faith be edified anew , praying in the Holy Spirit ,
65001021	ourselves in the love of Aloha to keep , while looking for the mercy of our Lord Jeshu Meshiha unto our eternal salvation .
65001022	And some of them snatch from the fire .
65001023	But when they repent , have compassion on them , with fear , hating even the tunic which by the flesh is contaminated .
65001024	But to him who is able to keep you without falling and without spot , and to establish you without blemish , Aloha our only Saviour by Jeshu Meshiha our Lord , before his majesty with joy ,
65001025	Be glory , and dominion , and honour , and grandeur , both now and in all ages . Amen .
66001001	THE Revelation of Jeshu Meshiha , which Aloha gave unto him , to show unto his servants the things which must be done speedily ; and which he made known , sending by his angel unto his servant Juhanon ,
66001002	who attested the word of Aloha and the testimony of Jeshu Meshiha , and all which he beheld .
66001003	Blessed is he who readeth , and they who hear the words of this prophecy , and keep those which are written therein ; for the time hath approached .
66001004	Juhanon to the seven churches which are in Asia : grace to you and peace from him who is , and who was , and who cometh ; from the seven Spirits who are before his throne ;
66001005	and from Jeshu Meshiha who is the faithful Witness , the First-born of the dead , and Head of the kings of the earth , who hath loved us , and released us from our sins by his blood ,
66001006	and hath made us a priestly kingdom unto Aloha and his Father ; to whom be glory and dominion for ever and ever . Amen .
66001007	Behold , he cometh with clouds , and all eyes shall see him , and they also who transfixed him ; and for him shall mourn all the tribes of the earth . Yes , Amen !
66001008	I am Olaph and Thau , saith Aloha the Lord , who is , and who was , and who cometh , the Omnipotent .
66001009	I , Juhanon your brother , and your fellow-sharer in the affliction , and in the patience , which are in Jeshu Meshiha , was in the island which is called Pathamon , for the word of Aloha and for the testimony of Jeshu Meshiha .
66001010	I was in the Spirit on the Lord's day ; and I heard behind me a great voice as a trumpet , saying ,
66001011	What thou seest , write in a book ; and send to the seven churches , at Ephesos , and at Smurna , and at Pergamos , and at Thiatira , and at Sardis , and at Philidaphia , and at Laodikia .
66001012	And I turned to see the voice that spake with me ; and being turned , I saw seven candlesticks of gold .
66001013	And in the midst of the candlesticks ( one ) who was like the Son of man , clothed to the foot , and girded about his paps with a circlet of gold .
66001014	But his head and hair were white as wool , white as snow ; and his eyes ( were ) as a flame of fire ,
66001015	and his feet were like refined brass , which flamed as in a furnace , and his voice as the voice of many waters .
66001016	And he had in his right hand seven stars ; and from his mouth a sharp sword of two edges went forth ; and his countenance was as the sun shining in his strength .
66001017	And when I saw him I fell at his feet as dead . And he laid upon me his right hand , saying , Fear not : I am the First and the Last ;
66001018	and who liveth and who have been dead ; and , behold , I am alive for ever and ever . Amen ! And I have the keys of death and of Sheul .
66001019	Write , then , what thou hast seen ; and those which are , and those which are to be after them .
66001020	( This is ) the mystery of the seven stars which thou sawest in my right hand , and of the seven candlesticks of gold : the seven stars are the angels of the seven churches , and the seven candlesticks are the seven churches .
66002001	To the angel of the church which is in Ephesos , write : These saith the Holder of all , and of the seven stars in his right hand , who walketh in the midst of the seven candlesticks of gold .
66002002	I know thy works , and thy labour , and thy patience , and ( that ) thou canst not bear evils ; and hast tried those who say they are apostles , and are not , and hast found them liars .
66002003	And thou hast patience , and hast laboured on account of my name , and hast not fainted .
66002004	But I have against thee , because thy first love thou hast forsaken .
66002005	Remember , therefore , from whence thou art fallen , and repent , and do the first works . But if not , I will come to thee quickly , and will remove thy candlestick from its place , if thou convert not .
66002006	But this thou hast , that thou hatest the works of the Nikolitu , which also I ( hate ) .
66002007	He who hath ears , let him hear what the Spirit saith to the churches . To him who overcometh I will give to eat of the tree of life , which is in the paradise of my God .
66002008	And to the angel of the church which is in Smurna , write : These saith the First and the Last , who was dead , and liveth .
66002009	I know thy works , and affliction , and poverty , but thou art rich ; and the blasphemy of them who say of themselves that they are Jihudoyee , and are not , but the synagogue of Satana .
66002010	Fear not any thing of those that thou art to suffer ; for , behold , it will be that the accuser will cast some of you into prison , so that you may be tried ; and you will have affliction ten days . Be faithful unto the death , and I will give thee the crown of life .
66002011	He who hath ears , let him hear what saith the Spirit to the churches . He who overcometh shall not be injured by the second death .
66002012	And to the angel of the church which is in Pergamos , write : These saith he who hath the sharp sword with two edges .
66002013	I know thy works , and where thou dwellest , where ( is ) the throne of Satana ; and thou hast held my name , and not denied my faith in those days when my witness was exposed , my faithful one , who was killed with you where dwelleth Satana .
66002014	But I have against thee a little , because thou hast there those who hold the doctrine of Belam , who taught Balok to cast a stumbling-block before the sons of Israel , to eat that which the sons of idols ( eat ) , and to commit fornication .
66002015	So hast thou who hold the doctrine of the Nikolitu : of it ,
66002016	in like ( manner ) , repent ; and if not , I will come to thee quickly , and will war against them with the sword of my mouth .
66002017	He who hath ears , let him hear what saith the Spirit to the churches . To him who overcometh will I give to eat of the manna which is hidden ; and I will give to him the white stone , and upon the stone a new name written , which no man knoweth but he who receiveth .
66002018	And to the angel and church which is in Thiatiros , write : These saith the Son of Aloha , who hath his eyes as the flame of fire , and his feet like refined brass .
66002019	I know thy works , and thy love and faith and service ; and also thy patience , and thy last works to be greater than the first .
66002020	But I have against thee that thou permittest thy wife Izabel , who calleth herself a prophetess , to teach and seduce my servants to commit fornication , and to eat what the sons of idols ( eat ) .
66002021	And I gave her time when she might convert , and she willed not to repent of her fornication .
66002022	Behold , I cast her into a bed , and those who have committed adultery with her into great affliction , if they repent not of their works .
66002023	And her sons will I kill with death , and all the churches shall know that I am he who searcheth the reins and the hearts : and I will give to you every one according to your works .
66002024	But to you I say , to those of the rest who are in Thiatiros , all them who have not this doctrine , the men who know not the depths Of Satana , as they speak ; I will not throw upon you another burden ;
66002025	but that which you have , hold , until I come .
66002026	And he who conquereth , and he who keepeth until the end my works , I will give to him power over the peoples ,
66002027	and he shall rule them with a rod of iron , and as a vessel of the potter shall they be destroyed , as also I have received from my Father ;
66002028	and I will give to him the morning star .
66002029	He who hath ears , let him hear what the Spirit saith to the churches .
66003001	AND to the angel who is in Sardis write : These saith he who hath the seven Spirits of Aloha , and the seven stars : I know thy works , that a name thou hast that thou livest , and thou art dead .
66003002	Awake , and keep those things which remain , which are about to die ; for I have not found thy works complete before my God .
66003003	Remember then how thou hast received , and hearken , and keep , and repent . And if then thou wilt not awake , I will come against thee as the thief , and thou shalt not know in what hour I come against thee .
66003004	But thou hast a few names in Sardis who have not defiled their vestments ; and they shall walk with me in white , because they are worthy .
66003005	He who overcometh shall be clothed in white vestments , and I will not blot their name from the book of life ; and I will confess their name before my Father , and before his angels .
66003006	He who hath ears , let him hear what the Spirit saith to the churches .
66003007	And to the angel of the church which is in Philadelphia write : These saith the Holy , the True , who hath the key of David ; who openeth and no man shutteth , and who shutteth and no man openeth .
66003008	I know thy works ; and , behold , I have given before thee an open door , which no man can shut ; because thou hast a little strength , and hast kept my word , and hast not denied my name .
66003009	Behold , I will give of the synagogue of Satana , who say that they are Jihudoyee , and are not , but lie ; behold , I will make them to come and worship before thy feet , and they shall know that I have loved thee .
66003010	Because thou hast kept the word of my patience , I will keep thee from the hour of temptation , which is to come upon all the habitable world , to try them who dwell upon the earth .
66003011	I come quickly . Hold that which thou hast , that no man take thy crown .
66003012	Him who overcometh I will make a column in the temple of my God , and he shall go out no more ; and I will write upon him the name of my God , and of Urishlem the new , which descendeth from heaven from my God , and my new name .
66003013	He who hath ears , let him hear what the Spirit saith to the churches .
66003014	And to the angel of the church which is in Ladikia write : These saith the Amen , the Witness , the faithful , the true , the Head of the creation of Aloha .
66003015	I know thy works , that thou art neither hot nor cold . Would that thou wast cold or hot !
66003016	So , because thou art lukewarm , and neither hot nor cold , I will vomit thee from my mouth .
66003017	Because thou sayest , I am rich , and have become opulent , and of nothing have need ; and knowest not that thou art infirm , and miserable , and needy , and blind , and naked ;
66003018	I counsel thee to buy of me gold , proved by fire , that thou mayest be rich ; and white raiment , that thou mayest be clothed , and the shame of thy nakedness be not seen ; and lave with collyrium thine eyes , that thou mayest see .
66003019	All those whom I love , I reprove and chasten : be zealous therefore , and repent .
66003020	Behold , I stand at the door and knock : if any man hear my voice , and will open the door , I will enter unto him , and will sup with him , and he with me .
66003021	And to him who overcometh I will give to sit with me upon my throne , as also I have overcome , and have sat with my Father in his throne .
66003022	He who hath ears , let him hear what the Spirit saith to the churches .
66004001	AFTER these I saw , and , behold , a door ( was ) open in heaven . And the first voice that I had heard as a trumpet talking with me , said , Come up hither , and I will make thee see the ( things ) which must be after these .
66004002	At once I was in the spirit : and , behold , a throne placed in heaven , and upon the throne ( One ) sat .
66004003	And he who sat was like to the appearance of the stone of jaspon , and of sardion ; and the bow of the clouds was around the throne , in resemblance to the appearance of zmragda .
66004004	Around the throne were seats twenty and four ; and upon those seats twenty and four presbyters sitting , who were robed in white vestments , and upon their heads wore coronets of gold .
66004005	And from the throne went forth lightnings and the voice of thunders . And there were seven lamps of fire which burned before His throne , which are the seven Spirits of Aloha .
66004006	And before the throne was a sea of brightness like chrystalos ; and in the midst of the throne , and around it , and before the throne , four living-ones , who were full of eyes before and behind .
66004007	And the first living-one was like the lion , and the second living-one was like the calf , and the third living-one had a face as a man , and the fourth living-one was like the eagle which flieth .
66004008	And these four living-ones , each of them , had six wings round about ; and within were full of eyes ; and they rest not day and night from saying , Holy , holy , holy , Lord God Almighty , Who wast , and art , and art to come .
66004009	And when those living-ones give glory and honour and thanks unto Him who sitteth upon the throne , to Him who liveth for ever and ever ,
66004010	the four and twenty presbyters fell before Him who sitteth upon the throne , and worshipped Him who liveth for ever and ever , and cast their crowns before the throne , saying ,
66004011	Worthy art thou , O Lord , And our God the Holy One , To receive glory and honour and power ; For thou hast created all , And by thy hand they are , And through thy will they were and are created .
66005001	AND I saw in the right hand of him who sat on the throne a writing which was written within and on the back , and sealed with seven seals .
66005002	And I saw a mighty angel who proclaimed with a great voice : Who is worthy to open the book , and to loose the seals thereof ?
66005003	And no one was able , in heaven above , nor upon earth , nor under the earth , to open the book , or to inspect it .
66005004	And I wept much , because no one could be found who was worthy to open the book , or to inspect it .
66005005	And one of the presbyters said to me , Weep not ; behold , the Lion of the tribe of Jihuda , who is the root of David , hath prevailed . He will open the book and the seven seal thereof .
66005006	And I saw , in the midst of the presbyters , a Lamb standing , as slain , who had seven horns and seven eyes which are the seven Spirits of Aloha , which are sent forth to all the earth .
66005007	And he came and took the book from the right hand of him who sat upon the throne .
66005008	And when he had taken the book , the four living-ones and the twenty and four presbyters fell down before the Lamb , having each of them an harp , and vials of gold full of perfumes , which are the prayers of the saints .
66005009	And they hymned a new hymn , saying , Thou art worthy to take the book , And to open the seals thereof ; Because thou wast slain , And hast redeemed us to Aloha by thy blood , From every tribe and tongue and people and nation .
66005010	And thou hast made them to our God kings and priests , And reigning upon the earth .
66005011	And I saw and heard as the voice of many angels around the throne , and the living-ones , and the presbyters , and the number of them was ten thousand times ten thousand , and thousands of thousands ,
66005012	which said with a great voice , Worthy is the Lamb that was slain , To receive power , and riches , and wisdom , and strength , And honour , and glory , and blessing ,
66005013	And every creature which is in heaven , and on earth , And under the earth , and in the sea , And all them which are therein . And I heard him who sat upon the throne saying : To the Lamb let there be given blessing , and honour , and glory , and praise , and dominion , for ever and ever .
66005014	And the four living-ones said , Amen ! And the presbyters fell , and worshipped .
66006001	AND I saw , when the Lamb had opened one of the SEVEN SEALS . And I heard one of the four living-ones speaking as the voice of thunder , Come , and see !
66006002	And I looked : and there was a white horse ; and he who sat upon him had a bow , and there was given to him a crown ; and he went forth conquering , so that he might conquer .
66006003	And when he had opened the SECOND SEAL , I heard the second living-one , who said , Come !
66006004	And there went out another horse ( which was ) red ; and to him who sat upon him was given to take peace from the earth , and thus that one another they should kill ; and there was given to him a great sword .
66006005	And when he had opened the THIRD SEAL , I heard the third living one , saying , Come , and see ! And I saw , and , behold , a black horse , and he who sat upon him had a balance in his hand .
66006006	And I heard a voice from the midst of the four living-ones , saying , A choenix of wheat for a dinar ; And three choenices of barley for a dinar ; And the oil and the wine hurt not .
66006007	And when he had opened the FOURTH SEAL , I heard the fourth living-one , saying , Come , and see !
66006008	And I saw a green horse , and he who sat upon him had the name of Death , and Shiul followed after him . And there was given to him power over the fourth of the earth , to kill with the sword , and with famine , and with death , and with the toothed beast of the earth .
66006009	And when he had opened the FIFTH SEAL , I saw under the altar the souls of them who had been killed for the word of Aloha , and for the testimony of the Lamb , which had been theirs .
66006010	And they cried with a great voice , saying , Until when , O Lord , holy ( and ) true , Dost thou not judge and avenge our blood On those who dwell upon the earth ?
66006011	And there was given to each of them the white robe ; and it was told them , that they should rest yet a little time , until should be completed their fellow-servants , their brethren who would be killed as also they .
66006012	And I saw when he opened the SIXTH SEAL , there was a great movement ; and the sun became black as sackcloth of hair , and all the moon became as blood ;
66006013	and the stars of heaven fell to the earth , as the fig-tree casteth her figs , when from a great wind she is shaken .
66006014	And the heavens were sundered as a book that is rolled , and all the mountains and islands from their places were moved ;
66006015	and the kings of the earth and great ones , and the chiefs of thousands , and the rich and the mighty ones , and every servant , and every freeman , hid them in the caverns , and in the rocks of the mountains ,
66006016	saying to the mountains and to the rocks , Fall upon us , and hide us from the face of him who sitteth upon the throne and from the wrath of the Lamb .
66006017	For the great day of their wrath has come , and who is able to stand ?
66007001	AND after these , I saw four angels standing upon the four corners of the earth , holding the four winds of the earth , that the winds should not blow upon the earth , nor upon the sea , nor upon the trees .
66007002	And I saw another angel , and he ascended from the rising of the sun ; who had the seal of Aloha the Living . And he cried with a great voice to the four angels to whom it had been given to hurt the earth and the sea ,
66007003	saying , Hurt not the earth , nor the sea , neither the trees , until we have sealed the servants of our God upon their foreheads .
66007004	And I heard the number of them who were sealed , an hundred and forty and four thousands , sealed of every tribe of Israel :
66007005	of the tribe of Jihuda , twelve thousand were sealed ; of the tribe of Rubill , twelve thousand ; of the tribe of Gad , twelve thousand ;
66007006	of the tribe of Ashir , twelve thousand ; of the tribe of Naphtoli , twelve thousand ; of the tribe of Manasha , twelve thousand ;
66007007	of the tribe of Shemun , twelve thousand ; of the tribe of Levi , twelve thousand ; of the tribe of Isokar , twelve thousand ;
66007008	of the tribe of Zabolon , twelve thousand ; of the tribe of Jauseph , twelve thousand ; of the tribe of Benjomin , twelve thousand
66007009	After these I saw , and , behold , a great assembly , which to number no man was able , from all people and nations and tribes and tongues , were standing before the throne and before the Lamb , arrayed in white robes , and with palms in their hands ;
66007010	and , crying with a great voice , said , Salvation to our God ! To him who sitteth on the throne , And to the Lamb !
66007011	And all the angels stood around the throne , and the presbyters , and the four living-ones ; and they fell before his throne upon their faces , and worshipped Aloha ,
66007012	saying , Amen . Blessing , and glory , and wisdom , and thanksgiving , And honour , and might , and power , To our God , for ever and ever . Amen .
66007013	And one of the presbyters answered and said to me : These , who are arrayed in white robes , who are they ? and from whence do they come ?
66007014	And I said to him , My lord , thou knowest . And he said to me , These are they who have come from great affliction , and have washed their robes , and made them white in the blood of the Lamb .
66007015	On account of this they are before the throne of Aloha , and minister to him day and night in his temple . And he who sitteth upon the throne will protect them .
66007016	They will not hunger or thirst again , nor will the sun come down upon them , nor any heat ;
66007017	for it is the Lamb who is in the midst of the throne who will feed them , and will lead them unto fountains of living waters , and Aloha will wipe away every tear from their eyes .
66008001	AND when he had opened the SEVENTH SEAL , silence was in heaven , as the dividing of an hour .
66008002	And I saw the seven angels who stood before Aloha , and there were given to them SEVEN TRUMPETS .
66008003	And another angel came , and stood at the altar , and he had a censer of gold , and many perfumes were given to him , which he should give with the prayers of all saints upon the altar of gold that is before the throne ;
66008004	and the cloud of the perfumes of the prayers of the saints ascended from the hand of the angel before Aloha .
66008005	And the angel took the censer , and filled it from the fire of the altar , and cast forth upon the earth . And there were thunders , and lightnings , and voices , and movement .
66008006	And the seven angels which had the seven trumpets prepared them to sound . And the First sounded .
66008007	And there was hail , and fire mingled with the waters , and they were cast upon the earth ; and the third of the earth burned , and the third of the trees burned , and every green herb burned .
66008008	And the Second angel sounded . And as a great mountain burning with fire was cast into the sea ; and the third of the sea also became blood .
66008009	And the third of all creatures which were in the sea , which had lives , died , and the third of the ships were destroyed .
66008010	And the Third angel sounded . And there fell from heaven a star burning as a lamp , and it fell upon the third of the rivers , and upon fountains of waters .
66008011	And the name of the star is called Aphsinthos ; and the third of the waters became bitterness , and many men died from the waters because they were bitter .
66008012	And the Fourth angel sounded . And the third of the sun was absorbed , and the third of the moon , and the third of the stars , as that the third of them should be darkened ; and they were darkened , and the day shone not a third of it , and the night , in like manner .
66008013	And I beheld , and heard an eagle , flying in the midst , having a tail of blood , saying with a great voice , Woe , woe , to those who dwell upon earth , from the voice of the rest of the trumpets of the three angels which are about to sound !
66009001	AND the Fifth angel sounded . And I saw a star which fell from heaven unto the earth and there was given to him the key of the pit of the abyss .
66009002	And he opened the pit of the abyss , and smoke ascended from the pit , as the smoke of a burning furnace ; and the sun was darkened , and the air , from the smoke of the pit .
66009003	And from the smoke came forth locusts upon the earth . And there was given to them power such as scorpions have upon the earth .
66009004	And it was told them , that they should not hurt the herbage of the earth , nor any green ( thing ) , nor any tree , but only those men who had not the seal of Aloha upon their foreheads .
66009005	And it was given them , that they should not kill them , but torture them five months . And their torture was as the torture of a scorpion when he striketh a man .
66009006	And in those days men shall seek death , and shall not find ; and shall desire to die , and death will flee from them .
66009007	And the likeness of those locusts ( was this ) : they resemble the appearance of horses prepared for battle . And upon their heads ( was ) a crown of the likeness of gold ; and their faces ( were ) as the faces of men .
66009008	And they had hair as the hair of women , and their teeth were as of lions ;
66009009	and they had breast-plates as breast-plates of iron , and the sound of their wings was as the sound of the chariots of many horses running to battle .
66009010	And they had tails like those of scorpions , and stings ; and in their tails they have power to hurt men five months .
66009011	And they had a king over them , the angel of the abyss , and his name in Hebrew is Abadon ; but in Javanith his name is Apolon .
66009012	One woe hath gone . Behold , two woes yet come after it .
66009013	And the Sixth angel sounded . And I heard one voice from the horns of the altar of gold which was before Aloha ,
66009014	saying to the sixth angel who had the trumpet , Release the four angels which are bound in the great river Phraat .
66009015	And the four angels were released , they who were prepared for an hour , and for a day , and for a month , and for a year , to kill the third ( part ) of men .
66009016	And the number of the host of the horsemen was two myriads of myriads . I heard the number of them .
66009017	And as I beheld those horses in the vision , and those who sat upon them , ( I saw that ) they had breast-plates of fire , and jacinth , and sulphur ; and the heads of the horses were as the heads of lions , and from their mouths went out fire , and smoke , and sulphur .
66009018	And by these three plagues were the third of men killed ; from the fire , and from the smoke , and from the sulphur which went out of their mouths .
66009019	For the power of the horses is in their mouth and in their tails : for their tails were like serpents which had heads , and with them they wound .
66009020	And the rest of men who were not killed by those plagues , did not repent of the works of their hands , that they should not worship demons and idols of gold and of silver and of brass and of stone and of wood , which can neither see nor hear ;
66009021	nor repented they of their murders , nor of their sorceries , nor of their fornications , nor of their robberies .
66010001	AND I saw another mighty angel descending from heaven , clothed ( with a ) cloud , and the bow of the cloud ( was ) upon his head ; and his countenance was as the sun , and his feet as columns of fire .
66010002	And he had in his hand an open book ; and he set his right foot upon the sea , but the left upon the land ,
66010003	and cried with a great voice , as the roar of a lion . And when he had cried , seven thunders spoke their voices .
66010004	And when those seven thunders had spoken , I was about to write . And I heard a voice from heaven , which said , Seal those ( things ) which the seven thunders have spoken , and write them not .
66010005	And the angel whom I saw standing upon the sea and upon the land , lifted his right hand to heaven ,
66010006	and sware by Him who liveth for ever and ever , who created heaven and those who are in it , and the earth and those that are in it , and the sea and those that are in it , That time no more shall be ;
66010007	but ( that ) in the days of the voice of the seventh angel , when he is about to sound , the mystery of Aloha shall be completed , as he hath declared to his servants the prophets .
66010008	And the voice which I heard from heaven spake with me again , and said , Go , take the book which is open in the hand of the angel who standeth upon the sea and upon the land .
66010009	And I went to the angel , and said to him , Give me the book . And he said to me , Take , and eat it ; and it will embitter thee thy belly , but in thy mouth it will be sweet as honey .
66010010	And I took the book from the hand of the angel , and ate it . And it was in my mouth as sweet as honey ; and when I had eaten it my belly was made bitter .
66010011	And he said to me , It behoves thee yet to prophesy concerning many nations , and concerning peoples and princes and kings .
66011001	AND there was given to me a reed , like a staff ; and the angel stood , saying , Arise , measure the temple of Aloha , and the altar , and them who worship therein ;
66011002	and the court which is without the temple cast out , and do not measure it , because it is given to the Gentiles , and the holy city shall be trodden down , MONTHS FORTY AND TWO .
66011003	And I will give my two witnesses , and they shall prophesy , DAYS A THOUSAND AND TWO HUNDRED AND SIXTY , clothed in sackcloth .
66011004	These are the two olive ( trees ) and two candlesticks which before the Lord of the earth do stand .
66011005	And if a man willeth to wound them , fire cometh forth from their mouth , and devoureth their adversaries . And if a man willeth to wound ( them ) , thus must he be killed .
66011006	These have power to shut heaven , that rain it may not rain in those days ; and power have they over the waters , to turn them into blood , and to smite the earth with every plague as many times as they will .
66011007	And when they shall have completed their testimony , the beast of prey , which ascended from the abyss , will make war against them , and overcome them ,
66011008	and their dead bodies ( will be ) upon the wide street of the great city , which is called , spiritually , Sedum , and Metsreen , where also our Lord hath been crucified .
66011009	And of the peoples and tribes and nations and tongues , seeing their dead bodies days three and a half , will not suffer them to be laid in the tomb .
66011010	And they who dwell upon earth will rejoice over them and be gratified , and will send gifts to one another , because these two prophets tormented them who dwell upon earth .
66011011	And after those three days and a half , the spirit of life from Aloha entered into them , and they arose upon their feet . And great fear fell upon them who saw them .
66011012	And they heard a great voice from heaven , saying to them , Ascend hither . And they ascended to heaven in a cloud , and their adversaries beheld them .
66011013	And in that hour there was a great movement ; and one of ten of the city fell ; and there were killed in the movement the names of men seven thousand . And they who were left were made afraid , and gave glory to Aloha .
66011014	That second woe hath passed . Behold , the third woe cometh quickly .
66011015	And the Seventh angel sounded . And there were voices and thunders , saying , The kingdom of the world Is of our Lord , and of his Meshiha ; And he will reign for ever and ever !
66011016	And the twenty and four presbyters who were before the throne of Aloha , who were sitting upon their thrones , fell upon their faces and worshipped ,
66011017	saying , We give thanks to thee , Lord God omnipotent , Who art , and who wast ; Because thou hast taken thy great power , And hast reigned .
66011018	And the nations were angry ; But thy wrath is come , And the time of the dead , That they should be avenged ; And to give reward to thy servants , To the prophets , and to the saints , And to them who fear thy Name , To the small and to the great ; And to destroy them who have destroyed the earth .
66011019	And the temple of Aloha was opened in heaven ; and there was seen the ark of his covenant in his temple . And there were lightnings , and thunderings , and voices , and movement , and great hail .
66012001	AND a great sign was seen in heaven ; a woman clothed with the sun , and the moon beneath her feet , and upon her head a crown of twelve stars .
66012002	And having in her womb , she cried , and was in travail , and was pained to give birth .
66012003	And I saw another sign in heaven ; and behold a great dragon of fire , which had seven heads and ten horns , and upon his heads seven diadems .
66012004	And his tail drew the third of the stars of heaven , and cast them to the earth . And the dragon stood before the woman when she was about to give birth , that when she had given birth he might devour her son .
66012005	And she gave birth to a male child , who is to rule all nations with a rod of iron ; and her son was rapt unto Aloha and unto his throne .
66012006	And the woman fled into the desert , where she had a place prepared of Aloha , that there they might nourish her , DAYS A THOUSAND AND TWO HUNDRED AND SIXTY .
66012007	And there was war in heaven . And Mikoel and his angels to fight with the dragon ; and the dragon and his angels warred .
66012008	And they could not prevail , and their place was found no more in heaven .
66012009	And the great dragon was cast down , the old serpent , who is called the Deceiver , and the Adversary , which seduceth the whole habitable world . And he was cast upon the earth , and his angels with him were cast .
66012010	And I heard a great voice in heaven saying , Now is there salvation and strength , And the kingdom of our God , And the power of his Meshiha ; Because the accuser of our brethren is cast down , Who accused them before Aloha day and night .
66012011	And they overcame him by the blood of the Lamb , And by the word of his testimony . But they loved not their lives unto death .
66012012	Wherefore let the heavens be glad , And those who dwell in them . Woe to the earth and to the sea ! Because the deceiver hath gone down to you , Having great indignation , Knowing that little time is to him .
66012013	And when the dragon saw that he was cast down upon the earth , he pursued the woman which gave birth to the son .
66012014	And there were given to the woman two wings of a great eagle , that she might fly into the desert unto her place , where she was to be nourished A TIME , AND TIMES , AND THE DIVIDING OF A TIME , from the face of the serpent .
66012015	And the serpent cast forth from his mouth after the woman waters like a river , as that she might be carried off by the river which he would make .
66012016	And the earth succoured the woman , and the earth opened her mouth , and swallowed the river which the dragon had cast forth from his mouth .
66012017	And the dragon raged against the woman , and went to make war with those of the rest of her seed which kept the commandments of Aloha , and had the testimony of Jeshu .
66013001	And he stood upon the sand of the sea . AND I saw that a beast of prey ascended from the sea , having ten horns and seven heads , and upon his horns seven diadems ; and upon his heads names of blasphemy .
66013002	And the beast of prey which I saw was like a leopard , and his feet were as ( those ) of a bear , and his mouth as the mouth of a lion , and the dragon gave to him his power , and his throne , and great authority .
66013003	And one of his heads was wounded as to death . And his stroke of death was healed ; and all the earth wondered after the beast of prey .
66013004	And they worshipped the dragon because he had given authority to the beast of prey , ( saying , Who is like the beast of prey , ) and who is able to make war with him ?
66013005	And there was given him a mouth speaking great sayings and blasphemies , and authority was given him to act , MONTHS , FORTY AND TWO .
66013006	And he opened his mouth to blaspheme against Aloha , blaspheming his name , and his tabernacle , and those who dwell in heaven .
66013007	And there was given to him authority over every tribe , and people , and tongue , and nation ; and there was given to him to make war with the saints , to overcome them .
66013008	And all those who inhabit on the earth will worship him , they whose name is not written in the book of life of the Lamb from the foundation of the world .
66013009	If a man have ears , let him hear .
66013010	If any man into captivity leadeth , into captivity he shall go . If any man kill with the sword , it behoveth him by the sword to be killed . This is the patience and the faith of the saints .
66013011	And I saw another beast of prey ascending from the earth ; and he had two horns like those of the lamb , and he spake as the dragon .
