66013012	And all the authority of the first beast of prey he exercised before him ; and he made the earth and those who inhabit therein to worship the first beast of prey , whose wound of death was healed .
66013013	And he wrought great signs , as that also he would make fire to come down from heaven upon earth before men .
66013014	And he will seduce those who dwell upon earth to the making an image of the beast of prey who had the wound of the sword and lived .
66013015	And it was given to him to give spirit to the image of the beast of prey , ( that the image also of the beast of prey should speak , ) and to cause that all those whosoever who worshipped not the image of the beast of prey should be killed .
66013016	And he caused all , small and great , and rich and poor , and sons of freedom and slaves , to have given to them a signature upon their right hands , or upon their foreheads ;
66013017	as that no man might be able to buy or sell , unless he had the signature of the name of the beast of prey , or the number of his name .
66013018	Here is wisdom . Let him who hath mind , calculate the number of the beast of prey ; for the number is of man ; and his number is Six hundred and sixty and six .
66014001	AND I saw , and , behold , the Lamb stood upon the mountain of Sion , and with him the number , an hundred and forty and four thousand , who had his name , and the name of his Father , written upon their foreheads .
66014002	And I heard a voice from heaven , as the sound of many waters , and as the sound of great thunder ; and the voice which I heard was as harpers striking on their harps .
66014003	And they hymned a new hymn before the throne , and before the four living-ones , and the presbyters . And no man was able to learn the hymn , but the hundred and forty and four thousand ( who were redeemed from the earth ) .
66014004	These are they who with women have not been defiled , for they are virgins . These are they who follow the Lamb wherever he goeth . These by Jeshu were redeemed from men , first-fruits unto Aloha and to the Lamb .
66014005	And in their mouth falsehood was not found , for they are without spot .
66014006	And I saw another angel flying through heaven , who with blood had the everlasting gospel to preach to them who dwell on the earth , and unto every nation and tribe , and tongue and people ;
66014007	saying with a great voice , Serve Aloha , and give him glory : For the hour of his judgment cometh : And worship him who made heaven and earth , And the sea , and the fountains of waters .
66014008	And another angel , a second , followed him , saying , Fallen , fallen is Babel the Great , Which of the wine of the rage of her fornication Hath made all nations to drink .
66014009	And another angel , a third , followed them saying with a great voice , If any man worship the beast of prey and his image , And receive his mark on his brow , or in his hand ,
66014010	He also shall drink of the wine of the wrath of Aloha , Which is mingled without sparing In the cup of his anger . And he shall be tormented in fire and sulphur , Before his holy angels and before the throne :
66014011	And the smoke of their torment For ever and ever will ascend . And they have no rest day and night Who worship the beast of prey and his image .
66014012	Here is the patience of the saints , Who keep the commandments of Aloha , And the faith of Jeshu .
66014013	And I heard a voice from heaven , saying , Write , Blessed are the dead Who in Aloha die from now . Yes , saith the Spirit , That they may rest from their labours , For their works follow with them .
66014014	And I looked , and behold a white cloud , and upon the cloud sat ( one ) like the Son of man , having on his head a crown of gold , and in his hand a sharp sickle .
66014015	And another angel came out of the temple , crying with a great voice to him who sat upon the cloud .
66014016	And he thrust his sickle over the earth , and the earth was reaped .
66014017	And another angel came out of the temple which is in heaven , having also a sharp sickle .
66014018	And another angel came forth from the altar who had authority over the fire , and he cried with a great cry to him who had the sharp sickle , saying , Send forth thy sharp sickle , and reap the clusters of the vintage of the earth ; for the grapes of the earth are ripe .
66014019	And the angel thrust forth his sickle unto the earth , and reaped the vintage of the earth , and he cast into the winepress of the wrath of Aloha the Great .
66014020	And the winepress was trodden ( without the city , and blood flowed from the winepress ) unto the bridles of the horses , a thousand and six hundred stadia .
66015001	AND I saw another sign in heaven , great and wondrous , seven angels having the seven last plagues ; for in them is completed the wrath of Aloha .
66015002	And I saw as a sea of brightness commingled with fire ; and them who had won-the-victory from the beast of prey , and from his image , and from the number of his name , standing on the sea of brightness , having the harps of Aloha .
66015003	And they sang the song of Musha the servant of Aloha , and the song of the Lamb , saying , Great and wondrous are thy works , Lord God Omnipotent ; Just and true are thy ways , King of ages !
66015004	Who shall not fear thee , Lord , And glorify thy name ? For thou only art and holy and just ; Therefore all nations shall come And worship before thee ; Because thy judgments are revealed .
66015005	After these I saw , and the temple of the tabernacle of testimony which is in heaven was opened .
66015006	And the seven angels came forth , having the seven plagues , from the temple , clothed in linen pure , resplendent , and girded at their breasts with zones of gold .
66015007	And one of the four living-ones gave to the seven angels SEVEN VIALS of gold , which were full of the wrath of Aloha , who liveth for ever and ever .
66015008	And the temple was filled with smoke from the glory of Aloha , and from his power . And no man was able to enter the temple , until should be completed the seven plagues of the seven angels .
66016001	AND I heard a great voice saying to the seven angels , Go , and pour forth the seven vials of the wrath of Aloha upon the earth .
66016002	And the first went , and poured his vial upon the earth : and there became an ulcer , evil and painful , upon the men who had the mark of the beast of prey , and who worshipped the image of him .
66016003	And the second angel poured his vial upon the sea ; and it became blood as of the dead , and every living soul died which was in the sea .
66016004	And the third angel poured his vial upon the rivers , and upon the fountains of waters , and they became blood .
66016005	And I heard the angel of the waters saying , Righteous art Thou , who art , And who wast , and just ; Because thou hast judged these .
66016006	For the blood of saints and of prophets have they shed , And blood to them hast thou given to drink For they are worthy .
66016007	And I heard from the altar saying , Yes , Lord God Almighty ! True and just is thy judgment .
66016008	And the fourth poured out his vial upon the sun , and it was given to him to scorch men with fire ;
66016009	and men were scorched with great heat ; and men blasphemed the name of Aloha who hath power over these plagues ; and they repented not to give him glory .
66016010	And the fifth poured his vial upon the throne of the beast of prey ; and his kingdom became darkness , and they gnawed their tongues from pain ;
66016011	and they blasphemed the God of heaven from their pains , and from their ulcers , and repented not of their works .
66016012	And the sixth poured his vial upon the great river Phrat , and his waters were dried , that might be prepared the way of the kings who ( are ) from the rising of the sun .
66016013	And I saw from the mouth of the dragon , and from the mouth of the beast of prey , and from the mouth of the false prophet , three unclean spirits like frogs .
66016014	For they are spirits of demons , working signs ; they go to the kings of the whole inhabited world , to gather them to the battle of the great day of Aloha the Omnipotent .
66016015	And BEHOLD , I COME , as the thief . Blessed is he who watcheth , and keepeth his garments , lest naked he walk , and they see his shame .
66016016	And they gathered them to a place which is called in Hebrew Armagedon .
66016017	And the seventh poured his vial upon the air ; and a great voice went forth from the temple , from the throne , saying , IT IS DONE .
66016018	And there were lightnings and thunders and voices , and a great movement , such as was not since men were upon earth , as this movement so great .
66016019	And the great city became three parts , and the city of the nations fell ; and Babel the great was remembered before Aloha , to give to her the cup of the wine of the fury of his wrath .
66016020	And every island fled , and the mountains were not found .
66016021	And great hail , as of a talent ( in weight ) , was from heaven upon men ; and men blasphemed Aloha from the plague of hail , because the plague thereof was exceeding great .
66017001	AND one of the seven angels who had the seven vials came and spake with me , saying , Come ; I will show thee the judgment of the great harlot , which sitteth upon many waters :
66017002	with whom the kings of the earth have committed fornication , and they who dwell in the earth have been made drunk by the wine of her fornication .
66017003	And he led me into the desert , in the spirit ; and I saw a woman sitting on a beast of prey which was red , full of names of blasphemy , ( and ) having seven heads and ten horns .
66017004	And the woman was arrayed in purple and scarlet , and golden with gold and precious stones and pearls ; having a cup of gold in her hand , full of pollutions and uncleanness of her fornications the earth .
66017005	And upon her forehead the name was written , Mystery : Babel the Great , the Mother of Harlots and of the Abominations of the Earth .
66017006	And I saw the woman drunk with the blood of the saints , and with the blood of the martyrs of Jeshu ; and I wondered , when I saw , with great wonder .
66017007	And the angel said to me , Why wonderest thou ? I will tell thee the mystery of the woman , and of the beast of prey which beareth her , which hath the seven heads and the ten horns .
66017008	The beast of prey which thou seest , was , and is not ; and will ascend from the abyss , and go into perdition : and they who dwell on the earth will admire , they whose name is not written in the book of life from the foundations of the world , while they see the beast of prey , who was , and is not , and draweth nigh .
66017009	Here is the mind of him who hath wisdom : The seven heads are seven hills where the woman sitteth upon them .
66017010	And the kings are seven ; five have fallen , one is , the other not yet hath come : and when he hath come , a little while it behoveth him to abide .
66017011	And the beast of prey which was and is not , this is an Eighth , and is of the Seven , and is unto perdition .
66017012	And the ten horns which thou sawest are ten kings , the men who kingdom not yet have received ; but authority as kings one hour receive with the beast of prey .
66017013	They have one will , and their power and their authority unto the beast of prey they will give .
66017014	They with the Lamb will make war , and the Lamb will overcome them ; for he is the Lord of lords , and the King of kings , and they who are with him ( are ) the called and the chosen and the faithful .
66017015	And he said to me , The waters which thou sawest where the harlot is sitting , are peoples , and assemblages , and tongues .
66017016	And the ten horns which thou sawest , and the beast of prey , will hate the harlot , and make her desolate and naked ; and her flesh they will eat , and herself burn with fire .
66017017	For Aloha hath ingiven it to their hands that they might do his will , and perform one will to give their kingdom to the wild beast , until shall be fulfilled the words of Aloha .
66017018	And the woman which thou sawest is the great city which hath kingdom over the kings of the earth .
66018001	AFTER these I saw another angel descending from heaven , having great power ; and the earth brightened with his glory .
66018002	And he cried with a mighty voice , saying , Fallen , fallen hath Babel the Great , and hath become a den of demons , and the keep of every unclean spirit , and the keep of every unclean and abominable bird , and the keep of every unclean and abominable beast of prey .
66018003	For that of the wine of her rage have all nations drunk ; and the kings of the earth have with her committed fornication , and the merchants of the earth from the power of her luxuriance have become rich .
66018004	And I heard another voice from heaven , saying : COME OUT OF HER , MY PEOPLE , that you be not partakers of her sins , and lest of her plagues you receive .
66018005	For her sins have reached unto heaven , and Aloha hath remembered her iniquity .
66018006	Deal with her as she hath dealt with you , and double to her according to her works . In the cup which she mingled mingle to her double .
66018007	How much she hath pleased herself to be wanton , all this give her suffering and sorrow . For she said in her heart , I sit the queen , and am not a widow , and sorrow I see not .
66018008	Therefore in one day will come these her plagues , death and sorrow and hunger ; and in fire she will burn , for mighty is the Lord God who judgeth her .
66018009	And the kings of the earth who with her have committed fornication , and have been wanton , shall weep and lament and wail over her , when they see the smoke of her burning ;
66018010	standing from far , for fear of her torment , saying , Woe , woe , that great city Babel , that mighty city ! For in one hour hath come thy judgment .
66018011	And the merchants of the earth shall be sorrowful over her , because no man buyeth of their burden .
66018012	No more ( shall there be in thee ) the burden of gold , and of silver and of precious stones , and of pearls ; and of fine linen , and of purple , and of silk and scarlet ; and of every aromatic wood , and every vessel of elephant's-tooth , and every vessel of wood of great price , and of brass and of iron and of marble ;
66018013	and cinnamon and omomun and perfumes , and ointment and frankincense and wine and oil , and fine meal , and wheat , and cattle , and slaves , and horses and chariots , and bodies and souls of men .
66018014	And the fruit of the desire of thy soul hath gone from thee , and all those things which are delicious and brilliant have perished from thee ,
66018015	and the merchants of these things will find them no more . They who were made rich by her from afar will stand for fear of her torment , and wail and be sorrowful ,
66018016	saying , Woe , woe , that great city , which was arrayed in fine linen and purple and scarlet , and golded with gold , and ( adorned ) with precious stones and pearls ;
66018017	for in one hour hath been destroyed wealth like this . And every captain and every pilot who navigateth to the place , and the mariners , and all who serve on the sea , stood from afar ,
66018018	and cried , while beholding the smoke of her burning , saying , What is like to this great city !
66018019	And they cast dust upon their heads , and cried , weeping and lamenting , and saying , Woe , woe , that great city , in which were made rich all they who have ships in the sea , from the preciousness of her ! For in one hour she becometh desolate !
66018020	Rejoice over her , heaven , and the angels and apostles and prophets , because Aloha hath judged your judgment upon her .
66018021	And an angel took a stone , as a great millstone , and cast it into the sea , saying , Thus with force is cast down Babel the great city , and to be found no more .
66018022	And the voice of harpers , and of musicians , and of singers , and of trumpeters , shall be heard in thee no more . And no artificer , nor art , shall more be found in thee .
66018023	And the light of a lamp shall be seen in thee no more . And the voice of the bridegroom and of the bride shall be heard in thee no more . For thy merchants were the great ones of the earth ; for by thy sorcery were all nations seduced .
66018024	And in her was found the blood of prophets and of saints , and of all those who had been killed upon the earth .
66019001	AFTER these I heard a great voice of a multitudinous host in heaven , saying , Halleluia ! Salvation , and power , and glory , and honour , Be unto our God .
66019002	For true and righteous are his judgments ; Because he hath judged the great harlot Who corrupted the earth with her fornication , And hath avenged the blood of his servants at her hand .
66019003	And the second time they said , Halleluia ! And her smoke went up for ever and ever .
66019004	And the four-and-twenty presbyters fell , and the four living-ones , and worshipped Aloha who sitteth upon the throne , saying , Amen , Halleluia !
66019005	And a voice came forth from the throne , saying , Praise our God , all his servants , And they who fear him , small and great .
66019006	And I heard as the voice of a great host , as the voice of many waters , as the voice of mighty thunders , saying , Halleluia , For the Lord our God the Omnipotent reigneth !
66019007	Let us rejoice and exult and give glory unto him ; Because the marriage feast of the Lamb hath come , And his bride hath made herself ready .
66019008	And it was given to her to be arrayed in fine linen , resplendent and pure ; for the fine linen is the righteousness of saints .
66019009	And he said to me , Write , Blessed are they who to the supper of the marriage feast of the Lamb are called . And he said to me , These my words are the true sayings of Aloha .
66019010	And I fell before his feet to worship ; and he said to me , See ( that thou do it ) not ; thy fellowservant ( am I ) , and of thy brethren who have the testimony of Jeshu . Aloha worship ; for the testimony of Jeshu is the spirit of prophecy .
66019011	And I saw heaven opened . And behold a white horse , and he who sat upon him was called the Faithful and the True ; and in righteousness he judgeth and maketh war .
66019012	But his eyes were as the flame of fire , and upon his head were many diadems , having names written ; and the name which was written of him no man knoweth but himself .
66019013	And he was arrayed in a vestment sprinkled with blood , and his name was called The Word of Aloha .
66019014	And the armies of heaven followed him upon white horses , clothed in garments of fine linen , pure ( and ) white .
66019015	And from his mouth went forth a sharp sword of two edges , that therewith he might smite the nations . And he will rule the nations with a rod of iron , and he will tread the winepress of the fierceness of the wrath of Aloha the Omnipotent .
66019016	And he had upon his vestment and upon his thigh the name written , King of kings , and Lord of lords .
66019017	And I saw an angel standing in the sun . And he cried with a great voice , saying to all the fowls that fly in the midst of heaven , Come , gather to the great supper of Aloha ;
66019018	that ye may eat the flesh of kings , and the flesh of chiefs of thousands , and the flesh of heroes , and the flesh of horses and them who sit upon them , and the flesh of all the sons of liberty and of the slaves , and of the small and of the great .
66019019	And I saw the beast of prey , and the kings of the earth , and their armies , gathered together to make war with him who sat on the throne , and with his armies .
66019020	And the beast of prey was taken , and the false prophet with him who wrought signs before him , with which he deluded them who received the signature of the beast of prey , and them who worshipped his image ; and living they were both cast into the lake of fire which burneth with sulphur .
66019021	And the rest were slain with the sword of him who sat upon the horse ; with that ( sword ) which went forth from his mouth . And all the fowls were satiated with their flesh .
66020001	AND I saw an angel descending from heaven , having the key of the abyss , and a great chain in his hand .
66020002	And he laid hold of the dragon , that ancient serpent , who is the deceiver , and Satana , who seduced all the habitable world , and bound him a thousand years ;
66020003	and cast him into the abyss , and shut and sealed over him , that he should no more seduce the nations , until the thousand years be completed : but after them he will be loosed a little time .
66020004	And I saw thrones , and they sat upon them , and judgment was given to them ; and to the souls of them who had been cut asunder for the sake of the testimony of Jeshu , and for the word of Aloha , and them who had not worshipped the beast of prey nor his image , nor received his signature upon their forehead and upon their hands . And they lived and reigned with their Meshiha the thousand years .
66020005	This is the first resurrection .
66020006	Blessed and holy is he who hath part in the first resurrection : upon them the second death hath not power ; but they shall be priests of Aloha and of his Meshiha , and shall reign with him the thousand years .
66020007	And when the thousand years shall be fulfilled , Satana will be loosed from the place of his keeping ,
66020008	and will go forth and seduce the nations which are in the four corners of the earth , Gug and Mogug , to gather them to war , of whom the number is as the sand of the sea .
66020010	And the accuser who seduced them was cast into the lake of fire and of sulphur , as was also the beast of prey and the false prophet ; and they will be tormented day and night for ever and ever .
66020011	And I saw a great white throne , and Him who sat thereon , from whom from his face fled earth and heaven ; and place ( as ) to this was not found for them .
66020012	And I saw the dead , great and small , standing before the throne ; and the books were opened ; and another book was opened , which is ( the Book ) of Life . And the dead were judged from the ( records ) which are written in the books according to their works .
66020013	And the sea gave up the dead which were in it , and death and shiul gave up the dead which were in them . And they were judged every one according to their works .
66020014	And death and shiul were cast into the lake of fire , which is the second death .
66020015	And if a man was not found written in the Book of Life , he was cast into the lake of fire .
66021001	AND I saw new heavens and a new earth : for the first heaven and the first earth had gone , and the sea was no more .
66021002	And the holy city , Urishlem the new , I saw descending from heaven from Aloha , prepared as the bride is decked for her husband .
66021003	And I heard a great voice from heaven , saying , Behold , the tabernacle of Aloha is with men ; and he will dwell with them , and they shall be his people ; and Aloha himself will be with them , and will be their God .
66021004	And every tear shall be wiped away from their eyes , and death shall be no more ; nor sorrow , nor clamour , nor pain , shall be any more ; for the former things are passed away .
66021005	And He who sat upon the throne said , Behold , I make all things new . And he said , Write : for these are the faithful and true words of Aloha .
66021006	And he said to me , I am Olaph and Thau , the Beginning and the End . To him who thirsteth I will give of the water of life freely .
66021007	He who overcometh shall inherit these ; and I will be to him Aloha , and he shall be my son .
66021008	But the fearful , and the faithless , and sinners , and the unclean , and murderers , and fornicators , and sorcerers , and servers of idols , and all liars , ( shall have ) their portion in the lake which burneth with fire and sulphur ; which is the second death .
66021009	And one of the seven angels who had the seven vials full of the seven last plagues , came and spake with me . saying , Come , I will show thee the bride , the wife of the Lamb .
66021010	And he led me in spirit upon a great and high mountain , and showed me the holy city Urishlem , descending from heaven from Aloha ;
66021011	having the glory of Aloha , as the clearness of light , like a stone of great price , as the stone Jaspon , resembling crystallos ;
66021012	having a wall great and high , which had twelve gates , and names written upon them , which are the names of the twelve tribes of the sons of Israel .
66021013	On the east three gates , and on the north three gates , and on the south three gates , and on the west three gates .
66021014	And the wall of the city had twelve foundations ; and upon them the twelve names of the twelve apostles of the Lamb .
66021015	And he who talked with me had a measure , a rod of gold , that he might measure the city and the gates and the walls thereof .
66021016	And the city was set four-square , and the length of it was as the breadth : and he measured the city with the rod , upon twelve stadia of twelve thousand . And the length and the breadth and the height of it are equal .
66021017	And he measured the wall of it , an hundred and forty and four measures of the cubits of a man , that is , of the angel .
66021018	And the structure of the wall of it is ( of ) jaspis , and the city is of pure gold , like pure brightness .
66021019	And the foundations of the wall of the city were adorned with every precious stone : the first foundation was of jaspis , the second sathphiros , the third caledon , the fourth zmoragdo ,
66021020	the fifth sardonicos , the sixth sardion , the seventh crisuthilos , the eighth berulla , the ninth topadion , the tenth chrosoposius , the eleventh hyacinthos , the twelfth amuthistos .
66021021	And the twelve gates are twelve pearls , each of every one of the gates ( a pearl ) , and each of every one of the pearls ( a gate ) . And the wide street of the city was of pure gold as the brightness of light .
66021022	And a temple I saw not in it ; for the Lord , the Omnipotent , is the temple thereof and the Lamb .
66021023	And the city hath no need of the sun nor of the moon to enlighten it ; for the glory of Aloha illuminateth it , and the light thereof is the Lamb .
66021024	And the nations of the saved walk by the light of it , and the kings of the earth bring their glory and the honour of the nations into it .
66021025	And the gates of it shall not be shut by day , for night is not there .
66021026	And they shall bring the glory and honour of the nations into it ;
66021027	and nothing shall enter into it that defileth , nor that worketh uncleanness ; but they who are written in the book of life of the Lamb .
66022001	AND he showed me a river of waters of life , clear as crystal , coming forth from the throne of Aloha and of the Lamb .
66022002	In the midst of the wide street of it , and by the river , here and there , ( was ) the tree of life , which produced twelve fruits , in every month giving each one its fruit . And the leaves of the tree ( are ) for the healing of the nations .
66022003	And there shall be no more falling away ; and the throne of Aloha and of the Lamb shall be in it , and his servants shall serve him .
66022004	And they shall see his face , and his name shall be upon their foreheads .
66022005	And night shall be no more : nor any need have they of the light of a lamp , or the light of the sun ; for the Lord God enlighteneth them , and they will reign for ever and ever .
66022006	And he said to me , These sayings are faithfulness and truth . And the Lord God of the spirit of the prophets hath sent me , his angel , to show to his servants the things which must soon be done .
66022007	And behold , I come quickly . Blessed is he who keepeth the words of the prophecy of this book .
66022008	And also I Juhanon am he who heard and saw these . And when I had heard and seen , I fell to worship before the feet of the angel who showed them to me .
66022009	And he said to me , See ( that thou do it ) not . I am thy fellow-servant , and of thy brethren the prophets , and of them who keep the words of this book . Worship Aloha .
66022010	And he said to me , Seal not the words of the prophecy of this book ; for the time draweth nigh .
66022011	He who doeth evil shall work evil still ; and he who is filthy shall be filthy still ; and the righteous shall still do righteousness , and the holy be holy still .
66022012	Behold , I come quickly ; and my reward is with me , to render to every one according as is his work .
66022013	I am Olaph and Thau , the First and the Last , the Beginning and the End .
66022014	Blessed are they who do his commandments , that they may have authority to the tree of life , and by the gates may enter into the city .
66022015	Without are dogs , and sorcerers , and fornicators , and murderers , and servers of idols , and every one who loveth and maketh a lie .
66022016	I JESHU have sent mine angel to testify unto you these things before the churches . I am the root and the offspring of Dawid , as the bright , the morning star .
66022017	AND THE SPIRIT AND THE BRIDE SAY , COME ! AND HE WHO HEARETH SHALL SAY , COME ! AND HE WHO THIRSTETH MAY COME , AND HE WHO WILLETH , TO TAKE THE WATERS OF LIFE FREELY .
66022018	I testify to every one who heareth the words of the prophecy of this book , That if any man shall set upon them , Aloha will set upon him the plagues which are written in this book .
66022019	And if any man make to cease from the words of the book of this prophecy , Aloha will make to cease his portion of the tree of life , and of the holy city of which is written in this book .
66022020	He who testifieth these saith , Yes : I come quickly . Amen . Come , Lord Jeshu .
66022021	The grace of our Lord Jeshu Meshiha be with all the saints . Amen .
